GP12mtp176pu:2574: tasmādbhavatyā yaḥ kāmo na tathā sambhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:2575: ṛṣiputro na te kaścij jātu pāṇiṃ grahīṣyati // MatsP_26.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2576: phaliṣyati na me vidyā tvadvacaśceti tattayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2577: adhyāpayiṣyāmi ca yaṃ tasya vidyā phaliṣyati // MatsP_26.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2585: na te yaśaḥ praṇaśitā bhāgabhākca bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_26.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2590: kacādavetya tāṃ vidyāṃ kṛtārthā bharatarṣabha // MatsP_27.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2596: vāyurbhūtaḥ sa vastrāṇi sarvāṇyeva vyamiśrayat // MatsP_27.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2597: tato jalāt samuttīrya tāḥ kanyāḥ sahitāstadā /
GP12mtp176pu:2599: tatra vāso devayānyāḥ śarmiṣṭhā jagṛhe tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:2604: kasmādgṛhṇāsi me vastraṃ śiṣyā bhūtvā mamāsuri /
GP12mtp176pu:2605: samudācārahīnāyā na te śreyo bhaviṣyati // MatsP_27.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2607: āsīnaṃ ca śayānaṃ ca pitā te pitaraṃ mama /
GP12mtp176pu:2608: stauti pṛcchati cābhīkṣṇaṃ nīcasthaḥ suvinītavat // MatsP_27.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2610: sutāhaṃ stūyamānasya dadato na tu gṛhṇataḥ // MatsP_27.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2611: anāyudhā sāyudhāyāḥ kiṃ tvaṃ kupyasi bhikṣuki /
GP12mtp176pu:2612: lapsyase pratiyoddhāraṃ na ca tvāṃ gaṇayāmyaham // MatsP_27.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2614: sā vismayaṃ devayānīṃ gatāṃ saktāṃ ca vāsasi /
GP12mtp176pu:2620: nāhuṣiḥ prekṣamāṇo hi sa nipāne gatodake /
GP12mtp176pu:2621: dadarśa kanyāṃ tāṃ tatra dīptāmagniśikhām iva // MatsP_27.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2625: dīrghaṃ dhyāyasi cātyarthaṃ kasmācchvasiṣi cāturā // MatsP_27.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2626: kathaṃ ca patitā hy asmin kūpe vīruttṛṇāvṛte /
GP12mtp176pu:2627: duhitā caiva kasya tvaṃ vada sarvaṃ sumadhyame // MatsP_27.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2630: tasya śukrasya kanyāhaṃ tvaṃ māṃ nūnaṃ na budhyase // MatsP_27.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2631: eṣa me dakṣiṇo rājan pāṇis tāmranakhāṅguliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2632: samuddhara gṛhītvā māṃ kulīnastvaṃ hi me mataḥ // MatsP_27.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2633: jānāmi tvāṃ ca saṃśāntaṃ vīryavantaṃ yaśasvinam /
GP12mtp176pu:2634: tasmānmāṃ patitāṃ kūpād asmād uddhartumarhasi // MatsP_27.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2636: tāmatha brāhmaṇīṃ strīṃ ca vijñāya nahuṣātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2637: gṛhītvā dakṣiṇe pāṇāv ujjahāra tato 'vaṭāt // MatsP_27.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:2639: āmantrayitvā suśroṇīṃ yayātiḥ svapuraṃ yayau // MatsP_27.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2640: gate tu nāhuṣe tasmin devayānyapi ninditā /
GP12mtp176pu:2643: tvaritaṃ ghūrṇike gaccha sarvamācakṣva me pituḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2644: nedānīṃ tu pravekṣyāmi nagaraṃ vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // MatsP_27.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2646: sā tu vai tvaritaṃ gatvā ghūrṇikāsuramandiram /
GP12mtp176pu:2648: ācakhyau ca mahābhāgā devayānī vane hatā /
GP12mtp176pu:2650: śrutvā duhitaraṃ kāvyas tadā śarmiṣṭhayā hatām /
GP12mtp176pu:2651: tvarayā niryayau duḥkhān mārgamāṇaḥ sutāṃ vane // MatsP_27.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2655: manye duścaritaṃ te 'sti tasyeyaṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā // MatsP_27.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:2657: niṣkṛtir vāstu vā māstu śṛṇuṣvāvahito mama /
GP12mtp176pu:2660: evaṃ hi me kathayati śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // MatsP_27.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:2662: stuvato duhitāsi tvaṃ yācataḥ pratigṛhṇataḥ // MatsP_27.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:2667: prasādayiṣye śarmiṣṭhām ityuktā hi sakhī mayā // MatsP_27.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:2669: stuvato duhitā na tvaṃ bhadre na pratigṛhṇataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2671: vṛṣaparvaiva tadveda śakro rājā ca nāhuṣaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2672: acintyaṃ brahma nirdvaṃdvam aiśvaraṃ hi balaṃ mama // MatsP_27.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:2677: devayāni vijānīhi tena sarvamidaṃ jitam // MatsP_28.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2678: yaḥ samutpatitaṃ krodhaṃ nigṛhṇāti hayaṃ yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:2679: sa yantetyucyate sadbhir na yo raśmiṣu lambate // MatsP_28.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2681: devayāni vijānīhi tena sarvamidaṃ jitam // MatsP_28.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2683: yathoragastvacaṃ jīrṇāṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate // MatsP_28.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2685: yaśca tapto na tapati bhṛśaṃ so 'rthasya bhājanam // MatsP_28.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2686: yo yajedaśvamedhena māsi māsi śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2687: yastu kupyenna sarvasya tayorakrodhano varaḥ // MatsP_28.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2689: naitatprājñastu kurvīta viduste na balābalam // MatsP_28.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2691: vedāhaṃ tāta bālāpi kāryāṇāṃ tu gatāgatam /
GP12mtp176pu:2692: krodhe caivātivāde vā kāryasyāpi balābale // MatsP_28.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2694: asatsaṃkīrṇavṛtteṣu vāso mama na rocate // MatsP_28.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2696: na teṣu nivasetprājñaḥ śreyorthī pāpabuddhiṣu // MatsP_28.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2698: teṣu sādhuṣu vastavyaṃ sa vāsaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate // MatsP_28.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2701: na hy ato duṣkaraṃ manye tāta lokeṣvapi triṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:2702: yaḥ sapatnaśriyaṃ dīptāṃ hīnaśrīḥ paryupāsate // MatsP_28.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2708: nādharmaścarito rājan sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva /
GP12mtp176pu:2710: yadi nātmani putreṣu na cetpaśyati naptṛṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:2713: yadā ghātayase vipraṃ kacamāṅgirasaṃ tadā // MatsP_29.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2717: sthātuṃ tvadviṣaye rājan na śaknomi tvayā saha // MatsP_29.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2721: nāvadyaṃ na mṛṣāvādaṃ tvayi jānāmi bhārgava /
GP12mtp176pu:2722: tvayi satyaṃ ca dharmaśca tatprasīdatu māṃ bhavān // MatsP_29.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2726: samudraṃ praviśadhvaṃ vo diśo vā vrajatāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2727: duhiturnāpriyaṃ soḍhuṃ śakto 'haṃ dayitā hi me // MatsP_29.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2728: prasādyatāṃ devayānī jīvitaṃ yatra me sthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:2732: bhuvi hastirathāśvaṃ vā tasya tvaṃ mama ceśvaraḥ // MatsP_29.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2737: tatastu tvaritaḥ śukras tena rājñā samaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:2738: uvāca caināṃ subhage pratipannaṃ vacastava // MatsP_29.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2741: nābhijānāmi tatte 'haṃ rājā vadatu māṃ svayam // MatsP_29.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2747: anuyāsyati māṃ tatra yatra dāsyati me pitā // MatsP_29.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2749: uttiṣṭha dhātri gaccha tvaṃ śarmiṣṭhāṃ śīghramānaya /
GP12mtp176pu:2750: yaṃ ca kāmayate kāmaṃ devayānī karotu tam // MatsP_29.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2752: tato dhātrī tatra gatvā śarmiṣṭhām idamabravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:2753: uttiṣṭha bhadre śarmiṣṭhe jñātīnāṃ sukhamāvaha // MatsP_29.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2755: yaṃ sā kāmayate kāmaṃ sa kāryo 'tra tvayānaghe /
GP12mtp176pu:2758: yaṃ ca kāmayate kāmaṃ karavāṇyahamadya tam /
GP12mtp176pu:2759: mā gānmanyuvaśaṃ śukro devayānī ca matkṛte // MatsP_29.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2765: dhruvaṃ tvāṃ tatra yāsyāmi yatra dāsyati te pitā // MatsP_29.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2768: stūyamānasya duhitā kathaṃ dāsī bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_29.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2771: anuyāsyāmyahaṃ tatra yatra dāsyati te pitā // MatsP_29.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2777: amoghaṃ tava vijñānam asti vidyābalaṃ ca te // MatsP_29.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:2780: praviveśa puraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ pūjitaḥ sarvadānavaiḥ // MatsP_29.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2785: vanaṃ tadaiva niryātā krīḍārthaṃ varavarṇinī // MatsP_30.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2787: tameva deśaṃ samprāptā yathākāmaṃ cacāra sā // MatsP_30.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2789: krīḍantyo 'bhiratāḥ sarvāḥ pibantyo madhu mādhavam // MatsP_30.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2793: dadarśa devayānīṃ ca śarmiṣṭhāṃ tāśca yoṣitaḥ // MatsP_30.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2795: upaviṣṭāṃ ca dadṛśe devayānīṃ śucismitām // MatsP_30.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2800: gotre ca nāmanī caiva dvayoḥ pṛcchāmyato hy aham // MatsP_30.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2803: śuko nāmāsuraguruḥ sutāṃ jānīhi tasya mām // MatsP_30.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2804: iyaṃ ca me sakhī dāsī yatrāhaṃ tatra gāminī /
GP12mtp176pu:2807: kathaṃ tu te sakhī dāsī kanyeyaṃ varavarṇinī /
GP12mtp176pu:2808: asurendrasutā subhūḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // MatsP_30.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2811: vidhinā vihitaṃ jñātvā mā vicitraṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ // MatsP_30.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2812: rājavadrūpaveṣau te brāhmīṃ vācaṃ bibharṣi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:2813: kiṃnāmā tvaṃ kutaścāsi kasya putraśca śaṃsa me // MatsP_30.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2815: brahmacaryeṇa vedo me kṛtsnaḥ śrutipathaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2818: kena cārthena nṛpate hy enaṃ deśaṃ samāgataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2825: tvadadhīnāsmi bhadraṃ te sakhe bhartā ca me bhava // MatsP_30.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2827: viddhyauśanasi bhadraṃ te na tvadarho 'smi bhāmini /
GP12mtp176pu:2828: avivāhyāḥ sma rājāno devayāni pitustava // MatsP_30.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2830: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā kṣatraṃ kṣatraṃ brahmaṇi saṃśritam /
GP12mtp176pu:2831: ṛṣiśca ṛṣiputraśca nāhuṣādya bhajasva mām // MatsP_30.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2834: pṛthagdharmāḥ pṛthakchaucās teṣāṃ vai brāhmaṇo varaḥ // MatsP_30.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2836: pāṇigraho nāhuṣāyaṃ na puṃbhiḥ sevitaḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:2837: tvaṃ pāṇimagrahīdagre vṛṇomi tvāmahaṃ tataḥ // MatsP_30.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2838: kathaṃ tu me manasvinyāḥ pāṇimanyaḥ pumānspṛśet /
GP12mtp176pu:2848: hanti vipraḥ sarāṣṭrāṇi purāṇyapi hi kopitaḥ // MatsP_30.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2850: ato 'dattāṃ ca pitrā tvāṃ bhadre na vivahāmyaham // MatsP_30.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:2852: dattāṃ vahasva pitrā māṃ tvaṃ hi rājanvṛto mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2853: ayācato bhayaṃ nāsti dattāṃ ca pratigṛhṇataḥ // MatsP_30.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:2856: sarvaṃ nivedayāmāsa dhātrī tasmai yathātatham // MatsP_30.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2857: śrutvaiva ca sa rājānaṃ darśayāmāsa bhārgavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2858: dṛṣṭvaivam āgataṃ vipraṃ yayātiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // MatsP_30.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:2859: vavande brāhmaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2863: namaste dehi māmasmai loke nānyaṃ patiṃ vṛṇe // MatsP_30.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:2866: gṛhāṇemāṃ mayā dattāṃ mahiṣīṃ nahuṣātmaja // MatsP_30.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:2868: adharmo māṃ spṛśedevaṃ pāpam asyāśca bhārgava /
GP12mtp176pu:2869: varṇasaṃkarato brahmann iti tvāṃ pravṛṇomyaham // MatsP_30.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:2872: asminvivāhe tvaṃ ślāghyo rahaḥ pāpaṃ nudāmi te // MatsP_30.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:2874: anayā saha samprītim atulāṃ samavāpnuhi // MatsP_30.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:2875: iyaṃ cāpi kumārī te śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:2876: saṃpūjyā satataṃ rājan na caināṃ śayane hvaya // MatsP_30.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:2879: jagāma svapuraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ so 'nujñāto mahātmanā // MatsP_30.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:2889: devayānyā tu sahitaḥ sa nṛpo nahuṣātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2892: lebhe garbhaṃ prathamataḥ kumāraśca vyajāyata // MatsP_31.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2894: dadarśa yauvanaṃ prāptā ṛtuṃ sā kamalekṣaṇā // MatsP_31.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2896: ṛtukālaśca samprāpto na kaścinme patirvṛtaḥ // MatsP_31.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2897: kiṃ prāptaṃ kiṃca kartavyaṃ kathaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:2899: yathā tayā vṛto bhartā tathaivāhaṃ vṛṇomi tam /
GP12mtp176pu:2900: rājñā putraphalaṃ deyam iti me niścitā matiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2901: apīdānīṃ sa dharmātmā raho me darśanaṃ vrajet // MatsP_31.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2909: tava vā nāhuṣa gṛhe kaḥ striyaṃ draṣṭumarhati // MatsP_31.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2911: sā tvāṃ yāce prasādyeha rantumehi narādhipa // MatsP_31.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2914: rūpaṃ tu te na paśyāmi sūcyagramapi ninditam // MatsP_31.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2916: neyam āhvayitavyā te śayane vārṣaparvaṇī // MatsP_31.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2918: na narmayuktaṃ vacanaṃ hinasti na strīṣu rājan na vivāhakāle /
GP12mtp176pu:2920: pṛṣṭāstu sākṣye pravadanti cānyathā bhavanti mithyāvacanā narendra te /
GP12mtp176pu:2921: ekārthatāyāṃ tu samāhitāyāṃ mithyā vadantaṃ hy anṛtaṃ hinasti // MatsP_31.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2923: rājā pramāṇaṃ bhūtānāṃ sa vinaśyenmṛṣā vadan /
GP12mtp176pu:2924: arthakṛcchramapi prāpya na mithyā kartumutsahe // MatsP_31.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2926: samāv etau matau rājan patiḥ sakhyāśca yaḥ patiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2927: samaṃ vivāha ityāhuḥ sakhyā me 'si patiryataḥ // MatsP_31.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2930: tvaṃ ca yācasi kāmaṃ māṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi tat // MatsP_31.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2932: adharmāttrāhi māṃ rājan dharmaṃ ca pratipādaya /
GP12mtp176pu:2934: traya evādhanā rājan bhāryā dāsastathā sutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2935: yatte samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya taddhanam // MatsP_31.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:2936: devayānyā bhujiṣyāsmi vaśyā ca tava bhārgavī /
GP12mtp176pu:2937: sā cāhaṃ ca tvayā rājan bharaṇīyāṃ bhajasva mām // MatsP_31.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2940: pūjayāmāsa śarmiṣṭhāṃ dharmaṃ ca pratipādayan // MatsP_31.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2945: prajajñe ca tataḥ kāle rājñī rājīvalocanā /
GP12mtp176pu:2950: śrutvā kumāraṃ jātaṃ sā devayānī śucismitā /
GP12mtp176pu:2953: kimarthaṃ vṛjinaṃ subhrūḥ kṛtaṃ te kāmalubdhayā // MatsP_32.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2956: sa mayā tu varaḥ kāmaṃ yācito dharmasaṃhatam // MatsP_32.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2958: tasmād ṛṣer mamāpatyam iti satyaṃ bravīmi te // MatsP_32.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2961: apatyaṃ yadi te labdhaṃ jyeṣṭhācchreṣṭhācca vai dvijāt // MatsP_32.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2962: śobhanaṃ bhīru satyaṃ cet kathaṃ sa jñāyate dvijaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2965: ojasā tejasā caiva dīpyamānaṃ raviṃ yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:2966: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mama saṃpraṣṭuṃ śaktir nāsīcchucismite // MatsP_32.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2968: anyonyamevam uktvā ca samprahasya ca te mithaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2971: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva śakraviṣṇū ivāparau // MatsP_32.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2973: druhyaṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca trīnkumārānajījanat // MatsP_32.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2974: tataḥ kāle ca kasmiṃścid devayānī śucismitā /
GP12mtp176pu:2975: yayātisahitā rājañ jagāma haritaṃ vanam // MatsP_32.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2977: krīḍamānān tu visrabdhān vismitā cedamabravīt // MatsP_32.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2982: kiṃ nāmadheyagotre vaḥ putrakā brāhmaṇaḥ pitā // MatsP_32.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2983: vibrūta me yathātathyaṃ śrotukāmāsmyato hy aham /
GP12mtp176pu:2985: śarmiṣṭhāṃ mātaraṃ caiva tasyā ūcuḥ kumārakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2990: dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ tu bālānāṃ praṇayaṃ pārthivaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:2991: buddhvā ca tattvato devī śarmiṣṭhāmidamabravīt // MatsP_32.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2994: tamevāsuradharmaṃ tvam āsthitā na bibheṣi kim // MatsP_32.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2997: nyāyato dharmataścaiva carantī na bibhemi te // MatsP_32.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2998: yadā tvayā vṛto rājā vṛta eva tadā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2999: sakhībhartā hi dharmeṇa bhartā bhavati śobhane // MatsP_32.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3000: pūjyāsi mama mānyā ca śreṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā ca brāhmaṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:3001: tvatto hi me pūjyataro rājarṣiḥ kiṃ na vetsi tat // MatsP_32.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3004: rājannādyeha vatsyāmi vipriyaṃ me tvayā kṛtam // MatsP_32.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3006: tūrṇaṃ sakāśaṃ kāvyasya prasthitāṃ vyathitastadā // MatsP_32.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3008: nyavartata na sā caiva krodhasaṃraktalocanā // MatsP_32.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3011: sā tu dṛṣṭvaiva pitaram abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitā /
GP12mtp176pu:3017: durbhagāyā mama dvau tu putrau tāta bravīmi te // MatsP_32.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3018: dharmajña iti vikhyāta eṣa rājā bhṛgūdvaha /
GP12mtp176pu:3022: tasmājjarā tvām acirād dharṣayiṣyati durjayā // MatsP_32.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:3024: ṛtuṃ yo yācyamānāyā na dadāti pumānvṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3025: bhrūṇahetyucyate brahman sa ceha brahmavādibhiḥ // MatsP_32.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:3026: ṛtukāmāṃ striyaṃ yastu gamyāṃ rahasi yācitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3027: nopaiti yo hi dharmeṇa brahmahetyucyate budhaiḥ // MatsP_32.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:3031: na tv ahaṃ pratyavekṣyaste madadhīno 'si pārthiva /
GP12mtp176pu:3035: pūrvaṃ vayaḥ parityajya jarāṃ sadyo 'nvapadyata // MatsP_32.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:3038: prasādaṃ kuru me brahmañ jareyaṃ mā viśeta mām // MatsP_32.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:3040: nāhaṃ mṛṣā vadāmyetaj jarāṃ prāpto 'si bhūmipa /
GP12mtp176pu:3041: jarāṃ tv etāṃ tvamanyasmin saṃkrāmaya yadīcchasi // MatsP_32.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:3044: yo dadyānme vayaḥ putras tadbhavānanumanyatām // MatsP_32.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:3047: māmanudhyāya tattvena na ca pāpamavāpsyasi // MatsP_32.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:3048: vayo dāsyati te putro yaḥ sa rājā bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:3053: jarāṃ prāpya yayātistu svapuraṃ prāpya caiva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:3054: putraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca yadumityabravīddvijaḥ // MatsP_33.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3056: jarā valī ca māṃ tāta palitāni ca paryaguḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3057: kāvyasyośanasaḥ śāpān na ca tṛpto 'smi yauvane // MatsP_33.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3058: tvaṃ yado pratipadyasva pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:3060: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu tvadīyaṃ yauvanaṃ tv aham /
GP12mtp176pu:3061: dattvā sampratipatsyāmi pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3067: santi te bahavaḥ putrā mattaḥ priyatarā nṛpa /
GP12mtp176pu:3068: jarāṃ grahītuṃ dharmajña putramanyaṃ vṛṇīṣva vai // MatsP_33.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3070: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:3073: yauvanena careyaṃ vai viṣayāṃstava putraka // MatsP_33.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3075: tathaiva pratipatsyāmi pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3080: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:3081: tasmātprajā samucchedaṃ turvaso tava yāsyati // MatsP_33.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3083: piśitāśiṣu lokeṣu nūnaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_33.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3087: evaṃ sa turvasuṃ śaptvā yayātiḥ sutamātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3088: śarmiṣṭhāyāḥ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ druhyuṃ vacanamabravīt // MatsP_33.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3091: jarāṃ varṣasahasraṃ me yauvanaṃ svaṃ prayacchatām // MatsP_33.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3092: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu te pradāsyāmi yauvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3093: svaṃ cādāsyāmi bhūyo 'haṃ pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3095: na rājyaṃ na rathaṃ nāśvaṃ jīrṇo bhuṅkte na ca striyam /
GP12mtp176pu:3096: na rāgaścāsya bhavati tajjarāṃ te na kāmaye // MatsP_33.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3098: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:3099: taddruhyo vai priyaḥ kāmo na te sampatsyate kvacit // MatsP_33.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3101: arājyabhojaśabdaṃ tvaṃ tatra prāpsyasi sānvayaḥ // MatsP_33.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3103: ano tvaṃ pratipadyasva pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:3104: ekaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu careyaṃ yauvanena te // MatsP_33.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3107: na juhoti ca kāle 'gniṃ tāṃ jarāṃ nābhikāmaye // MatsP_33.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3109: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:3111: prajāśca yauvanaṃ prāptā vinaśyanti hy ano tava /
GP12mtp176pu:3114: pūro tvaṃ pratipadyasva pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:3115: tvaṃ me priyataraḥ putras tvaṃ varīyān bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_33.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3116: jarā valī ca māṃ tāta palitāni ca paryaguḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3117: kāvyasyośanasaḥ śāpān na ca tṛpto 'smi yauvane // MatsP_33.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3120: svaṃ caiva pratipatsye 'haṃ pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3123: yathāttha tvaṃ mahārāja tatkariṣyāmi te vacaḥ // MatsP_33.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3124: pratipatsyāmi te rājan pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:3125: gṛhāṇa yauvanaṃ mattaś cara kāmān yathepsitān // MatsP_33.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3127: yauvanaṃ bhavate dattvā cariṣyāmi yathecchayā // MatsP_33.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:3129: pūro prīto 'smi te vatsa varaṃ cemaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:3134: evamuktaḥ sa rājarṣiḥ kāvyaṃ smṛtvā mahāvratam /
GP12mtp176pu:3135: saṃkrāmayāmāsa jarāṃ tadā putre mahātmani // MatsP_34.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3139: dharmāviruddhānrājendro yathārhati sa eva hi // MatsP_34.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3144: dharmeṇa ca prajāḥ sarvā yathāvad anurañjayan /
GP12mtp176pu:3148: sa samprāpya śubhānkāmāṃs tṛptaḥ khinnaśca pārthivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3151: pūrṇam matvā tataḥ kālaṃ pūruṃ putramuvāca ha // MatsP_34.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3152: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
GP12mtp176pu:3155: nālamekasya tatsarvam iti matvā śamaṃ vrajet // MatsP_34.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3157: sevitā viṣayāḥ putra yauvanena mayā tava // MatsP_34.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3158: pūro prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te gṛhāṇedaṃ svayauvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3159: rājyaṃ caiva gṛhāṇedaṃ tvaṃ hi me priyakṛtsutaḥ // MatsP_34.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3162: yauvanaṃ pratipede sa pūruḥ svaṃ punarātmanaḥ // MatsP_34.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3163: abhiṣektukāmaṃ ca nṛpaṃ pūruṃ putraṃ kanīyasam /
GP12mtp176pu:3165: kathaṃ śukrasya dauhitraṃ devayānyāḥ sutaṃ prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:3166: jyeṣṭhaṃ yadumatikramya rājyaṃ pūroḥ pradāsyasi // MatsP_34.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3168: śarmiṣṭhāyāḥ suto druhyus tathānuḥ pūrureva ca // MatsP_34.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3172: brāhmaṇapramukhā varṇāḥ sarve śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3173: jyeṣṭhaṃ prati yato rājyaṃ na deyaṃ me kathaṃcana // MatsP_34.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3175: pratikūlaḥ pituryaśca na sa putraḥ satāṃ mataḥ // MatsP_34.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3177: sa putraḥ putravadyaśca vartate pitṛmātṛṣu // MatsP_34.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3179: druhyuṇā cānunā caivam apyavajñā kṛtā bhṛśam // MatsP_34.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3180: pūruṇā me kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ mānitaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3181: kanīyānmama dāyādo jarā yena dhṛtā mama // MatsP_34.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3182: mama kāmaḥ sa ca kṛtaḥ pūruṇā putrarūpiṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:3183: śukreṇa ca varo dattaḥ kāvyenośanasā svayam // MatsP_34.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3188: sarvaṃ so 'rhati kalyāṇaṃ kanīyānapi sa prabhuḥ // MatsP_34.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3189: arhaṃ pūroridaṃ rājyaṃ yaḥ priyaḥ priyakṛt tava /
GP12mtp176pu:3190: varadānena śukrasya na śakyaṃ vaktumuttaram // MatsP_34.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3193: abhiṣicya tataḥ pūruṃ rājye svasutamātmajam // MatsP_34.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3194: dattvā ca pūrave rājyaṃ vanavāsāya dīkṣitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3195: purātsa niryayau rājā brāhmaṇaistāpasaiḥ saha // MatsP_34.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3197: druhyoścaiva sutā bhojā anostu mlecchajātayaḥ // MatsP_34.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:3198: pūrostu pauravo vaṃśo yatra jāto 'si pārthiva /
GP12mtp176pu:3203: evaṃ sa nāhuṣo rājā yayātiḥ putramīpsitam /
GP12mtp176pu:3205: uṣitvā vanavāsaṃ sa brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṃśritaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3206: phalamūlāśano dānto yathā svargamito gataḥ // MatsP_35.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3207: sa gataḥ svargavāsaṃ tu nyavasanmuditaḥ sukhī /
GP12mtp176pu:3208: kālasya nātimahataḥ punaḥ śakreṇa pātitaḥ // MatsP_35.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3210: sthitaścāsīd antarikṣe sa tadeti śrutaṃ mayā // MatsP_35.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3211: tata eva punaścāpi gataḥ svargamiti śrutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3212: rājñā vasumatā sārdham aṣṭakena ca vīryavān /
GP12mtp176pu:3213: pratardanena śibinā sametya kila saṃsadi // MatsP_35.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3215: karmaṇā kena sa divaṃ punaḥ prāpto mahīpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3222: śrotumicchāmi deveśa divi ceha ca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_35.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3225: divi ceha ca puṇyārthāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm // MatsP_35.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3227: rājye 'bhiṣicya muditaḥ pravavrāja vanaṃ tadā // MatsP_35.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3235: ambubhakṣaḥ sa cābdāṃstrīn āsīn niyatavāṅmanāḥ // MatsP_35.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3237: pañcāgnimadhye ca tapas tepe saṃvatsaraṃ punaḥ // MatsP_35.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3248: kathānte tatra śakreṇa pṛṣṭaḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ // MatsP_36.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3250: yadā sa pūrustava rūpeṇa rājañ jarāṃ gṛhītvā pracacāra loke /
GP12mtp176pu:3251: tadā rājyaṃ sampradāyaiva tasmai tvayā kimuktaḥ kathayeha satyam // MatsP_36.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3256: akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas tathā titikṣur atitikṣor viśiṣṭaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3257: amānuṣebhyo mānuṣaśca pradhāno vidvāṃstathaivāviduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ // MatsP_36.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3259: ākroṣṭāraṃ nirdahati sukṛtaṃ cāsya vindati // MatsP_36.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3260: nāruntudaḥ syānna nṛśaṃsavādī na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta /
GP12mtp176pu:3261: yayāsya vācā para udvijeta na tāṃ vadedruśatīṃ pāpalaulyām // MatsP_36.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3262: aruntudaṃ puruṣaṃ tīvravācaṃ vākkaṇṭakair vitudantaṃ manuṣyān /
GP12mtp176pu:3263: vidyād alakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ mukhe nibaddhaṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam // MatsP_36.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3264: sadbhiḥ purastādabhipūjitaḥ syāt sadbhistathā pṛṣṭhato rakṣitaḥ syāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3265: sadā satām ativādāṃstitikṣet satāṃ vṛttaṃ pālayansādhuvṛtaḥ // MatsP_36.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3266: vāksāyakā vadanānniṣpatanti yair āhataḥ śocati vā tryahāni /
GP12mtp176pu:3267: parasya no marmasu te patanti tānpaṇḍito nāvasṛjetpareṣu // MatsP_36.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3269: yathā maitrī ca lokeṣu dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk // MatsP_36.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3270: tasmātsāntvaṃ sadā vācyaṃ na vācyaṃ paruṣaṃ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:3276: sarvāṇi kāryāṇi samāpya rājan gṛhānparityajya vanaṃ gato 'si /
GP12mtp176pu:3277: tattvāṃ pṛcchāmi nahuṣasya putra kenāpi tulyastapasā yayāte // MatsP_37.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3283: tasmāllokā hy antavantastaveme kṣīṇe puṇye patito 'syadya rājan // MatsP_37.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3285: surarṣigandharvanarāvamānāt kṣayaṃ gatā me yadi śakralokāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3286: icchāmyahaṃ suralokādvihīnaḥ satāṃ madhye patituṃ devarāja // MatsP_37.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3288: satāṃ sakāśe patito 'si rājaṃś cyutaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ yatra labdhāsi bhūyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3289: evaṃ viditvā tu punaryayāte na te 'vamānyāḥ sadṛśaḥ śreyase ca // MatsP_37.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3292: samprekṣya rājarṣivaro 'ṣṭakas tam uvāca saddharmavidhānagoptā // MatsP_37.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3294: kastvaṃ yuvā vāsavatulyarūpaḥ svatejasā dīpyamāno yathāgniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3295: patasyudīrṇāmbudharaprakāśaḥ khe khecarāṇāṃ pravaro yathārkaḥ // MatsP_37.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3297: kiṃnusvid etat patatīva sarve vitarkayantaḥ parimohitāḥ smaḥ // MatsP_37.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3299: pratyudgatāstvāṃ vayamadya sarve tasmātpāte tava jijñāsamānāḥ // MatsP_37.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3300: na cāpi tvāṃ dhṛṣṇavaḥ praṣṭum agre na ca tvamasmānpṛcchasi ke vayaṃ sma /
GP12mtp176pu:3301: tattvāṃ pṛcchāmi spṛhaṇīyarūpaṃ kasya tvaṃ vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvamāgāḥ // MatsP_37.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3302: bhayaṃ tu te vyetu viṣādamohau tyajāśu devendrasamānarūpa /
GP12mtp176pu:3303: tvāṃ vartamānaṃ hi satāṃ sakāśe śakro na soḍhuṃ balahāpi śaktaḥ // MatsP_37.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3304: santaḥ pratiṣṭhā hi sukhacyutānāṃ satāṃ sadaivāmararājakalpa /
GP12mtp176pu:3305: te saṃgatāḥ sthāvarajaṅgameśāḥ pratiṣṭhitastvaṃ sadṛśeṣu satsu // MatsP_37.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3307: prabhuḥ sūryaḥ prakāśācca satāṃ cābhyāgataḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_37.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3311: ahaṃ yayātirnahuṣasya putraḥ pūroḥ pitā sarvabhūtāvamānāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3313: ahaṃ hi pūrvo vayasā bhavadbhayas tenābhivādaṃ bhavatāṃ na yuñje /
GP12mtp176pu:3314: yo vidyayā tapasā janmanā vā vṛddhaḥ sa vai sambhavati dvijānām // MatsP_38.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3316: avādīstvaṃ vayasāsmi pravṛddha iti vai rājann adhikaḥ kathaṃcit /
GP12mtp176pu:3317: yo vai vidvāṃstapasā sampravṛddhaḥ sa eva pūjyo bhavati dvijānām // MatsP_38.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3319: pratikūlaṃ karmaṇāṃ pāpamāhus tadvartināṃ pravaṇaṃ pāpalokam /
GP12mtp176pu:3320: santo 'sato nānvavartanta te vai yadātmanaiṣāṃ pratikūlavādī // MatsP_38.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3321: abhūddhanaṃ me vipulaṃ mahadvai viceṣṭamāno 'dhigantā tadasmi /
GP12mtp176pu:3322: evaṃ pradhāryātmahite niviṣṭo yo vartate sa vijānāti dhīraḥ // MatsP_38.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3324: tattatprāpya na vihanyeta dhīro diṣṭaṃ balīya iti matvātmabuddhyā // MatsP_38.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3325: sukhaṃ hi janturyadi vāpi duḥkhaṃ daivādhīnaṃ vindati nātmaśaktyā /
GP12mtp176pu:3326: tasmāddiṣṭaṃ balavanmanyamāno na saṃjvarennāpi hṛṣyetkadācit // MatsP_38.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3327: duḥkhe na tapyeta sukhe na hṛṣyet samena varteta sadaiva dhīraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3328: diṣṭaṃ balīya iti manyamāno na saṃjvarennāpi hṛṣyet kadācit // MatsP_38.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3329: bhaye na muhyāmyaṣṭakāhaṃ kadācit saṃtāpo me manaso nāsti kaścit /
GP12mtp176pu:3330: dhātā yathā māṃ vidadhāti loke dhruvaṃ tathāhaṃ bhaviteti matvā // MatsP_38.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3331: saṃsvedajā hy aṇḍajā hy udbhidaśca sarīsṛpāḥ kṛmayo 'py apsu matsyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3332: tathāśmānastṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ ca sarvaṃ diṣṭakṣaye svāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhajante // MatsP_38.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3333: anityatāṃ sukhaduḥkhasya buddhvā kasmāt saṃtāpamaṣṭakāhaṃ bhajeyam /
GP12mtp176pu:3334: kiṃ kuryāṃ vai kiṃca kṛtvā na tapye tasmātsaṃtāpaṃ varjayāmyapramattaḥ // MatsP_38.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3336: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ yayātim athāṣṭakaḥ punarevānvapṛcchat /
GP12mtp176pu:3337: mātāmahaṃ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ yatra sthitaṃ svargaloke yathāvat // MatsP_38.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3339: ye ye lokāḥ pārthivendra pradhānās tvayā bhuktā yaṃ ca kāle yathā ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3340: tanme rājanbrūhi sarvaṃ yathāvat kṣetrajñavadbhāṣase tvaṃ hi dharmam // MatsP_38.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3342: rājāhamāsaṃ tv iha sārvabhaumas tato lokānmahataś cājaryaṃ vai /
GP12mtp176pu:3344: tataḥ purīṃ puruhūtasya ramyāṃ sahasradvārāṃ śatayojanāntām /
GP12mtp176pu:3346: tato divyamajaraṃ prāpya lokaṃ prajāpater lokapaterdurāpam /
GP12mtp176pu:3348: devasya devasya niveśane ca vijitya lokānnyavasaṃ yatheṣṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:3352: tatra sthitaṃ māṃ devasukheṣu saktaṃ kāle 'tīte mahati tato 'timātram /
GP12mtp176pu:3353: dūto devānāmabravīdugrarūpo dhvaṃsetyuccaistriḥ plutena svareṇa // MatsP_38.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3354: etāvanme viditaṃ rājasiṃha tato bhraṣṭo 'haṃ nandanātkṣīṇapuṇyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3355: vāco 'śrauṣaṃ cāntarikṣe surāṇām anukrośācchocatāṃ māṃ narendra // MatsP_38.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3357: tānabruvaṃ patamānastadāhaṃ satāṃ madhye nipateyaṃ kathaṃ nu // MatsP_38.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3359: havirgandhair darśitāṃ yajñabhūmiṃ dhūmāpāṅgaṃ parigṛhya pratītām // MatsP_38.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3364: kiṃkāraṇaṃ kārtayugapradhāna hitvā tadvai vasudhām anvapadyaḥ // MatsP_39.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3366: jñātiḥ suhṛtsvajano yo yatheha kṣīṇe vitte tyajyate mānavairhi /
GP12mtp176pu:3367: tathā svarge kṣīṇapuṇyaṃ manuṣyaṃ tyajanti sadyaḥ khecarā devasaṃghāḥ // MatsP_39.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3369: kathaṃ tasminkṣīṇapuṇyā bhavanti saṃmuhyate me 'tra mano 'timātram /
GP12mtp176pu:3370: kiṃviśiṣṭāḥ kasya dhāmopayānti tadvai brūhi kṣetravittvaṃ mato me // MatsP_39.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3372: imaṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ te patanti lālapyamānā naradeva sarve /
GP12mtp176pu:3373: te kaṅkagomāyupalāśanārthaṃ kṣitau vivṛddhiṃ bahudhā prayānti // MatsP_39.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3374: tasmādevaṃ varjanīyaṃ narendra duṣṭaṃ loke garhaṇīyaṃ ca karma /
GP12mtp176pu:3375: ākhyātaṃ te pārthiva sarvametad bhūyaścedānīṃ vada kiṃ te vadāmi // MatsP_39.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3377: yadā tu tāṃs te vitudante vayāṃsi tathā gṛdhrāḥ śitikaṇṭhāḥ pataṃgāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3378: kathaṃ bhavanti kathamābhavanti tvatto bhaumaṃ narakamahaṃ śṛṇomi // MatsP_39.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3380: ūrdhvaṃ dehātkarmaṇo jṛmbhamāṇād vyaktaṃ pṛthivyām anusaṃcaranti /
GP12mtp176pu:3381: imaṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ te patanti nāvekṣante varṣapūgānanekān // MatsP_39.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3382: ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi patanti vyomni tathāśītiṃ caiva tu vatsarāṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:3383: tānvai nudante prapatantaḥ prayātān bhīmā bhaumā rākṣasās tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāḥ // MatsP_39.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3386: kathaṃ bhavanti kathamābhavanti kathaṃbhūtā garbhabhūtā bhavanti // MatsP_39.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3388: asṛgretaḥ puṣparasānuyuktam anveti sadyaḥ puruṣeṇa sṛṣṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:3389: tava tarayā raja āpadyate ca sa garbhabhūtaḥ samupaiti tatra // MatsP_39.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3390: vanaspatīn oṣadhīṃścāviśanti apo vāyuṃ pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam /
GP12mtp176pu:3391: catuṣpadaṃ dvipadaṃ cāpi sarva evaṃbhūtā garbhabhūtā bhavanti // MatsP_39.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3394: āpadyamāno narayonimetām ācakṣva me saṃśayātpṛcchatastvam // MatsP_39.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3395: śarīradehādisamucchrayaṃ ca cakṣuḥśrotre labhate kena saṃjñām /
GP12mtp176pu:3396: etatsarvaṃ tāta ācakṣva pṛṣṭaḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ manyamānā hi sarve // MatsP_39.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3398: vāyuḥ samutkarṣati garbhayonim ṛtau retaḥ puṣparasānuyuktam /
GP12mtp176pu:3399: sa tatra tanmātrakṛtādhikāraḥ krameṇa saṃvardhayatīha garbham // MatsP_39.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3400: sa jāyamāno 'tha gṛhītamātraḥ saṃjñāmadhiṣṭhāya tato manuṣyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3401: sa śrotrābhyāṃ vedayatīha śabdaṃ sa vai rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā ca // MatsP_39.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3402: ghrāṇena gandhaṃ jihvayātho rasaṃ ca tvacā sparśaṃ manasā devabhāvam /
GP12mtp176pu:3403: ityaṣṭakehopacitaṃ hi viddhi mahātmanaḥ prāṇabhṛtaḥ śarīre // MatsP_39.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3405: yaḥ saṃsthitaḥ puruṣo dahyate vā nikhanyate vāpi nikṛṣyate vā /
GP12mtp176pu:3406: abhāvabhūtaḥ sa vināśametya kenātmānaṃ cetayate purastāt // MatsP_39.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3408: hitvā so 'sūn suptavanniṣṭhitatvāt purodhāya sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3409: anyāṃ yoniṃ puṇyapāpānusārāṃ hitvā dehaṃ bhajate rājasiṃha // MatsP_39.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3410: puṇyāṃ yoniṃ puṇyakṛto viśanti pāpāṃ yoniṃ pāpakṛto vrajanti /
GP12mtp176pu:3411: kīṭāḥ pataṃgāśca bhavanti pāpān na me vivakṣāsti mahānubhāva // MatsP_39.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3412: catuṣpadā dvipadāḥ pakṣiṇaśca tathābhūtā garbhabhūtā bhavanti /
GP12mtp176pu:3413: ākhyātametannikhilaṃ hi sarvaṃ bhūyastu kiṃ pṛcchasi rājasiṃha // MatsP_39.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3415: kiṃ svitkṛtvā labhate tāta saṃjñāṃ martyaḥ śreṣṭhāṃ tapasā vidyayā vā /
GP12mtp176pu:3416: tanme pṛṣṭaḥ śaṃsa sarvaṃ yathāvac chubhāṃllokān yena gacchetkrameṇa // MatsP_39.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3418: tapaśca dānaṃ ca śamo damaśca hrīr ārjavaṃ sarvabhūtānukampā /
GP12mtp176pu:3419: svargasya lokasya vadanti santo dvārāṇi saptaiva mahānti puṃsām // MatsP_39.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3421: naśyanti mānena tamo 'bhibhūtāḥ puṃsaḥ sadaiveti vadanti santaḥ // MatsP_39.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3422: adhīyānaḥ paṇḍitaṃ manyamāno yo vidyayā hanti yaśaḥ parasya /
GP12mtp176pu:3423: tasyāntavantaḥ puruṣasya lokā na cāsya tadbrahmaphalaṃ dadāti // MatsP_39.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3426: na mānyamāno mudamādadīta na saṃtāpaṃ prāpnuyāccāvamānāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3427: santaḥ sataḥ pūjayantīha loke nāsādhavaḥ sādhubuddhiṃ labhante // MatsP_39.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3428: iti dadyāditi yajed ityadhīyīta me śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:3430: yenāśrayaṃ vedayante purāṇaṃ manīṣiṇo mānase mānayuktam /
GP12mtp176pu:3431: tanniḥśreyas tena saṃyogametya parāṃ śāntiṃ prāpnuyuḥ pretya ceha // MatsP_39.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3435: carangṛhasthaḥ kathameti devān kathaṃ bhikṣuḥ katham ācāryakarmā /
GP12mtp176pu:3436: vānaprasthaḥ satpathe saṃniviṣṭo bahūnyasmin samprati vedayanti // MatsP_40.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3438: āhūtādhyāyī gurukarmasu codyataḥ pūrvotthāyī caramaṃ copaśāyī /
GP12mtp176pu:3439: mṛdurdānto dhṛtimānapramattaḥ svādhyāyaśīlaḥ sidhyati brahmacārī // MatsP_40.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3442: svavīryajīvī vṛjinānnivṛtto dātā parebhyo na paropatāpī /
GP12mtp176pu:3443: tādṛṅmuniḥ siddhimupaiti mukhyāṃ vasann araṇye niyatāhāraceṣṭaḥ // MatsP_40.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3444: aśilpajīvī vigṛhaśca nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ sarvato vipramuktaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3445: anokaśāyī laghu lipsamānaś caran deśānekacaraḥ sa bhikṣuḥ // MatsP_40.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3446: rātryā yayā cābhiratāśca lokā bhavanti kāmābhijitāḥ sukhena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3447: tāmeva rātriṃ prayateta vidvān araṇyasaṃstho bhavituṃ yatātmā // MatsP_40.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3449: araṇyavāsī sukṛtaṃ dadhāti muktvā tv araṇye svaśarīradhātūn // MatsP_40.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3452: bhavantīti tadācakṣva śrotum icchāmahe vayam // MatsP_40.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3454: araṇye vasato yasya grāmo bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3455: grāme vā vasato 'raṇyaṃ sa muniḥ syājjanādhipa // MatsP_40.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3458: grāme vā vasato 'raṇyaṃ kathaṃ bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_40.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3461: tathāsya vasato 'raṇye grāmo bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_40.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3465: tadāsya vasato grāme 'raṇyaṃ bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_40.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3467: ātiṣṭheta munir maunaṃ sa loke siddhimāpnuyāt // MatsP_40.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3471: yadā bhavati nirdvaṃdvo munirmaunaṃ samāsthitaḥ // MatsP_40.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3472: atha lokamimaṃ jitvā lokaṃ cāpi jayetparam /
GP12mtp176pu:3474: athāsya lokaiḥ sarvo yaḥ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // MatsP_40.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3482: grāma eva caranbhikṣus tayoḥ pūrvataraṃ gataḥ // MatsP_41.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3483: aprāpyaṃ dīrghamāyuśca yaḥ prāpto vikṛtiṃ caret /
GP12mtp176pu:3484: tapyeta yadi tatkṛtvā caretsograṃ tapastataḥ // MatsP_41.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3485: yadvai nṛśaṃsaṃ tadapat hyamāhur yaḥ sevate dharmamanarthabuddhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3486: asāvanīśaḥ sa tathaiva rājaṃs tadārjavaṃ sa samādhistadāryam // MatsP_41.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3488: kenādya tvaṃ tu prahito 'si rājan yuvā sragvī darśanīyaḥ suvarcāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3489: kuta āgataḥ katamasyāṃ diśi tvamutāhosvitpārthivasthānam asti // MatsP_41.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3491: imaṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ kṣīṇapuṇyaḥ praveṣṭum ūrvīṃ gaganādviprakīrṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3492: uktvāhaṃ vaḥ prapatiṣyāmy anantaraṃ tvarantvamī brahmaṇo lokapā ye // MatsP_41.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3493: satāṃ sakāśe tu vṛtaḥ prapātas te saṅgatā guṇavantastu sarve /
GP12mtp176pu:3494: śakrācca labdho hi varo mayaiṣa patiṣyatā bhūmitalaṃ narendra // MatsP_41.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3496: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ prapatantaṃ prapātaṃ yadi lokāḥ pārthiva santi me 'tra /
GP12mtp176pu:3497: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye // MatsP_41.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3499: yāvatpṛthivyāṃ vihitaṃ gavāśvaṃ sahāraṇyaiḥ paśubhiḥ pakṣibhiśca /
GP12mtp176pu:3500: tāvallokā divi te saṃsthitā vai tathā vijānīhi narendrasiṃha // MatsP_41.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3502: tāṃste dadāmi mā prapata prapātaṃ ye me lokā divi rājendra santi /
GP12mtp176pu:3503: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritāstānākrama kṣipramamitrahā'thasi // MatsP_41.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3506: yathā pradeyaṃ satataṃ dvijebhyas tadā dade pūrvam ahaṃ narendra // MatsP_41.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3507: nābrāhmaṇaḥ kṛpaṇo jātu jīved yadyapi syādbrāhmaṇī vīrapatnī /
GP12mtp176pu:3508: so 'haṃ yadevākṛtapūrvaṃ careyaṃ vivitsamānaḥ kimu tatra sādhuḥ // MatsP_41.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3510: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ spṛhaṇīyarūpa pratardano 'haṃ yadi me santi lokāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3511: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śrutāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye // MatsP_41.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3513: santi lokā bahavaste narendra apyekaikaṃ sapta śatānyahāni /
GP12mtp176pu:3514: madhucyuto ghṛtavanto viśokās tenāntavantaḥ pratipālayanti // MatsP_41.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3516: tāṃste dadāmi patamānasya rājan ye me lokāstava te vai bhavantu /
GP12mtp176pu:3517: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritās tānākrama kṣipramapetamohaḥ // MatsP_41.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3519: nu tulyatejāḥ sukṛtaṃ hi kāmaye yogakṣemaṃ pārthivātpārthivaḥ san /
GP12mtp176pu:3520: daivādeśādāpadaṃ prāpya vidvāṃś carennṛśaṃsaṃ hi na jātu rājā // MatsP_41.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3521: dharmyaṃ mārgaṃ cintayāno yaśasyaṃ kuryāttapo dharmamavekṣamāṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3522: na madvidho dharmabuddhirhi rājā hy evaṃ kuryātkṛpaṇaṃ māṃ yathāttha // MatsP_41.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3523: kuryāmapūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ yadanyair vivitsamānaḥ kim u tatra sādhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3524: bruvāṇamevaṃ nṛpatiṃ yayātiṃ nṛpottamo vasumānabravīt tam // MatsP_41.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3528: pṛcchāmyahaṃ vasumānauṣadaśvir yadyasti loko divi mahyaṃ narendra /
GP12mtp176pu:3529: yadyantarikṣe prathito mahātman kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye // MatsP_42.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3531: yadantarikṣaṃ pṛthivī diśaśca yattejasā tapate bhānumāṃśca /
GP12mtp176pu:3532: lokās tāvanto divi saṃsthitā vai te tvāṃ bhavantaṃ pratipālayanti // MatsP_42.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3534: tāṃs te dadāmi pata māṃ prapātaṃ ye me lokāstava te vai bhavantu /
GP12mtp176pu:3535: krīṇīṣvaināṃs tṛṇakenāpi rājan pratigrahaste yadi samyakpraduṣṭaḥ // MatsP_42.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3537: na mithyāhaṃ vikrayaṃ vai smarāmi mayā kṛtaṃ śiśubhāve 'pi rājan /
GP12mtp176pu:3538: kuryāṃ na caivākṛtapūrvamanyair vivitsamāno vasumanna sādhu // MatsP_42.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3540: tāṃs tvaṃ lokānpratipadyasva rājan mayā dattānyadi neṣṭaḥ krayaste /
GP12mtp176pu:3541: nāhaṃ tānvai pratigantā narendra sarve lokāstāvakā vai bhavantu // MatsP_42.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3543: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ śibirauśīnaro 'haṃ mamāpi lokā yadi santi tāta /
GP12mtp176pu:3544: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye // MatsP_42.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3546: na tvaṃ vācā hṛdayenāpi rājan parīpsamāno māvamaṃsthā narendra /
GP12mtp176pu:3547: tenānantā divi lokāḥ sthitā vai vidyudrūpāḥ svanavanto mahāntaḥ // MatsP_42.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3549: tāṃs tvaṃ lokānpratipadyasva rājan mayā dattānyadi neṣṭaḥ krayaste /
GP12mtp176pu:3550: na cāhaṃ tānpratipadya dattvā yatra tvaṃ tāta gantāsi lokān // MatsP_42.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3553: tathādya loke na rame 'nyadatte tasmācchibe nābhinandāmi vācam // MatsP_42.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3556: sarve pradāya tāṃllokān gantāro narakaṃ vayam // MatsP_42.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3559: ahaṃ tu nābhigṛhṇāmi yatkṛtaṃ na mayā purā // MatsP_42.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3560: alipsamānasya tu me yaduktaṃ na tattathāstīha narendrasiṃha /
GP12mtp176pu:3561: asya pradānasya yadeva yuktaṃ tasyaiva cānantaphalaṃ bhaviṣyam // MatsP_42.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3564: uccaiḥ santaḥ prakāśante jvalanto 'gniśikhā iva // MatsP_42.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3566: bhavatāṃ mama caivaite rathā bhānti hiraṇmayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3567: āruhyaiteṣu gantavyaṃ bhavadbhiśca mayā saha // MatsP_42.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3572: sarvairidānīṃ gantavyaṃ saha svargo jito yataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3573: eṣa vo virajāḥ panthā dṛśyate devasadmagaḥ // MatsP_42.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3576: ākrāmanto divaṃ bhānti dharmeṇāvṛtya rodasī // MatsP_42.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3578: ahaṃ manye pūrvameko 'bhigantā sakhā cendraḥ sarvathā me mahātmā /
GP12mtp176pu:3579: kasmādevaṃ śibirauśīnaro 'yam eko 'tyayāt sarvaṃ vegena vāhān // MatsP_42.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3582: uśīnarasya putro 'yaṃ tasmācchreṣṭho hi vaḥ śibiḥ // MatsP_42.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3583: dānaṃ śaucaṃ satyamatho hy ahiṃsā hrīḥ śrīstitikṣā samatānṛśaṃsyam /
GP12mtp176pu:3584: rājantyetānyatha sarvāṇi rājñi śibau sthitānyapratime subuddhyā /
GP12mtp176pu:3585: evaṃ vṛttaṃ hrīniṣevī bibharti tasmācchibir abhigantā rathena // MatsP_42.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3588: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ nṛpate brūhi satyaṃ kutaśca kaścāsi kathaṃ tvamāgāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3589: kṛtaṃ tvayā yaddhi na tasya kartā loke tvadanyo brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vā // MatsP_42.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3591: yayātirasmi nahuṣasya putraḥ pūroḥ pitā sārvabhaumastvihāsam /
GP12mtp176pu:3592: guhyaṃ mantraṃ māmakebhyo bravīmi mātāmaho bhavatāṃ suprakāśaḥ // MatsP_42.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3593: sarvām imāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirjigāya ṛddhāṃ mahīmadadāṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3594: medhyānaśvānnaikaśas tānsurūpāṃs tadā devāḥ puṇyabhājo bhavanti // MatsP_42.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3596: gobhiḥ suvarṇaiśca dhanaiśca mukhyair aśvāḥ sanāgāḥ śataśastvarbudāni // MatsP_42.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3597: satyena me dyauśca vasuṃdharā ca tathaivāgnirjvalate mānuṣeṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:3598: na me vṛthā vyāhṛtameva vākyaṃ satyaṃ hi santaḥ pratipūjayanti // MatsP_42.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3599: sādhvaṣṭaka prabravīmīha satyaṃ pratardanaṃ vasumantaṃ śibiṃ ca /*
GP12mtp176pu:3600: sarve devā munayaśca lokāḥ satyena pūjyā iti me manogatam // MatsP_42.26 //*
GP12mtp176pu:3601: yo naḥ sarvajitaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ nivedayet /
GP12mtp176pu:3602: anasūyur dvijāgnyebhyaḥ sa bhajennaḥ salokatām // MatsP_42.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3604: evaṃ rājansa mahātmā yayātiḥ svadauhitraistārito mitravaryaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3605: tyaktvā mahīṃ paramodārakarmā svargaṃ gataḥ karmabhirvyāpya pṛthvīm // MatsP_42.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3606: evaṃ sarvaṃ vistarato yathāvad ākhyātaṃ te caritaṃ nāhuṣasya /
GP12mtp176pu:3607: vaṃśo yasya prathitaṃ pauraveyo yasmiñjātastvaṃ manujendrakalpaḥ // MatsP_42.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3612: vismitaḥ parayā prītyā pūrṇacandra ivābabhau // MatsP_43.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3615: pratigṛhya tataḥ sarvaṃ yadrājñā prahitaṃ dhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3619: yaduprabhṛtibhiḥ putrair yadā loke pratiṣṭhitam // MatsP_43.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3622: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca gadato me nibodhata // MatsP_43.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3628: haihayaśca hayaścaiva tathā veṇuhayaśca yaḥ // MatsP_43.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3634: rudraśreṇyasya putro 'bhūd durdamo nāma pārthivaḥ // MatsP_43.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3635: durdamasya suto dhīmān kanako nāma vīryavān /
GP12mtp176pu:3636: kanakasya tu dāyādāś catvāro lokaviśrutāḥ // MatsP_43.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3642: tasmai dattā varāstena catvāraḥ puruṣottama // MatsP_43.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3643: pūrvaṃ bāhusahasraṃ tu sa vavre rājasattamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3651: daśa yajñasahasrāṇi rājñāṃ dvīpeṣu vai tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:3652: nirargalāni vṛttāni śrūyante tasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_43.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3657: tasya yajñe jagau gāthāṃ gandharvo nāradastathā /
GP12mtp176pu:3658: kārtavīryasya rājarṣer mahimānaṃ nirīkṣya saḥ // MatsP_43.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3659: na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti kṣatriyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3661: sa hi saptasu dvīpeṣu khaḍgī cakrī śarāsanī /
GP12mtp176pu:3662: rathī dvīpānyanucaran yogī paśyati taskarān // MatsP_43.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3664: sa sarvaratnasampūrṇaś cakravartī babhūva ha // MatsP_43.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3665: sa eva paśupālo 'bhūt kṣetrapālaḥ sa eva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:3666: sa eva vṛṣṭyā parjanyo yogitvādarjuno 'bhavat // MatsP_43.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3670: karkoṭakasutaṃ jitvā puryāṃ tatra nyaveśayat // MatsP_43.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3671: eṣa vegaṃ samudrasya prāvṛṭkāle bhajeta vai /
GP12mtp176pu:3685: evaṃ baddhvā dhanurjyāyām utsiktaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3686: laṅkāyāṃ mohayitvā tu sabalaṃ rāvaṇaṃ balāt // MatsP_43.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:3687: nirjitya baddhvā cānīya māhiṣmatyāṃ babandha ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3688: tato gatvā pulastyastu hy arjunaṃ saṃprasādayan // MatsP_43.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:3692: aho bata vidhervīryaṃ bhārgavo 'yaṃ yadāchinat // MatsP_43.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:3694: yatrāpavastu saṃkruddho hy arjunaṃ śaptavānprabhuḥ // MatsP_43.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:3695: yasmādvanaṃ pradagdhaṃ vai viśrutaṃ mama haihaya /
GP12mtp176pu:3696: tasmātte duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtamanyo hariṣyati // MatsP_43.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:3697: chittvā bāhusahasraṃ te prathamaṃ tarasā balī /
GP12mtp176pu:3698: tapasvī brāhmaṇaśca tvāṃ sa vadhiṣyati bhārgava // MatsP_43.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:3700: tasya rāmastadā tv āsīn mṛtyuḥ śāpena dhīmataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3701: varaścaiva tu rājarṣeḥ svayameva vṛtaḥ purā // MatsP_43.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:3702: tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīt pañca tatra mahārathāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3703: kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā dharmātmāno mahābalāḥ // MatsP_43.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:3707: tasya putraśatānyeva tālajaṅghā iti śrutāḥ // MatsP_43.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:3708: teṣāṃ pañca kulāḥ khyātā haihayānāṃ mahātmanām /
GP12mtp176pu:3717: na tasya vittanāśaḥ syān naṣṭaṃ ca labhate punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3724: kārtavīryeṇa vikramya sūta prabrūhi tattvataḥ // MatsP_44.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3725: rakṣitā sa tu rājarṣiḥ prajānāmiti naḥ śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:3726: sa kathaṃ rakṣitā bhūtvā adahattattapovanam // MatsP_44.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3732: kīdṛśaṃ bhojanaṃ dadmi hutvā tu vidadhāmyaham // MatsP_44.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3734: sthāvaraṃ dehi me sarvam āhāraṃ dadatāṃ vara /
GP12mtp176pu:3735: tena tṛpto bhaveyaṃ vai sā me tṛptirhi pārthiva // MatsP_44.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3737: na śakyāḥ sthāvarāḥ sarve tejasā ca balena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3738: nirdagdhuṃ tapatāṃ śreṣṭha tena tvāṃ praṇamāmyaham // MatsP_44.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3741: ye prakṣiptā jvaliṣyanti mama tejaḥsamanvitāḥ // MatsP_44.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3746: tato dadāha samprāptān sthāvarān sarvameva ca // MatsP_44.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3749: evaṃ prācīmanvadahat tataḥ sarvāṃ sa dakṣiṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:3750: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā bhūmir hatā ghoreṇa tejasā // MatsP_44.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3752: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tatrāste sa mahānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_44.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3755: krodhācchaśāpa rājarṣiṃ kīrtitaṃ vo yathā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:3760: svāhaputro 'bhavad rājan ruṣaṅgur vadatāṃ varaḥ // MatsP_44.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3761: sa tu prasūtimicchan vai ruṣaṅguḥ saumyamātmajam /
GP12mtp176pu:3764: śaśabinduriti khyātaś cakravartī babhūva ha // MatsP_44.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3784: rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaśca jyāmaghaḥ parigho hariḥ // MatsP_44.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3790: narmadāṃ nṛpa ekākī kevalaṃ vṛttikāmataḥ // MatsP_44.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:3794: tasyāsīdvijayo yuddhe tatra kanyāmavāpya saḥ // MatsP_44.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:3796: evamuktābravīdenaṃ kasya ceyaṃ snuṣeti ca // MatsP_44.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:3798: yaste janiṣyate putras tasya bhāryā bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:3800: putraṃ vidarbhaṃ subhagā caitrā pariṇatā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:3802: lomapādaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu putraṃ paramadhārmikam // MatsP_44.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:3804: lomapādānmanuḥ putrā jñātistasya tu cātmajaḥ // MatsP_44.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:3805: kaiśikasya cidiḥ putras tasmāccaidyā nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3808: dhṛṣṭasya putro dharmātmā nirvṛtiḥ paravīrahā // MatsP_44.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:3809: tadeko nirvṛteḥ putro nāmnā sa tu vidūrathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3810: daśārhastasya vai putro vyomastasya ca vai smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3811: dāśārhāccaiva vyomāttu putro jīmūta ucyate // MatsP_44.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:3813: suto bhīmarathasyāsīt smṛto navarathaḥ kila // MatsP_44.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:3815: tasmātkarambhaḥ kārambhir devarāto babhūva ha // MatsP_44.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:3824: prajāvān eti sāyujyaṃ rājñaḥ somasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_44.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:3826: bhajinaṃ bhajamānaṃ tu divyaṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpa // MatsP_44.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:3827: andhakaṃ ca mahābhojaṃ vṛṣṇiṃ ca yadunandanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3828: teṣāṃ tu sargāś catvāro vistareṇaiva tacchṛṇu // MatsP_44.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:3830: sṛñjayasya sute dve tu bāhyakāstu tadābhavan // MatsP_44.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:3831: tasya bhārye bhaginyau dve suṣuvāte bahūnsutān /
GP12mtp176pu:3832: nimiṃ ca kṛmilaṃ caiva vṛṣṇiṃ parapuraṃjayam /
GP12mtp176pu:3833: te bāhyakāyāṃ sṛñjayyāṃ bhajamānād vijajñire // MatsP_44.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:3836: putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama bhūyāditi spṛhan // MatsP_44.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:3843: atha bhūtvā kumārī sā bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3845: atha sā navame māsi suṣuve saritāṃ varā /
GP12mtp176pu:3850: babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devairdevāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ // MatsP_44.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:3855: atha kaṅkasya duhitā suṣuve caturaḥ sutān /
GP12mtp176pu:3856: kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca śaśiṃ kambalabarhiṣam // MatsP_44.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:3857: kukurasya suto vṛṣṇir vṛṣṇestu tanayo dhṛtiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3860: khyāyate tasya nāmnā sa nandano daradundubhiḥ // MatsP_44.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:3862: aśvamedhaṃ ca putrārtham ājahāra narottamaḥ // MatsP_44.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:3864: atastu vidvānkarmajño yajvā dātā punarvasuḥ // MatsP_44.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:3866: āhukaścāhukī caiva khyātaṃ mātematāṃ vara // MatsP_44.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:3872: āhukasya bhṛtiṃ prāptā ityetadvai taducyate // MatsP_44.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:3876: devakasya sutā vīrā jajñire tridaśopamāḥ // MatsP_44.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:3878: teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptāsan vasudevāya tā dadau // MatsP_44.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:3880: śrīdevī satyadevī ca sutāpī ceti saptamī // MatsP_44.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:3882: nyagrodhaśca sunāmā ca kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuśca bhūyasaḥ // MatsP_44.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:3884: teṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāsan kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā // MatsP_44.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:3885: sutantū rāṣṭrapālī ca kaṅkā ceti varāṅganāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3892: śamī ca devaśarmā ca nikuntaḥ śakraśatrujit // MatsP_44.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:3894: pratikṣetraḥ suto bhojo hṛdīkastasya cātmajaḥ // MatsP_44.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:3896: kṛtavarmāgrajas teṣāṃ śatadhanvā ca madhyamaḥ // MatsP_44.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:3902: sudaṃṣṭraśca sunābhaśca kṛṣṇa ityandhakā matāḥ // MatsP_44.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:3904: ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ prajāvānāpnute naraḥ // MatsP_44.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:3908: gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca vṛṣṇibhārye babhūvatuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3910: mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīḍhuṣam /
GP12mtp176pu:3911: anamitraṃ śibiṃ caiva pañcamaṃ kṛtalakṣaṇam // MatsP_45.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3912: anamitrasuto nighno nighnasyāpi tu dvau sutau /
GP12mtp176pu:3913: prasenaśca mahāvīryaḥ śaktisenaśca tāv ubhau // MatsP_45.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3915: pṛthivyāṃ sarvaratnānāṃ rājā vai so 'bhavanmaṇiḥ // MatsP_45.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3916: hṛdi kṛtvā tu bahuśo maṇiṃ tamabhiyācitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3917: govindo 'pi na taṃ lebhe śakto 'pi na jahāra saḥ // MatsP_45.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3919: yathāśabdaṃ sa śuśrāva bile sattvena pūrite // MatsP_45.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3920: tataḥ praviśya sa bilaṃ praseno hy ṛkṣamaikṣata /
GP12mtp176pu:3921: ṛkṣaḥ prasenaṃ ca tathā ṛkṣaṃ caiva prasenajit // MatsP_45.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3922: hatvā ṛkṣaḥ prasenaṃ tu tatastaṃ maṇimādadāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3924: prasenaṃ tu hataṃ jñātvā govindaḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3925: govindena hato vyaktaṃ praseno maṇikāraṇāt // MatsP_45.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3927: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa hatastena govindaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GP12mtp176pu:3928: hanmi cainaṃ durācāraṃ śatrubhūtaṃ hi vṛṣṇiṣu // MatsP_45.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3929: atha dīrgheṇa kālena mṛgayāṃ nirgataḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3931: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu mahāśabdaṃ sa cakre ṛkṣarāḍbalī /
GP12mtp176pu:3932: śabdaṃ śrutvā tu govindaḥ khaḍgapāṇiḥ praviśya saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3940: kanyā ceyaṃ mama śubhā bhartāraṃ tvāmavāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3941: yo 'yaṃ maṇiḥ prasenaṃ tu hatvā prāpto mayā prabho // MatsP_45.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3942: tataḥ sa jāmbavantaṃ taṃ hatvā cakreṇa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3947: asmākaṃ tu matirhyāsīt prasenastu tvayā hataḥ // MatsP_45.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3948: kaikeyasya sutā bhāryā daśa satrājitaḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3953: satyabhāmā varā strīṇāṃ vratinī ca dṛḍhavratā /
GP12mtp176pu:3954: tathā padmāvatī caiva tāśca kṛṣṇāya so 'dadāt // MatsP_45.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3960: anamitrānvayo hy eṣa vyākhyāto vṛṣṇivaṃśajaḥ // MatsP_45.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3962: anyau tu tanayau vīrau vṛṣabhaḥ kṣatra eva ca // MatsP_45.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3964: jayantastu jayantyāṃ tu putraḥ samabhavacchubhaḥ // MatsP_45.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3969: upalambhaḥ sadālambho vṛkalo vīrya eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3972: sarve ca pratihotāro ratnāyāṃ jajñire ca te // MatsP_45.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:3975: aśvinyāṃ ca tataḥ putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthureva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3977: vṛṣṭinemiḥ sudharmā ca tathā śaryātireva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3980: na sa mithyābhiśāpena abhiśāpyo 'tha kenacit // MatsP_45.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:3985: pauruṣājjajñire śūrād bhojāyāṃ putrakā daśa // MatsP_46.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3987: devamārgastato jajñe tato devaśravāḥ punaḥ // MatsP_46.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3989: śyāmaḥ śamīkaḥ saṃyūpaḥ pañca cāsya varāṅganāḥ // MatsP_46.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3991: rājādhidevī ca tathā pañcaitā vīramātaraḥ // MatsP_46.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3992: kṛtasya tu śrutādevī sugrīvaṃ suṣuve sutam /
GP12mtp176pu:3993: kaikeyyāṃ śrutakīrtyāṃ tu jajñe so 'nuvrato nṛpaḥ // MatsP_46.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3996: atha sakhyena vṛddhe 'sau kuntibhoje sutāṃ dadau /
GP12mtp176pu:3997: evaṃ kuntī samākhyātā vasudevasvasā pṛthā // MatsP_46.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3998: vasudevena sā dattā pāṇḍorbhāryā hy aninditā /
GP12mtp176pu:3999: pāṇḍorarthena sā jajñe devaputrān mahārathān // MatsP_46.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4004: rohiṇī pauravī nāma bhāryā hy ānakadundubheḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4005: lebhe jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ sāraṇaṃ ca sutaṃ priyam // MatsP_46.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4007: citrākṣyau dve kumāryau tu rohiṇyāṃ jajñire tadā // MatsP_46.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:4011: prathamā yā amāvāsyā vārṣikī tu bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:4012: tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ // MatsP_46.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:4014: devakyāṃ tu mahātejā jajñe śūro mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_46.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:4017: ekāṃ kanyāṃ ca subhagāṃ kaṃsastām abhyaghātayat // MatsP_46.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:4018: vijayaṃ rocamānaṃ ca vardhamānaṃ tu devalam /
GP12mtp176pu:4019: ete sarve mahātmāno hy upadevyāṃ prajajñire // MatsP_46.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4021: vṛkadevyāṃ svayaṃ jajñe nandako nāma nāmataḥ // MatsP_46.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:4024: śraddhādevyā vihāre tu vane hi vicaranpurā /
GP12mtp176pu:4028: jarā nāma niṣādo 'bhūt prathamaḥ sa dhanurdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4035: sucandraṃ tu mahābhāgaṃ vīryavantaṃ mahābalam // MatsP_46.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:4036: jāmbavatyāḥ sutāv etau dvau ca satkṛtalakṣaṇau /
GP12mtp176pu:4044: śṛṇoti mānavo nityaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // MatsP_46.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:4048: atha devo mahādevaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4049: vihārārthaṃ sa deveśo mānuṣeṣviha jayate // MatsP_47.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:4053: uvāca vasudevastaṃ rūpaṃ saṃhara vai prabho // MatsP_47.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:4055: mama putrā hatāstena jyeṣṭhāste bhīmavikramāḥ // MatsP_47.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:4060: ayaṃ tu garbho devakyāṃ jātaḥ kaṃsaṃ haniṣyati // MatsP_47.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:4062: ka eṣa vasudevastu devakī ca yaśasvinī /
GP12mtp176pu:4063: nandagopaśca kastveṣa yaśodā ca mahāvratā // MatsP_47.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:4064: yo viṣṇuṃ janayāmāsa yaṃ ca tātetyabhāṣata /
GP12mtp176pu:4065: yā garbhaṃ janayāmāsa yā cainaṃ tv abhyavardhayat // MatsP_47.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4070: ye tayā kāṅkṣitā nityam ajātasya mahātmanaḥ // MatsP_47.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:4071: so 'vatīrṇo mahīṃ devaḥ praviṣṭo mānuṣīṃ tanum /
GP12mtp176pu:4073: naṣṭe dharme tathā jajñe viṣṇurvṛṣṇikule prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4074: kartuṃ dharmasya saṃsthānam asurāṇāṃ praṇāśanam // MatsP_47.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:4075: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca satyā nāgnajitī tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4076: subhāmā ca tathā śaibyā gāndhārī lakṣmaṇā tathā // MatsP_47.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:4077: mitravindā ca kālindī devī jāmbavatī tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4078: suśīlā ca tathā mādrī kauśalyā vijayā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4079: evamādīni devīnāṃ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa // MatsP_47.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:4081: cārudeṣṇaṃ raṇe śūraṃ pradyumnaṃ ca mahābalam // MatsP_47.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:4082: sucāruṃ bhadracāruṃ ca sudeṣṇaṃ bhadrameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4084: cāruhāsaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ ca kanyāṃ cārumatīṃ tathā // MatsP_47.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:4086: rohito dīptimāṃścaiva tāmraś cakro jalaṃdhamaḥ // MatsP_47.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4088: jāmbavatyāḥ suto jajñe sāmbaḥ samitiśobhanaḥ // MatsP_47.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:4090: mitrabāhuḥ sunīthaśca nāgnajityāḥ prajā hi sā // MatsP_47.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:4092: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_47.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:4094: lakṣamekaṃ tathā proktaṃ putrāṇāṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // MatsP_47.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:4095: upasaṅgasya tu sutau vajraḥ saṃkṣipta eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4100: satyaprakṛtayo devāḥ pañca vīrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_47.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:4103: devāṃśāḥ sarva eveha hy utpannāste mahaujasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4104: devāsure hatā ye ca tv asurā ye mahābalāḥ // MatsP_47.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:4108: sarvametatkulaṃ yāvad vartate vaiṣṇave kule // MatsP_47.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:4109: viṣṇusteṣāṃ praṇetā ca prabhutve ca vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4115: kimarthaṃ saṃghaśo bhūtāḥ smṛtāḥ sambhūtayaḥ kati // MatsP_47.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:4119: punaḥ punarmanuṣyeṣu tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // MatsP_47.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:4121: tyaktvā divyāṃ tanuṃ viṣṇur mānuṣeṣviha jāyate /
GP12mtp176pu:4122: yuge tv atha parāvṛtte kāle praśithile prabhuḥ // MatsP_47.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:4130: devānāmasurāṇāṃ ca ghoraḥ kṣayakaro mahān // MatsP_47.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:4132: bhṛgoḥ śāpanimittaṃ tu devāsurakṛte tadā // MatsP_47.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:4135: devāsuraṃ yathā vṛttaṃ tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // MatsP_47.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:4138: varāhādyā daśa dvau ca śaṇḍāmarkāntare smṛtāḥ // MatsP_47.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:4148: vāmanena balir baddhas trailokyākramaṇe purā // MatsP_47.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:4149: hiraṇyākṣo hato dvaṃdve pratighāte tu daivataiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4150: daṃṣṭrayā tu varāheṇa samudrastu dvidhā kṛtaḥ // MatsP_47.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:4154: aśaknuvansa devānāṃ sarvaṃ soḍhuṃ sadaivatam // MatsP_47.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:4155: nihatā dānavāḥ sarve trailokye tryambakeṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:4158: saṃpṛkto dānavairvṛtro ghoro hālāhale hataḥ // MatsP_47.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:4163: jayankolāhale sarvān devaiḥ parivṛto vṛṣā // MatsP_47.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:4165: ete devāsure vṛttāḥ saṃgrāmā dvādaśaiva tu // MatsP_47.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:4169: aśītiṃ ca sahasrāṇi trailokyaiśvaryatāṃ gataḥ // MatsP_47.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:4173: tāvatkālaṃ tu prahlādo nivṛtto hy asuraiḥ saha // MatsP_47.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:4182: kiṃ tvaṃ no miṣatāṃ rājyaṃ tyaktvā yajñaṃ punargataḥ // MatsP_47.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:4183: sthātuṃ na śaknumo hy atra praviśāmo rasātalam /
GP12mtp176pu:4185: mā bhaiṣṭa dhārayiṣyāmi tejasā svena vo 'surāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4186: mantrāścauṣadhayaścaiva rasā vasu ca yatparam // MatsP_47.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:4187: kṛtsnāni mayi tiṣṭhanti pādasteṣāṃ sureṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:4188: tatsarvaṃ vaḥ pradāsyāmi yuṣmadarthe dhṛtā mayā // MatsP_47.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:4190: saṃmantrayanti devā vai saṃvijñāstu jighṛkṣayā // MatsP_47.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:4191: kāvyo hy eṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ vyāvartayati no balāt /
GP12mtp176pu:4194: tato devāstu saṃrabdhā dānavān upasṛtya ha // MatsP_47.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:4196: tataḥ kāvyastu tāndṛṣṭvā tūrṇaṃ devair abhidrutān // MatsP_47.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:4198: kāvyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthitaṃ devā niḥśaṅkamasurāñjahuḥ // MatsP_47.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:4200: tānuvāca tataḥ kāvyaḥ pūrvaṃ vṛttamanusmaran // MatsP_47.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:4201: trailokyaṃ vo hṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanena tribhiḥ kramaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4202: balirbaddho hato jambho nihataśca virocanaḥ // MatsP_47.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:4205: kiṃcicchīṣṭāstu yūyaṃ vai yuddhaṃ māstviti me matam /
GP12mtp176pu:4206: nītiṃ yāṃ vo 'bhidhāsyāmi tiṣṭhadhvaṃ kālaparyayāt // MatsP_47.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:4209: yudhyāmahe punardevāṃs tataḥ prāpsyatha vai jayam // MatsP_47.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:4211: nyastaśastrā vayaṃ sarve niḥsaṃnāhā rathairvinā // MatsP_47.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:4213: prahlādasya vacaḥ śrutvā satyābhivyāhṛtaṃ tu tat // MatsP_47.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:4214: tato devā nyavartanta vijvarā muditāśca te /
GP12mtp176pu:4221: mantrānicchāmyahaṃ deva ye na santi bṛhaspatau /
GP12mtp176pu:4222: parābhavāya devānām asurāṇāṃ jayāya ca // MatsP_47.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:4225: yadi pāsyasi bhadraṃ te tato mantrānavāpsyasi // MatsP_47.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:4228: vrataṃ carāmyahaṃ deva tvayādiṣṭo 'dya vai prabho // MatsP_47.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:4230: tadā tasmingate śukre hy asurāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:4231: mantrārthaṃ tatra vasati brahmacaryaṃ maheśvare // MatsP_47.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:4232: tadbuddhvā nītipūrvaṃ tu rājye nyaste tadāsuraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4236: utpetuḥ sahasā te vai saṃtrastāstānvaco 'bruvan // MatsP_47.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:4238: dattvā bhavanto hy abhayaṃ samprāptā no jighāṃsayā // MatsP_47.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:4241: raṇe vijetuṃ devāṃśca na śakṣyāmaḥ kathaṃcana /
GP12mtp176pu:4244: nivṛtte ca tathā śukre yotsyāmo daṃśitāyudhāḥ // MatsP_47.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:4246: prāpadyanta tato bhītās tebhyo 'dādabhayaṃ tu sā // MatsP_47.91 //
GP12mtp176pu:4247: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ bhayaṃ tyajata dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4248: matsaṃnidhau vartatāṃ vo na bhīr bhavitumarhati // MatsP_47.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:4254: tastambha devī balavad yogayuktā tapodhanā // MatsP_47.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:4255: tatastaṃ stambhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā indraṃ devāśca mūkavat /
GP12mtp176pu:4256: prādravanta tato bhītā indraṃ dṛṣṭvā vaśīkṛtam // MatsP_47.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:4258: māṃ tvaṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te nayiṣye tvāṃ surottama // MatsP_47.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:4260: viṣṇunā rakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā devī kruddhā vaco 'bravīt // MatsP_47.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:4261: eṣā tvāṃ viṣṇunā sārdhaṃ dahāmi maghavanbalāt /
GP12mtp176pu:4262: miṣatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dṛśyatāṃ me tapobalam // MatsP_47.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:4264: kathaṃ mucyeva sahitau viṣṇurindram abhāṣata // MatsP_47.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:4266: viśeṣaṇābhibhūto 'smi tvatto 'haṃ jahi mā ciram // MatsP_47.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:4267: tataḥ samīkṣya viṣṇustāṃ strīvadhe kṛcchram āsthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4268: abhidhyāya tataścakram āpaduddharaṇe tu tat // MatsP_47.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:4271: kruddhaḥ svamastramādāya śiraściccheda vai bhiyā // MatsP_47.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:4272: taṃ dṛṣṭvā strīvadhaṃ ghoraṃ cukrodha bhṛgurīśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4273: tato 'bhiśapto bhṛguṇā viṣṇur bhāryāvadhe tadā // MatsP_47.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:4277: lokasya ca hitārthāya jāyate mānuyeṣviha // MatsP_47.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:4279: samānīya tataḥ kāyam asau gṛhyedamabravīt // MatsP_47.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:4280: eṣā tvaṃ viṣpunā devi hatā saṃjīvayāmyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:4281: tatastāṃ yojya śirasā abhijīveti so 'bravīt // MatsP_47.108 //
GP12mtp176pu:4282: yadi kṛtsno mayā dharmo jñāyate carito 'pi vā /
GP12mtp176pu:4283: tena satyena jīvasva yadi satyaṃ vadāmyaham // MatsP_47.109 //
GP12mtp176pu:4284: tatastāṃ prokṣya śītābhir adbhir jīveti so 'bravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:4285: tato 'bhivyāhṛte tasya devī saṃjīvitā tadā // MatsP_47.110 //
GP12mtp176pu:4287: sādhu sādhviti cakruste vacasā sarvatodiśam // MatsP_47.111 //
GP12mtp176pu:4288: evaṃ pratyāhṛtā tena devī sā bhṛguṇā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4289: miṣatāṃ devatānāṃ hi tadadbhutam ivābhavad // MatsP_47.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:4293: saṃcintya matimān vākyaṃ svāṃ kanyāṃ pākaśāsanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4294: eṣa kāvyo hyamitrāya vrataṃ carati dāruṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:4295: tenāhaṃ vyākulaḥ putri kṛto matimatā bhṛśam // MatsP_47.114 //
GP12mtp176pu:4299: gaccha tvaṃ tasya dattā'si prayatnaṃ kuru matkṛte // MatsP_47.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:4300: evamuktā jayantī sā vacaḥ saṃgṛhya vai pituḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4301: agacchadyatra ghoraṃ sa tapa ārabhya tiṣṭhati // MatsP_47.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:4302: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu pibantaṃ sā kaṇadhūmam avāṅmukham /
GP12mtp176pu:4303: yakṣeṇa pātyamānaṃ ca kuṇḍadhāreṇa pātitam // MatsP_47.118 //
GP12mtp176pu:4304: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pātyamānaṃ devī kāvyamavasthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:4306: pitrā yathoktaṃ vākyaṃ sā kāvye kṛtavatī tadā // MatsP_47.119 //
GP12mtp176pu:4311: vareṇa cchandayāmāsa kāvyaṃ prīto bhavastadā // MatsP_47.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:4314: tasmādvai tapasā buddhyā śrutena ca balena ca // MatsP_47.122 //
GP12mtp176pu:4317: prapatsyase tu tatsarvaṃ nānuvācyaṃ tu kasyacit /
GP12mtp176pu:4318: sarvābhibhāvī tena tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi dvijottama // MatsP_47.124 //
GP12mtp176pu:4320: prajeśatvaṃ dhaneśatvam avadhyatvaṃ ca vai dadau // MatsP_47.125 //
GP12mtp176pu:4334: varāya bhavyarūpāya śvetāya puruṣāya ca // MatsP_47.131 //
GP12mtp176pu:4336: sutṛptāya suvastrāya dhanvine bhārgavāya ca // MatsP_47.132 //
GP12mtp176pu:4337: niṣaṅgiṇe ca tārāya svakṣāya kṣapaṇāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4338: tāmrāya caiva bhīmāya ugrāya ca śivāya ca // MatsP_47.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:4340: hiraṇyāya variṣṭhāya jyeṣṭhāya madhyamāya ca // MatsP_47.134 //
GP12mtp176pu:4342: mṛgavyādhāya dakṣāya sthāṇave bhīṣaṇāya ca // MatsP_47.135 //
GP12mtp176pu:4344: kapāline ca vīrāya mṛtyave tryambakāya ca // MatsP_47.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:4346: pinākine ceṣumate citrāya rohitāya ca // MatsP_47.137 //
GP12mtp176pu:4349: sāṃkhyāya caiva yogāya vyāpine dīkṣitāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4350: anāhatāya śarvāya bhavyeśāya yamāya ca // MatsP_47.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:4352: catuṣpadāya medhyāya rakṣiṇe śīghragāya ca // MatsP_47.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:4356: saumyāya caiva mukhyāya dhārmikāya śubhāya ca // MatsP_47.142 //
GP12mtp176pu:4358: vyāpṛtāya viśiṣṭāya bharatāya ca sākṣiṇe // MatsP_47.143 //
GP12mtp176pu:4360: kartre paraśave caiva śūline divyacakṣuṣe // MatsP_47.144 //
GP12mtp176pu:4370: kṛśānave pracetāya vahnaye nirmalāya ca // MatsP_47.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:4372: vibhrāntāya mahāntāya arṇave durgamāya ca // MatsP_47.150 //
GP12mtp176pu:4375: hiraṇyabāhave caiva vyāptāya ca mahāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4380: dṛḍhadhanvine kavacine rathine ca varūthine // MatsP_47.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:4382: amoghāya praśāntāya sumedhāya vṛṣāya ca // MatsP_47.155 //
GP12mtp176pu:4384: paśūnāṃ pataye tubhyaṃ bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ // MatsP_47.156 //
GP12mtp176pu:4385: praṇave ṛgyajuḥsāmne svāhāya ca svadhāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4386: vaṣaṭkārātmane caiva tubhyaṃ mantrātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.157 //
GP12mtp176pu:4387: tvaṣṭre dhātre tathā kartre cakṣuḥśrotramayāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4390: viṣāya mārutāyaiva tubhyaṃ devātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.159 //
GP12mtp176pu:4393: prajānāṃ pataye caiva tubhyaṃ brahmātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.160 //
GP12mtp176pu:4397: nirupākhyāya mitrāya tubhyaṃ sāṃkhyātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.162 //
GP12mtp176pu:4398: pṛthivyai cāntarikṣāya divyāya ca mahāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4399: janastapāya satyāya tubhyaṃ lokātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.163 //
GP12mtp176pu:4401: ātmajñāya viśeṣāya tubhyaṃ sarvātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.164 //
GP12mtp176pu:4403: buddhāya vibhave caiva tubhyaṃ mokṣātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.165 //
GP12mtp176pu:4404: namaste triṣu lokeṣu namaste paratas triṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:4405: satyānteṣu mahādyeṣu caturṣu ca namo 'stu te // MatsP_47.166 //
GP12mtp176pu:4406: namaḥ stotre mayā hy asmin yadi na vyāhṛtaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:4407: madbhakta iti brahmaṇya tatsarvaṃ kṣantumarhasi // MatsP_47.167 //
GP12mtp176pu:4415: kasya tvaṃ subhage kā vā duḥkhite mayi duḥkhitā /
GP12mtp176pu:4416: mahatā tapasā yuktā kimarthaṃ māṃ niṣevase // MatsP_47.171 //
GP12mtp176pu:4417: anayā saṃstuto bhaktyā praśrayeṇa damena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4418: snehena caiva suśroṇi prīto 'smi varavarṇini // MatsP_47.172 //
GP12mtp176pu:4422: cikīrṣitaṃ hi me brahmaṃs tvaṃ hi vettha yathātatham // MatsP_47.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:4424: mayā saha tvaṃ suśroṇi daśa varṣāṇi bhāmini // MatsP_47.175 //
GP12mtp176pu:4427: evaṃ vṛṇoṣi kāmaṃ tvaṃ matto vai valgubhāṣiṇi // MatsP_47.176 //
GP12mtp176pu:4431: adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ māyayā saṃvṛtaḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_47.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:4432: kṛtārthamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā kāvyaṃ sarve diteḥ sutāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4434: yadā gatā na paśyanti māyayā saṃvṛtaṃ gurum /
GP12mtp176pu:4436: bṛhaspatistu saṃruddhaṃ kāvyaṃ jñātvā vareṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:4437: tuṣṭyarthaṃ daśa varṣāṇi jayantyā hitakāmyayā // MatsP_47.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:4441: svāgataṃ mama yājyānāṃ prāpto 'haṃ vo hitāya ca // MatsP_47.183 //
GP12mtp176pu:4442: ahaṃ vo 'dhyāpayiṣyāmi vidyāḥ prāptāstu yā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:4446: buddhiṃ cakre tataḥ so 'tha yājyānāṃ pratyavekṣaṇe // MatsP_47.185 //
GP12mtp176pu:4450: eṣa dharmaḥ satāṃ brahman na dharmaṃ lopayāmi te // MatsP_47.187 //
GP12mtp176pu:4453: kāvyaṃ māṃ vo vijānīdhvaṃ toṣito giriśo vibhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4454: vañcitā bata yūyaṃ vai sarve śṛṇuta dānavāḥ // MatsP_47.189 //
GP12mtp176pu:4455: śrutvā tathā bruvāṇaṃ taṃ saṃbhrāntāste tadābhavan /
GP12mtp176pu:4456: prekṣantas tāv ubhau tatra sthitāsīnau suvismitāḥ // MatsP_47.190 //
GP12mtp176pu:4457: sampramūḍhās tataḥ sarve na prābudhyanta kiṃcana /
GP12mtp176pu:4459: ācāryo vo hy ahaṃ kāvyo devācāryo 'yamaṅgirāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4460: anugacchata māṃ daityās tyajatainaṃ bṛhaspatim // MatsP_47.192 //
GP12mtp176pu:4461: ityuktā hy asurāstena tāv ubhau samavekṣya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4462: yadāsurā viśeṣaṃ tu na jānantyubhayostayoḥ // MatsP_47.193 //
GP12mtp176pu:4464: kāvyo vo 'haṃ gururdaityā madrūpo 'yaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ // MatsP_47.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:4466: śrutvā tasya tataste vai sametya tu tato 'bruvan // MatsP_47.195 //
GP12mtp176pu:4467: ayaṃ no daśa varṣāṇi satataṃ śāsti vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4468: eṣa vai gururasmākam antarepsurayaṃ dvijaḥ // MatsP_47.196 //
GP12mtp176pu:4470: vacanaṃ jagṛhustasya cirābhyāse na mohitāḥ // MatsP_47.197 //
GP12mtp176pu:4472: ayaṃ gurur hito 'smākaṃ gaccha tvaṃ nāsi no guruḥ // MatsP_47.198 //
GP12mtp176pu:4473: bhārgavo vāṅgirā vāpi bhagavāneṣa no guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4474: sthitā vayaṃ nideśe 'sya sādhu tvaṃ gaccha māciram // MatsP_47.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:4476: yadā na pratyapadyanta kāvyenoktaṃ mahaddhitam // MatsP_47.200 //
GP12mtp176pu:4478: bodhitā hi mayā yasmān na māṃ bhajatha dānavāḥ // MatsP_47.201 //
GP12mtp176pu:4480: iti vyāhṛtya tānkāvyo jagāmātha yathāgatam // MatsP_47.202 //
GP12mtp176pu:4482: kṛtārthaḥ sa tadā hṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ pratyapadyata // MatsP_47.203 //
GP12mtp176pu:4484: tataḥ pranaṣṭe tasmiṃstu vibhrāntā dānavābhavan // MatsP_47.204 //
GP12mtp176pu:4487: vañcitāḥ sopadhānena sve sve vastuni māyayā /
GP12mtp176pu:4494: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ śukraṃ tu bāṣpasaṃdigdhayā girā /
GP12mtp176pu:4495: prahlādastaṃ tadovāca mā nastvaṃ tyaja bhārgava // MatsP_47.209 //
GP12mtp176pu:4498: bhaktānarhasi vai jñātuṃ tapodīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā // MatsP_47.210 //
GP12mtp176pu:4499: yadi nastvaṃ na kuruṣe prasādaṃ bhṛgunandana /
GP12mtp176pu:4500: apadhyātās tvayā hy adya praviśāmo rasātalam // MatsP_47.211 //
GP12mtp176pu:4502: evaṃ pratyanunīto vai tataḥ kopaṃ niyamya saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4503: uvācaitānna bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ rasātalam // MatsP_47.212 //
GP12mtp176pu:4504: avaśyaṃ bhāvino hy arthāḥ prāptavyā mayi jāgrati /
GP12mtp176pu:4505: na śakyamanyathā kartuṃ diṣṭaṃ hi balavattaram // MatsP_47.213 //
GP12mtp176pu:4506: saṃjñā pranaṣṭā yā vo 'dya tāmetāṃ pratipatsyatha /
GP12mtp176pu:4511: etāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ vai brahmā rājyamabhāṣata // MatsP_47.216 //
GP12mtp176pu:4512: rājyaṃ sāvarṇike tubhyaṃ punaḥ kila bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:4513: lokānāmīśvaro bhāvyas tava pautraḥ punarbaliḥ // MatsP_47.217 //
GP12mtp176pu:4514: evaṃ kila mithaḥ proktaḥ pautraste viṣṇunā svayam /
GP12mtp176pu:4517: tasmādvṛttena prītena tubhyaṃ dattaṃ svayambhuvā // MatsP_47.219 //
GP12mtp176pu:4519: tasmādadṛśyo bhūtānāṃ kālāpekṣaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // MatsP_47.220 //
GP12mtp176pu:4522: na hi śakyaṃ mayā tubhyaṃ purastād viprabhāṣitum /
GP12mtp176pu:4523: brahmaṇā pratiṣiddho 'haṃ bhaviṣyaṃ jānatā vibho // MatsP_47.222 //
GP12mtp176pu:4524: imau ca śiṣyau dvau mahyaṃ samāv etau bṛhaspateḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4525: daivataiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭān sarvānvo dhārayiṣyataḥ // MatsP_47.223 //
GP12mtp176pu:4527: hṛṣṭāstena yayuḥ sārdhaṃ prahlādena mahātmanā // MatsP_47.224 //
GP12mtp176pu:4528: avaśyaṃ bhāvyamarthaṃ tu śrutvā śukreṇa bhāṣitam /
GP12mtp176pu:4530: daṃśitāḥ sāyudhāḥ sarve tato devānsamāhvayan // MatsP_47.225 //
GP12mtp176pu:4533: devāsure tadā tasmin vartamāne śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4534: ajayannasurā devāṃs tato devā hy amantrayan // MatsP_47.227 //
GP12mtp176pu:4536: tadopāmantrayandevāḥ śaṇḍāmarkau tu tāv ubhau // MatsP_47.228 //
GP12mtp176pu:4537: yajñe cāhūya tau proktau tyajetāmasurān dvijau /
GP12mtp176pu:4538: vayaṃ yuvāṃ bhajiṣyāmaḥ saha jitvā tu dānavān // MatsP_47.229 //
GP12mtp176pu:4540: tato devā jayaṃ prāpur dānavāśca parājitāḥ // MatsP_47.230 //
GP12mtp176pu:4545: evaṃ nirudyamā devaiḥ kṛtāḥ kṛcchreṇa dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4546: tataḥ prabhṛti śāpena bhṛgornaimittikena tu // MatsP_47.233 //
GP12mtp176pu:4547: jajñe punaḥ punarviṣṇur dharme praśithile prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4549: prahlādasya nideśe tu na sthāsyantyasurāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:4552: yajñaṃ vai vartayāmāsur devā vaivasvate 'ntare // MatsP_47.236 //
GP12mtp176pu:4554: yugākhyāyāṃ caturthyāṃ tu āpanneṣu sureṣu vai // MatsP_47.237 //
GP12mtp176pu:4556: dvitīye narasiṃhākhye rudro hy āsītpurohitaḥ // MatsP_47.238 //
GP12mtp176pu:4558: tṛtīye vāmanasyārthe dharmeṇa tu purodhasā // MatsP_47.239 //
GP12mtp176pu:4559: etās tisraḥ smṛtāstasya divyāḥ sambhūtayo dvijāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4560: mānuṣāḥ sapta yānyāstu śāpajāstā nibodhata // MatsP_47.240 //
GP12mtp176pu:4561: tretāyuge tu prathame dattātreyo babhūva ha /
GP12mtp176pu:4563: pañcamaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ ca tretāyāṃ saṃbabhūva ha /
GP12mtp176pu:4577: sarvāṃśca bhūtāṃs timitān pāṣaṇḍāṃścaiva sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_47.248 //
GP12mtp176pu:4580: brahmadviṣaḥ sapatnāṃstu saṃhṛtyaiva ca tadvapuḥ // MatsP_47.250 //
GP12mtp176pu:4582: śūdrān saṃśodhayitvā tu samudrāntaṃ ca vai svayam // MatsP_47.251 //
GP12mtp176pu:4585: tatastadā sa vai kalkiś caritārthaḥ sasainikaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4586: prajāstaṃ sādhayitvā tu samṛddhāstena vai svayam // MatsP_47.253 //
GP12mtp176pu:4588: kṣapayitvā tu te 'nyonyaṃ bhāvinārthena coditāḥ // MatsP_47.254 //
GP12mtp176pu:4589: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu sa devo 'ntaradhīyata /
GP12mtp176pu:4592: parasparaṃ ca hatvā tu nirākrandāḥ suduḥkhitāḥ // MatsP_47.256 //
GP12mtp176pu:4600: utpātaduḥkhāḥ svalpārthā bahubādhāśca tāḥ prajāḥ // MatsP_47.260 //
GP12mtp176pu:4602: tataḥ kṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti sārdhaṃ kaliyugena tu // MatsP_47.261 //
GP12mtp176pu:4606: turvasostu pravakṣyāmi pūror druhyostathā hy anoḥ // MatsP_47.263 //
GP12mtp176pu:4613: duṣyantaḥ pauravasyāpi tasya putro hy akalmaṣaḥ // MatsP_48.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:4615: turvasoḥ pauravaṃ vaṃśaṃ praviveśa purā kila // MatsP_48.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:4616: duṣyantasya tu dāyādo varūtho nāma pārthivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4619: teṣāṃ janapadāḥ sphītāḥ pāṇḍyāścolāḥ sakeralāḥ // MatsP_48.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:4620: druhyostu tanayau śūrau setuḥ ketustathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4625: ghṛtācca viduṣo jajñe pracetāstasya cātmajaḥ // MatsP_48.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4626: pracetasaḥ putraśataṃ rājānaḥ sarva eva te /
GP12mtp176pu:4627: mleccharāṣṭrādhipāḥ sarve udīcīṃ diśam āśritāḥ // MatsP_48.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:4631: kolāhalasya dharmātmā saṃjayo nāma viśrutaḥ // MatsP_48.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4639: uśīnaraṃ ca dharmajñaṃ titikṣuṃ caiva tāv ubhau // MatsP_48.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:4641: bhṛśā kṛśā navā darśā yā ca devī dṛṣadvatī // MatsP_48.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:4643: tapasā te tu mahatā jātā vṛddhasya dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_48.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4644: bhṛśāyāstu nṛgaḥ putro navāyā nava eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4646: dṛṣadvatyāḥ sutaścāpi śibir auśīnaro nṛpaḥ // MatsP_48.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:4652: navasya navarāṣṭraṃ tu titikṣostu prajāṃ śṛṇu // MatsP_48.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:4656: jāto mānuṣayonyāṃ tu kṣīṇe vaṃśe prajecchayā // MatsP_48.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:4657: mahāyogī tu sa balir baddho bandhairmahātmanā /
GP12mtp176pu:4659: aṅgaṃ sa janayāmāsa vaṅgaṃ suhmaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4660: puṇḍraṃ kaliṅgaṃ ca tathā bāleyaṃ kṣetramucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:4661: bāleyā brāhmaṇāścaiva tasya vaṃśakarāḥ prabho // MatsP_48.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:4662: baleśca brahmaṇā datto varaḥ prītena dhīmataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4665: traikālyadarśanaṃ caiva prādhānyaṃ prasave tathā // MatsP_48.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:4667: caturo niyatānvarṇān sa vai sthāpayitā prabhuḥ // MatsP_48.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:4668: teṣāṃ ca pañca dāyādā vaṅgāṅgāḥ suhmakāstathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4669: puṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāśca tathā aṅgasya tu nibodhata // MatsP_48.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:4671: kathaṃ baleḥ sutā jātāḥ pañca tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4672: kiṃnāmnī mahiṣī tasya janitā katama ṛṣiḥ // MatsP_48.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:4674: māhātmyaṃ ca prabhāvaṃ ca nikhilena vadasva tat // MatsP_48.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:4677: patnī vai mamatā nāma babhūvāsya mahātmanaḥ // MatsP_48.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:4680: uvāca mamatā taṃ tu devaraṃ varavarṇinī /
GP12mtp176pu:4681: antarvatnyasmi te bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya tu viramyatām // MatsP_48.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:4682: ayaṃ tu me mahābhāga garbhaḥ kupyedbṛhaspate /
GP12mtp176pu:4685: asminn evaṃ gate kāle yathā vā manyase prabho // MatsP_48.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:4687: kāmātmā sa mahātmāpi na manaḥ so 'bhyavārayat // MatsP_48.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:4693: putraṃ jyeṣṭhasya vai bhrātur garbhasthaṃ bhagavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_48.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:4700: tasya bhrātā pitṛvyo yaś cakāra bharaṇaṃ tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4703: jagrāha taṃ dīrghatamāḥ śṛṅgayostu catuṣpadam // MatsP_48.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:4705: tato 'bravīdvṛṣastaṃ vai muñca māṃ balināṃ vara // MatsP_48.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:4707: mama cānyaḥ samo vāpi na hi me balasaṃkhyayā /
GP12mtp176pu:4708: muñca tāteti ca punaḥ prītaste 'haṃ varaṃ vṛṇu // MatsP_48.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:4710: eṣa tvāṃ na vimokṣyāmi parasvādaṃ catuṣpadam // MatsP_48.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:4712: nāsmākaṃ vidyate tāta pātakaṃ steyameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4713: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ tathā caiva peyāpeyaṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_48.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:4714: dvipadāṃ bahavo hy ete dharma eṣa gavāṃ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4715: kāryākārye na vāgamyā-gamanaṃ ca tathaiva ca // MatsP_48.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:4717: gavāṃ dharmaṃ tu vai śrutvā saṃbhrāntastu visṛjya tam /
GP12mtp176pu:4719: prasādite gate tasmin godharmaṃ bhaktitastu saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4720: manasaiva samādadhyau tanniṣṭhastatparo hi saḥ // MatsP_48.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:4722: kṛtāvalepāṃ tāṃ matvā so 'naḍvāniva na kṣamaḥ // MatsP_48.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:4723: godharmaṃ tu paraṃ matvā snuṣāṃ tāmabhyapadyata /
GP12mtp176pu:4724: nirbhartsya cainaṃ ruddhvā ca bāhubhyāṃ sampragṛhya ca // MatsP_48.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:4725: bhāvyamarthaṃ tu taṃ jñātvā māhātmyāttamuvāca sā /
GP12mtp176pu:4726: viparyayaṃ tu tvaṃ labdhvā anaḍvāniva vartase // MatsP_48.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:4728: durvṛttaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmyadya gaccha tvaṃ svena karmaṇā // MatsP_48.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:4732: jagrāha taṃ sa dharmātmā balir vairocanistadā // MatsP_48.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:4734: prītaścaiva vareṇaiva cchandayāmāsa vai balim // MatsP_48.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:4735: tasmācca sa varaṃ vavre putrārthe dānavarṣabhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4739: sa tasya rājā svāṃ bhāryāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ nāma prāhiṇot /
GP12mtp176pu:4740: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca taṃ jñātvā na sā devī jagāma ha // MatsP_48.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:4742: tasyāṃ kakṣīvadādīṃśca śūdrayonāv ṛṣir vaśī // MatsP_48.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:4744: uvāca taṃ balī rājā dṛṣṭvā kakṣīvadādikān // MatsP_48.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:4748: mamaiva ceti hovāca taṃ dīrghatamasaṃ baliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4749: natyuvāca munistaṃ vai mamaivamiti cābravīt // MatsP_48.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:4751: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ jñātvā sudeṣṇā mahiṣī tava /
GP12mtp176pu:4752: prāhiṇod avamānānme śūdrāṃ dhātreyikāṃ nṛpa // MatsP_48.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:4754: baliḥ sudeṣṇāṃ tāṃ bhāryāṃ bhartsayāmāsa dānavaḥ // MatsP_48.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:4756: tāṃ sa dīrghatamā devīṃ tathā kṛtavatīṃ tadā // MatsP_48.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:4757: dadhnā lavaṇamiśreṇa tv abhyaktaṃ madhukena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:4759: tatastvaṃ prāpsyase devi putrānvai manasepsitān // MatsP_48.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:4760: tasya sā tadvaco devī sarvaṃ kṛtavatī tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4761: tasya sāpānam āsādya devī pariharattadā // MatsP_48.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:4762: tāmuvāca tataḥ so 'tha yatte parihṛtaṃ śubhe /
GP12mtp176pu:4763: vināpānaṃ kumāraṃ tu janayiṣyasi pūrvajam // MatsP_48.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:4765: nārhasi tvaṃ mahābhāga putraṃ me dātumīdṛśam /
GP12mtp176pu:4766: toṣitaśca yathāśakti prasādaṃ kuru me prabho // MatsP_48.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:4769: naiva dāsyati putraste pautrau vai dāsyate phalam // MatsP_48.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:4771: tasmād dīrghatamāṅgeṣu kukṣau spṛṣṭvedam abravīt // MatsP_48.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:4773: tena tiṣṭhanti te garbhe paurṇamāsyām ivoḍurāṭ // MatsP_48.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:4775: tejasvinaḥ suvṛttāśca yajvāno dhārmikāśca te // MatsP_48.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:4778: aṅgastathā kaliṅgaśca puṇḍraḥ suhmastathaiva ca // MatsP_48.77 //
