GP12mtp176pu:4782: tato mānuṣayonyāṃ sa janayāmāsa vai prajāḥ // MatsP_48.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:4784: vicārya yasmādgodharmaṃ pramāṇaṃ te kṛtaṃ vibho // MatsP_48.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:4786: tasmāttubhyaṃ tamo dīrgham āghrāyāpanudāmi vai // MatsP_48.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:4788: jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ tamaścaiva āghrāyāpanudāmi te // MatsP_48.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:4792: kākṣīvāṃstu tato gatvā saha pitrā girivrajam // MatsP_48.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:4793: dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā piturvai sa hy upaviṣṭaściraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4794: tataḥ kālena mahatā tapasā bhāvitastu saḥ // MatsP_48.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:4796: tato 'bravītpitā taṃ vai putravānasmyahaṃ tvayā // MatsP_48.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:4798: muktvātmānaṃ tato 'sau vai prāptavānbrahmaṇaḥ kṣayam // MatsP_48.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:4800: kauṣmāṇḍā gautamāścaiva smṛtāḥ kākṣīvataḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_48.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:4804: kṛtārthaḥ so 'pi dharmātmā yogamāyāvṛtaḥ svayam // MatsP_48.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:4805: adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kālāpekṣaḥ sa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4809: sa hi dharmarathaḥ śrīmāṃs tena viṣṇupade girau /
GP12mtp176pu:4810: somaḥ śukreṇa vai rājñā saha pīto mahātmanā // MatsP_48.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:4812: tasya satyarathaḥ putras tasmāddaśarathaḥ kila // MatsP_48.94 //
GP12mtp176pu:4813: lomapāda iti khyātas tasya śāntā sutābhavat /
GP12mtp176pu:4814: atha dāśarathir vīraś caturaṅgo mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_48.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:4816: caturaṅgasya putrastu pṛthulākṣa iti smṛtaḥ // MatsP_48.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:4818: campasya tu purī campā pūrvaṃ yā mālinī bhavat // MatsP_48.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:4822: haryaṅgasya tu dāyādo jāto bhadrarathaḥ kila // MatsP_48.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:4826: nāmnā jayadrathaṃ nāma tasmādbṛhadratho nṛpaḥ // MatsP_48.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:4834: etad icchāmahe śrotum atyantakuśalo hy asi // MatsP_48.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:4837: tasya patnīdvayaṃ hy āsīc chaibyasya tanaye hy ubhe /
GP12mtp176pu:4838: yaśodevī ca satyā ca tayorvaṃśaṃ ca me śṛṇu // MatsP_48.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:4839: jayadrathaṃ tu rājānaṃ yaśodevī hy ajījanat /
GP12mtp176pu:4840: sā bṛhanmanasaḥ satyā vijayaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_48.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:4844: yaḥ karṇaṃ pratijagrāha tena karṇastu sūtajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4845: taccedaṃ sarvamākhyātaṃ karṇaṃ prati yathoditam // MatsP_48.108 //
GP12mtp176pu:4849: pūroḥ putro mahātejā rājā sa janamejayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4856: bhadrāśvasya dhṛtāyāṃ tu daśāpsarasi sūnavaḥ // MatsP_49.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:4860: auceyorjvalanā nāma bhāryā vai takṣakātmajā // MatsP_49.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:4864: gaurī kanyā tṛtīyā ca māndhāturjananī śubhā // MatsP_49.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4866: brahmavādaparākrāntāñ chubhadā tv ilinā hy abhūt // MatsP_49.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:4868: ṛṣyantamatha duṣyantaṃ pravīram anadhaṃ tathā // MatsP_49.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:4870: śakuntalāyāṃ bharato yasya nāmnā ca bhāratāḥ // MatsP_49.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4872: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ // MatsP_49.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:4875: tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyamāha śakuntalā // MatsP_49.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:4877: putrāṇāṃ mātṛkāt kopāt sumahānsaṃkṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ // MatsP_49.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:4878: tato marudbhirānīya putraḥ sa tu bṛhaspateḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4882: saṃkrāmito mahātejās tanno brūhi yathātatham // MatsP_49.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:4885: bhrāturbhāryāṃ sa dṛṣṭvā tu bṛhaspatiruvāca ha // MatsP_49.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4886: upatiṣṭha svalaṃkṛtya maithunāya ca māṃ śubhe /
GP12mtp176pu:4889: amogharetāstvaṃ cāpi dharmaṃ caivaṃ vigarhitam // MatsP_49.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:4891: nopadeṣṭavyo vinayas tvayā me varavarṇini // MatsP_49.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:4893: tato bṛhaspatiṃ garbho dharṣamāṇamuvāca ha // MatsP_49.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:4894: saṃniviṣṭo hy ahaṃ pūrvam iha nāma bṛhaspate /
GP12mtp176pu:4895: amogharetāśca bhavān nāvakāśa iha dvayoḥ // MatsP_49.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:4896: evamuktaḥ sa garbheṇa kupitaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GP12mtp176pu:4898: abhiṣedhasi tasmāttvaṃ tamo dīrghaṃ pravekṣyasi // MatsP_49.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:4901: sadyojātaṃ kumāraṃ tu dṛṣṭvā taṃ mamatābravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:4902: gamiṣyāmi gṛhaṃ svaṃ vai bharasvainaṃ bṛhaspate // MatsP_49.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:4903: evamuktvā gatā sā tu gatāyāṃ so 'pi taṃ tyajat /
GP12mtp176pu:4904: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ tyaktaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā taṃ marutaḥ śiśum /
GP12mtp176pu:4905: jagṛhustaṃ bharadvājaṃ marutaḥ kṛpayā sthitāḥ // MatsP_49.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:4909: tataḥ kratuṃ marutsomaṃ putrārthe samupāharat // MatsP_49.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:4914: bharatastu bharadvājaṃ putraṃ prāpya vibhur bravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:4915: ādāv ātmahitāya tvaṃ kṛtārtho 'haṃ tvayā vibho // MatsP_49.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:4916: pūrvaṃ tu vitathe tasmin kṛte vai putrajanmani /
GP12mtp176pu:4917: tatastu vitatho nāma bharadvājo nṛpo 'bhavat // MatsP_49.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:4920: tato jāte hi vitathe bharataśca divaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:4921: bharadvājo divaṃ yāto hy abhiṣicya sutamṛṣiḥ // MatsP_49.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:4925: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putras tasya putro mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_49.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:4926: gurudhī rantidevaśca satkṛtyāṃ tāv ubhau smṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:4930: tasya bhāryā viśālā tu suṣuve putrakatrayam /
GP12mtp176pu:4931: tryuṣaṇaṃ puṣkariṃ caiva kaviṃ caiva mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_49.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:4932: urukṣavāḥ smṛtā hy ete sarve brāhmaṇatāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4933: kāvyānāṃ tu varā hy ete trayaḥ proktā maharṣayaḥ // MatsP_49.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:4935: saṃbhṛtāṅgiraso dakṣā bṛhatkṣatrasya ca kṣitiḥ // MatsP_49.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:4937: tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ puraṃ tu gajasāhvayam // MatsP_49.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:4941: nīlinī dhūminī caiva keśinī caiva viśrutā // MatsP_49.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:4943: tapaso 'nte mahātejā jātā vṛddhasya dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_49.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:4947: ajamīḍhasya bhūminyāṃ jajñe bṛhadanur nṛpaḥ // MatsP_49.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:4957: nīpasyaikaśataṃ tv āsīt putrāṇām amitaujasām // MatsP_49.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:4958: nīpā iti samākhyātā rājānaḥ sarva eva te /
GP12mtp176pu:4959: teṣāṃ vaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān nīpānāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ // MatsP_49.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:4961: samarasya pārasampārau sadaśva iti te trayaḥ // MatsP_49.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:4962: putrāḥ sarvaguṇopetā jātā vai viśrutā bhuvi /
GP12mtp176pu:4965: vibhrājasya tu dāyādas tv aṇuho nāma vīryavān // MatsP_49.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:4967: aṇuhasya tu dāyādo brahmadatto mahīpatiḥ // MatsP_49.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:4969: vibhrājaḥ punar ājātaḥ sukṛteneha karmaṇā // MatsP_49.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:4972: ugrāyudhena tasyārthe sarve nīpāḥ praṇāśitāḥ // MatsP_49.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:4974: ugrāyudhaḥ kasya sutaḥ kasya vaṃśe sa kathyate /
GP12mtp176pu:4975: kimarthaṃ tena te nīpāḥ sarve caiva praṇāśitāḥ // MatsP_49.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:4979: tasya rājyaṃ pratiśrutya nīpān ājaghnivān prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4980: uvāca sāntvaṃ vividhaṃ jaghnuste vai hy ubhāv api // MatsP_49.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:4983: yadi me 'sti tapastaptaṃ sarvānnayatu vo yamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4984: tatastān kṛpyamāṇāṃstu yamena purataḥ sa tu // MatsP_49.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:4989: tathetyuktastato rājā yamena yuyudhe ciram // MatsP_49.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:4993: sarve yathocitaṃ kṛtvā jagmuste kṛṣṇamavyayam // MatsP_49.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:4994: yeṣāṃ tu caritaṃ gṛhya hanyate nāpamṛtyubhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4995: iha loke pare caiva sukhamakṣayyamaśnute // MatsP_49.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:4998: atha satyadhṛteḥ putro dṛḍhanemiḥ pratāpavān // MatsP_49.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:5004: atha rukmarathasyāsīt supārśvo nāma pārthivaḥ // MatsP_49.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:5010: smṛtāste prācyasāmānaḥ kārtā nāmeha sāmagāḥ // MatsP_49.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:5012: babhūva yena vikramya pṛthukasya pitā hataḥ // MatsP_49.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:5014: ugrāyudhasya dāyādaḥ kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_49.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:5016: nṛpaṃjayācca viratha ityete pauravāḥ stutāḥ // MatsP_49.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:5027: pañcālarakṣiṇo hy ete deśānāmiti naḥ śrutam // MatsP_50.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5029: ete hy aṅgirasaḥ pakṣaṃ saṃśritāḥ kāṇvamudgalāḥ // MatsP_50.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5033: divodāsaśca rājarṣir ahalyā ca yaśasvinī // MatsP_50.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5037: āsītsatyadhṛteḥ śukram amoghaṃ dhārmikasya tu // MatsP_50.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:5038: skannaṃ retaḥ satyadhṛter dṛṣṭvā cāpsarasaṃ jale /
GP12mtp176pu:5039: mithunaṃ tatra saṃbhṛtaṃ tasminsarasi saṃbhṛtam // MatsP_50.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5041: dṛṣṭvā jagrāha kṛpayā śaṃtanurmṛgayāṃ gataḥ // MatsP_50.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5042: ete śaradvataḥ putrā ākhyātā gautamā varāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5043: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi divodāsasya vai prajāḥ // MatsP_50.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5045: maitrāyaṇāvaraḥ so 'tha maitreyastu tataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_50.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5046: ete vaṃśyā yateḥ pakṣāḥ kṣatropetāstu bhārgavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5047: rājā caidyavaro nāma maitreyasya sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_50.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:5049: ajamīḍhaḥ punarjātaḥ kṣīṇe vaṃśe tu somakaḥ // MatsP_50.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5050: somakasya suto jantur hate tasmiñchataṃ babhau /
GP12mtp176pu:5053: putrābhāve tapastepe śataṃ varṣāṇi duścaram // MatsP_50.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:5057: ṛkṣaṃ sā janayāmāsa dhūmavarṇaṃ śatāgrajam // MatsP_50.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5061: kṛṣyamāṇastataḥ śakro bhayāttasmai varaṃ dadau // MatsP_50.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5062: puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca kurukṣetraṃ tu tatsmṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5063: tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān yasya nāmnā tu kauravāḥ // MatsP_50.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5064: kurostu dayitāḥ putrāḥ sudhanvā jahnureva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5069: kṛmeḥ putro mahāvīryaḥ khyātastvindrasamo vibhuḥ // MatsP_50.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:5071: caidyoparicarājjajñe girikā sapta vai sutān // MatsP_50.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5074: pañcamaśca yajuścaiva matsyaḥ kālī ca saptamī /
GP12mtp176pu:5075: bṛhadrathasya dāyādaḥ kuśāgro nāma viśrutaḥ // MatsP_50.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5077: vṛṣabhasya tu dāyādaḥ puṇyavānnāma pārthivaḥ // MatsP_50.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:5081: dve tasya śakale jāte jarayā saṃdhitaś ca saḥ // MatsP_50.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:5083: jetā sarvasya kṣatrasya jarāsaṃdho mahābalaḥ // MatsP_50.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:5085: sahadevātmajaḥ śrīmān somavit sa mahātapāḥ // MatsP_50.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:5088: surathasya tu dāyādo vīro rājā vidūrathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5093: devātithestu dāyādo dakṣa eva babhūva ha // MatsP_50.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:5095: dilīpasya pratīpastu tasya putrās trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_50.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:5097: vāhlīkasya tu dāyādāḥ sapta vāhlīśvarā nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5100: prajābhistu kimarthaṃ vai hy apadhyāto janeśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5101: ko doṣo rājaputrasya prajābhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // MatsP_50.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:5104: kāryaṃ caiva tu devānāṃ kṣatraṃ prati dvijottamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5107: idaṃ codāharantyatra ślokaṃ prati mahābhiṣak // MatsP_50.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:5108: yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ rogiṇameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5109: punaryuvā ca bhavati tasmāttaṃ śaṃtanuṃ viduḥ // MatsP_50.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5113: kālī vicitravīryaṃ tu dāśeyī janayatsutam // MatsP_50.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:5116: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca viduraṃ cāpyajījanat /
GP12mtp176pu:5118: teṣāṃ duryodhanaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvakṣatrasya vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5119: mādrī kuntī tathā caiva pāṇḍorbhārye babhūvatuḥ // MatsP_50.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:5131: kāśī baladharādbhīmāj jajñe vai sarvagaṃ sutam // MatsP_50.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:5135: yaudheyaṃ devakī caiva putraṃ jajñe yudhiṣṭhirāt // MatsP_50.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:5139: sa vaiśampāyanenaiva śaptaḥ kila maharṣiṇā // MatsP_50.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:5141: yāvatsthāsyasi tvaṃ loke tāvadeva prapatsyati // MatsP_50.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:5143: abhigamya sthitāścaiva nṛpaṃ ca janamejayam // MatsP_50.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:5145: utsannā yājino yajñe tataḥprabhṛti sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_50.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:5152: vivāde brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham abhiśapto vanaṃ yayau // MatsP_50.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:5158: durāpaṃ dīrghasattraṃ vai trīṇi varṣāṇi puṣkare /
GP12mtp176pu:5162: purā kila yadetadvai vyatītaṃ kīrtitaṃ tvayā // MatsP_50.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:5163: yeṣu vai sthāsyate kṣatram utpatsyante nṛpāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:5164: teṣām āyuṣpramāṇaṃ ca nāmataścaiva tānnṛpān // MatsP_50.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:5168: etatsarvaṃ prasaṃkhyāya pṛcchatāṃ brūhi naḥ prabho // MatsP_50.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:5171: bhāvyaṃ kaliyugaṃ caiva tathā manvantarāṇi ca // MatsP_50.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:5173: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhaviṣyā ye nṛpāstathā // MatsP_50.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:5177: tebhyo 'pare 'pi ye tv anye hy utpatsyante nṛpāḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5178: kṣatrāḥ pāraśavāḥ śūdrās tathānye ye bahiścarāḥ // MatsP_50.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:5185: gaṅgayā tu hṛte tasmin nagare nāgasāhvaye // MatsP_50.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:5193: nṛcakṣuṣastu dāyādo bhavitā vai sukhīvalaḥ // MatsP_50.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:5196: medhāvī tasya dāyādo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5198: urvo bhāvyaḥ sutastasya tigmātmā tasya cātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5201: bhaviṣyate codayanād vīge rājā vahīnaraḥ // MatsP_50.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:5206: kṣemakaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāsyati kalau yuge // MatsP_50.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:5212: ye pūjyāḥ syur dvijātīnām agnayaḥ sūta sarvadā /
GP12mtp176pu:5216: brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putras tasmātsvāhā vyajījanat // MatsP_51.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5217: pāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciragniśca yaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5219: śuciragniḥ smṛtaḥ sauraḥ sthāvarāścaiva te smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5220: pavamānātmajo hy agnir havyavāhaḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_51.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5222: devānāṃ havyavāho 'gniḥ prathamo brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // MatsP_51.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5223: saharakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ tu trayāṇāṃ te trayo 'gnayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5226: pāvano laukiko hy agniḥ prathamo brahmaṇaśca yaḥ // MatsP_51.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5228: vaiśvānaro havyavāho vahanhavyaṃ mamāra saḥ // MatsP_51.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:5230: yo 'tharvā laukiko hy agnir dakṣiṇāgniḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_51.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:5232: tasya hy alaukiko hy agnir dakṣiṇāgniḥ sa vai smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5233: atha yaḥ pavamānastu nirmathyo 'gniḥ sa ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5234: sa ca vai gārhapatyo 'gniḥ prathamo brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5235: tataḥ sabhyāvasathyau ca saṃśatyās tau sutāvubhau /
GP12mtp176pu:5237: yaḥ khalvāhavanīyo 'gnir abhimānī dvijaiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5238: kāverīṃ kṛṣṇaveṇīṃ ca narmadāṃ yamunāṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:5240: vipāśāṃ kauśikīṃ caiva śatadruṃ sarayūṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:5241: sītāṃ manasvinīṃ caiva hrādinīṃ pāvanāṃ tathā // MatsP_51.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:5243: tadā tu viharaṃstāsu dhiṣṇyecchaḥ sa babhūva ha // MatsP_51.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5245: dhiṣṇyeṣu jajñire yasmāt tataste dhiṣṇavaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_51.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5255: havyasūdo hy asaṃmṛjyaḥ śāmitraḥ sa vibhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5256: śatadhāmā sudhājyotī raudraiśvaryaḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_51.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5258: ajaikapādupastheyaḥ sa vai śālāmukho yataḥ // MatsP_51.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5260: putrā hyete tu sarvasya upastheyā dvijaiḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_51.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:5262: hautriyasya suto hyagnir barhiṣo havyavāhanaḥ // MatsP_51.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5265: apāṃ yoniḥ smṛtaḥ svāmbhaḥ seturnāma vibhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5266: dhiṣṇya āharaṇā hyete somenejyanta vai dvijaiḥ // MatsP_51.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5267: tato yaḥ pāvako nāmnā yaḥ sadbhiryoga ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5268: agniḥ so 'vabhṛtho jñeyo varuṇena sahejyate // MatsP_51.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:5269: hṛdayasya suto hyagner jaṭhare 'sau nṛṇāṃ pacan /
GP12mtp176pu:5272: agnermanyumataḥ putro ghoraḥ saṃvartakaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:5275: saharakṣastu vai kāmān gṛhe sa vasate nṛṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:5276: kravyādagniḥ sutastasya puruṣānyo 'tti vai mṛtān // MatsP_51.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:5278: tataḥ sutāstu sauvīryād gandharvairasurair hṛtāḥ // MatsP_51.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:5280: āyur nāmnā tu bhagavān paśau yastu praṇīyate // MatsP_51.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:5282: pākayajñeṣv abhīmānī hutaṃ havyaṃ bhunakti yaḥ // MatsP_51.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:5284: putro 'sya sahito hyagnir adbhutaḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_51.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:5286: adbhutasya suto vīro devāṃśastu mahānsmṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:5292: śucyagnestu prajā hyeṣā agnayaśca caturdaśa // MatsP_51.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:5293: ityete hyagnayaḥ proktāḥ praṇītā ye hi cādhvare /
GP12mtp176pu:5294: samatīte tu sarge ye yāmaiḥ saha surottamaiḥ // MatsP_51.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:5300: ete devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ prathamasyāntare manoḥ // MatsP_51.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5319: karmayogaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca yathāvadvistarānvitam // MatsP_52.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5322: yasmādaviditaṃ loke na kiṃcittava suvrata // MatsP_52.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5327: karmajñānodbhavaṃ brahma na ca jñānamakarmaṇaḥ // MatsP_52.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5331: dayā sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣāntī rakṣāturasya tu // MatsP_52.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:5334: na ca dravyeṣu kārpaṇyam ārteṣūpārjiteṣu ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5335: tathāspṛhā paradravye parastrīṣu ca sarvadā // MatsP_52.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5338: karmayogaṃ vinā jñānaṃ kasyacin neha dṛśyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5340: devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvadā /
GP12mtp176pu:5345: kaṇḍanī peṣaṇī cullī jalakumbhī pramārjanī // MatsP_52.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5346: pañca sūnā gṛhasthasya tena svargaṃ na gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:5356: vāsudevo jaganmūrtis tasya sambhūtayo hy amī // MatsP_52.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5361: brahmādyāś caturo mūlam avyaktādhipatiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_52.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5362: oṃ oṃ brahmaṇā cātha sūryeṇa viṣṇunātha śivena vā /
GP12mtp176pu:5365: vedamūrtāv ataḥ pūṣā pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ // MatsP_52.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5369: vikarmabhītasya sadā na kiṃcit prāptavyamastīha pare ca loke // MatsP_52.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5380: anantaraṃ ca vaktrebhyo vedāstasya vinirgatāḥ // MatsP_53.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5383: nirdagdheṣu ca lokeṣu vājirūpeṇa vai mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:5384: aṅgāni caturo vedān purāṇaṃ nyāyavistaram // MatsP_53.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5385: mīmāṃsāṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca parigṛhya mayā kṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5388: śrutvā jagāda ca munīn prati devāṃścaturmukhaḥ // MatsP_53.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5390: kālenāgrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā purāṇasya tato nṛpa // MatsP_53.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:5396: purāṇāni daśāṣṭau ca sāmprataṃ tadihocyate // MatsP_53.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5406: jyeṣṭhe māsi tilairyuktam aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet // MatsP_53.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5408: yatprāha dharmānakhilāṃs tadyuktaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ viduḥ // MatsP_53.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5410: paurṇamāsyāṃ vipūtātmā sa padaṃ yāti vāruṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:5417: śivaloke sa pūtātmā kalpamekaṃ vasennaraḥ // MatsP_53.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5423: paurṇamāsyāṃ prauṣṭhapadyāṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12mtp176pu:5435: yat tad īśānakaṃ kalpaṃ vṛttāntamadhikṛtya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5440: yaḥ pradadhannaraḥ so 'tha svargaloke mahīyate // MatsP_53.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5444: caturdaśa sahasrāṇi tathā pañca śatāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5446: tatpauṣe māsi yo dadyāt paurṇamāsyāṃ vimatsaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5468: skāndaṃ nāma purāṇaṃ ca hy ekāśītirnigadyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5469: sahasrāṇi śataṃ caikam iti martyeṣu gadyate // MatsP_53.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5471: śaivaṃ padamavāpnoti mīne copāgate ravau // MatsP_53.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:5475: yaḥ śaradviṣuve dadyād vaiṣṇavaṃ yātyasau padam // MatsP_53.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:5487: yo dadyātpṛthivī tena dattā bhavati cākhilā // MatsP_53.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:5492: sa siddhiṃ labhate mukhyāṃ śivaloke ca saṃsthitim // MatsP_53.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:5495: bhaviṣyāṇāṃ ca kalpānāṃ śrūyate yatra vistaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5501: matpiturmama pitrā ca mayā tubhyaṃ niveditam // MatsP_53.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:5522: sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣu tadviruddhaṃ ca yatphalam // MatsP_53.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:5524: rājaseṣu ca māhātmyam adhikaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ // MatsP_53.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:5526: saṃkīrṇeṣu sarasvatyāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca nigadyate // MatsP_53.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:5534: evaṃ sapādāḥ pañcaite lakṣā martye prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_53.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:5537: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_53.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:5538: idaṃ pavitraṃ yaśaso nidhānam idaṃ pitṝṇāmativallabhaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5539: idaṃ ca deveṣv amṛtāyitaṃ ca nityaṃ tvidaṃ pāpaharaṃ ca puṃsām // MatsP_53.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:5552: saṃyuktastava viṣṇorvā pumānbhaktaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // MatsP_54.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5557: śrutamapyatra yacchāntyai tadvrataṃ śṛṇu nārada // MatsP_54.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5562: mūle namo viśvadharāya pādau gulphāvanantāya ca rohiṇīṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:5563: jaṅghe 'bhipūjye varadāya caiva dve jānunī vāśvikumāraṛkṣe // MatsP_54.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:5565: pūrvottarāphalguniyugmake ca meḍhraṃ namaḥ pañcaśarāya pūjyam // MatsP_54.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5566: kaṭiṃ namaḥ śārṅgadharāya viṣṇoḥ sampūjayennārada kṛttikāsu /
GP12mtp176pu:5567: tathārcayedbhādrapadādvaye ca pārśve namaḥ keśiniṣūdanāya // MatsP_54.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5569: ṛkṣe 'nurādhāsu ca mādhavāya namastathoraḥsthalameva pūjyam // MatsP_54.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5570: pṛṣṭhaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu ca pūjanīyam aghaughavidhvaṃsakarāya tacca /
GP12mtp176pu:5571: śrīśaṅkhacakrāsigadādharāya namo viśākhāsu bhujāśca pūjyāḥ // MatsP_54.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5572: haste tu hastā madhusūdanāya namo 'bhipūjyā iti kaiṭabhāreḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5575: kūrmasya pādau śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi jyeṣṭhāsu kaṇṭhe harirarcanīyaḥ // MatsP_54.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5576: śrotre varāhāya namo 'bhipūjyā janārdanasya śravaṇena samyak /
GP12mtp176pu:5577: puṣye mukhaṃ dānavasūdanāya namo nṛsiṃhāya ca pūjanīyam // MatsP_54.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5579: āsyaṃ harerbhārgavanandanāya saṃpūjanīyaṃ dvija vāruṇe tu // MatsP_54.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:5580: namo 'stu rāmāya maghāsu nāsā saṃpūjanīyā raghunandanasya /
GP12mtp176pu:5581: mṛgottamāṅge nayane 'bhipūjye namo 'stu te rāma vighūrṇitākṣa // MatsP_54.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:5582: buddhāya śāntāya namo lalāṭaṃ citrāsu saṃpūjyatamaṃ murāreḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5583: śiro 'bhipūjyaṃ bharaṇīṣu viṣṇor namo 'stu viśveśvara kalkirūpiṇe // MatsP_54.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5584: ārdrāsu keśāḥ puruṣottamasya saṃpūjanīyā haraye namaste /
GP12mtp176pu:5585: upoṣitenarkṣadineṣu bhaktyā saṃpūjanīyā dvijapuṃgavāḥ syuḥ // MatsP_54.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5586: pūrṇe vrate sarvaguṇānvitāya vāgrūpaśīlāya ca sāmagāya /
GP12mtp176pu:5588: jalasya pūrṇe kalaśe niviṣṭām arcāṃ harervastragavā sahaiva /
GP12mtp176pu:5594: yathā na viṣṇubhaktānāṃ vṛjinaṃ jāyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:5596: yathā na lakṣmyā śayanaṃ tava śūnyaṃ janārdana /
GP12mtp176pu:5597: śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu kṛṣṇa janmani janmani // MatsP_54.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5604: brahmahatyādikaṃ kiṃcid iha vāmutra vā kṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5605: ātmanā vātha pitṛbhis tatsarvaṃ kṣayamāpnuyāt // MatsP_54.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5606: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vātibhaktyā puruṣavaro vratamaṅganātha kuryāt /
GP12mtp176pu:5607: kalikaluṣavidāraṇaṃ murāreḥ sakalavibhūtiphalapradaṃ ca puṃsām // MatsP_54.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:5618: yadā hastena saptamyām ādityasya dinaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:5619: sūryasya cātha saṃkrāntis tithiḥ sā sārvakāmikī // MatsP_55.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5621: sūryārcāṃ śivaliṅge ca prakurvan pūjayedyataḥ // MatsP_55.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5622: umāpate ravervāpi na bhedo dṛśyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:5624: haste ca sūryāya namo 'stu pādāv arkāya citrāsu ca gulphadeśam /
GP12mtp176pu:5625: svātīṣu jaṅghe puruṣottamāya dhātre viśākhāsu ca jānudeśam // MatsP_55.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5627: jyeṣṭhāsvanaṅgāya namo 'stu guhyam indrāya somāya kaṭī ca mūle // MatsP_55.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:5628: pūrvottarāṣāḍhayuge ca nābhiṃ tvaṣṭre namaḥ saptataraṃgamāya /
GP12mtp176pu:5629: tīkṣṇāṃśave ca śravaṇe ca kukṣau pṛṣṭhaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu vikartanāya // MatsP_55.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:5631: pūrvottarābhādrapadādvaye ca bāhū namaścaṇḍakarāya pūjyau // MatsP_55.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5632: sāmnāmadhīśāya karadvayaṃ ca saṃpūjanīyaṃ dvija revatīṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:5633: nakhāni pūjyāni tathāśvinīṣu namo 'stu saptāśvadhuraṃdharāya // MatsP_55.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5636: mṛgottamāṅge daśanā murāreḥ saṃpūjanīyā haraye namaste /
GP12mtp176pu:5637: namaḥ savitre rasanāṃ śaṃkare ca nāsābhipūjyā ca punarvasau ca // MatsP_55.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5639: sārpe 'tha mauliṃ vibudhapriyāya maghāsu karṇāviti gogaṇeśe // MatsP_55.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:5641: athottarāphalgunibhe bhruvau ca viśveśvarāyeti ca pūjanīye // MatsP_55.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5644: ityādi cāstrāṇi ca pūjya nityaṃ viśveśvarāyeti śivo 'bhipūjyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5646: ityevaṃ dvija naktāni kṛtvā dadyāt punarvasau /
GP12mtp176pu:5649: saptame vastrayugmaṃ ca pāraṇe tvadhikaṃ bhavet // MatsP_55.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5652: kṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ padmam aṣṭapattraṃ sakarṇikam /
GP12mtp176pu:5659: kapilāṃ vastrasaṃyuktāṃ suśīlāṃ ca payasvinīm // MatsP_55.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5663: kāntyā dhṛtyā śriyā ratyā tathā me santu siddhayaḥ // MatsP_55.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5664: yathā na devāḥ śreyāṃsaṃ tvadanyamanaghaṃ viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5667: śayyāgavādi tatsarvaṃ dvijasya bhavanaṃ nayet // MatsP_55.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5669: prakāśanīyaṃ vratamindumauler yaścāpi nindāmadhikāṃ vidhatte // MatsP_55.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:5670: bhaktāya dāntāya ca guhyametad ākhyeyam ānandakaraṃ śivasya /
GP12mtp176pu:5671: idaṃ mahāpātakabhin narāṇām apyakṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti // MatsP_55.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5673: nābhyeti rogaṃ na ca śokaduḥkhaṃ yā vātha nārī kurute 'tibhaktyā // MatsP_55.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:5674: idaṃ vasiṣṭhena purārjunena kṛtaṃ kubereṇa puraṃdareṇa /
GP12mtp176pu:5675: yatkīrtanenāpyakhilāni nāśam āyānti pāpāni na saṃśayo 'sti // MatsP_55.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:5676: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ raviśayanaṃ puruhūtavallabhaḥ syāt /*
GP12mtp176pu:5677: api narakagatānpitṝn aśeṣān api divamānayatīha yaḥ karoti // MatsP_55.33 //*
GP12mtp176pu:5682: śāntirmuktiśca bhavati jayaḥ puṃsāṃ viśeṣataḥ // MatsP_56.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5684: māghe maheśvaraṃ devaṃ mahādevaṃ ca phālgune // MatsP_56.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5685: sthāṇuṃ caitre śivaṃ tadvad vaiśākhe tvarcayennaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5686: jyeṣṭhe paśupatiṃ cārced āṣāḍhe ugramarcayet // MatsP_56.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5688: haramāśvayuje māsi tatheśānaṃ ca kārttike // MatsP_56.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5693: pañcagavyaṃ ca saṃprāśya śaṃkaraṃ pūjayenniśi // MatsP_56.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5694: aśvatthaṃ ca vaṭaṃ caivo-dumbaraṃ plakṣameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5695: palāśaṃ jambuvṛkṣaṃ ca viduḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maharṣayaḥ // MatsP_56.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5698: devāya dadyādarghyaṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ gāṃ kṛṣṇavāsasam /
GP12mtp176pu:5701: gāvaḥ kṛṣṇāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5710: muhurmuhurjanmani yena samyag vrataṃ samācakṣva tadindumaule // MatsP_57.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5713: rahasyaṃ tava vakṣyāmi yatpurāṇavido viduḥ // MatsP_57.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5718: tadā snānaṃ naraḥ kuryāt pañcagavyena sarṣapaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5719: āpyāyasveti tu japed vidvānaṣṭaśataṃ punaḥ // MatsP_57.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5721: somāya varadāyātha viṣṇave ca namo namaḥ // MatsP_57.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5724: somāya śāntāya namo 'stu pādāv anantadhāmneti ca jānujaṅghe /
GP12mtp176pu:5726: namo namaḥ kāmasukhapradāya kaṭiḥ śaśāṅkasya sadārcanīyā /
GP12mtp176pu:5727: tathodaraṃ cāpyamṛtodarāya nābhiḥ śaśāṅkāya namo 'bhipūjyā // MatsP_57.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:5728: namo 'stu candrāya mukhaṃ ca pūjyaṃ dantā dvijānāmadhipāya pūjyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5730: nāsā ca nāthāya vanauṣadhīnām ānandabhūtāya punarbhruvau ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5731: netradvayaṃ padmanibhaṃ tathendor indīvaraśyāmakarāya śaureḥ // MatsP_57.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5734: śiraḥ śaśāṅkāya namo murārer viśveśvarāyeti namaḥ kirīṭine /
GP12mtp176pu:5735: padmapriye rohiṇi nāma lakṣmīḥ saubhāgyasaukhyāmṛtacārukāye // MatsP_57.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5737: suptvātha bhūmau punarutthitena snātvā ca viprāya haviṣyayuktaḥ // MatsP_57.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:5743: śubhraṃ ca viṣṇoḥ karavīrapuṣpaṃ śrīcampakaṃ candramasaḥ pradeyam // MatsP_57.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5749: candraḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ kāryo rohiṇī caturaṅgulā // MatsP_57.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5754: savastrabhājanāṃ dhenuṃ tathā śaṅkhaṃ ca śobhanam // MatsP_57.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5756: candro 'yaṃ dvijarūpeṇa sabhārya iti kalpayet // MatsP_57.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5757: yathā na rohiṇī kṛṣṇa śayyāṃ saṃtyajya gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:5758: somarūpasya te tadvan mamābhedo 'stu bhūtibhiḥ // MatsP_57.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:5760: bhuktirmuktistathā bhaktis tvayi candrāstu me sadā // MatsP_57.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5763: idameva pitṝṇāṃ ca sarvadā vallabhaṃ mune /
GP12mtp176pu:5766: nārī vā rohiṇī candra-śayanaṃ yā samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:5768: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ madhumathanārcanam indukīrtanena /
GP12mtp176pu:5769: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi śaurer bhavanagataḥ paripūjyate 'maraughaiḥ // MatsP_57.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5776: ke tatra cartvijo nātha vedī vā kīdṛśī bhavet // MatsP_58.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5778: dravyāṇi kāni śastāni sarvamācakṣva tattvataḥ // MatsP_58.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5782: prāpya pakṣaṃ śubhaṃ śuklam atīte cottarāyaṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:5785: caturhastāṃ śubhāṃ vedīṃ caturasrāṃ caturmukhām // MatsP_58.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5788: nava saptātha vā pañca nātiriktā nṛpātmaja /
GP12mtp176pu:5795: aṣṭau tu jāpakāḥ kāryā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ // MatsP_58.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5799: vyajanaṃ cāmare śubhre tāmrapātre suvistṛte // MatsP_58.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5805: kuṇḍalāni ca haimāni keyūrakaṭakāni ca // MatsP_58.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5807: pūjayettu samaṃ sarvān ācāryo dviguṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5811: evamāsādya tatsarvam ādāveva viśāṃ pate // MatsP_58.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:5817: añjasā maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt pañcavarṇena tattvavit // MatsP_58.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5819: caturasraṃ ca parito vṛttaṃ madhye suśobhanam // MatsP_58.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5823: brahmāṇaṃ ca śivaṃ viṣṇuṃ tatraiva sthāpayedbudhaḥ // MatsP_58.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5831: sāmagau paścime tadvad uttareṇa tvatharvaṇau // MatsP_58.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5835: evamādiśya tānsarvān paryukṣyāgniṃ sa mantravit // MatsP_58.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5840: rātrisūktaṃ ca raudraṃ ca pāvamānaṃ sumaṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:5841: japeyuḥ pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ pūrvato bahvṛcaḥ pṛthak // MatsP_58.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:5842: śākraṃ raudraṃ ca saumyaṃ ca kūṣmāṇḍaṃ jātavedasam /
GP12mtp176pu:5845: śaiśavaṃ pañcanidhanaṃ gāyatraṃ jyeṣṭhasāma ca // MatsP_58.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:5847: gavāṃ vrataṃ ca kāṇvaṃ ca rakṣoghnaṃ vayasastathā /
GP12mtp176pu:5848: gāyeyuḥ sāmagā rājan paścimaṃ dvāramāśritāḥ // MatsP_58.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:5850: japeyurmanasā devam āśritya varuṇaṃ prabhum // MatsP_58.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:5854: rocanāṃ ca sasiddhārthāṃ gandhaṃ guggulameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5856: pratyekaṃ tu mahāmantrair eva kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5858: tataḥ prabhāte vimale saṃjāte 'tha śataṃ gavām /
GP12mtp176pu:5862: vedaśabdaiśca gāndharvair vādyaiśca vividhaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_58.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:5864: sāmagāya ca sā deyā brāhmaṇāya viśāṃ pate // MatsP_58.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5869: uttarābhimukhīṃ dhenuṃ jalamadhye tu kārayet // MatsP_58.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:5871: āpo hi ṣṭheti mantreṇa kṣiptvāgatya ca maṇḍapam // MatsP_58.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:5878: hemapātrīṃ ca śayyāṃ ca sthāpakāya nivedayet // MatsP_58.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:5883: eṣa eva vidhirdṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭhāsu tathaiva ca // MatsP_58.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:5887: prāvṛṭkāle sthite toye hy agniṣṭomaphalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5893: sa yāti rudrālayamāśu pūtaḥ kalpānanekāndivi modate ca // MatsP_58.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:5895: sahaiva viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ yat prāpnoti tadyāgaphalena bhūyaḥ // MatsP_58.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:5900: vidhinā kena kartavyaṃ pādapodyāpanaṃ budhaiḥ // MatsP_59.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5901: ye ca lokāḥ smṛtāsteṣāṃ tānidānīṃ vadasva naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5902: yatphalaṃ labhate pretya tatsarvaṃ vaktumarhasi // MatsP_59.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5912: phalāni sapta cāṣṭau vā kāladhautāni kārayet /
GP12mtp176pu:5919: vanaspateśca vidvadbhir homaḥ kāryo dvijātibhiḥ // MatsP_59.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5933: dakṣiṇā ca punastadvad deyā tatrāpi śaktitaḥ // MatsP_59.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5935: ācārye dviguṇaṃ dadyāt praṇipatya visarjayet // MatsP_59.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5943: so 'pi sampūjito devair brahmaloke mahīyate // MatsP_59.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5952: tataḥ kālena mahatā punaḥ sargavidhau nṛpa /
GP12mtp176pu:5958: rasarūpaṃ tato yāvat prāpnoti vasudhātalam // MatsP_60.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5972: tāmārādhya pumānbhaktyā nārī vā kiṃ na vindati // MatsP_60.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5975: tadvidhānaṃ jagannātha tatsarvaṃ ca vadasva me // MatsP_60.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5978: śuklapakṣasya pūrvāhṇe tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret // MatsP_60.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:5979: tasminnahani sā devī kila viśvātmanā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:5985: namo 'stu pāṭalāyai tu pādau devyāḥ śivasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:5986: śivāyeti ca saṃkīrya jayāyai gulphayor dvayoḥ // MatsP_60.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:5989: saṃkīrtya harikeśāya tathorū varade namaḥ // MatsP_60.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5990: īśāyai ca kīṭaṃ devyāḥ śaṃkarāyeti śaṃkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:5991: kukṣidvayaṃ ca koṭavyai śūline śūlapāṇaye // MatsP_60.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5993: sarvātmane namo rudram īśānyai ca kucadvayam // MatsP_60.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5998: svāhāsvadhāyai ca mukham īśvarāyeti śūlinam // MatsP_60.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6000: sthāṇave tu haraṃ tadvad dhāsyaṃ candramukhapriye // MatsP_60.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:6002: nama ugrāya lokeśaṃ laliteti punarbhruvau // MatsP_60.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:6010: evaṃ nivedya tatsarvam agrataḥ śivayoḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6012: punaḥ prabhāte tu tathā kṛtasnānajapaḥ śuciḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6016: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvat tṛtīyāyāṃ sadā mano /
GP12mtp176pu:6018: prāśane dānamantre ca viśeṣo 'yaṃ nibodha me /
GP12mtp176pu:6019: śṛṅgodakaṃ caitramāse vaiśākhe gomayaṃ punaḥ // MatsP_60.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:6021: śrāvaṇe dadhi saṃprāśyaṃ nabhasye ca kuśodakam // MatsP_60.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:6023: mārge māse tu gomūtraṃ pauṣe saṃprāśayedghṛtam // MatsP_60.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:6025: lalitā vijayā bhadrā bhavānī kumudā śivā // MatsP_60.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:6026: vāsudevī tathā gaurī maṅgalā kamalā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:6027: umā ca dānakāle tu prīyatāmiti kīrtayet // MatsP_60.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:6030: sindhuvāraṃ ca sarveṣu māseṣu kramaśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:6033: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvad upoṣya vidhivannaraḥ // MatsP_60.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:6034: strī bhaktā vā kumārī vā śivamabhyarcya bhaktitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6036: umāmaheśvaraṃ haimaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca gavā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:6050: nārī vā kurute vāpi kumārī vā nareśvara /
GP12mtp176pu:6053: so 'pi vidyādharo bhūtvā svargaloke ciraṃ vaset // MatsP_60.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:6054: idamiha madanena pūrvamiṣṭaṃ śatadhanuṣā kṛtavīryasūnunā ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6055: kṛtamatha varuṇena nandinā vā kim u jananātha tato yadudbhavaḥ syāt // MatsP_60.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:6060: tapaḥ satyaṃ ca saptaite devalokāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_61.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6061: paryāyeṇa tu sarveṣām ādhipatyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:6062: iha loke śubhaṃ rūpam āyuḥ saubhāgyameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6063: lakṣmīśca vipulā nātha kathaṃ syātpurasūdana // MatsP_61.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6072: tataḥ prabhṛti te devān manuṣyānsaha jaṅgamān /
GP12mtp176pu:6073: saṃpīḍya ca munīnsarvān praviśanti punarjalam // MatsP_61.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6074: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi vīrāḥ pañca ca sapta ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6081: adharma eṣa devendra sāgarasya vināśanam // MatsP_61.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6085: nivasanti suraśreṣṭha sa kathaṃ nāśamarhati // MatsP_61.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6087: uvācedaṃ vaco roṣān nirdahanniva pāvakam // MatsP_61.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6094: mārutena samaṃ loke tava janma bhaviṣyati // MatsP_61.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6103: kathaṃ ca mitrāvaruṇau pitarāvasya tau smṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:6107: bhūtvā dharmasuto viṣṇuś cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_61.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6111: na kāmamādhavābhyāṃ ca viṣayānprati cukṣubhe // MatsP_61.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6115: saṃkṣubdhāstu tayā devās tau tu devavarāvubhau /
GP12mtp176pu:6118: urvaśīti ca nāmneyaṃ loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // MatsP_61.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:6120: uktā māṃ ramayasveti bāḍham ityabravīttu sā // MatsP_61.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6122: varuṇena dhṛtā paścād varuṇaṃ nābhyanandata // MatsP_61.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6123: mitreṇāhaṃ vṛtā pūrvam adya bhāryā na te vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:6124: uvāca varuṇaścittaṃ mayi saṃnyasya gamyatām // MatsP_61.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:6126: tasyai mānuṣaloke tvaṃ gaccha somasutātmajam // MatsP_61.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:6127: bhajasveti yato veśyā dharma eṣa tvayā kṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6128: jalakumbhe tato vīryaṃ mitreṇa varuṇena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6135: jagmatuḥ śāpanāśāya brahmāṇaṃ jagataḥ patim // MatsP_61.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:6137: nimeṣāḥ syuśca lokānāṃ tadviśrāmāya nārada // MatsP_61.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:6140: agastya iti śāntātmā babhūva ṛṣisattamaḥ // MatsP_61.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:6142: sabhāryaḥ saṃvṛto viprais tapaścakre suduścaram // MatsP_61.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:6147: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yadabhīṣṭaṃ ca vai mune // MatsP_61.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:6155: tasmādarghaḥ pradātavyo hy agastyasya sadā budhaiḥ // MatsP_61.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:6157: kathamarghapradānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ tasya vai vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:6158: vidhānaṃ yadagastyasya pūjane tadvadasva me // MatsP_61.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:6166: caturmukhaṃ kumbhamukhe nidhāya dhānyāni saptāmbarasaṃyutāni // MatsP_61.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:6168: utkṣipya lambodaradīrghabāhum ananyacetā yamadiṅmukhaḥ san // MatsP_61.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:6169: śvetāṃ ca dadyādyadi śaktirasti raupyaiḥ khurair hemamukhīṃ savatsām /
GP12mtp176pu:6170: dhenuṃ naraḥ kṣīravatīṃ praṇamya savatsaghaṇṭābharaṇāṃ dvijāya // MatsP_61.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:6172: yāvatsamāḥ sapta daśāthavā syur athordhvamapyatra vadanti kecit // MatsP_61.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:6174: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putra kumbhayone namo 'stu te // MatsP_61.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:6177: vātāpī bhakṣito yena samudraḥ śoṣitaḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:6178: lopāmudrāpatiḥ śrīmān yo 'sau tasmai namo namaḥ // MatsP_61.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:6181: pratyabdaṃ tu phalatyāgam evaṃ kurvanna sīdati // MatsP_61.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:6182: homaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścād varjayenmānavaḥ phalam /
GP12mtp176pu:6183: anena vidhinā yastu pumānarghyaṃ nivedayet // MatsP_61.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:6185: dvitīyena bhuvarlokaṃ svargalokaṃ tataḥ param // MatsP_61.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:6187: yāvadāyuśca yaḥ kuryāt paraṃ brahmādhigacchati // MatsP_61.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:6188: iha paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya etad yugalamuniprabhavārghyasampradānam /
GP12mtp176pu:6189: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi viṣṇor bhavanagataḥ paripūjyate 'maraughaiḥ // MatsP_61.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:6194: bhuktimuktipradaṃ deva tanme brūhi janārdana // MatsP_62.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6207: saubhāgyārogyadaṃ yasmāt sadā ca lalitāpriyam // MatsP_62.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6209: dhārayedatha raktāni nārī cedatha saṃyatā // MatsP_62.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6211: devīṃ tu pañcagavyena tataḥ kṣīreṇa kevalam /
GP12mtp176pu:6217: varadāyai namaḥ pādau tathā gulphau namaḥ śriyai /
GP12mtp176pu:6218: aśokāyai namo jaṅghe pārvatyai jānunī tathā // MatsP_62.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6220: padmodarāyai jaṭharam uraḥ kāmaśriyai namaḥ // MatsP_62.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6222: mukhaṃ darpaṇavāsinyai smaradāyai smitaṃ namaḥ // MatsP_62.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6223: gauryai namastathā nāsām utpalāyai ca locane /
GP12mtp176pu:6225: namo gauryai namo dhiṣṇyai namaḥ kāntyai namaḥ śriyai /
GP12mtp176pu:6226: rambhāyai lalitāyai ca vāsudevyai namo namaḥ // MatsP_62.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6229: pūrveṇa vinyasedgaurīm aparṇāṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12mtp176pu:6230: bhavānīṃ dakṣiṇe tadvad rudrāṇīṃ ca tataḥ param // MatsP_62.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6233: madhye yathāsvaṃ māṃsāṅgāṃ maṅgalāṃ kumudāṃ satīm /
GP12mtp176pu:6234: rudraṃ ca madhye saṃsthāpya lalitāṃ karṇikopari /
GP12mtp176pu:6238: sindūraṃ snānacūrṇaṃ ca tāsāṃ śirasi pātayet // MatsP_62.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6241: na pūjyate gururyatra sarvāstatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ // MatsP_62.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6250: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
GP12mtp176pu:6259: yathā na devi deveśas tvāṃ parityajya gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:6261: kumudā vimalānantā bhavānī ca sudhā śivā /
GP12mtp176pu:6262: lalitā kamalā gaurī satī rambhātha pārvatī // MatsP_62.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:6265: mithunāni caturviṃśad daśa dvo ca samarcayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6266: aṣṭau ṣaḍvāpyatha punaś cānumāsaṃ samarcayet // MatsP_62.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:6271: naro vā yadi vā nārī vittaśāṭhyāt patatyadhaḥ // MatsP_62.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:6272: garbhiṇī sūtikā naktaṃ kumārī vātha rogiṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:6278: nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vidhavāthavā /
GP12mtp176pu:6280: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ giritanayāvratam indravāsasaṃsthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6281: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi devair amaravadhūjanakiṃnaraiśca pūjyaḥ // MatsP_62.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:6288: prātargavyena payasā tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret // MatsP_63.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6291: dakṣiṇāṅgāni sampūjya tato vāmāni pūjayet // MatsP_63.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6292: lalitāyai namo devyāḥ pādau gulphau tato 'rcayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6293: jaṅghāṃ jānuṃ tathā śāntyai tathaivoruṃ śriyai namaḥ // MatsP_63.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6295: stanau madanavāsinyai kumudāyai ca kandarām // MatsP_63.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6297: bhūlalāṭaṃ ca rudrāṇyai śaṃkarāyai tathālakān // MatsP_63.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6299: madanāyai lalāṭaṃ tu mohanāyai punarbhruvau // MatsP_63.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6300: netre candrārdhadhāriṇyai tuṣṭyai ca vadanaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6301: utkaṇṭhinyai namaḥ kaṇṭham amṛtāyai namaḥ stanau // MatsP_63.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6302: rambhāyai vāmakukṣiṃ ca viśokāyai namaḥ kaṭim /
GP12mtp176pu:6305: jānujaṅghe namo gauryai gāyatryai ghuṭike namaḥ // MatsP_63.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6306: dharādharāyai pādau tu viśvakāyai namaḥ śiraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6307: namo bhavānyai kāminyai kāmadevyai jagatpriye // MatsP_63.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6314: anena vidhinā devī māsi māsi sadārcayet // MatsP_63.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6315: lavaṇaṃ varjayenmāghe phālgune ca guḍaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6316: tailaṃ rājiṃ tathā caitre varjyaṃ ca madhu mādhave // MatsP_63.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6317: pānakaṃ jyeṣṭhamāse tu āṣāḍhe cātha jīrakam /
GP12mtp176pu:6318: śrāvaṇe varjayetkṣīraṃ dadhi bhādrapade tathā // MatsP_63.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6319: ghṛtamāśvayuje tadvad ūrje varjyaṃ ca mākṣikam /
GP12mtp176pu:6320: dhānyakaṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu pauṣe varjyā ca śarkarā // MatsP_63.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6321: vratānte karakaṃ pūrṇam eteṣāṃ māsi māsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6327: kumudā mādhavī gaurī rambhā bhadrā jayā śivā /
GP12mtp176pu:6328: umā ratiḥ satī tadvan maṅgalā ratilālasā // MatsP_63.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6333: kṛtvā tu kāñcanīṃ gaurīṃ pañcaratnasamanvitām // MatsP_63.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6340: navārbudasahasraṃ tu na duḥkhī jāyate naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6343: nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vā varānane /
GP12mtp176pu:6344: vidhavā yā tathā nārī sāpi tatphalamāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:6346: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayedyaḥ prasaṅgāt kalikaluṣavimuktaḥ pārvatīlokameti /
GP12mtp176pu:6347: matimapi ca narāṇāṃ yo dadāti priyārthaṃ vibudhapativimāne nāyakaḥ syādamoghaḥ // MatsP_63.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:6352: nāmnā ca loke vikhyātām ārdrānandakarīmimām // MatsP_64.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6354: brahmarkṣaṃ vā mṛgarkṣaṃ vā hasto mūlamathāpi vā /
GP12mtp176pu:6359: vāsudevyai namaḥ pādau śaṃkarāya namo haram /
GP12mtp176pu:6360: jaṅghe śokavināśinyai ānandāya namaḥ prabho // MatsP_64.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6362: adityai ca kaṭiṃ devyāḥ śūlinaḥ śūlapāṇaye // MatsP_64.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6363: mādhavyai ca tathā nābhim atha śambhorbhavāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6365: utkaṇṭhinyai namaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ nīlakaṇṭhāya vai haram /
GP12mtp176pu:6367: bāhū ca parirambhiṇyai triśūlāya harasya ca // MatsP_64.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6369: smitaṃ sasmeralīlāyai viśvavaktrāya vai vibho // MatsP_64.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6371: bhruvau nṛtyapriyāyai tu tāṇḍaveśāya śūlinaḥ // MatsP_64.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6373: svāhāyai mukuṭaṃ devyā vibhorgaṅgādharāya vai // MatsP_64.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6376: evaṃ sampūjya vidhivad agrataḥ śivayoḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6387: apakvaṃ dadhi dugdhaṃ ca gośṛṅgodakameva ca // MatsP_64.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6394: gaurī me prīyatāṃ nityam aghanāśāya maṅgalā /
GP12mtp176pu:6397: candanaṃ netrapaṭṭaṃ ca sahiraṇyāmbujena tu // MatsP_64.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6400: sapatnīkāya viprāya gaurī me prīyatāmiti // MatsP_64.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6402: yāmupoṣya naro yāti śambhoryatparamaṃ padam // MatsP_64.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6405: nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vidhavā ca yā /
GP12mtp176pu:6410: śakraloke sa gandharvaiḥ pūjyate 'pi yugatrayam // MatsP_64.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6411: ānandadāṃ sakaladuḥkhaharāṃ tṛtīyāṃ yā strī karotyavidhavā vidhavātha vāpi /
GP12mtp176pu:6412: sā sve gṛhe sukhaśatānyanubhūya bhūyo gaurīpadaṃ sadayitā dayitā prayāti // MatsP_64.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6417: yasyāṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam // MatsP_65.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6419: akṣayaṃ phalamāpnoti sarvasya sukṛtasya ca // MatsP_65.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6421: tatra dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ sarvamakṣayamucyate // MatsP_65.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6423: akṣataiḥ pūjyate viṣṇus tena sāpyakṣayā smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:6424: akṣataistu narāḥ snātā viṣṇordattvā tathākṣatān // MatsP_65.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6425: vipreṣu dattvā tāneva tathā saktūn susaṃkṛtān /
GP12mtp176pu:6428: etāsāmapi sarvāsāṃ tṛtīyānāṃ phalaṃ bhavet // MatsP_65.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6430: rājasūyaphalaṃ prāpya gatimagryāṃ ca vindati // MatsP_65.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6437: āyuśca vipulaṃ puṃsāṃ tanme kathaya mādhava // MatsP_66.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6439: samyakpṛṣṭaṃ tvayā rājañ chṛṇu sārasvataṃ vratam /
GP12mtp176pu:6447: yathā na devi bhagavān brahmaloke pitāmahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6448: tvāṃ parityajya saṃtiṣṭhet tathā bhava varapradā // MatsP_66.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6449: vedāḥ śāstrāṇi sarvāṇi gītanṛtyādikaṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:6450: na vihīnaṃ tvayā devi tathā me santu siddhayaḥ // MatsP_66.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6451: lakṣmīrmedhā dharā puṣṭir gaurī tuṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6452: etābhiḥ pāhi cāṣṭābhis tanubhirmāṃ sarasvati // MatsP_66.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6455: maunavratena bhuñjīta sāyaṃ prātastu dharmavit // MatsP_66.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6458: kṣīraṃ dadyāddhiraṇyaṃ ca gāyatrī prīyatāmiti // MatsP_66.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6461: samāpte tu vrate kuryād bhojanaṃ śuklataṇḍulaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6462: pūrvaṃ savastrayugmaṃ ca dadyādviprāya bhojanam // MatsP_66.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6463: devyā vitānaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ ca sitanetre payasvinīm /
GP12mtp176pu:6464: candanaṃ vastrayugmaṃ ca dadyācca śikharaṃ punaḥ // MatsP_66.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6470: nārī vā kurute yā tu sāpi tatphalagāminī // MatsP_66.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6471: brahmaloke vased rājan yāvat kalpāyutatrayam // MatsP_66.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:6472: sārasvataṃ vrataṃ yastu śṛṇuyādapi yaḥ paṭhet /
GP12mtp176pu:6492: sarve samudrāḥ saritas tīrthāni jaladā nadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6510: trailokye yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6511: brahmaviṣṇvarkayuktāni tāni pāpaṃ dahantu vai // MatsP_67.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6521: kṛtasnānāya taṃ paṭṭaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_67.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6523: na tasya grahapīḍā syān na ca bandhujanakṣayaḥ // MatsP_67.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6525: sūryagrahe sūryanāma sadā mantreṣu kīrtayet // MatsP_67.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6526: adhikāḥ padmarāgāḥ syuḥ kapilāṃ ca suśobhanām /
GP12mtp176pu:6541: tadvadvṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca yauvane cāpi vartatām // MatsP_68.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6545: vaivasvataśca tatrāpi yadā tu manuruttamaḥ // MatsP_68.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6553: sahasrabāhuśca yadā bhavitā tasya vai sutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6558: kṛtavīryeṇa vai pṛṣṭa idaṃ vakṣyati bhāskaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6568: tadvadvṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syāditareṣu ca // MatsP_68.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6577: hutvā snānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ maṅgalaṃ yena dhīmatā // MatsP_68.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6579: sthāpayitvā tu caturaḥ kumbhānkoṇeṣu śobhanān // MatsP_68.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6596: te te cānye ca devaughāḥ sadā pāntu kumārakam // MatsP_68.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6597: mitraḥ śanirvā hutabhug ye ca bālagrahāḥ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:6598: pīḍāṃ kurvantu bālasya mā māturjanakasya vai // MatsP_68.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6600: saptakaṃ pūjayedbhaktyā strīṇāmatha guruṃ punaḥ // MatsP_68.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:6605: bhuktvā ca guruṇā ceyam uccāryā mantrasaṃtatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6608: brahmā rudro vasuḥ skando viṣṇuḥ śakro hutāśanaḥ // MatsP_68.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:6609: rakṣantu sarve duṣṭebhyo varadāḥ santu sarvadā /
GP12mtp176pu:6611: śaktitaḥ kapilāṃ dadyāt praṇamya ca visarjayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6612: caruṃ ca putrasahitā praṇamya raviśaṃkarau // MatsP_68.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:6625: etanmahāpātakanāśanaṃ syāt paraṃ hitaṃ bālavivardhanaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6626: śṛṇoti yaścainamananyacetās tasyāpi siddhiṃ munayo vadanti // MatsP_68.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:6631: mandarastho mahādevaḥ pinākī brahmaṇā svayam // MatsP_69.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6634: svalpena tapasā deva bhavenmokṣo 'thavā nṛṇām // MatsP_69.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6638: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sa viśvātmā brahmaṇā lokabhāvanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6642: vārāho bhavitā kalpas tasya manvantare śubhe // MatsP_69.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6644: dvāparākhyaṃ yugaṃ tadvad aṣṭāviṃśatimaṃ jaguḥ // MatsP_69.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6649: purīṃ dvāravatīṃ nāma sāmprataṃ yā kuśasthalī /
GP12mtp176pu:6651: tvaṣṭā mamājñayā tadvat kariṣyati jagatpateḥ // MatsP_69.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6657: tvayā pṛṣṭasya dharmasya rahasyasyāsya bhedakṛt // MatsP_69.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6658: bhavitā sa tadā brahman kartā caiva vṛkodaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6660: yasya tīkṣṇo vṛko nāma jaṭhare havyavāhanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6661: mayā dattaḥ sa dharmātmā tena cāsau vṛkodaraḥ // MatsP_69.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6663: bhaviṣyatyajaraḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva rūpavān // MatsP_69.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6669: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:6670: bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhaviṣyāṇāṃ purāṇānāṃ purātanam // MatsP_69.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:6673: anyeṣvapi dinarkṣeṣu na śaktastvam upoṣitum // MatsP_69.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6675: upoṣya vidhinānena gaccha viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // MatsP_69.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6677: ghṛtenābhyañjanaṃ kṛtvā tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret // MatsP_69.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6679: kṛṣṇāya pādau sampūjya śiraḥ sarvātmane namaḥ // MatsP_69.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6681: śaṅkhine cakriṇe tadvad gadine varadāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:6682: sarve nārāyaṇasyaivaṃ saṃpūjyā bāhavaḥ kramāt // MatsP_69.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6685: namo nīlāya vai jaṅghe pādau viśvasṛje namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6686: namo devyai namaḥ śāntyai namo lakṣmyai namaḥ śriyai // MatsP_69.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:6687: namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai dhṛṣṭyai hṛṣṭyai namo namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6693: sarpiṣā saha bhuktvā ca gatvā śatapadaṃ budhaḥ // MatsP_69.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6697: namo nārāyaṇāyeti tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // MatsP_69.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:6699: rātriṃ ca sakalāṃ sthitvā snānaṃ ca payasā tathā // MatsP_69.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:6704: śrutvā prabhāte saṃjāte nadīṃ gatvā viśāṃ pate /
GP12mtp176pu:6705: snānaṃ kṛtvā mṛdā tadvat pāṣaṇḍān abhivarjayet // MatsP_69.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:6706: upāsya saṃdhyāṃ vidhivat kṛtvā ca pitṛtarpaṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:6714: tasya dhārāṃ ca śirasā dhārayetsakalāṃ niśām // MatsP_69.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:6716: aratnimātraṃ kuṇḍaṃ ca kuryāttatra trimekhalam // MatsP_69.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:6719: hutvā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ samyak caruṃ gokṣīrasaṃyutam /
GP12mtp176pu:6732: upādhyāyasya ca punar dviguṇaṃ sarvameva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:6733: tataḥ prabhāte vimale samutthāya trayodaśa // MatsP_69.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:6737: tāstu teṣāṃ tato bhaktyā bhakṣyabhojyānnatarpitān // MatsP_69.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:6739: bhuktvā cākṣāralavaṇam ātmanā ca visarjayet // MatsP_69.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:6742: śivasya hṛdaye viṣṇur viṣṇośca hṛdaye śivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6743: yathāntaraṃ na paśyāmi tathā me svasti cāyuṣaḥ // MatsP_69.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:6745: vāsāṃsi caiva sarveṣāṃ gṛhāṇi prāpayedbudhaḥ // MatsP_69.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:6749: taddinaṃ naraśārdūla ya icchedvipulāṃ śriyam // MatsP_69.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:6751: kuru vratamidaṃ samyak snehāttava mayeritam // MatsP_69.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:6754: yā tu kalyāṇinī nāma purā kalpeṣu paṭhyate // MatsP_69.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:6757: kṛtvā ca yāmapsarasām adhīśā veśyā kṛtā hyanyabhavāntareṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:6760: tatrāpi tasyāḥ paricārikeyaṃ mama priyā samprati satyabhāmā // MatsP_69.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:6761: snātaḥ purā maṇḍalameṣa tadvat tejomayaṃ vedaśarīramāpa /
GP12mtp176pu:6762: asyāṃ ca kalyāṇatithau vivasvān sahasradhāreṇa sahasraraśmiḥ // MatsP_69.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:6764: phalamasya na śakyate 'bhivaktuṃ yadi jihvāyutakoṭayo mukhe syuḥ // MatsP_69.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:6766: api narakagatānpitṝn aśeṣān alamuddhartumihaiva yaḥ karoti // MatsP_69.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:6767: ya idamaghavidāraṇaṃ śṛṇoti bhaktyā paripaṭhatīha paropakārahetoḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6768: tithimiha sakalārthabhāṅnarendras tava caturānana sāmyatāmupaiti // MatsP_69.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:6769: kalyāṇinī nāma purā babhūva yā dvādaśī māghadineṣu pūjyā /
GP12mtp176pu:6770: sā pāṇḍuputreṇa kṛtā bhaviṣyaty anantapuṇyānagha bhīmapūrvā // MatsP_69.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:6778: tasminneva yuge brahman sahasrāṇi tu ṣoḍaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:6789: śāpaṃ vakṣyati tāḥ sarvā vo hariṣyanti dasyavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6791: tataḥ prasādito deva idaṃ vakṣyati śārṅgabhṛt /
GP12mtp176pu:6797: ityuktvā tāḥ pariṣvajya gato dvāravatīśvaraḥ // MatsP_70.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6799: nivṛtte mausale tadvat keśave divamāgate // MatsP_70.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6803: āgamiṣyati yogātmā dālbhyo nāma mahātapāḥ // MatsP_70.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6808: divyabhāvāṃ tāṃ ca purīṃ nānāratnagṛhāṇi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6814: ādiṣṭo 'si purā brahman keśavena ca dhīmatā /
GP12mtp176pu:6816: veśyānāmapi yo dharmas taṃ no brūhi tapodhana /
GP12mtp176pu:6823: kathaṃ nārāyaṇo 'smākaṃ bhartā syād ityupādiśa // MatsP_70.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6835: purā devāsure yuddhe hateṣu śataśaḥ suraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6838: pariṇītāni yāni syur balādbhuktāni yāni vai /
GP12mtp176pu:6839: tāni sarvāṇi deveśaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // MatsP_70.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6842: bhaktimatyo varārohās tathā devakuleṣu ca // MatsP_70.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6843: rājānaḥ svāminastulyāḥ sutā vāpi ca tatsamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6844: bhaviṣyati ca saubhāgyaṃ sarvāsāmapi śaktitaḥ // MatsP_70.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:6846: nidhanenopacāryo vaḥ sa tadānyatra dāmbhikāt // MatsP_70.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:6849: brāhmaṇānāṃ varārohāḥ kāryāṇi vacanāni ca // MatsP_70.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:6851: avicāreṇa sarvābhir anuṣṭheyaṃ ca tatpunaḥ // MatsP_70.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:6853: yadā sūryadine hastaḥ puṣyo yātha punarvasuḥ // MatsP_70.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:6857: kāmāya pādau sampūjya jaṅghe vai mohakāriṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:6858: meḍhraṃ kandarpanidhaye kīṭaṃ prītimate namaḥ // MatsP_70.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:6864: sarvātmane ca sarvāṅgaṃ devadevasya pūjayet // MatsP_70.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:6868: sarvaśāntyai namaḥ prītyai namo ratyai nama śriyai // MatsP_70.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:6871: gandhairmaulyaistathā dhūpair naivedyena ca kāminī // MatsP_70.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:6875: tasmai viprāya sā dadyān mādhavaḥ prīyatāmiti // MatsP_70.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:6877: ratyarthaṃ kāmadevo 'yam iti citte 'vadhārya tam // MatsP_70.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:6891: dadyādetena mantreṇa tathaikāṃ gāṃ payasvinīm // MatsP_70.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:6893: tathaiva sarvakāmāptir astu viṣṇo sadā mama // MatsP_70.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:6894: yathā na kamalā dehāt prayāti tava keśava /
GP12mtp176pu:6895: tathā mamāpi deveśa śarīre sve kuru prabho // MatsP_70.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:6897: ka idaṃ kasmā adāditi vaidikaṃ mantramīrayet // MatsP_70.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:6899: śayyāsanādikaṃ sarvaṃ brāhmaṇasya gṛhaṃ nayet // MatsP_70.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:6900: tataḥ prabhṛti yo vipro ratyarthaṃ gṛhamāgataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6901: sa mānyaḥ sūryavāre ca sa mantavyo bhavettadā // MatsP_70.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:6906: daivaṃ vā mānuṣaṃ vā syād anurāgeṇa vā tataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6909: adharmo 'yaṃ tato na syād veśyānāmiha sarvadā // MatsP_70.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:6911: tadidaṃ sāmprataṃ sarvaṃ bhavatīṣvapi yujyate // MatsP_70.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:6913: kalyāṇīnāṃ ca kathitaṃ tatkurudhvaṃ varānanāḥ // MatsP_70.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:6915: sā pūjitā devagaṇair aśeṣair ānandakṛtsthānam upaiti viṣṇoḥ // MatsP_70.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:6917: tapodhanaḥ so 'pyabhidhāya caivaṃ tadā ca tāsāṃ vratamaṅganānām /
GP12mtp176pu:6918: svasthānameṣyatyanu tāḥ samastaṃ vrataṃ kariṣyanti ca devayānaiḥ // MatsP_70.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:6923: tasyāpi niṣkṛtiṃ deva vada sarvakṛpākara // MatsP_71.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6925: śokavyādhibhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavedyena tadvada // MatsP_71.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6928: kṣīrārṇave sapatnīkaḥ sadā vasati keśavaḥ // MatsP_71.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6934: gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmadam // MatsP_71.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6936: pitaro mā praṇaśyantu māstu dāmpatyabhedanam // MatsP_71.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6937: lakṣmyā viyujyate deva na kadācidyathā bhavān /
GP12mtp176pu:6938: tathā kalatrasambandho deva mā me viyujyatām // MatsP_71.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6939: lakṣmyā na śūnyo varada śayyāṃ tvaṃ śayanaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6959: na tasya patnyā virahaḥ kadācidapi jāyate /
GP12mtp176pu:6961: na virūpau na śokārtau dampatī bhavataḥ kvacit // MatsP_71.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6976: avyaṅgatā śive bhaktir vaiṣṇavo vā bhavetkatham // MatsP_72.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6979: śṛṇuṣva yadvakṣyati vai dharmaputrāya dhārmikaḥ // MatsP_72.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6981: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra idānīṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:6982: aṅgāravratam ityetat sa vakṣyati mahīpateḥ // MatsP_72.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6984: virocanasya saṃvādaṃ bhārgavasya ca dhīmataḥ // MatsP_72.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6987: sādhu sādhu mahābāho virocana śivaṃ tava /
GP12mtp176pu:6988: tattathā hasitaṃ tasya papraccha surasūdanaḥ // MatsP_72.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6990: sādhusādhviti māmevam uktavāṃstvaṃ vadasva me // MatsP_72.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6995: bhittvā sa sapta pātālān adahatsapta sāgarān /
GP12mtp176pu:7003: prekṣiṣyante janāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti varānmama // MatsP_72.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7005: devaloke 'dvitīyaṃ ca tava rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_72.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:7006: ye ca tvāṃ pūjayiṣyanti caturthyāṃ tvaddine narāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7011: dṛṣṭavānkriyamāṇaṃ ca śūdreṇa ca vyavasthitaḥ // MatsP_72.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:7013: vividhā ca rucirjātā yasmāttava vidūragā // MatsP_72.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:7018: paśyato 'pi bhavedrūpam aiśvaryaṃ kimu kurvataḥ // MatsP_72.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7020: ālokitaṃ tena surārigarbhe sambhūtireṣā tava daitya jātā // MatsP_72.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:7023: prahrādanandano vīraḥ punaḥ papraccha vismitaḥ // MatsP_72.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:7026: dīyamānaṃ tu yaddānaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ bhavāntare // MatsP_72.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:7028: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā punaḥ provāca vistarāt // MatsP_72.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7031: mṛdā snānaṃ tadā kuryāt padmarāgavibhūṣitaḥ // MatsP_72.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7042: suvarṇaśṛṅgīṃ kapilām athārcya raupyaiḥ suraiḥ kāṃsyadohāṃ savatsām /
GP12mtp176pu:7043: dhuraṃdharaṃ raktamatīva saumyaṃ dhānyāni saptāmbarasaṃyutāni // MatsP_72.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:7045: caturbhujaṃ hemamaye niviṣṭaṃ pātre guḍasyopari sarpiyukte // MatsP_72.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:7047: dātavyametatsakalaṃ dvijāya kuṭumbine naiva tu dāmbhikāya /
GP12mtp176pu:7048: samarpayedvipravarāya bhaktyā kṛtāñjaliḥ pūrvamudīrya mantram // MatsP_72.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:7050: rūpārthī tvāṃ prapanno 'haṃ gṛhāṇārghyaṃ namo 'stu te // MatsP_72.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:7054: śayyāṃ ca śaktito dadyāt sarvopaskarasaṃyutām // MatsP_72.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:7060: caturo vātha vā tasya yatpuṇyaṃ tadvadāmi te // MatsP_72.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:7062: viṣṇau vātha śive bhaktaḥ saptadvīpādhipo bhavet // MatsP_72.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:7066: ityevamuktvā bhṛgunandano 'pi jagāma daityaśca cakāra sarvam /
GP12mtp176pu:7067: tvaṃ cāpi rājankuru sarvametad yato 'kṣayaṃ vedavido vadanti // MatsP_72.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:7069: tatheti sampūjya sa pippalādaṃ vākyaṃ cakārādbhutavīryakarmā /
GP12mtp176pu:7070: śṛṇoti yaścainamananyacetās tasyāpi siddhiṃ bhagavānvidhatte // MatsP_72.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:7075: yātrārambhe 'vasāne ca tathā śukrodaye tviha // MatsP_73.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7081: kave sarvārthasiddhyarthaṃ gṛhāṇārghyaṃ namo 'stu te // MatsP_73.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7084: yāvacchukrasya na hṛtā pūjā sā mālyakaiḥ śubhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7086: tāvadannaṃ na cāśnīyāt tribhiḥ kāmārthasiddhaye // MatsP_73.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7092: praṇamya ca gavā sārdhaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_73.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7094: krūragrahaiḥ pīḍitānām amṛtāya namo namaḥ // MatsP_73.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7109: yadā tu śuklasaptamyām ādityasya dinaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:7110: sā tu kalyāṇinī nāma vijayā ca nigadyate // MatsP_74.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7112: tataḥ śuklāmbaraḥ padmam akṣatābhiḥ prakalpayet // MatsP_74.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7116: yāmye divākarāyeti vidhātra iti nairṛte // MatsP_74.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7118: saumye vikartanāyeti ravaye cāṣṭame dale // MatsP_74.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7119: ādāvante ca madhye ca namo 'stu paramātmane /
GP12mtp176pu:7122: sthaṇḍile pūjayedbhaktyā guḍena lavaṇena ca // MatsP_74.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7125: tilapātraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_74.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7131: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi vrataṃ caret // MatsP_74.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7135: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta yato mohātpatatyadhaḥ // MatsP_74.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7142: śṛṇoti paṭhate ceha sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // MatsP_74.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:7147: yāmupoṣya naraḥ śokaṃ na kadācidihāśnute // MatsP_75.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7148: māghe kṛṣṇatilaiḥ snātvā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ vai śuklapakṣataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7152: kṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ padmam arkāyeti ca pūjayet /
GP12mtp176pu:7155: tathā viśokatā me 'stu tvadbhaktiḥ pratijanma ca // MatsP_75.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7156: evaṃ sampūjya ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu bhaktyā sampūjayeddvijān /
GP12mtp176pu:7157: suptvā saṃprāśya gomūtram utthāya kṛtanaityakaḥ // MatsP_75.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7159: tadvastrayugmaṃ padmaṃ ca brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_75.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7165: śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dadyāt kapilāṃ ca payasvinīm // MatsP_75.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7167: viśokasaptamīṃ kuryāt sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_75.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7170: yaṃ yaṃ prārthayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnoti puṣkalam /
GP12mtp176pu:7171: niṣkāmaḥ kurute yastu sa paraṃ brahma gacchati // MatsP_75.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7173: so 'pīndralokamāpnoti na duḥkhī jāyate kvacit // MatsP_75.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7178: yāmupoṣya naraḥ pāpād vimuktaḥ svargabhāgbhavet // MatsP_76.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7180: tāmupoṣyātha kamalaṃ kārayitvā tu kāñcanam // MatsP_76.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7191: bhānurarko ravirbrahmā sūryaḥ śakro hariḥ śivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7193: pratimāsaṃ ca saptamyām ekaikaṃ nāma kīrtayet /
GP12mtp176pu:7197: yathā na viphalāḥ kāmās tvadbhaktānāṃ sadā rave /
GP12mtp176pu:7205: yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi so 'pi kalyāṇabhāgbhavet // MatsP_76.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7212: prātaḥ snātvā tilaiḥ śuklaiḥ śuklamālyānulepanaḥ // MatsP_77.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7214: tasminnamaḥ savitre tu gandhadhūpau nivedayet // MatsP_77.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:7219: sarvasyāmṛtameva tvam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_77.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7223: tatsarvaṃ viduṣe tadvad brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_77.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7226: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7233: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta kurvandoṣaṃ samaśnute // MatsP_77.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7235: nipeturye dharaṇyāṃ tu śālimudgekṣavaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_77.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7237: iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ // MatsP_77.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7240: yaḥ kuryātparayā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:7241: kalpamekaṃ vasetsvarge tato yāti paraṃ padam // MatsP_77.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:7242: idamanaghaṃ śṛṇoti yaḥ smaredvā paripaṭhatīha divākarasya loke /
GP12mtp176pu:7243: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi devair amaravadhūjanamālayābhipūjyaḥ // MatsP_77.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7250: tilapātre ca sauvarṇe vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham // MatsP_78.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7256: śaktyā ca kapilāṃ dadyād alaṃkṛtya vidhānataḥ // MatsP_78.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7259: anena vidhinā śukla-saptamyāṃ māsi māsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7262: gāṃ ca dadyātsvaśaktyā tu suvarṇāḍhyāṃ payasvinīm // MatsP_78.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7266: kalpe kalpe tato lokān saptagatvā pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12mtp176pu:7267: apsarobhiḥ parivṛtas tato yāti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_78.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7268: yaḥ paśyatīdaṃ śṛṇuyācca martyaḥ paṭhecca bhaktyātha matiṃ dadāti /
GP12mtp176pu:7278: tataḥ prabhāta utthāya kṛtvā snānaṃ punardvijān // MatsP_79.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:7280: sauvarṇaṃ puruṣaṃ tadvat padmahastaṃ suśobhanam // MatsP_79.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7284: dakṣiṇe tadvadarkāya tathāryamṇe ca nairṛte // MatsP_79.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7287: karṇikāyāṃ ca puruṣaṃ sarvātmana iti nyaset /
GP12mtp176pu:7291: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ saptamyāṃ māsi māsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7298: vipāpmā sa sukhī martyaḥ kalpaṃ ca divi modate // MatsP_79.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7318: tataḥ prabhāte saṃjāte bhaktyā sampūjayeddvijān // MatsP_80.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7319: anena vidhinā dadyān māsi māsi sadā naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7320: vāsasā vṛṣabhaṃ haimaṃ tadvadgāṃ kāñcanodbhavām // MatsP_80.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7326: tasya śrīrvipulā kīrtir bhavejjanmani janmani // MatsP_80.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7334: yāvatsamāḥ sapta naraḥ karoti yaḥ saptamīṃ saptavidhānayuktām /
GP12mtp176pu:7335: sa saptalokādhipatiḥ krameṇa bhūtvā padaṃ yāti paraṃ murāreḥ // MatsP_80.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7340: vibhavodbhavakāri bhūtale 'smin bhavabhīterapi sūdanaṃ ca puṃsaḥ // MatsP_81.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7342: paripṛṣṭamidaṃ jagatpriyaṃ te vibudhānāmapi durlabhaṃ mahattvāt /
GP12mtp176pu:7343: tava bhaktimatastathāpi vakṣye vratamindrāsuramānaveṣu guhyam // MatsP_81.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7348: śriyaṃ vābhyarcya vidhivad bhokṣyāmi tvapare 'hani // MatsP_81.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7352: viśokāya namaḥ pādau jaṅghe ca varadāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:7353: śrīśāya jānunī tadvad ūrū ca jalaśāyine // MatsP_81.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7354: kandarpāya namo guhyaṃ mādhavāya namaḥ kaṭim /
GP12mtp176pu:7355: dāmodarāyetyudaraṃ pārśve ca vipulāya vai // MatsP_81.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7356: nābhiṃ ca padmanābhāya hṛdayaṃ manmathāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:7357: śrīdharāya vibhorvakṣaḥ karau madhujite namaḥ // MatsP_81.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7358: cakriṇe vāmabāhuṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ gadine namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7359: vaikuṇṭhāya namaḥ kaṇṭham āsyaṃ yajñamukhāya vai // MatsP_81.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7361: lalāṭaṃ vāmanāyeti haraye ca punarbhruvau // MatsP_81.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7363: namaḥ sarvātmane tadvac chira ityabhipūjayet // MatsP_81.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7365: tatastu maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā sthaṇḍilaṃ kārayenmudā // MatsP_81.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7367: ślakṣṇaṃ hṛdyaṃ ca parito vapratrayasamāvṛtam // MatsP_81.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7372: namo devyai namaḥ śāntyai namo lakṣmyai namaḥ śriyai /
GP12mtp176pu:7373: namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai vṛṣṭyai hṛṣṭyai namo namaḥ // MatsP_81.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:7375: viśokā cāstu sampattyai viśokā sarvasiddhaye // MatsP_81.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7381: abhigamya ca viprāṇāṃ mithunāni tadārcayet // MatsP_81.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:7385: prabhāte ca tataḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā dāmpatyamarcayet // MatsP_81.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7387: bhuktvā śrutvā purāṇāni taddinaṃ cātivāhayet // MatsP_81.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:7388: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7391: yathā na lakṣmīrdeveśa tvāṃ parityajya gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:7392: tathā surūpatārogyam aśokaścāstu me sadā // MatsP_81.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:7393: yathā devena rahitā na lakṣmīrjāyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:7394: tathā viśokatā me 'stu bhaktiragryā ca keśave // MatsP_81.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7396: śūrpaṃ ca lakṣmyā sahitaṃ dātavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā // MatsP_81.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7399: kadambaṃ kubjakaṃ jātiḥ śastānyetāni sarvadā // MatsP_81.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7404: kiṃrūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dātavyaṃ tadihocyatām // MatsP_82.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7413: vatsaṃ bhāreṇa kurvīta dvābhyāṃ vai madhyamā smṛtā // MatsP_82.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7414: ardhabhāreṇa vatsaḥ syāt kaniṣṭhā bhārakeṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:7425: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deveṣvavasthitā /
GP12mtp176pu:7426: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama śāntiṃ prayacchatu // MatsP_82.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7427: dehasthā yā ca rudrāṇī śaṃkarasya sadā priyā /
GP12mtp176pu:7428: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // MatsP_82.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7429: viṣṇorvakṣasi yā lakṣmīḥ svāhā yā ca vibhāvasoḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7431: caturmukhasya yā lakṣmīr yā lakṣmīrdhanadasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7432: lakṣmīryā lokapālānāṃ sā dhenurvaradāstu me // MatsP_82.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7433: svadhā yā pitṛmukhyāṇāṃ svāhā yajñabhujāṃ ca yā /
GP12mtp176pu:7434: sarvapāpaharā dhenus tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_82.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7438: tāsāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi nāmāni ca narādhipa // MatsP_82.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7443: rasadhenuśca navamī daśamī syāt svarūpataḥ // MatsP_82.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:7447: etadevaṃvidhānaṃ syāt ta evopaskarāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_82.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:7457: yāmupoṣya naro yāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // MatsP_82.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7458: iha loke ca saubhāgyam āyurārogyameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7459: vaiṣṇavaṃ puramāpnoti maraṇe ca smaranharim // MatsP_82.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7461: na śokaduḥkhadaurgatyaṃ tasya saṃjāyate nṛpa // MatsP_82.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7462: nārī vā kurute yā tu viśokadvādaśīvratam /
GP12mtp176pu:7465: kartavyaṃ bhūtikāmena bhaktyā tu parayā nṛpa // MatsP_82.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7466: iti paṭhati ya itthaṃ yaḥ śṛṇotīha samyaṅ madhumuranarakārer arcanaṃ yaśca paśyet /
GP12mtp176pu:7467: matimāpa ca janānāṃ yo dadātīndraloke vasati sa vibudhaughaiḥ pūjyate kalpamekam // MatsP_82.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:7479: prathamo dhānyaśailaḥ syād dvitīyo lavaṇācalaḥ // MatsP_83.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7485: ayane viṣuve puṇye vyatīpāte dinakṣaye // MatsP_83.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7488: śuklāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ vā puṇyarkṣe vā vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7492: prāgudakpravaṇaṃ tadvat prāṅmukhaṃ ca vidhānataḥ // MatsP_83.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7496: madhyamaḥ pañcaśatikaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ syāt tribhiḥ śataiḥ // MatsP_83.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7500: śrīkhaṇḍakhaṇḍairabhitaḥ pravālair latānvitaḥ śuktiśilātalaḥ syāt // MatsP_83.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7503: catvāri śṛṅgāṇi ca rājatāni nitambabhāgeṣvapi rājataḥ syāt /
GP12mtp176pu:7505: śuklāmbarāṇyambudharāvalī syāt pūrveṇa pītāni ca dakṣiṇena /
GP12mtp176pu:7506: vāsāṃsi paścādatha karburāṇi raktāni caivottarato ghanālī // MatsP_83.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7508: nānāphalālī ca samantataḥ syān manoramaṃ mālyavilepanaṃ ca // MatsP_83.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:7509: vitānakaṃ copari pañcavarṇam amlānapuṣpābharaṇaṃ sitaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7510: itthaṃ niveśyāmaraśailamagryaṃ merostu viṣkambhagirīn krameṇa // MatsP_83.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:7512: pūrveṇa mandaramanekaphalāvalībhir yuktaṃ yavaiḥ kanakabhadrakadambacihnaiḥ // MatsP_83.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:7514: kṣīrāruṇodasarasātha vanena caivaṃ raupyeṇa śaktighaṭitena virājamānam // MatsP_83.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:7516: haimena yajñapatinā ghṛtamānasena vastraiśca rājatavanena ca saṃyutaḥ syāt // MatsP_83.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7518: ākārayedrajatapuṣpavanena tadvad vastrānvitaṃ dadhisitodasaras tathāgre // MatsP_83.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:7519: saṃsthāpya taṃ vipulaśailamathottareṇa śailaṃ supārśvamapi māṣamayaṃ suvastram /
GP12mtp176pu:7520: puṣpaiśca hemavaṭapādapaśekharaṃ tam ākārayet kanakadhenuvirājamānam // MatsP_83.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:7521: mākṣīkabhadrasarasātha vanena tadvad raupyeṇa bhāsvaravatā ca yutaṃ vidhāya /
GP12mtp176pu:7523: pūrveṇa hastamitamatra vidhāya kuṇḍaṃ kāryastilairyavaghṛtena samitkuśaiśca /
GP12mtp176pu:7524: rātrau ca jāgaramanuddhatagītatūryair āvāhanaṃ ca kathayāmi śiloccayānām // MatsP_83.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7526: kṣemaṃ vidhatsva kuru śāntimanuttamāṃ naḥ sampūjitaḥ paramabhaktimatā mayā hi // MatsP_83.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7528: mūrtāmūrtātparaṃ bījam ataḥ pāhi sanātana // MatsP_83.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7530: rudrādityavasūnāṃ ca tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_83.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:7534: yasmāccaitrarathena tvaṃ bhadrāśvena ca varṣataḥ // MatsP_83.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:7538: yasmāttvaṃ ketumālena vaibhrājena vanena ca // MatsP_83.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:7540: uttaraiḥ kurubhiryasmāt sāvitreṇa vanena ca // MatsP_83.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:7541: supārśva rājase nityam ataḥ śrīrakṣayāstu me /
GP12mtp176pu:7542: evamāmantrya tānsarvān prabhāte vimale punaḥ // MatsP_83.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:7546: nava sapta tathāṣṭau vā pañca dadyād aśaktimān // MatsP_83.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:7547: ekāpi gurave deyā kapilā ca payasvinī /
GP12mtp176pu:7548: parvatānāmaśeṣāṇām eṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_83.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:7549: ta eva pūjane mantrās ta evopaskarā matāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7550: grahāṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ ca sarvadā // MatsP_83.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:7554: dānakāle ca ye mantrāḥ parvateṣu ca yatphalam // MatsP_83.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:7555: annaṃ brahma yataḥ proktam anne prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7562: vimānena divaḥ pṛṣṭham āyāti sma niṣevita /
GP12mtp176pu:7563: dharmakṣaye rājarājyam āpnotīha na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_83.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:7578: taddānakartṛkatvena tvaṃ māṃ pāhi nagottama // MatsP_84.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7580: priyaṃ ca śivayornityaṃ tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_84.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7584: umāloke vasetkalpaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_84.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7599: tathā rasānāṃ pravaraḥ sadaivekṣuraso mataḥ // MatsP_85.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7600: mama tasmātparāṃ lakṣmīṃ guḍaparvata dehi vai /
GP12mtp176pu:7602: nivāsaścāpi pārvatyās tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_85.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7604: pūjyamānaḥ sa gandharvair gaurīloke mahīyate // MatsP_85.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7611: yasya pradānādbhavanaṃ vairiñcaṃ yāti mānavaḥ // MatsP_86.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7623: tatra kalpaśataṃ tiṣṭhet tato yāti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_86.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7629: uttamo daśabhir droṇair madhyamaḥ pañcabhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7630: tribhiḥ kaniṣṭho viprendra tilaśailaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_87.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7634: tilāḥ kuśāśca māṣāśca tasmācchāntyai bhavatviha // MatsP_87.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7635: havye kavye ca yasmācca tilā evābhirakṣaṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:7636: bhavāduddhara śailendra tilācala namo 'stu te // MatsP_87.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7638: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti punarāvṛttidurlabham // MatsP_87.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7645: yatpradānānnaro nityam āpnoti paramaṃ padam // MatsP_88.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7654: rudraloke vasetkalpaṃ tato rājā bhavediha // MatsP_88.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7669: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ gurave taṃ nivedayet /
GP12mtp176pu:7690: padmarāgaiḥ sasauvarṇair uttareṇa ca vinyaset // MatsP_90.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7696: tvaṃ ca ratnamayo nityaṃ namaste 'stu sadācala // MatsP_90.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7698: sadā ratnapradānena tasmānnaḥ pāhi parvata // MatsP_90.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7717: rājataṃ syādyadanyeṣāṃ sarvaṃ tadiha kāñcanam // MatsP_91.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7719: dadyāttataḥ prabhāte tu gurave raupyaparvatam // MatsP_91.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7722: pitṝṇāṃ vallabho yasmād dharīndrāṇāṃ śivasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7746: haimī supārśve surabhir dakṣiṇābhimukhī bhavet // MatsP_92.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7748: kṛtvā tu gurave dadyān madhyamaṃ parvatottamam /
GP12mtp176pu:7751: tasmādānandakārī tvaṃ bhava śailendra sarvadā // MatsP_92.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7752: amṛtaṃ pibatāṃ ye tu nipeturbhuvi śīkarāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7753: devānāṃ tatsamutthastvaṃ pāhi naḥ śarkarācala // MatsP_92.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7757: sarvapāpair vinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramaṃ padam // MatsP_92.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7767: suhṛcchakrasya nihatā yena daityāḥ sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_92.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7780: kasmācca vipulaṃ tejo maccharīre sadottamam // MatsP_92.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7786: bhṛtyo līlāvatīgehe tena hemnā vinirmitāḥ // MatsP_92.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:7789: dharmakāryamiti jñātvā na gṛhṇāti kathaṃcana // MatsP_92.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:7791: līlāvatī gireḥ pārśve paricaryāṃ ca pārthiva // MatsP_92.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7793: sā ca līlāvatī veśyā-kālena mahatāpi ca // MatsP_92.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7797: na maulyamādādveśyātaḥ sa bhavāniha sāmpratam // MatsP_92.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:7800: samyagujjvālitāḥ patnyā seyaṃ bhānumatī tava // MatsP_92.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7802: yasmātkṛtaṃ tatparikarma rātrāv anuddhatābhyāṃ lavaṇācalasya // MatsP_92.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:7805: tatheti satkṛtya sa dharmamūrtir vaco vasiṣṭhasya dadau ca sarvān /
GP12mtp176pu:7808: śṛṇoti bhaktyātha matiṃ dadāti vikalmaṣaḥ so 'pi divaṃ prayāti // MatsP_92.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:7810: yaḥ kuryātkimu munipuṃgaveha samyak śāntātmā sakalagirīndrasampradānam // MatsP_92.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:7819: yena brahmanvidhānena tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // MatsP_93.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7835: rāhuḥ keturiti proktā grahā lokahitāvahāḥ // MatsP_93.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7836: madhye tu bhāskaraṃ vidyāl lohitaṃ dakṣiṇena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:7837: uttareṇa guruṃ vidyād budhaṃ pūrvottareṇa tu // MatsP_93.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7842: skandamaṅgārakasyāpi budhasya ca tathā harim // MatsP_93.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7844: śanaiścarasya tu yamaṃ rāhoḥ kālaṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_93.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7846: agnirāpaḥ kṣitirviṣṇur indra aindrī ca devatāḥ // MatsP_93.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7851: somaśukrau tathā śveto budhajīvau ca piṅgalau /
GP12mtp176pu:7852: mandarāhū tathā kṛṣṇau dhūmraṃ ketugaṇaṃ viduḥ // MatsP_93.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7858: dadhyodanaṃ ca jīvāya śakrāya ca ghṛtaudanam /
GP12mtp176pu:7864: sthāpayedavraṇaṃ kumbhaṃ varuṇaṃ tatra vinyaset // MatsP_93.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7865: gaṅgādyāḥ saritaḥ sarvāḥ samudrāṃśca sarāṃsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7869: sarve samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca nadāstathā /
GP12mtp176pu:7874: audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāśca samidhaḥ kramāt // MatsP_93.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7876: hotavyā madhusarpirbhyāṃ dadhnā caiva samanvitāḥ // MatsP_93.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7880: svena svenaiva mantreṇa hotavyāḥ samidhaḥ pṛthak // MatsP_93.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7885: hutvā ca tāṃścarūnsamyak tato homaṃ samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7886: ākṛṣṇeti ca sūryāya homaḥ kāryo dvijanmanā // MatsP_93.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:7888: agnirmūrdhā divo mantra iti bhaumāya kīrtayet // MatsP_93.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:7891: śukraṃ te anyaditi ca śukrasyāpi nigadyate /
GP12mtp176pu:7892: śanaiścarāyeti punaḥ śaṃ no devīti homayet // MatsP_93.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:7894: ketuṃ kṛṇvann api brūyāt ketūnāmapi śāntaye // MatsP_93.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:7895: ā vo rājeti rudrasya balihomaṃ samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7896: āpo hi ṣṭhetyumāyāstu syoneti svāminastathā // MatsP_93.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:7899: tathā yamasya cāyaṃ gaur iti homaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7900: kālasya brahma jajñānam iti mantraḥ praśasyate // MatsP_93.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:7902: agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti vahnerudāhṛtaḥ // MatsP_93.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:7903: ud uttamaṃ varuṇamity apāṃ mantraḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7904: bhūmeḥ pṛthivyantarikṣam iti vedeṣu paṭhyate // MatsP_93.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:7906: indrāyendo marutvata iti śakrasya śasyate // MatsP_93.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:7909: namo 'stu sarpebhya iti sarpāṇāṃ mantra ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:7910: eṣa brahmā ya ṛtvigbhya iti brahmaṇyudāhṛtaḥ // MatsP_93.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:7911: vināyakasya cānūnam iti mantro budhaiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7914: krāṇā śiśurmahīnāṃ ca vāyormantraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_93.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:7915: eṣo uṣā apūrvyā ity aśvinormantra ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:7920: yajamānasya kartavyaṃ caturbhiḥ snapanaṃ dvijaiḥ // MatsP_93.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:7926: brahmaṇā sahitaḥ śeṣo dikpālāstvāmavantu te // MatsP_93.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:7928: buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāntis tuṣṭiḥ krāntiśca mātaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7933: ṛṣayo munayo gāvo devamātara eva ca // MatsP_93.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:7935: astrāṇi sarvaśastrāṇi rājāno vāhanāni ca // MatsP_93.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:7937: saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailās tīrthāni jaladā nadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7944: raktaṃ dhuraṃdharaṃ dadyād bhaumāya ca kakudminam // MatsP_93.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:7948: suvarṇena samā kāryā yajamānena dakṣiṇā // MatsP_93.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:7951: samantreṇaiva dātavyāḥ sarvāḥ sarvatra dakṣiṇāḥ // MatsP_93.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:7953: tīrthadevamayī yasmād ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:7954: puṇyastvaṃ śaṅkha puṇyānāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:7955: viṣṇunā vidhṛtaścāsi tataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:7957: aṣṭamūrteradhiṣṭhānam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:7959: anantapuṇyaphaladam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:7961: pradānāttasya me viṣṇo hy ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:7963: candrārkavāhano nityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:7965: sarvapāpaharā nityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:7969: yānaṃ vibhāvasornityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:7971: yasmāttasmācchriye me syād iha loke paratra ca // MatsP_93.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:7973: śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu dattā janmani janmani // MatsP_93.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:7974: yathā ratneṣu sarveṣu sarve devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7975: tathā ratnāni yacchantu ratnadānena me surāḥ // MatsP_93.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:7982: yastu pīḍākaro nityam alpavittasya vā grahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7983: taṃ ca yatnena sampūjya śeṣānapyarcayedbudhaḥ // MatsP_93.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:8001: prāguttaraṃ samāsādya pradeśaṃ maṇḍapasya tu // MatsP_93.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:8017: dvyaṅgulo hyucchrito vapraḥ prathamaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8019: tryaṅgulasya ca vistāraḥ sarveṣāṃ kathyate budhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8026: viṣapāpaharo nityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:8032: ghṛtadhārāṃ tayā samyag agnerupari pātayet // MatsP_93.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:8034: mahāvaiśvānaraṃ sāma jyeṣṭhasāma ca vācayet // MatsP_93.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:8040: kāryāvayutahome tu na prasajyeta vistare // MatsP_93.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:8041: tadvacca daśa cāṣṭau ca lakṣahome tu ṛtvijaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8042: kartavyāḥ śaktitastadvac catvāro vā vimatsaraḥ // MatsP_93.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:8050: annahīnaḥ kṛto yasmād durbhikṣaphalado bhavet // MatsP_93.110 //
GP12mtp176pu:8052: yaṣṭāraṃ dakṣiṇāhīnaṃ nāsti yajñasamo ripuḥ // MatsP_93.111 //
GP12mtp176pu:8053: na vāpyalpadhanaḥ kuryāl lakṣahomaṃ naraḥ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:8054: yasmātpīḍākaro nityaṃ yajñe bhavati vigrahaḥ // MatsP_93.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:8055: tameva pūjayedbhaktyā dvau vā trīnvā yathāvidhi /
GP12mtp176pu:8063: sa taṃ kāmamavāpnoti padamānantyam aśnute // MatsP_93.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:8064: putrārthī labhate putrān dhanārthī labhate dhanam /
