GP12mtp176pu:8065: bhāryārthī śobhanāṃ bhāryāṃ kumārī ca śubhaṃ patim // MatsP_93.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:8067: yaṃ yaṃ prārthayate kāmaṃ sa vai bhavati puṣkalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8068: niṣkāmaḥ kurute yastu sa paraṃ brahma gacchati // MatsP_93.118 //
GP12mtp176pu:8070: āhutībhiḥ prayatnena dakṣiṇābhiḥ phalena ca // MatsP_93.119 //
GP12mtp176pu:8072: homamantrāsta evoktāḥ khāne dāne tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8085: vedī ca koṭihome syād vitastīnāṃ catuṣṭayam // MatsP_93.126 //
GP12mtp176pu:8087: vaprapramāṇaṃ pūrvoktaṃ vedīnāṃ ca tathocchrayaḥ // MatsP_93.127 //
GP12mtp176pu:8089: pūrvadvāre ca saṃsthāpya bahvṛcaṃ vedapāragam // MatsP_93.128 //
GP12mtp176pu:8095: rātrisūktaṃ ca raudraṃ ca pāvamānaṃ sumaṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8096: pūrvato bahvṛcaḥ śāntiṃ paṭhannāste hyudaṅmukhaḥ // MatsP_93.131 //
GP12mtp176pu:8097: śāktaṃ śākraṃ ca saumyaṃ ca kauṣmāṇḍaṃ śāntimeva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8100: jyeṣṭhamāsa tathā śāntiṃ chandogaḥ paścime japet // MatsP_93.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:8101: śāntisūktaṃ ca sauraṃ ca tathā śākunakaṃ śubham /
GP12mtp176pu:8104: snāne dāne ca mantrāḥ syus ta eva munisattama // MatsP_93.135 //
GP12mtp176pu:8115: navagrahamakhaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kāmyaṃ samācaret // MatsP_93.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:8116: anyathā phaladaṃ puṃsāṃ na kāmyaṃ jāyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:8118: vṛttaṃ voccāṭane kuṇḍaṃ tathā ca vaśyakarmaṇi /
GP12mtp176pu:8125: sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhaya iti homayet // MatsP_93.145 ///
GP12mtp176pu:8126: na cātra sthāpanaṃ kāryaṃ na ca kumbhābhiṣecanam /
GP12mtp176pu:8127: snānaṃ sarvauṣadhaiḥ kṛtvā śuklapuṣpāmbaro gṛhī // MatsP_93.146 //
GP12mtp176pu:8129: sūkṣmavastrāṇi deyāni śuklā gāvaḥ sakāñcanāḥ // MatsP_93.147 //
GP12mtp176pu:8133: dvimekhalaṃ koṇamukhaṃ hastamātraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_93.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:8139: durmitriyās tasmai santu tathā huṃphaḍitīti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8144: vidveṣaṇaṃ tathā kurvan netadeva samācaret // MatsP_93.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:8150: na tasya grahapīḍā syān na ca bandhujanakṣayaḥ // MatsP_93.157 //
GP12mtp176pu:8152: na pīḍā tatra bālānāṃ na rogo na ca bandhanam // MatsP_93.158 //
GP12mtp176pu:8158: paripaṭhati ya itthaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti prasaṅgād abhibhavati sa śatrūnāyurārogyayuktaḥ // MatsP_93.161 //
GP12mtp176pu:8163: saptāśvaḥ saptarajjuśca dvibhujaḥ syātsadā raviḥ // MatsP_94.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8167: caturbhujaḥ śvetaromā varadaḥ syād dharāsutaḥ // MatsP_94.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8192: ādiṣṭastvaṃ śiveneha vada māheśvaraṃ vratam // MatsP_95.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8195: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātā nāmnā śivacaturdaśī // MatsP_95.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8199: suvarṇavṛṣabhaṃ dattvā bhokṣyāmi ca pare 'hani // MatsP_95.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8203: pādau namaḥ śivāyeti śiraḥ sarvātmane namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8204: trinetrāyeti netrāṇi lalāṭaṃ haraye namaḥ // MatsP_95.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8206: sadyojātāya karṇau tu vāmadevāya vai bhujau // MatsP_95.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8212: pradhānāya namo jaṅghe gulphau vyomātmane namaḥ // MatsP_95.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8214: namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai pārvatīṃ cāpi pūjayet // MatsP_95.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8224: ye tu māse viśeṣāḥ syus tānnibodha kramādiha // MatsP_95.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8228: namaste 'stu mahādeva sthāṇave ca tataḥ param // MatsP_95.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8229: namaḥ paśupate nātha namaste śambhave punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8231: namo bhīmāya ityevaṃ tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8232: gomūtraṃ gomūyaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam // MatsP_95.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8233: pañcagavyaṃ tato bilvaṃ karpūraṃ cāguruṃ yavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8234: tilāḥ kṛṣṇāśca vidhivat prāśanaṃ kramaśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:8235: pratimāsaṃ caturdaśyor ekaikaṃ prāśanaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_95.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8243: umāmaheśvaraṃ haimaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca gavā saha // MatsP_95.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:8247: sthāpya viprāya śāntāya vedavrataparāya ca // MatsP_95.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:8249: guṇajñe śrotriye dadyād ācārye tattvavedini // MatsP_95.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8259: gaṇādhipatyaṃ divi kalpakoṭi-śatānyuṣitvā padameti śambhoḥ // MatsP_95.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:8260: na bṛhaspatirapyanantamasyāḥ phalamindo na pitāmaho 'pi vaktum /
GP12mtp176pu:8261: na ca siddhagaṇo 'pyalaṃ na cāhaṃ yadi jihvāyutakoṭayo 'pi vaktre // MatsP_95.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:8262: bhavatyamaravallabhaḥ paṭhati yaḥ smaredvā sadā śṛṇotyapi vimatsaraḥ sakalapāpanirmocanīm /
GP12mtp176pu:8263: imāṃ śivacaturdaśīmamarakāminīkoṭayaḥ stuvanti tamaninditaṃ kimu samācaredyaḥ sadā // MatsP_95.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:8264: yā vātha nārī kurute 'tibhaktyā bhartāramāpṛcchya sutāngurūnvā /
GP12mtp176pu:8265: sāpi prasādātparameśvarasya paraṃ padaṃ yāti pinākapāṇeḥ // MatsP_95.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:8271: mārgaśīrṣe śubhe māsi tṛtīyāyāṃ mune vratam /
GP12mtp176pu:8278: savṛṣaṃ kāñcanaṃ rudraṃ dharmarājaṃ ca kārayet // MatsP_96.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8279: kūṣmāṇḍaṃ mātuliṅgaṃ ca vārtākaṃ panasaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:8282: kāśmaraṃ dāḍimaṃ śaktyā kāladhautāni ṣoḍaśa // MatsP_96.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8301: tadyuktaphaladānena tau syātāṃ me varapradau // MatsP_96.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8305: tathā mamāstu viśvātmā śaṃkaraḥ śaṃkaraḥ sadā // MatsP_96.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8306: iti dattvā ca tatsarvam alaṃkṛtya ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8315: etasmānnāparaṃ kiṃcid iha loke paratra ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8320: etatsamastakaluṣāpaharaṃ janānām ājīvanāya manujeṣu ca sarvadā syāt /
GP12mtp176pu:8321: janmāntareṣvapi na putraviyogaduḥkham āpnoti dhāma ca puraṃdaralokajuṣṭam // MatsP_96.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:8322: yo vā śṛṇoti puruṣo 'lpadhanaḥ paṭhedvā devālayeṣu bhavaneṣu ca dhārmikāṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:8323: pāpairviyuktavapuratra puraṃ murārer ānandakṛtpadamupaiti munīndra so 'pi // MatsP_96.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:8328: yacchāntaye ca martyānāṃ vada nandīśa tadvratam // MatsP_97.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8334: yadā hastena saṃyuktam ādityasya ca vāsaram /
GP12mtp176pu:8335: tadā śanidine kuryād ekabhaktaṃ vimatsaraḥ // MatsP_97.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8340: bhagaṃ tu nairṛte devaṃ varuṇaṃ paścime dale /
GP12mtp176pu:8341: mahendramanile tadvad ādityaṃ ca tathottare // MatsP_97.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8345: uttare tu raviṃ devaṃ karṇikāyāṃ ca bhāskaram // MatsP_97.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8347: tasminpadme tato dadyād imaṃ mantramudīrayet // MatsP_97.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8350: agnim īḍe namastubhyam iṣetvorje ca bhāskara /
GP12mtp176pu:8351: agna āyāhi varada namaste jyotiṣāṃ pate // MatsP_97.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8354: puruṣaṃ ca yathāśaktyā kārayeddvibhujaṃ tathā // MatsP_97.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8355: suvarṇaśṛṅgīṃ kapilāṃ mahārghyāṃ raupyaiḥ khuraiḥ kāṃsyadohāṃ savatsām /
GP12mtp176pu:8356: pūrṇe guḍasyopari tāmrapātre nidhāya padmaṃ puruṣaṃ ca dadyāt // MatsP_97.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8357: sampūjya raktāmbaramālyadhūpair dvijaṃ ca raktairatha hemaśṛṅgaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8362: ityanena vidhinā samācared abdabhekamiha yastu mānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8365: dvīpasaptakapatiḥ punaḥ punar varmamūrtir amitaujasā yutaḥ // MatsP_97.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8367: sāpi lokamamareśavanditā yāti nārada raverna saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_97.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8368: yaḥ paṭhedapi śṛṇoti mānavaḥ paṭhyamānamatha vānumodate /
GP12mtp176pu:8369: so 'pi śakrabhuvanasthito 'maraiḥ pūjyate vasati cākṣayaṃ divi // MatsP_97.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8377: saṃkrāntivāsare prātas tilaiḥ snānaṃ vidhīyate // MatsP_98.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8381: nama uṣṇārciṣe yāmye namo ṛṅmaṇḍalāya ca // MatsP_98.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8382: namaḥ savitre nairṛtye vāruṇe tapanaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8383: vāyavye tu bhagaṃ nyasya punaḥ punarathārcayet // MatsP_98.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8387: kamalaṃ ca yathāśaktyā kārayitvā nivedayet // MatsP_98.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8390: namo 'nanta namo dhātre ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ pate // MatsP_98.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8391: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:8392: vatsarānte 'thavā kuryāt sarvaṃ dvādaśadhā naraḥ // MatsP_98.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8395: payasvinīḥ śīlavatīśca dadyād dharmaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ raupyakhuraiśca yuktāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8396: gāvo 'ṣṭa vā sapta sakāṃsyadohā mālyāmbarā vā caturo 'pyaśaktaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8398: haimīṃ ca dadyātpṛthivīṃ saśeṣām ākārya rūpyāmatha vā ca tāmrīm /
GP12mtp176pu:8399: paiṣṭīmaśaktaḥ pratimāṃ vidhāya sauvarṇasūryeṇa samaṃ pradadyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:8400: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ puruṣo 'tra kuryāt kurvannadho yāti na saṃśayo 'tra // MatsP_98.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8402: tāvatsa gandharvagaṇair aśeṣaiḥ sampūjyate nārada nākapṛṣṭhe // MatsP_98.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8405: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vātha bhaktyā vidhimakhilaṃ ravisaṃkramasya puṇyam /
GP12mtp176pu:8406: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi devair amarapaterbhavane prapūjyate ca // MatsP_98.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8413: āṣāḍhe vā daśamyāṃ tu śuklāyāṃ laghubhuṅnaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8414: kṛtvā sāyantanīṃ saṃdhyāṃ gṛhṇīyānniyamaṃ budhaḥ // MatsP_99.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8416: dvādaśyāṃ dvijasaṃyuktaḥ kariṣye bhojanaṃ vibho // MatsP_99.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8417: tadavighnena me yātu saphalaṃ syācca keśava /
GP12mtp176pu:8418: namo nārāyaṇāyeti vācyaṃ ca svapatā niśi // MatsP_99.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8421: vibhūtaye namaḥ pādāv aśokāya ca jānunī /
GP12mtp176pu:8422: namaḥ śivāyetyūrū ca viśvamūrte namaḥ kaṭim // MatsP_99.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8423: kandarpāya namo meḍhram ādityāya namaḥ karau /
GP12mtp176pu:8426: śrīdharāya mukhaṃ keśān keśavāyeti nārada // MatsP_99.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8429: śiraḥ sarvātmane brahman nama ityabhipūjayet // MatsP_99.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8436: yathā na mucyase deva sadā sarvavibhūtibhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8444: grāmaṃ ca śaktimāndadyāt kṣetraṃ vā bhavanānvitam /
GP12mtp176pu:8448: alpavitto yathāśaktyā stokaṃ stokaṃ samācaret // MatsP_99.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8454: na ca vyādhirbhavettasya na dāridryaṃ na bandhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:8455: vaiṣṇavo vātha śaivo vā bhavejjanmani janmani // MatsP_99.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8462: nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātas tejasā sūryasaṃnibhaḥ // MatsP_100.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8464: kamalaṃ kāñcanaṃ dattaṃ yathākāmagamaṃ mune // MatsP_100.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8466: dvīpāni suralokaṃ ca yatheṣṭaṃ vyacarattadā // MatsP_100.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8468: loke ca pūjitaṃ yasmāt puṣkaradvīpamucyate // MatsP_100.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8473: nāmnā ca lāvaṇyavatī babhūva sā pārvatīveṣṭatamā bhavasya // MatsP_100.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8476: so 'bhyāgataṃ vīkṣya munipravīraṃ prācetasaṃ vākyamidaṃ babhāṣe // MatsP_100.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8478: bhāryā mamālpatapasā paritoṣitena dattaṃ mamāmbujagṛhaṃ ca munīndra dhātrā // MatsP_100.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8480: no lakṣyate kva gatamambaramadhya indus tārāgaṇairiva gataḥ paritaḥ sphuradbhiḥ // MatsP_100.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8482: bhagavanmayātha tanayair athavānayāpi bhadraṃ yadetadakhilaṃ kathaya pracetaḥ // MatsP_100.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8484: janmābhavattava tu lubdhakule 'tighore jātastvamapyanudinaṃ kila pāpakārī // MatsP_100.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8486: na ca te suhṛn na sutabandhujano na tātas tv ādṛksvasā na jananī ca tadābhiśastā // MatsP_100.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8487: abhisaṃgatā paramabhīṣṭatamā vimukhī mahīśa tava yoṣidiyam /
GP12mtp176pu:8489: kṣutpīḍitenātha tadā na kiṃcid āsāditaṃ dhānyaphalāmiṣādyam // MatsP_100.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8491: padmānyathādāya tato bahūni gataḥ puraṃ vaidiśanāmadheyam // MatsP_100.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8492: tanmaulyalābhāya puraṃ samastaṃ bhrāntaṃ tvayāśeṣam ahas tadāsīt /
GP12mtp176pu:8493: kretā na kaścitkamaleṣu jātaḥ śrānto bhṛśaṃ kṣutparipīḍitaśca // MatsP_100.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8495: atha maṅgalaśabdaśca tvayā rātrau mahāñśrutaḥ // MatsP_100.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8502: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tatastābhyām idaṃ ca paricintitam /
GP12mtp176pu:8503: kimebhiḥ kamalaiḥ kāryaṃ varaṃ viṣṇuralaṃkṛtaḥ // MatsP_100.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8506: śayyā ca puṣpaprakaraiḥ pūjitā bhūśca sarvataḥ // MatsP_100.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:8511: ānīya vyāhṛtaṃ cātra bhujyatāmiti bhūpate // MatsP_100.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8512: tābhyāṃ tu tadapi tyaktaṃ bhokṣyāvo vai varānane /
GP12mtp176pu:8517: prabhāte ca tadā dattā śayyā salavaṇācalā // MatsP_100.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:8518: grāmāśca gurave bhaktyā vipreṣu dvādaśaiva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:8522: sa bhavāṃl lubdhako jātaḥ sapatnīko nṛpeśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8525: tasya sattvasya māhātmyād alpena tapasā nṛpa // MatsP_100.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8529: patnī sapatnī saṃjātā ratyāḥ prītiriti śrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:8533: kuru rājendra nirvāṇam avaśyaṃ samavāpsyasi // MatsP_100.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:8535: rājā yathoktaṃ ca punar akarotpuṣpavāhanaḥ // MatsP_100.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:8537: yathākathaṃcit kamalair dvādaśa dvādaśīr mune // MatsP_100.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:8539: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta bhaktyā tuṣyati keśavaḥ // MatsP_100.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:8540: iti kaluṣatridāraṇaṃ janānāmapi paṭhatīha śṛṇoti cātha bhaktyā /*
GP12mtp176pu:8541: matimapi ca dadāti devaloke vasati sa koṭiśatāni vatsarāṇām // MatsP_100.37 //*
GP12mtp176pu:8547: naktamabdaṃ caritvā tu gavā sārdhaṃ kuṭumbine /
GP12mtp176pu:8548: haimaṃ cakraṃ triśūlaṃ ca dadyādviprāya vāsasī // MatsP_101.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8552: dhenuṃ tilamayīṃ dadyāt sa padaṃ yāti śāṃkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:8556: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti līlāvratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8558: bhojanopaskaraṃ dadyāt sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8564: puṣyādau yastrayodaśyāṃ kṛtvā naktaṃ madhau punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8565: aśokaṃ kāñcanaṃ dadyād ikṣuyuktaṃ daśāṅgulam // MatsP_101.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8568: etat kāmavrataṃ nāma sadā śokavināśanam // MatsP_101.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8574: puṣpatrayaṃ ca phālgunyāṃ kṛtvā śaktyā ca kāñcanam // MatsP_101.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8576: dattvā paraṃ padaṃ yāti saumyavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8578: samāpte śayanaṃ dadyād gṛhaṃ copaskarānvitam // MatsP_101.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8588: etat sampadvrataṃ nāma sadā pāpavināśanam // MatsP_101.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8591: janmāyutaṃ sa rājā syāt tataḥ śivapuraṃ vrajet /
GP12mtp176pu:8594: ekabhaktaṃ naraḥ kuryād abdamekaṃ vimatsaraḥ // MatsP_101.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8598: ghṛtena snapanaṃ kuryāc chambhor vā keśavasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8605: haimaṃ siṃhaṃ ca viprāya dattvā śivapadaṃ vrajet /
GP12mtp176pu:8607: etadvīravrataṃ nāma nārīṇāṃ ca sukhapradam // MatsP_101.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:8609: samānte śrāddhakṛddadyāt pañca gāstu payasvinīḥ // MatsP_101.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:8611: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tārayecchatam /
GP12mtp176pu:8612: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syāt pitṛvratam idaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8618: vatsarānte punardadyād dhenuṃ pañcāmṛtena hi // MatsP_101.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:8619: viprāya dadyācchaṅkhaṃ ca sa padaṃ yāti śāṃkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:8620: rājā bhavati kalpānte dhṛtivratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:8628: vipreṣu bhojanaṃ dadyāt kārttikyāṃ goprado bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8629: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti viṣṇuvratamidaṃ śubham // MatsP_101.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:8631: tadante puṣpadāmāni ghṛtadhenvā sahaiva tu // MatsP_101.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:8635: samānte dīpikāṃ dadyāc cakraśūle ca kāñcane // MatsP_101.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:8636: vastrayugmaṃ ca viprāya tejasvī sa bhavediha /
GP12mtp176pu:8639: naktaṃ caredabdamekam abdānte goprado bhavet // MatsP_101.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:8646: bhūtvā viṣṇupade kalpaṃ sthitvā rājā bhavediha /
GP12mtp176pu:8649: tryahaṃ tilaprado bhūtvā vahniṃ saṃtarpya sadvijam // MatsP_101.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:8655: dinaṃ payovratastiṣṭhet sa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:8659: dattvā brahmapadaṃ yāti kalpavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:8660: māsopavāsī yo dadyād dhenuṃ viprāya śobhanām /
GP12mtp176pu:8661: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yati bhīmavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:8662: dadyād viṃśatpalādūrdhvaṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā tu kāñcanīm /
GP12mtp176pu:8670: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syāt prabhāvratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:8673: naktāśī cāṣṭamīṣu syād vatsarānte ca dhenudaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8676: ghṛtadhenuprado 'nte ca sa paraṃ brahma gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:8679: samānte vaiṣṇavaṃ haimaṃ sa viṣṇoḥ padamāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:8680: etat kṛṣṇavrataṃ nāma kalpānte rājyabhāgbhavet // MatsP_101.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:8682: lakṣmīlokamavāpnoti hy etad devīvrataṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:8695: paramaṃ padaṃ prāpnoti viṣṇuvratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:8696: kārttikyāṃ ca vṛṣotsargaṃ kṛtvā naktaṃ samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:8698: kṛcchrānte gopradaḥ kuryād bhojanaṃ śaktitaḥ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:8699: viprāṇāṃ śāṃkaraṃ yāti prājāpatyamidaṃ vratam // MatsP_101.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:8706: anagnipakkam aśnāti tṛtīyāyāṃ tu yo naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8711: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syād aśvavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:8717: niśi kṛtvā jale vāsaṃ prabhāte goprado bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8719: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād dhaimaṃ candraṃ nivedayet /
GP12mtp176pu:8725: māghe niśyārdravāsāḥ syāt saptamyāṃ goprado bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8726: divi kalpamuṣitveha rājā syātpavanaṃ vratam // MatsP_101.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:8733: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syāt somavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:8742: śrotuṃ tavecchā tadudīrayāmi priyeṣu kiṃ vākathanīyam asti // MatsP_101.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:8746: nairmalyaṃ bhāvaśuddhiśca vinā snānaṃ na vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:8755: pāhi nas tvenasas tasmād ājanmamaraṇāntikāt // MatsP_102.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8757: divi bhuvyantarikṣe ca tāni te santi jāhnavi // MatsP_102.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8758: nandinītyeva te nāma deveṣu nalinīti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8759: dakṣā pṛthvī ca vihagā viśvakāyāmṛtā śivā // MatsP_102.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8761: kṣemā ca jāhnavī caiva śāntā śāntipradāyinī // MatsP_102.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8766: snānaṃ kuryānmṛdā tadvad āmantrya tu vidhānataḥ // MatsP_102.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8768: mṛttike hara me pāpaṃ yanmayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // MatsP_102.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8771: āruhya mama gātrāṇi sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pracodaya // MatsP_102.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8772: mṛttike dehi naḥ puṣṭiṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12mtp176pu:8774: evaṃ snātvā tataḥ paścād ācamya ca vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8775: utthāya vāsasī śukle śuddhe tu paridhāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:8776: tatastu tarpaṇaṃ kuryāt trailokyāpyāyanāya vai // MatsP_102.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8778: krūrāḥ sarpāḥ suparṇāśca taravo jambukāḥ khagāḥ // MatsP_102.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8780: nirādhārāśca ye jīvā ye tu dharmaratāstathā // MatsP_102.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8782: kṛtopavītī devebhyo nivītī ca bhavettataḥ // MatsP_102.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8786: sarve te tṛptimāyāntu maddattenāmbunā sadā // MatsP_102.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8788: pracetasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhṛguṃ nāradameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8790: apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā savyaṃ jānvācya bhūtale /
GP12mtp176pu:8800: saṃtarpya vidhinā bhaktyā imaṃ mantramudīrayet // MatsP_102.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:8802: te tṛptimakhilāṃ yāntu yaś cāsmatto 'bhivāñchati // MatsP_102.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:8812: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ caiva sarvaṃ paśyasi sarvaga /
GP12mtp176pu:8813: satyadeva namaste 'stu prasīda mama bhāskara // MatsP_102.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8815: evaṃ sūryaṃ namaskṛtya triḥ kṛtvātha pradakṣiṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:8816: dvijaṃ gāṃ kāñcanaṃ spṛṣṭvā tato viṣṇugṛhaṃ vrajet // MatsP_102.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:8822: bhārate tu yadā vṛtte prāptarājye pṛthāsute /
GP12mtp176pu:8826: asmānsaṃtāpya bahuśaḥ sarve te nidhanaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8827: vāsudevaṃ samāśritya pañca śeṣāstu pāṇḍavāḥ // MatsP_103.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8828: hatvā bhīṣmaṃ ca droṇaṃ ca karṇaṃ caiva mahābalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8830: rājāno nihatāḥ sarve ye cānye śūramāninaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8831: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogairjīvitena vā // MatsP_103.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8834: labdhasaṃjño yadā rājā cintayansa punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8835: kataro viniyogo vā niyamaṃ tīrthameva ca // MatsP_103.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8837: yatra sthitvā naro yāti viṣṇulokamanuttamam // MatsP_103.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8838: kathaṃ pṛcchāmi vai kṛṣṇaṃ yenedaṃ kārito 'smyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:8839: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ kathaṃ pṛcche yasya putraśataṃ hatam // MatsP_103.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8840: vyāsaṃ kathamahaṃ pṛcche yasya gotrakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8843: ye ca tatra mahātmānaḥ sametāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8844: kuntī ca draupadī caiva ye ca tatra samāgatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8845: bhūmau nipatitāḥ sarve rudantastu samantataḥ // MatsP_103.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8851: tvāṃ draṣṭukāmo mārkaṇḍeyo dvāri tiṣṭhatyasau muniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8854: svāgataṃ te mahābhāga svāgataṃ te mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8855: adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me tāritaṃ kulam // MatsP_103.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8856: adya me pitarastuṣṭās tvayi dṛṣṭe mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8857: adyāhaṃ pūtadeho 'smi yattvayā saha darśanam // MatsP_103.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8860: yudhiṣṭhiro mahātmā vai pūjayāmāsa taṃ munim // MatsP_103.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8861: tataḥ sa tuṣṭo mārkaṇḍaḥ pūjitaścāha taṃ nṛpam /
GP12mtp176pu:8862: ākhyāhi tvaritaṃ rājan kimarthaṃ ruditaṃ tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:8863: kena vā viklavībhūtaḥ kā bādhā te kimapriyam // MatsP_103.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8869: naiva dṛṣṭaṃ raṇe pāpaṃ yudhyamānasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_103.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:8871: tadevaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā tasmātpāpaṃ na cintayet // MatsP_103.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8872: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā praṇamya śirasā munim /
GP12mtp176pu:8876: kathaya tvaṃ samāsena yena mucyeta kilbiṣāt // MatsP_103.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:8886: mṛtānāṃ kā gatistatra snātānāṃ tatra kiṃ phalam // MatsP_104.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8887: ye vasanti prayāge tu brūhi teṣāṃ ca kiṃ phalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8888: etanme sarvamākhyāhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // MatsP_104.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8890: kathayiṣyāmi te vatsa yacchreṣṭhaṃ tatra yatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8891: purā hi sarvaviprāṇāṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śrutam // MatsP_104.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8894: etatprajāpateḥ kṣetraṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam // MatsP_104.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8895: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8896: tato brahmādayo devā rakṣāṃ kurvanti saṃgatāḥ // MatsP_104.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8899: saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣyāmi prayāgasya tu kīrtanam // MatsP_104.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8901: yamunāṃ rakṣati sadā savitā saptavāhanaḥ // MatsP_104.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8902: prayāgaṃ tu viśeṣeṇa sadā rakṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8903: maṇḍalaṃ rakṣati harir daivataiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // MatsP_104.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8905: sthānaṃ rakṣanti vai devāḥ sarvapāpaharaṃ śubham // MatsP_104.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8911: pañca kuṇḍāni rājendra teṣāṃ madhye tu jāhnavī /
GP12mtp176pu:8912: prayāgasya praveśe tu pāpaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt // MatsP_104.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8914: api duṣkṛtakarmā tu labhate paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_104.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8916: avagāhya ca pītvā tu punātyāsaptamaṃ kulam // MatsP_104.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8924: tapanasya sutā devī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:8926: tatra saṃnihito nityaṃ sākṣāddevo maheśvaraḥ // MatsP_104.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8927: duṣprāpyaṃ mānuṣaiḥ puṇyaṃ prayāgaṃ tu yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8934: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_105.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8936: sthānamuktaṃ prayāgaṃ tu nākhyeyaṃ tu kadācana // MatsP_105.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8937: vyādhito yadi vā dīno vṛddho vāpi bhavennaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8940: gandharvāpsarasāṃ madhye svarge krīḍati mānavaḥ // MatsP_105.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8945: yāvanna smarate janma tāvatsvarge mahīyate // MatsP_105.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8948: tadeva smarate tīrthaṃ smaraṇāttatra gacchati // MatsP_105.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8953: ṛṣayo munayaḥ siddhās tatra loke sa gacchati // MatsP_105.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8955: modate ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sukṛteneha karmaṇā // MatsP_105.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8958: tataḥ śubhāni karmāṇi cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8965: evaṃ tīrthe na gṛhṇīyāt puṇyeṣvāyataneṣu ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8966: nimitteṣu ca sarveṣu hy apramatto bhaveddvijaḥ // MatsP_105.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8972: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca // MatsP_105.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8973: yāvadromāṇi tasyā goḥ santi gātreṣu sattama /
GP12mtp176pu:8976: na ca paśyati taṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ tena karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:8979: putrāndārāṃstathā bhṛtyān gaurekā prati tārayet // MatsP_105.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:8982: gaureva rakṣāṃ kurute tasmāddeyā dvijottame // MatsP_105.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8986: yathā yathā prayāgasya māhātmyaṃ kathyate tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:8987: tathā tathā pramucye 'haṃ sarvapāpairna saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_106.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8989: prayāge yo vidhiḥ proktas tanme brūhi mahāmune // MatsP_106.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8995: narake vasate ghore gavāṃ kroṣṭā hi dāruṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:8996: salilaṃ na ca gṛhṇanti pitarastasya dehinaḥ // MatsP_106.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8998: yathātmanā tathā sarvaṃ dānaṃ vipreṣu dāpayet // MatsP_106.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9000: niṣphalaṃ tasya tatsarvaṃ tasmādyānaṃ vivarjayet // MatsP_106.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9003: na sa paśyati taṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ tena karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:9007: tena tīrthaphalaṃ caiva vardhate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9012: nirdahanti jagatsarvaṃ vaṭamūlaṃ na dahyate // MatsP_106.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9014: sthīyate tatra vai viṣṇur yajamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // MatsP_106.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9017: tato gaccheta rājendra prayāgaṃ saṃstuvaṃśca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:9018: yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ // MatsP_106.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9022: tathā nāgāḥ suparṇāśca siddhāśca khecarāśca ye // MatsP_106.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9023: sāgarāḥ saritaḥ śailā nāgā vidyādharāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:9027: tataḥ puṇyatamaṃ nāsti triṣu lokeṣu bhārata // MatsP_106.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9033: matir utkramaṇīyā te prayāgagamanaṃ prati // MatsP_106.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9038: na te jīvanti loke 'smiṃs tatra tatra yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9039: ye prayāgaṃ na samprāptās triṣu lokeṣu vañcitāḥ // MatsP_106.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9040: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tattīrthaṃ prayāgaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:9041: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ śaśāṅka iva rāhuṇā // MatsP_106.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:9043: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // MatsP_106.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9044: tatra gatvā ca saṃsthānaṃ mahādevasya viśrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:9048: pūrvapārśve tu gaṅgāyās triṣu lokeṣu bhārata /
GP12mtp176pu:9049: kūpaṃ caiva tu sāmudraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ ca viśrutam // MatsP_106.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9057: parityajati yaḥ prāṇāñ śṛṇu tasyāpi yatphalam // MatsP_106.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:9059: sevyate pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ svargaloke narādhipa // MatsP_106.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:9060: urvaśīṃ tu sadā paśyet svargaloke narottama /
GP12mtp176pu:9063: urvaśīsadṛśīnāṃ tu kanyānāṃ labhate śatam // MatsP_106.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:9067: bhuktvā tu vipulān bhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ bhajate punaḥ // MatsP_106.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:9069: ekaṃ kālaṃ tu bhuñjāno māsaṃ bhūmipatirbhavet // MatsP_106.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:9073: bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ labhate punaḥ // MatsP_106.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:9081: daśāśvamedhakaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ tatrāparaṃ bhavet // MatsP_106.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:9083: dhanāḍhyo rūpavāndakṣo dātā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // MatsP_106.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:9085: ahiṃsāyāṃ tu yo dharmo gamanādeva tatphalam // MatsP_106.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:9089: siddhakṣetraṃ hi tajjñeyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // MatsP_106.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:9091: divi tārayate devāṃs tena tripathagā smṛtā // MatsP_106.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:9095: tīrthānāṃ tu paraṃ tīrthaṃ nadīnāṃ tu mahānadī /
GP12mtp176pu:9097: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgā triṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā /
GP12mtp176pu:9099: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ // MatsP_106.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:9101: gatim anviṣyamāṇānāṃ nāsti gaṅgāsamā gatiḥ // MatsP_106.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:9102: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:9104: kṛte tu naimiṣaṃ kṣetraṃ tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12mtp176pu:9105: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgā viśiṣyate // MatsP_106.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:9107: nānyatkaliyuge ghore bheṣajaṃ nṛpa vidyate // MatsP_106.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:9112: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_107.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9113: mānasaṃ nāma tattīrthaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe /
GP12mtp176pu:9116: sa tatphalamavāpnoti tattīrthaṃ smarate punaḥ // MatsP_107.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:9117: akāmo vā sakāmo vā gaṅgāyāṃ yo 'bhipadyate /
GP12mtp176pu:9118: mṛtastu labhate svargaṃ narakaṃ ca na paśyati // MatsP_107.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9127: prayāge māghamāse tu tryahasnānāttu tatphalam // MatsP_107.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9133: sa bhuktvā vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ smarate punaḥ // MatsP_107.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9135: rāhugraste tathā some vimuktaḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // MatsP_107.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9139: paribhraṣṭastu rājendra samṛddhe jāyate kule // MatsP_107.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9143: bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ bhajate punaḥ // MatsP_107.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9144: yaḥ svadehaṃ tu kartitvā śakunibhyaḥ prayacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:9147: tasmādapi paribhraṣṭo rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // MatsP_107.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9149: bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ bhajate punaḥ // MatsP_107.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9150: yāmune cottare kūle prayāgasya tu dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:9151: ṛṇapramocanaṃ nāma tattīrthaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_107.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9158: viśuddhaṃ me 'dya hṛdayaṃ prayāgasya tu kīrtanāt // MatsP_108.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9160: yaṃ ca lokamavāpnoti viśuddhaḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // MatsP_108.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9163: prāpnoti puruṣo dhīmāñ śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ // MatsP_108.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:9165: aśvamedhaphalaṃ tasya gacchatastu pade pade // MatsP_108.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9167: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo gacchettu paramaṃ padam // MatsP_108.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9169: mahābhāgyaṃ hi dharmasya yattvaṃ vadasi me prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:9172: imaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chinddhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // MatsP_108.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9175: ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau pūrvaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śrutam // MatsP_108.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9177: praviṣṭamātre tadbhūmāv aśvamedhaḥ pade pade // MatsP_108.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9180: evaṃ jñātvā tu rājendra sadā sevāparo bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:9182: na prāpnuvanti tatsthānaṃ prayāgaṃ devarakṣitam // MatsP_108.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9184: snehādvā dravyalobhādvā ye tu kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9185: kathaṃ tīrthaphalaṃ teṣāṃ kathaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ bhavet // MatsP_108.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9187: prayāge kā gatistasya tanme brūhi pitāmaha // MatsP_108.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9190: māsamekaṃ tu yaḥ snāyāt prayāge niyatendriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9191: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ sa gacchetparamaṃ padam // MatsP_108.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9194: tribhirmāsaiḥ sa mucyeta prayāge tu na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_108.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9197: sthānaṃ ca labhate nityaṃ dhanadhānyasamākulam // MatsP_108.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9198: evaṃ jñānena sampūrṇaḥ sadā bhavati bhogavān /
GP12mtp176pu:9203: adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me tāritaṃ kulam /
GP12mtp176pu:9208: diṣṭyā te saphalaṃ janma diṣṭyā te tāritaṃ kulam /
GP12mtp176pu:9211: yamunāyāṃ tu kiṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tu mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:9214: tapanasya sutā devī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:9215: samākhyātā mahābhāgā yamunā tatra nimnagā // MatsP_108.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9216: yenaiva niḥsṛtā gaṅgā tenaiva yamunā gatā /
GP12mtp176pu:9218: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca yamunāyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9219: kīrtanāllabhate puṇyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadrāṇi paśyati // MatsP_108.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9220: avagāhya ca pītvā ca punātyāsaptamaṃ kulam /
GP12mtp176pu:9221: prāṇāṃstyajati yastatra sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_108.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:9223: paścime dharmarājasya tīrthaṃ tu narakaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_108.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9224: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9227: tīrthaṃ nirañjanaṃ nāma yatra devāḥ savāsavāḥ // MatsP_108.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:9228: upāsate sma saṃdhyāṃ ye trikālaṃ hi yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9229: devāḥ sevanti tattīrthaṃ ye cānye vibudhā janāḥ // MatsP_108.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9232: teṣu snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ // MatsP_108.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:9233: gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva ubhe tulyaphale smṛte /
GP12mtp176pu:9234: kevalaṃ jyeṣṭhabhāvena gaṅgā sarvatra pūjyate // MatsP_108.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:9237: yastvimaṃ kalya utthāya paṭhate ca śṛṇoti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9238: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // MatsP_108.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:9242: śrutaṃ me brahmaṇā proktaṃ purāṇe brahmasambhave /
GP12mtp176pu:9243: tīrthānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9244: sarve puṇyāḥ pavitrāśca gatiśca paramā smṛtā // MatsP_109.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9249: pṛthivyāṃ naimiṣaṃ puṇyam antarikṣe ca puṣkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:9253: gatiṃ ca paramāṃ divyāṃ bhogāṃścaiva yathepsitān /
GP12mtp176pu:9255: etanme saṃśayaṃ brūhi yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutam // MatsP_109.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9260: ete pātakinaḥ sarve tenedaṃ bhāṣitaṃ tvayā // MatsP_109.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9262: pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ca yathānyastaṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_109.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9264: śāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ kṛtvā ca yujyate yogamātmanaḥ // MatsP_109.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9268: yastu sarvāṇi ratnāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati // MatsP_109.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9269: tena dānena dattena yogaṃ nābhyeti mānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9270: prayāge tu mṛtasyedaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati nānyathā // MatsP_109.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9272: yathā sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahma sarvatra dṛśyate // MatsP_109.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9273: brāhmaṇe vāsti yatkiṃcid abrāhmam iti vocyate /
GP12mtp176pu:9274: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahma sarvatra pūjyate // MatsP_109.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9281: yathā puṇyatamaṃ cāsti tathaiva kathitaṃ mayā // MatsP_109.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9283: śrutaṃ cedaṃ tvayā proktaṃ vismito 'haṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9284: kathaṃ yogena tatprāptiḥ svargavāsastu karmaṇā // MatsP_109.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9285: dātā vai labhate bhogān gāṃ ca yatkarmaṇaḥ phalam /
GP12mtp176pu:9286: tāni karmāṇi pṛcchāmi punastaiḥ prāpyate mahī // MatsP_109.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9289: gāmagniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śāstraṃ kāñcanaṃ salilaṃ striyaḥ // MatsP_109.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9290: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva ye nindanti narādhamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9293: gacchanti narakaṃ ghoraṃ ye narāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ // MatsP_109.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9295: parokṣaṃ harate yastu paścāddānaṃ prayacchati // MatsP_109.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9296: na te gacchanti vai svargaṃ dātāro yatra bhoginaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9297: anenakarmaṇā yuktāḥ pacyante narake punaḥ // MatsP_109.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9298: evaṃ yogaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca dātāraṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9299: yathā satyamasatyaṃ vā asti nāstīti yatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:9300: niruktaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathāha svayamaṃśumān // MatsP_109.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9305: naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva gotīrthaṃ sindhusāgaram // MatsP_110.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9306: gayā ca caitrakaṃ caiva gaṅgāsāgarameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9307: ete cānye ca bahavo ye ca puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥ // MatsP_110.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9310: trīṇi cāpyagnikuṇḍāni yeṣāṃ madhye tu jāhnavī /
GP12mtp176pu:9312: tapanasya sutā devī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:9313: yamunā gaṅgayā sārdhaṃ saṃgatā lokabhāvinī // MatsP_110.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9315: prayāgaṃ rājaśārdūla kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // MatsP_110.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9317: divi bhuvyantarikṣe ca tatsarvaṃ jāhnavī smṛtā // MatsP_110.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9319: bhogavatyatha yā caiṣā vedireṣā prajāpateḥ // MatsP_110.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9322: yajante kratubhir devās tathā cakradharā nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9323: tataḥ puṇyatamaṃ nāsti triṣu lokeṣu bhārata // MatsP_110.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9325: daśa tīrthasahasrāṇi tisraḥ koṭyastathā parāḥ // MatsP_110.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9330: idaṃ dhanyamidaṃ svargyam idaṃ satyamidaṃ sukham /
GP12mtp176pu:9331: idaṃ puṇyamidaṃ dharmyaṃ pāvanaṃ dharmamuttamam // MatsP_110.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9333: adhītya ca dvijo 'pyetan nirmalaḥ svargamāpnuyāt // MatsP_110.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9334: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ tīrthaṃ puṇyaṃ sadā śuciḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9335: jātismaratvaṃ labhate nākapṛṣṭhe ca modate // MatsP_110.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9337: snāhi tīrtheṣu kauravya na ca vakramatirbhava // MatsP_110.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9338: tvayā ca samyakpṛṣṭena kathitaṃ vai mayā vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:9339: pitarastāritāḥ sarve tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ // MatsP_110.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9340: vrataṃ dānaṃ tapastīrthaṃ yāgāḥ sarve sadakṣiṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9341: yogāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ sadācāro ye cānye jñānahetavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9342: prayāgasya tu sarve te kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // MatsP_110.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9343: evaṃ jñānaṃ ca yogaśca tīrthaṃ caiva yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9344: bahukleśena yujyante tena yānti parāṃ gatim /
GP12mtp176pu:9345: trikālaṃ jāyate jñānaṃ svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati // MatsP_110.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9350: etannaḥ sarvamākhyāhi yathā hi mama tārayet // MatsP_111.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9352: śṛṇu rājanprayāge tu proktaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:9354: brahmā sṛjati bhūtāni sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:9355: tānyetāni paraṃ loke viṣṇuḥ saṃvardhate prajāḥ // MatsP_111.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:9356: kalpānte tatsamagraṃ hi rudraḥ saṃharate jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:9357: tadā prayāgatīrthaṃ ca na kadācidvinaśyati // MatsP_111.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9358: īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
GP12mtp176pu:9359: yatnenānena tiṣṭhanti te yānti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_111.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9361: ākhyāhi me yathātathyaṃ yathaiṣā tiṣṭhati śrutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9362: kena vā kāraṇenaiva tiṣṭhante lokasattamāḥ // MatsP_111.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9365: kāraṇaṃ tatpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira // MatsP_111.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9373: yasmiñjuhvansvakaṃ pāpaṃ narakaṃ ca na paśyati /
GP12mtp176pu:9374: evaṃ brahmā ca viṣṇuśca prayāge sa maheśvaraḥ // MatsP_111.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9377: ye cānye bahavaḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti ca yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9378: yat pṛthivī tatsamāśritya nirmitā daivatais tribhiḥ // MatsP_111.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9380: etatpuṇyaṃ pavitraṃ vai prayāgaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:9381: svarājyaṃ kuru rājendra bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'nagha // MatsP_111.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9385: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvair draupadyā saha bhāryayā /
GP12mtp176pu:9388: pāṇḍavaiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ pūjyamānastu mādhavaḥ // MatsP_112.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9390: abhiṣiktaḥ svarājye ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // MatsP_112.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:9392: tataḥ svastīti coktvā tu kṣaṇādāśramamāgamat // MatsP_112.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9394: mahādānaṃ tato dattvā dharmaputro mahāmanāḥ // MatsP_112.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9395: yastvidaṃ kalya utthāya māhātmyaṃ paṭhate naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9396: prayāgaṃ smarate nityaṃ sa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:9397: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo rudralokaṃ sa gacchati // MatsP_112.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9399: mama vākyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ mahārāja bravīmyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:9400: nityaṃ japasva juhvasva prayāge vigatajvaraḥ // MatsP_112.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9402: svayaṃ prāpsyasi rājendra svargalokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_112.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9410: na hi śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ mahīpate // MatsP_112.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9412: prāpyante pārthivairetaiḥ samṛddhairvai naraiḥ kvacit // MatsP_112.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9413: yo daridrairapi vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ nareśvara /
GP12mtp176pu:9414: tulyo yajñaphalaiḥ puṇyais tannibodha yudhiṣṭhira // MatsP_112.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9427: abhiṣekaṃ tu kṛtvādya kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_112.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9431: tatra snātvā ca japtvā ca vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:9432: dānaṃ dattvā dvijāgryebhyo gataḥ svabhavanaṃ tadā // MatsP_112.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9436: kati dvīpāḥ samudrā vā parvatā vā kati prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:9437: kiyanti caiva varṣāṇi teṣu nadyaśca kāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_113.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9444: na śakyante krameṇeha vaktuṃ vai sakalaṃ jagat // MatsP_113.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9447: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvās tāṃstu tarkeṇa sādhayet /
GP12mtp176pu:9448: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yacca tadacintyasya lakṣaṇam // MatsP_113.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9465: pūrvataḥ śvetavarṇastu brāhmaṇyaṃ tasya tena vai // MatsP_113.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9468: tenāsya śūdratā siddhā meror nāmārthakarmataḥ // MatsP_113.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9470: tenāsya kṣatrabhāvaḥ syād iti varṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_113.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9477: madhye tasya mahāmerur vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9478: vedyardhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ meror uttarārdhaṃ tathottaram // MatsP_113.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9479: varṣāṇi yāni saptātra teṣāṃ vai varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9480: dve dve sahasre vistīrṇā yojanairdakṣiṇottaram // MatsP_113.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9482: nīlaśca niṣadhaścaiva teṣāṃ hīnāśca ye pare // MatsP_113.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9491: teṣāṃ madhye janapadās tāni varṣāṇi sapta vai // MatsP_113.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:9493: sapta tāni nadībhedair agamyāni parasparam // MatsP_113.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9495: imaṃ haimavataṃ varṣaṃ bhārataṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_113.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:9496: hemakūṭaṃ paraṃ tasmān nāmnā kimpuruṣaṃ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:9499: ilāvṛtātparaṃ nīlaṃ ramyakaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_113.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9503: dīrghāṇi tasya catvāri madhyamaṃ tadilāvṛtam // MatsP_113.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:9505: paraṃ tvilāvṛtaṃ paścād vedyardhaṃ tu taduttaram // MatsP_113.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:9507: dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya niṣadhasyottareṇa tu // MatsP_113.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:9514: nānāvarṇaḥ sa pārśveṣu pūrvānte śveta ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:9515: pītaṃ tu dakṣiṇaṃ tasya bhṛṅgipattranibhaṃ param /
GP12mtp176pu:9516: uttaraṃ tasya raktaṃ vai iti varṇasamanvitaḥ // MatsP_113.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:9517: merustu śuśubhe divyo rājavatsa tu veṣṭitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9527: yasyeme caturo deśā nānāpārśveṣu saṃsthitāḥ // MatsP_113.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:9528: bhadrāśvaṃ bhārataṃ caiva ketumālaṃ ca paścime /
GP12mtp176pu:9533: teṣāmupari catvāri sarāṃsi ca vanāni ca // MatsP_113.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:9537: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi yojanaiḥ sarvataḥ samaḥ // MatsP_113.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:9539: tatra kālānalāḥ sarve mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ // MatsP_113.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:9541: tatra divyo mahāvṛkṣaḥ panasaḥ pattrabhāsuraḥ // MatsP_113.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:9543: tasya mālyavataḥ pārśve pūrve pūrvā tu gaṇḍikā /
GP12mtp176pu:9547: tatra te puruṣāḥ śvetā mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9552: kālāmrasya rasaṃ pītvā te sarve sthirayauvanāḥ // MatsP_113.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:9555: pūrvaṃ mamānugrahakṛd bhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ // MatsP_113.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:9559: pūrvāparau samākhyātau yau deśau tau tvayā mune /
GP12mtp176pu:9560: uttarāṇāṃ ca varṣāṇāṃ parvatānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_113.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:9561: ākhyāhi no yathātathyaṃ ye ca parvatavāsinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9564: śṛṇudhvaṃ yāni varṣāṇi pūrvoktāni ca vai mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:9565: dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya niṣadhasyottareṇa tu // MatsP_113.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:9566: varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante yatra vai prajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9569: tatrāpi ca mahāvṛkṣo nyagrodho rohiṇo mahān /
GP12mtp176pu:9570: tasyāpi te phalarasaṃ pibanto vartayanti hi // MatsP_113.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:9572: jīvanti te mahābhāgāḥ sadā hṛṣṭā narottamāḥ // MatsP_113.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:9573: uttareṇa tu śvetasya pārśve śṛṅgasya dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:9574: varṣaṃ hiraṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī // MatsP_113.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:9578: āyuṣpramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca // MatsP_113.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:9580: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ tatra jīvanti mānavāḥ // MatsP_113.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:9581: śṛṅgasāhvasya śṛṅgāṇi trīṇi tāni mahānti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:9582: ekaṃ maṇiyutaṃ tatra ekaṃ tu kanakānvitam /
GP12mtp176pu:9584: uttare cāsya śṛṅgasya samudrānte ca dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:9587: vastrāṇi te prasūyante phalaiścābharaṇāni ca // MatsP_113.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:9590: ye rakṣanti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ cāmṛtopamam // MatsP_113.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:9592: sarvatra sukhasaṃsparśā niḥśabdāḥ pavanāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_113.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:9596: teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanti hyamṛtopamam // MatsP_113.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:9598: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca samaṃ caiva mriyanti vai // MatsP_113.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:9602: jīvanti ca mahāsattvā na cānyā strī pravartate // MatsP_113.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:9604: evameva nisargo vai varṣāṇāṃ bhārate yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:9605: dṛṣṭaḥ paramadharmajñāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi vaḥ // MatsP_113.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:9614: uttaraśravaṇaṃ bhūyaḥ prabrūhi vadatāṃ vara // MatsP_114.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9617: buddhyā vicārya bahudhā vimṛśya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9623: yataḥ svargaśca mokṣaśca madhyamaścāpi hi smṛtaḥ // MatsP_114.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9624: na khalvanyatra martyānāṃ bhūmau karmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9629: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu dvīpo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇottaraḥ // MatsP_114.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9631: tiryagūrdhvaṃ tu vistīrṇaḥ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu // MatsP_114.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9634: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śūdrāśca bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9636: teṣāṃ sa vyavahāro 'yaṃ vartanaṃ tu parasparam /
GP12mtp176pu:9641: ya enaṃ jayate kṛtsnaṃ sa samrāḍiti kīrtitaḥ // MatsP_114.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9642: ayaṃ lokastu vai samrāḍ antarikṣajitāṃ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9643: svarāḍasau smṛto lokaḥ punarvakṣyāmi vistarāt // MatsP_114.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9649: anye tebhyaḥ parijñātā hrasvā hrasvopajīvinaḥ // MatsP_114.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9651: pibanti bahulā nadyo gaṅgā sindhuḥ sarasvatī // MatsP_114.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9653: airāvatī vitastā ca viśālā devikā kuhūḥ // MatsP_114.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9654: gomatī dhautapāpā ca bāhudā ca dṛṣadvatī /
GP12mtp176pu:9655: kauśikī tu tṛtīyā ca niścalā gaṇḍakī tathā // MatsP_114.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9658: parṇāśā narmadā caiva kāverī mahatī tathā // MatsP_114.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9660: śiprā hyavantī kuntī ca pāriyātrāśritāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_114.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9662: mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9663: tamasā pippalī śyenī tathā citrotpalāpi ca // MatsP_114.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9664: vimalā cañcalā caiva tathā ca dhūtavāhinī /
GP12mtp176pu:9665: śuktimantī śunī lajjā mukuṭā hrādikāpi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9667: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā kṣiprā ca ṛṣabhā nadī /
GP12mtp176pu:9668: veṇā vaitaraṇī caiva viśvamālā kumudvatī // MatsP_114.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9669: toyā caiva mahāgaurī durgamā tu śilā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:9670: vindhyapādaprasūtās tāḥ sarvāḥ śītajalāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:9672: tuṅgabhadrā suprayogā vāhyā kāverī caiva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:9675: malayaprasūtā nadyas tāḥ sarvāḥ śītajalāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9677: tāmraparṇī tathā mūlī śaravā vimalā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:9680: kṛpā ca pāśinī caiva śuktimantātmajās tu tāḥ // MatsP_114.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:9682: viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvapāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:9686: matsyāḥ kirātāḥ kulyāśca kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ // MatsP_114.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:9690: pṛthivyāmapi kṛtsnāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ // MatsP_114.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:9694: tataḥ puṣpavaro deśas tena jajñe manoramaḥ // MatsP_114.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:9710: pāṇḍyāśca keralāścaiva colāḥ kulyāstathaiva ca // MatsP_114.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:9714: pulindā vindhyapuṣikā vaidarbhā daṇḍakaiḥ saha // MatsP_114.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:9720: ityete aparāntāstu śṛṇu ye vindhyavāsinaḥ // MatsP_114.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:9722: auṇḍrā māṣā daśārṇāśca bhojāḥ kiṣkindhakaiḥ saha // MatsP_114.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:9724: tumurās tumbarāścaiva padgamā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // MatsP_114.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:9732: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12mtp176pu:9733: teṣāṃ nisargaṃ vakṣyāmi upariṣṭācca kṛtsnaśaḥ // MatsP_114.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:9735: etacchrutvā tu ṛṣaya uttaraṃ punareva te /
GP12mtp176pu:9738: yacca kimpuruṣaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9739: ācakṣva no yathātattvaṃ kīrtitaṃ bhārataṃ tvayā // MatsP_114.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:9741: dvīpānāṃ vāsināṃ teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ prabravīhi naḥ // MatsP_114.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:9749: varṣe kimpuruṣe puṇye plakṣo madhuvahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9750: tasya kimpuruṣāḥ sarve pibanto rasamuttamam // MatsP_114.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:9756: harivarṣe narāḥ sarve pibantīkṣurasaṃ śubham // MatsP_114.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:9757: na jarā bādhate tatra tena jīvanti te ciram /
GP12mtp176pu:9760: na tatra sūryastapati na ca jānanti mānavāḥ // MatsP_114.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:9763: padmagandhāśca jāyante tatra sarve ca mānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9766: trayodaśa sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ te narottamāḥ // MatsP_114.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:9767: āyuṣpramāṇaṃ jīvanti ye tu varṣa ilāvṛte /
GP12mtp176pu:9768: merostu dakṣiṇe pārśve niṣadhasyottareṇa vā // MatsP_114.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:9772: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca śatadhā ca mahānpunaḥ // MatsP_114.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:9774: tasya jambūphalaraso nadī bhūtvā prasarpati // MatsP_114.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:9776: taṃ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā jambūrasamilāvṛte // MatsP_114.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:9777: jambūphalarasaṃ pītvā na jarā bādhate 'pi tān /
GP12mtp176pu:9778: na kṣudhā na klamo vāpi na duḥkhaṃ ca tathāvidham // MatsP_114.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:9780: indragopakasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate bhāsuraṃ ca yat // MatsP_114.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:9782: skannaṃ tu kāñcanaṃ śubhraṃ jāyate devabhūṣaṇam // MatsP_114.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:9783: teṣāṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā dikṣvaṣṭāsu ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9784: īśvarānugrahādbhūmir mṛtāṃśca grasate tu tān // MatsP_114.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:9786: hemakūṭe tu vijñeyā gandharvāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // MatsP_114.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:9788: mahāmerau trayastriṃśat krīḍante yajñiyāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:9790: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca śvetaḥ parvata ucyate // MatsP_114.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:9795: aśakyā parisaṃkhyātuṃ śraddheyā ca bubhūṣatā // MatsP_114.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:9801: dhenvāḥ prasūyamānāyāḥ phalaṃ dānasya me śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:9805: kena karmavipākena sa tu rājā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9806: avāpa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ saubhāgyamapi cottamam // MatsP_115.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9808: urvaśī saṃmatā tyaktvā sarvabhāvena taṃ nṛpam // MatsP_115.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9811: avāpa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ saubhāgyamapi cottamam // MatsP_115.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9812: atīte janmani purā yo 'yaṃ rājā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9813: purūravā iti khyāto madradeśādhipo hi saḥ // MatsP_115.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9815: sa vai nṛpaguṇairyuktaḥ kevalaṃ rūpavarjitaḥ // MatsP_115.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9818: babhūva karmaṇā kena rūpavāṃścaiva sūtaja // MatsP_115.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9821: nadyāḥ kūle mahārājaḥ pūrvajanmani pārthivaḥ // MatsP_115.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9822: sa tu madrapatī rājā yastu nāmnā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9823: tasmiñjanmanyasau vipro dvādaśyāṃ tu sadānagha // MatsP_115.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9829: varjanīyaṃ prayatnena rūpaghnaṃ tatparaṃ nṛpa // MatsP_115.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9833: janānurāgo naivāsīd rūpahīnasya tasya vai // MatsP_115.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9835: rājyaṃ mantrigataṃ kṛtvā jagāma himaparvatam // MatsP_115.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9837: draṣṭuṃ sa tīrthasadanaṃ viṣayānte svake nadīm // MatsP_115.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9840: tuhinasadṛśahaimavarṇapuñjāṃ tuhinayaśāḥ saritaṃ dadarśa rājā // MatsP_115.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9844: sa dadarśa nadīṃ puṇyāṃ divyāṃ haimavatīṃ śubhām /
GP12mtp176pu:9845: gandharvaiśca samākīrṇāṃ nityaṃ śakreṇa sevitām // MatsP_116.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9851: sābhiṣiktāmiva satāṃ paśyanprītiṃ parāṃ yayau // MatsP_116.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9876: saṃyutaṃ salilaṃ tasyāḥ ṣaṭpadair upasevyate // MatsP_116.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9879: yasyāstīre ratiṃ yānti sadā kāmavaśā mṛgāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9880: tapovanāśca ṛṣayas tathā devāḥ sahāpsarāḥ // MatsP_116.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9886: sa tāṃ paśyanyayau rājā satāmīpsitakāmadām // MatsP_116.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9889: yā sadā vividhairviprair devaiścāpi niṣevyate // MatsP_116.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9890: yā ca sadā sakalaughavināśaṃ bhaktajanasya karotyacireṇa /
GP12mtp176pu:9891: yānugatā saritāṃ hi kadambair yānugatā satataṃ hi munīndraiḥ // MatsP_116.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9892: yā hi sutāniva pāti manuṣyān yā ca yutā satataṃ himasaṃghaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9893: yā ca yutā satataṃ suravṛndair yā ca janaiḥ svahitāya śritā vai // MatsP_116.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9894: prayuktā ca kesarigaṇaiḥ karivṛndajuṣṭā saṃtānayuktasalilāpi suvarṇayuktā /
GP12mtp176pu:9900: sa gacchanneva dadṛśe himavantaṃ mahāgirim // MatsP_117.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9902: pakṣiṇāmapi saṃcārair vinā siddhagatiṃ śubhām // MatsP_117.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9906: meghottarīyakaṃ śailaṃ dadṛśe sa narādhipaḥ // MatsP_117.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9913: darīmukhaiḥ kvacidbhīmaiḥ pibantaṃ salilaṃ mahat // MatsP_117.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9915: upagītaṃ tathā mukhyaiḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ gaṇaiḥ kvacit // MatsP_117.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9921: kvacic ca kusumairyuktam atyantaruciraṃ śubham // MatsP_117.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9925: dṛśyate na ca saṃśrāntaṃ gajānāmākulaṃ kulam // MatsP_117.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9929: ahīnaḥ paśyati girim ahīnaṃ ratnasampadā // MatsP_117.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9930: alpena tapasā yatra siddhiṃ prāpsyanti tāpasāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9940: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ cārunitambabhūmiṃ mahānubhāvaḥ sa tu madranāthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9941: babhrāma tatraiva mudā sametaḥ sthānaṃ tadā kiṃcidathāsasāda // MatsP_117.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9946: agamyaṃ mānuṣair anyair daivayogād upāgataḥ // MatsP_118.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9948: meghaśyāmaṃ ca taṃ deśaṃ drumakhaṇḍairanekaśaḥ // MatsP_118.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9952: bhūrjaiḥ samuñjakair bāṇair vṛkṣaiḥ saptacchadadrumaiḥ // MatsP_118.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9980: bandhūkaiśca subandhūkaiḥ kuñjakānāṃ tu jātibhiḥ // MatsP_118.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9995: pratānaiḥ pippalīnāṃ ca nāgavalyaśca bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_118.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9999: kūṣmāṇḍānāṃ pratānaiśca alābūnāṃ tathā kvacit // MatsP_118.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10003: kahlāraiśca vidāryā ca rurūṭaiḥ svādukaṇṭakaiḥ // MatsP_118.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10025: jalajaiśca tathā vaṇair nānāvarṇaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ // MatsP_118.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10036: na taddhānyaṃ na tatsasyaṃ na tacchākaṃ na tatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:10037: na tanmūlaṃ na tatkandaṃ na tatpuṣpaṃ narādhipa // MatsP_118.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10039: anūpotthaṃ vanotthaṃ ca tatra yannāsti pārthivaḥ // MatsP_118.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10041: madreśvaraḥ sa dadṛśe tapasā hyatiyogataḥ // MatsP_118.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10042: dadṛśe ca tathā tatra nānārūpān patatriṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10053: bhṛṅgarājān sīrapādān bhūliṅgān ḍiṇḍimān navān // MatsP_118.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:10061: tathā mattāṃśca mātaṃgān mahiṣān gavayān vṛṣān /
GP12mtp176pu:10070: taccāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ babhūvātreḥ purā nṛpam // MatsP_118.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:10072: hiṃsanti hi na cānyonyaṃ hiṃsakāstu parasparam // MatsP_118.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10076: payaḥ kṣaranti te divyam amṛtasvādukaṇṭakam // MatsP_118.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:10078: śilāḥ kṣīreṇa sampūrṇā dadhnā cānyatra vā bahiḥ // MatsP_118.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:10080: sarāṃsi tatra divyāni nadyaśca vimalodakāḥ // MatsP_118.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:10082: kandarāṇi ca śailasya susevyāni pade pade // MatsP_118.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:10084: upatyakā suśailasya śikharasya na vidyate // MatsP_118.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:10086: himapātaṃ ghanā yatra kurvanti sahitāḥ sadā // MatsP_118.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:10087: tatrāsti cāparaṃ śṛṅgaṃ yatra toyaghanā ghanāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10096: śailavāṭaiḥ parivṛtam agamyaṃ manujaiḥ sadā // MatsP_118.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:10100: kṛtaṃ svayaṃ ruciramathātriṇā śubhaṃ śubhāvahaṃ ca hi dadṛśe sa madrarāṭ // MatsP_118.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:10104: tatra yau tau mahāśṛṅgau mahāvarṇau mahāhimau /
GP12mtp176pu:10107: tasyādhastādvṛkṣagaṇe diśāṃ bhāge ca paścime // MatsP_119.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10109: dṛṣṭvaiva kautukāviṣṭas taṃ viveśa mahīpatiḥ // MatsP_119.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:10113: na tatra sūryastapati na virājati candramāḥ // MatsP_119.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:10121: pattrair marakatair nīlair vaiḍūryasya mahīpate // MatsP_119.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10123: tasminsarasi yā bhūmir na sā vajrasamākulā // MatsP_119.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:10125: kapardikānāṃ śuktīnāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ca mahīpate // MatsP_119.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10126: makarāṇāṃ ca matsyānāṃ caṇḍānāṃ kacchapaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:10127: tatra marakatakhaṇḍāni vajrāṇāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_119.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10129: puṣparāgāṇi sarvāṇi tathā karkoṭakāni ca // MatsP_119.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10130: tutthakasya tu khaṇḍāni tathā śeṣasya bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10133: jyotīrasasya ramyasya syamantasya ca bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_119.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10137: vajrasyaiva ca mukhyasya tathā brahmamaṇerapi // MatsP_119.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10140: vaiḍūryasya śilā madhye sarasastasya śobhanā // MatsP_119.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:10141: pramāṇena tathā sā ca dve ca rājandhanuḥśate /
GP12mtp176pu:10142: caturasrā tathā ramyā tapasā nirmitātriṇā // MatsP_119.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:10144: pradeśaḥ sa tu rājendra dvīpe tasminmanohare // MatsP_119.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10148: tasyāstadudakaṃ svādu laghu śītaṃ sugandhikam // MatsP_119.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10149: na kṣiṇoti yathā kaṇṭhaṃ kukṣiṃ nāpūrayatyapi /
GP12mtp176pu:10150: tṛptiṃ vidhatte paramāṃ śarīre ca mahatsukham // MatsP_119.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10151: madhye tu tasyāḥ prāsādaṃ nirmitaṃ tapasātriṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:10164: ekaṃ vai devadevasya dvitīyaṃ tu prasāritam // MatsP_119.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10167: tṛtīyaṃ tu bhujaṃ tasya caturthaṃ tu tathā śṛṇu /
GP12mtp176pu:10178: tataḥ sammukham udvīkṣya vavande sa narādhipaḥ // MatsP_119.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:10179: jānubhyāṃ śirasā caiva gatvā bhūmiṃ yathāvidhi /
GP12mtp176pu:10180: nāmnāṃ sahasreṇa tadā tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam // MatsP_119.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10181: pradakṣiṇamatho cakre sa tūtthāya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10191: na tasya glānimāyāti śarīraṃ ca tadadbhutam // MatsP_119.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10192: evaṃ sa rājā tapasi prasaktaḥ sampūjayandevavaraṃ sadaiva /
GP12mtp176pu:10193: tatrāśrame kālamuvāsa kaṃcit svargopame duḥkham avindamānaḥ // MatsP_119.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10198: kṛtvā puṣpoccayaṃ bhūri granthayitvā tathā srajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10199: agraṃ nivedya devāya gandharvebhyastadā dadau // MatsP_120.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10201: ceṣṭā nānāvidhākārāḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // MatsP_120.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:10208: kācid uccīya puṣpāṇi dadau kāntasya bhāminī /
GP12mtp176pu:10213: kācidevaṃ raho nītā ramaṇena riraṃsunā // MatsP_120.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10225: channā kācic cirātprāptā kāntenānviṣya yatnataḥ // MatsP_120.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10229: dhārayantī janaṃ cakre kācit tatra samanmatham // MatsP_120.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10233: saṃbhrāntā kāntaśaraṇaṃ magnā kācidgatā ciram // MatsP_120.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:10239: pūjyamānaṃ ca dadṛśe devadevaṃ janārdanam // MatsP_120.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10240: kvacic ca dadṛśe rājā latāgṛhagatāḥ striyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10243: śṛṇvatī kāntavacanam adhikā tu tathā babhau // MatsP_120.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10251: pītvā papraccha ramaṇaṃ kva gate te mamotpale // MatsP_120.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:10252: tvayaiva pītau tau nūnam ityuktā ramaṇena sā /
GP12mtp176pu:10253: tathā viditvā mugdhatvād babhūva vrīḍitā bhṛśam // MatsP_120.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10264: evam apsarasāṃ paśyan krīḍitāni sa parvate /
GP12mtp176pu:10268: vayaṃ hi te pradāsyāmo manasaḥ kāṅkṣitānvarān /
GP12mtp176pu:10269: tānādāya gṛhaṃ gaccha tiṣṭheha yadi vā punaḥ // MatsP_120.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10274: tatrovāsa sukhī māsaṃ pūjayāno janārdanam // MatsP_120.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10276: tutoṣa sa jano rājñas tasyālaulyena karmaṇā // MatsP_120.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10277: māsasya madhye sa nṛpaḥ praviṣṭastadāśramaṃ ratnasahasracitram /*
GP12mtp176pu:10278: toyāśanastatra hyuvāsa māsaṃ yāvatsitānto nṛpa phālgunasya // MatsP_120.41 //*
GP12mtp176pu:10284: pratyūṣakāle vidhivat snātaḥ sa prayatendriyaḥ // MatsP_120.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10286: dadarśātriṃ muniṃ rājā pratyakṣaṃ tapasāṃ nidhim // MatsP_120.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10288: tataḥ śuśrāva vacanaṃ devatānāṃ samīritam // MatsP_120.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:10298: madhye himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10299: tasminnivasati śrīmān kuberaḥ saha guhyakaiḥ // MatsP_121.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10303: tasmāt pravahate divyā nadī mandākinī śubhā // MatsP_121.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10304: divyaṃ ca nandanaṃ tatra tasyāstīre mahadvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:10305: prāguttareṇa kailāsād divyaṃ saugandhikaṃ girim // MatsP_121.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:10307: candraprabho nāma giriḥ yaḥ śubhro ratnasaṃnibhaḥ // MatsP_121.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:10308: tatsamīpe saro divyam acchodaṃ nāma viśrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:10309: tasmātprabhavate divyā nadī hyacchodakā śubhā // MatsP_121.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10313: puṇyā mandākinī nāma nadī hyacchodakā śubhā // MatsP_121.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10315: kailāsadakṣiṇe prācyāṃ śivaṃ sarvauṣadhiṃ girim // MatsP_121.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:10317: lohito hemaśṛṅgastu giriḥ sūryaprabho mahān // MatsP_121.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10319: tasmātprabhavate puṇyo lauhityaśca nado mahān // MatsP_121.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10320: divyāraṇyaṃ viśokaṃ ca tasya tīre mahadvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:10321: tasmingirau nivasati yakṣo maṇidharo vaśī // MatsP_121.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10325: tadañjanaṃ traikakudaṃ śailaṃ trikakudaṃ prati // MatsP_121.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10327: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ mānasaṃ siddhasevitam // MatsP_121.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10329: yasyāstīre vanaṃ divyaṃ vaibhrājaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_121.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10339: tasya pādātprabhavati śailodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ // MatsP_121.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10341: sā cakṣusī tayormadhye praviṣṭā paścimodadhim // MatsP_121.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10343: gauraṃ tu parvataśreṣṭhaṃ haritālamayaṃ prati // MatsP_121.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10345: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ saraḥ kāñcanavālukam // MatsP_121.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:10346: ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10347: gaṅgārthe sa tu rājarṣir uvāsa bahulāḥ samāḥ // MatsP_121.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:10349: tatra tripathagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā // MatsP_121.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10352: tatreṣṭvā kratubhiḥ siddhaḥ śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:10353: divyaśchāyāpathas tatra nakṣatrāṇāṃ tu maṇḍalam // MatsP_121.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10354: dṛśyate bhāsurā rātrau devī tripathagā tu sā /
GP12mtp176pu:10355: antarikṣaṃ divaṃ caiva bhāvayitvā bhuvaṃ gatā // MatsP_121.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10357: tasyā ye bindavaḥ kecit kruddhāyāḥ patitā bhuvi // MatsP_121.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10358: kṛtaṃ tu tairbahusaras tato bindusaraḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:10359: tatastasyā niruddhāyā bhavena sahasā ruṣā // MatsP_121.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10361: bhittvā viśāmi pātālaṃ srotasā gṛhya śaṃkaram // MatsP_121.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10362: athāvalepaṃ taṃ jñātvā tasyāḥ kruddhastu śaṃkaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10363: tirobhāvayituṃ buddhir āsīdaṅgeṣu tāṃ nadīm // MatsP_121.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10367: buddhvā'sya varadānaṃ tu tataḥ kopaṃ nyayacchata // MatsP_121.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10369: tato visarjayāmāsa saṃruddhāṃ svena tejasā // MatsP_121.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10371: tato visarjayāmāsa sapta srotāṃsi gaṅgayā // MatsP_121.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:10374: nalinī hlādinī caiva pāvanī caiva prācyagā /
GP12mtp176pu:10375: sītā cakṣuśca sindhuśca tisrastā vai pratīcyagāḥ // MatsP_121.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10377: tasmādbhāgīrathī sā vai praviṣṭā dakṣiṇodadhim // MatsP_121.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10378: sapta caitāḥ plāvayanti varṣaṃ tu himasāhvayam /
GP12mtp176pu:10379: prasūtāḥ sapta nadyastu śubhā bindusarodbhavāḥ // MatsP_121.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:10383: kṛtvā dvidhā himavantaṃ praviṣṭā dakṣiṇodadhim // MatsP_121.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10397: tataḥ pratihatā vindhye praviṣṭā dakṣiṇodadhim // MatsP_121.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:10403: sā maṇḍale samudrasya tīre bhūtvā tu sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_121.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10404: tatastu nalinī cāpi prācīmeva diśaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:10409: tatastu pāvanī prāyāt prācīmāśāṃ javena tu // MatsP_121.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10411: pūrvāndeśāṃśca sevantī bhittvā sā bahudhā girim /
GP12mtp176pu:10414: śaimimaṇḍalakoṣṭhaṃ tu sā praviṣṭā mahatsaraḥ // MatsP_121.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:10416: upagacchanti tā nadyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // MatsP_121.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10422: evameva tu vijñeyā siddhiḥ parvatavāsinām // MatsP_121.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:10424: hemakūṭasya pṛṣṭhe tu sarpāṇāṃ tatsaraḥ smṛtam // MatsP_121.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:10428: yasmādagre prabhavati gandharvānukule ca te // MatsP_121.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:10430: jambūścaiva nadī puṇyā yasyāṃ jāmbūnadaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_121.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:10431: payodastu hrado nīlaḥ sa śubhraḥ puṇḍarīkavān /
GP12mtp176pu:10434: mṛgyā ca mṛgakāntā ca tasmād dve samprasūyatām // MatsP_121.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:10436: nāmnā te vai jayā nāma dvādaśodadhisaṃnibhāḥ // MatsP_121.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:10437: tebhyaḥ śāntī ca madhvī ca dve nadyau samprasūyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:10438: kimpuruṣādyāni yānyaṣṭau teṣu devo na varṣati // MatsP_121.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:10440: balāhakaśca ṛṣabho cakro maināka eva ca // MatsP_121.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:10449: tatra saṃvartako nāma so 'gniḥ pibati tajjalam /
GP12mtp176pu:10452: chidyamāneṣu pakṣeṣu purā indrasya vai bhayāt // MatsP_121.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:10453: teṣāṃ tu dṛśyate candre śukle kṛṣṇe samāplutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10454: te bhāratasya varṣasya bhedā yena prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_121.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:10458: samanvitāni bhūtāni teṣu varṣeṣu bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_121.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:10459: vasanti nānājātīni teṣu sarveṣu tāni vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10465: kathyamānaṃ nibodha tvaṃ śākaṃ dvīpaṃ dvijottamāḥ // MatsP_122.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:10469: tatra puṇyā janapadāś cirācca mriyate janaḥ // MatsP_122.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:10471: tatrāpi parvatāḥ śubhrāḥ saptaiva maṇibhūṣitāḥ // MatsP_122.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10472: śākadvīpādiṣu tveṣu sapta sapta nagās triṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:10477: śākadvīpe tu vakṣyāmi sapta divyānmahācalān // MatsP_122.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10479: prāgāyataḥ sa sauvarṇa udayo nāma parvataḥ // MatsP_122.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10487: yatra śyāmatvamāpannāḥ prajāḥ pūrvamimāḥ kila // MatsP_122.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10489: śabdamṛtyuḥ purā tasmin dundubhistāḍitaḥ suraiḥ // MatsP_122.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10491: tasyāpareṇa rajato mahānasto giriḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_122.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10492: sa vai somaka ityukto devairyatrāmṛtaṃ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:10493: saṃbhṛtaṃ ca hṛtaṃ caiva māturarthe garutmatā // MatsP_122.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10499: saiveha keśavetyukto yato vāyuḥ pravāti ca // MatsP_122.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:10504: nāmnā gatabhayaṃ nāma varṣaṃ tatprathamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:10507: nāradasya ca kaumāraṃ tadeva ca sukhodayam // MatsP_122.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10509: ānandakamiti proktaṃ tadeva munibhiḥ śubham // MatsP_122.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10516: jambūdvīpena saṃkhyātaṃ tasya madhye vanaspatiḥ // MatsP_122.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:10518: eteṣu devagandharvāḥ siddhāśca saha cāraṇaiḥ // MatsP_122.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10519: viharanti ramante ca dṛśyamānāśca taiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:10522: dvināmnā caiva tāḥ sarvā gaṅgāḥ saptavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_122.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10524: munitaptā ca nāmnaiṣā nadī samparikīrtitā // MatsP_122.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10526: nandā ca pāvanī caiva tṛtīyā parikīrtitā // MatsP_122.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10527: śibikā ca caturthī syād dvividhā ca punaḥ smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:10528: ikṣuśca pañcamī jñeyā tathaiva ca punaḥ kuhūḥ // MatsP_122.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10530: sukṛtā ca gabhastī ca saptamī parikīrtitā // MatsP_122.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10533: abhigacchanti tāścānyā nadā nadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10535: tāsāṃ tu nāmadheyāni parimāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10536: na śakyaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ puṇyāstāḥ sariduttamāḥ // MatsP_122.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10537: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadīrjanapadāstu te /
GP12mtp176pu:10538: ete śāntabhayāḥ proktāḥ pramodā ye ca vai śivāḥ // MatsP_122.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10542: avasarpiṇī na teṣvasti tathaivotsarpiṇī punaḥ // MatsP_122.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10544: tretāyugasamaḥ kālas tathā tatra pravartate // MatsP_122.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10546: deśasya tu vicāreṇa kālaḥ svābhāvikaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_122.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10547: na teṣu saṃkaraḥ kaścid varṇāśramakṛtaḥ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:10549: na teṣu māyā lobho vā īrṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ kutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10550: viparyayo na teṣvasti tadvai svābhāvikaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_122.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10551: kālo naiva ca teṣvasti na daṇḍo na ca dāṇḍikaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10552: svadharmeṇa ca dharmajñās te rakṣanti parasparam // MatsP_122.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10561: atha tṛtīyaṃ vakṣyāmi kuśadvīpaṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10564: tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta vijñeyā ratnayonayaḥ // MatsP_122.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10565: ratnākarāstathā nadyas teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
GP12mtp176pu:10566: dvināmānaśca te sarve śākadvīpe yathā tathā // MatsP_122.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:10568: vidrumoccaya ityuktaḥ sa eva ca mahīdharaḥ // MatsP_122.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:10570: dvitīyaḥ parvatastatra unnato nāma viśrutaḥ // MatsP_122.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:10571: hemaparvata ityuktaḥ sa eva ca mahīdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10574: dyutimānnāmataḥ proktaḥ sa eva ca mahīdharaḥ // MatsP_122.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:10578: kaṅkastu pañcamasteṣāṃ parvato nāma sāravān // MatsP_122.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10579: kuśeśaya iti proktaḥ punaḥ sa pṛthivīdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10582: sa eva tu punaḥ prokto harirityabhiviśrutaḥ // MatsP_122.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:10584: saptamaḥ parvatastatra kakudmānsa hi bhāṣate // MatsP_122.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10586: manda ityeṣa yo dhātur apāmarthe prakāśakaḥ // MatsP_122.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:10588: tatra ratnānyanekāni svayaṃ rakṣati vāsavaḥ // MatsP_122.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:10592: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi saptaiva tu vibhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_122.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:10593: kumudasya smṛtaḥ śveta unnataśceva sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10594: unnatasya tu vijñeyaṃ varṣaṃ lohitasaṃjñakam // MatsP_122.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:10597: droṇasya harikaṃ nāma lavaṇaṃ ca punaḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:10598: kaṅkasyāpi kakun nāma dhṛtimaccaiva tatsmṛtam // MatsP_122.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:10600: kakudminastu tadvarṣaṃ kapilaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_122.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:10603: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva prativarṣaṃ hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10604: dvināmavatyastāḥ sarvāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyajalāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_122.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:10605: dhūtapāpā nadī nāma yoniścaiva punaḥ smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:10606: sītā dvitīyā vijñeyā sā caiva hi niśā smṛtā // MatsP_122.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:10607: pavitrā tṛtīyā vijñeyā vitṛṣṇāpi ca yā punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10608: caturthī hlādinītyuktā candrabhā iti ca smṛtā // MatsP_122.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:10609: vidyucca pañcamī proktā śuklā caiva vibhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10610: puṇḍrā ṣaṣṭhī tu vijñeyā punaścaiva vibhāvarī // MatsP_122.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:10611: mahatī saptamī proktā punaścaiṣā dhṛtiḥ smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:10613: abhigacchanti tā nadyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10614: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vaḥ kuśadvīpasya varṇitaḥ // MatsP_122.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:10619: tataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi krauñcadvīpaṃ yathā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:10632: krauñcasya kuśalo deśo vāmanasya manonugaḥ // MatsP_122.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:10638: śrutāstatraiva nadyastu prativarṣaṃ gatāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_122.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:10640: khyātī ca puṇḍarīkā ca gaṅgā saptavidhā smṛtā // MatsP_122.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:10642: abhigacchanti tā nadyo bahulāśca bahūdakāḥ // MatsP_122.89 //
GP12mtp176pu:10644: na śakyo vistarādvaktum api varṣaśatairapi // MatsP_122.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:10645: sargo yaśca prajānāṃ tu saṃhāro yaśca teṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10646: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi śālmalasya nibodhata // MatsP_122.91 //
GP12mtp176pu:10648: parivārya samudraṃ tu dadhimaṇḍodakaṃ sthitaḥ // MatsP_122.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:10649: tatra puṇyā janapadāś cirācca mriyate janaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10650: kuta eva tu durbhikṣaṃ kṣamātejoyutā hi te // MatsP_122.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:10652: pītastu madhyamaścāsīt tataḥ kumbhamayo giriḥ // MatsP_122.94 //
GP12mtp176pu:10655: sumahānrohito nāma divyo girivaro hi saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10656: sumanāḥ kuśalo deśaḥ sukhodarkaḥ sukhodayaḥ // MatsP_122.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:10658: tatra ratnānyanekāni svayaṃ rakṣati vāsavaḥ // MatsP_122.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:10660: na tatra meghā varṣanti śītoṣṇaṃ ca na tadvidham // MatsP_122.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:10661: varṇāśramāṇāṃ vārttā vā triṣu dvīpeṣu vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10662: na graho na ca candro 'sti īrṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā // MatsP_122.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:10664: bhojanaṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ tatra teṣāṃ svayamupasthitam // MatsP_122.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:10665: adhamottamaṃ na teṣvasti na lobho na parigrahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10668: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca dharmaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_122.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:10670: vyākhyātaḥ śālmalāntānāṃ dvīpānāṃ tu vidhiḥ śubhaḥ // MatsP_122.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:10679: tasmindvīpe tu vijñeyau parvatau dvau samāhitau // MatsP_123.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10687: dhātakinaḥ smṛtaṃ tadvai prathamaṃ prathamasya tu // MatsP_123.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:10688: gomedaṃ yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ nāmnā sarvasukhaṃ tu tat /
GP12mtp176pu:10689: kumudasya dvitīyasya dvitīyaṃ kumudaṃ tataḥ // MatsP_123.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10690: etau dvau parvatau vṛttau śeṣau sarvasamucchritau /
GP12mtp176pu:10691: pūrveṇa tasya dvīpasya sumanāḥ parvataḥ sthitaḥ // MatsP_123.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10693: paścārdhe kumudastasya evameva sthitastu vai // MatsP_123.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10694: etaiḥ parvatapādaistu sa deśo vai dvidhākṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10697: etau janapadau dvau tu gomedasya tu vistṛtau // MatsP_123.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10699: samudrekṣurasaṃ caiva gomedāddviguṇaṃ hi saḥ // MatsP_123.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10703: dvīpasyaiva tu pūrvārdhe citrasānuḥ sthito mahān // MatsP_123.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10705: ūrdhvaṃ sa vai caturviṃśad-yojanānāṃ mahābalaḥ // MatsP_123.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10707: sthito velāsamīpe tu pūrvacandra ivoditaḥ // MatsP_123.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10709: tasya putro mahāvītaḥ paścimārdhasya rakṣitā // MatsP_123.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10710: pūrvārdhe parvatasyāpi dvidhā deśastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10716: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10717: adhamottamau na teṣvāstāṃ tulyāste vīryarūpataḥ // MatsP_123.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10718: na tatra vadhyavadhakau nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:10719: na lobho na ca dambho vā na ca dveṣaḥ parigrahaḥ // MatsP_123.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10720: satyānṛte na teṣvāstāṃ dharmādharmau tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10721: varṇāśramāṇāṃ vārttā ca pāśupālyaṃ vaṇikkṛṣiḥ // MatsP_123.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10722: trayīvidyā daṇḍanītiḥ śuśrūṣā daṇḍa eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10723: na tatra varṣaṃ nadyo vā śītoṣṇaṃ ca na vidyate // MatsP_123.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10725: tulyottarakurūṇāṃ tu kālastatra tu sarvadā // MatsP_123.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:10727: sargastu dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahāvīte tathaiva ca // MatsP_123.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:10731: apāṃ caiva samudrekāt samudra iti saṃjñitaḥ // MatsP_123.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:10733: ṛṣiratyeva ramaṇe varṣantvetena teṣu vai // MatsP_123.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10734: udayatīndau pūrve tu samudraḥ pūryate sadā /
GP12mtp176pu:10735: prakṣīyamāne bahule kṣīyate 'stamite ca vai // MatsP_123.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10737: tato vai kṣīyamāṇe tu svātmanyeva hy apāṃ kṣayaḥ // MatsP_123.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10738: udayātpayasāṃ yogāt puṣpanty āpo yathā svayam /
GP12mtp176pu:10739: tathā sa tu samudro 'pi vardhate śaśinodaye // MatsP_123.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10743: daśottarāṇi pañcāhur aṅgulānāṃ śatāni ca // MatsP_123.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10744: apāṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ samudrāṇāṃ tu parvasu /
GP12mtp176pu:10745: dvirāpatvāt smṛto dvīpo dadhanāccodadhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_123.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:10747: śākadvīpe tu vai śākaḥ parvatastena cocyate // MatsP_123.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10749: krauñcadvīpe giriḥ krauñcas tasya nāmnā nigadyate // MatsP_123.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10751: gomedake tu gomedaḥ parvatastena cocyate // MatsP_123.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:10754: tasminsa vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārdhaṃ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10758: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānāṃ kramaśastu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10759: ārjavādbrahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca // MatsP_123.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:10761: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu yathoktaṃ varṣakeṣu ca // MatsP_123.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10764: ṣaḍrasaṃ tanmahāvīryaṃ tatra te bhuñjate janāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10773: adbhyo daśaguṇaścāgniḥ sarvato dhārayaty apaḥ // MatsP_123.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:10775: tiryakca maṇḍalo vāyur bhūtānyāveṣṭya dhārayan // MatsP_123.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10779: mahattattvaṃ hyanantena avyaktena tu dhāryate // MatsP_123.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:10783: evaṃ parasparotpannā dhāryante ca parasparam // MatsP_123.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10787: bhūtebhyaḥ paratas tebhyo hy alokaḥ sarvataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_123.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:10789: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathā hyantargatāni ca // MatsP_123.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10795: pratyākhyāyeha bhūtāni kāryotpattir na vidyate // MatsP_123.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10814: acirāttu prakāśena avanāttu raviḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_124.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10822: ataḥ pṛthivyā vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ yojanaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_124.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10826: abhimānino hyatītā ye tulyāste sāmprataistviha // MatsP_124.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:10832: merormadhye pratidiśaṃ koṭirekā tu sā smṛtā // MatsP_124.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10836: tisraḥ koṭyastu vistārāt saṃkhyātāstu caturdiśam // MatsP_124.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10838: saptadvīpasamudrāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sa tu vistaraḥ // MatsP_124.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10840: gaṇitaṃ yojanānāṃ tu koṭyastvekādaśa smṛtāḥ // MatsP_124.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10846: meroḥ prācyāṃ diśāyāṃ tu mānasottaramūrdhani // MatsP_124.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:10848: dakṣiṇena punarmeror mānasasya tu pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_124.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10850: pratīcyāṃ tu punarmeror mānasasya tu mūrdhani // MatsP_124.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10851: suṣā nāma purī ramyā varuṇasyāpi dhīmataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10864: suṣāyāmatha vāruṇyām uttiṣṭhansa tu dṛśyate // MatsP_124.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10866: suṣāyāmatha vāruṇyāṃ madhyāhne tu raviryadā // MatsP_124.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10872: evaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu dakṣiṇānteṣu sarpati // MatsP_124.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10874: pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe ca dvau dvau devālayau tu saḥ // MatsP_124.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10875: patatyekaṃ tu madhyāhne bhābhireva ca raśmibhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10876: udito vardhamānābhir madhyāhne tapate raviḥ // MatsP_124.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:10877: ataḥ paraṃ hrasantībhir gobhirastaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:10878: udayāstamayābhyāṃ ca smṛte pūrvāpare tu vai // MatsP_124.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10880: yatrodayastu dṛśyeta teṣāṃ sa udayaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_124.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10881: praṇāśaṃ gacchate yatra teṣāmastaḥ sa ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10884: śrayante raśmayo yasmāt tena rātrau na dṛśyate // MatsP_124.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10886: evaṃ puṣkaramadhye tu yadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ // MatsP_124.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10887: triṃśadbhāgaṃ ca medinyā muhūrtena sa gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:10888: yojanānāṃ sahasrasya imāṃ saṃkhyāṃ nibodhata // MatsP_124.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10892: etena kramayogeṇa yadā kāṣṭhāṃ tu dakṣiṇām // MatsP_124.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10896: sarvato dakṣiṇasyāṃ tu kāṣṭhāyāṃ tannibodhata // MatsP_124.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10898: tathā śatasahasrāṇi catvāriṃśacca pañca ca // MatsP_124.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:10906: gomedasya paradvīpe uttarāṃ ca diśaṃ caran // MatsP_124.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10907: uttarāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ tu kāṣṭhāyā maṇḍalasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:10911: nāgavīthyuttarā vīthī hy ajavīthis tu dakṣiṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:10912: ubhe āṣāḍhamūlaṃ tu ajavīthyādayas trayaḥ // MatsP_124.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:10914: aśvinī kṛttikā yāmyā nāgavīthyas trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_124.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10916: puṣyāśleṣā punarvasvor vīthī cairāvatī smṛtā // MatsP_124.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:10917: tisrastu vīthayo hyetā uttaro mārga ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10918: pūrvottarā ca phalgunyau maghā caivārṣabhī bhavet // MatsP_124.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:10920: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca vāruṇaṃ ca jaradgavam // MatsP_124.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10921: etāstu vīthayas tisro madhyamo mārga ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10922: hastaścitrā tathā svātī hy ajavīthiriti smṛtā // MatsP_124.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:10923: jyeṣṭhā viśākhā maitraṃ ca mṛgavīthī tathocyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10924: mūlaṃ pūrvottarāṣāḍhe vīthī vaiśvānarī bhavet // MatsP_124.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:10925: smṛtāstisrastu vīthyastā mārge vai dakṣiṇe punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10926: kāṣṭhayorantaraṃ caitad vakṣyate yojanaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_124.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10928: śatāni trīṇi cānyāni trayastriṃśattathaiva ca // MatsP_124.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:10938: abhyantaraṃ sa paryeti kramate maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_124.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:10940: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa cāṣṭau tathā smṛtam // MatsP_124.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:10942: viṣkambho maṇḍalasyaiva tiryaksa tu vidhīyate // MatsP_124.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:10943: ahastu carate nābheḥ sūryo vai maṇḍalaṃ kramāt /
GP12mtp176pu:10946: tasmātprakṛṣṭāṃ bhūmiṃ tu kālenālpena gacchati // MatsP_124.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:10952: tasmāddīrgheṇa kālena bhūmiṃ so 'lpāṃ prasarpati // MatsP_124.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:10954: trayodaśānāṃ madhye tu ṛkṣāṇāṃ carate raviḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10956: tato mandataraṃ tābhyāṃ cakraṃ tu bhramate punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10957: mṛtpiṇḍa iva madhyastho bhramate 'sau dhruvastathā // MatsP_124.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:10959: ubhayoḥ kāṣṭhayormadhye bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_124.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:10961: tasyaiva tu punarnaktaṃ śīghrā sūryasya vai gatiḥ // MatsP_124.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:10963: gatiḥ sūryasya vai naktaṃ mandā cāpi vidhīyate // MatsP_124.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:10969: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśordhvaṃ cocchrito giriḥ // MatsP_124.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:10975: lokālokau tu saṃdhatte yasmātsūryaḥ paribhraman // MatsP_124.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:10977: uṣā rātriḥ smṛtā viprair vyuṣṭiścāpi ahaḥ smṛtam // MatsP_124.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:10978: triṃśatkalo muhūrtastu ahaste daśa pañca ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10979: hrāso vṛddhiraharbhāgair divasānāṃ yathā tu vai // MatsP_124.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:10982: prātaḥ smṛtastataḥ kālo bhāgāṃścāhuśca pañca ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10986: traya eva muhūrtāstu kāla eṣa smṛto budhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10987: aparāhṇavyatītācca kālaḥ sāyaṃ sa ucyate // MatsP_124.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:10988: daśa pañca muhūrtāhno muhūrtās traya eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10989: daśapañcamuhūrtaṃ vai ahastu viṣuve smṛtam // MatsP_124.91 //
GP12mtp176pu:10991: ahastu grasate rātriṃ rātristu grasate ahaḥ // MatsP_124.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:10993: ālokāntaḥ smṛto loko lokāccāloka ucyate // MatsP_124.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:11003: lokasya saṃtānakarāḥ pitṛyāne pathi sthitāḥ // MatsP_124.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:11005: prārabhante lokakāmās teṣāṃ panthāḥ sa dakṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_124.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:11006: calitaṃ te punardharmaṃ sthāpayanti yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:11007: saṃtaptatapasā caiva maryādābhiḥ śrutena ca // MatsP_124.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:11008: jāyamānāstu pūrve vai paścimānāṃ gṛheṣu te /
GP12mtp176pu:11013: kriyāvatāṃ prasaṃkhyaiṣā ye śmaśānāni bhejire // MatsP_124.103 //
