GP12mtp176pu:11017: ityetaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ siddhāḥ śmaśānānīha bhejire // MatsP_124.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:11019: saṃtatiṃ te jugupsante tasmānmṛtyurjitastu taiḥ // MatsP_124.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:11025: ityetaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ śuddhais te 'mṛtatvaṃ hi bhejire // MatsP_124.109 //
GP12mtp176pu:11031: etadviṣṇupadaṃ divyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vyomni bhāsvaram // MatsP_124.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:11032: yatra gatvā na śocanti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:11033: dharme dhruvasya tiṣṭhanti ye tu lokasya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_124.113 //
GP12mtp176pu:11037: sūryācandramasoś cāraṃ grahāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_125.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11040: avyūhenaiva sarvāṇi tathā cāsaṃkareṇa vā // MatsP_125.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11041: kaśca bhrāmayate tāni bhramanti yadi vā svayam /
GP12mtp176pu:11042: etadveditum icchāmas tato nigada sattama // MatsP_125.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11045: pratyakṣamapi dṛśyaṃ tat saṃmohayati vai prajāḥ // MatsP_125.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11050: dhruvasya manasā yo vai bhramate jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11051: vātānīkamayair bandhair dhruve baddhaḥ prasarpati // MatsP_125.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11052: teṣāṃ bhedaśca yogaśca tathā kālasya niścayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11055: jīmūtā nāma te meghā yadebhyo jīvasambhavaḥ // MatsP_125.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11059: puṣkarāvartakā nāma ye meghāḥ pakṣasambhavāḥ // MatsP_125.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11068: yasmin brahmā samutpannaś caturvaktraḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11071: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhaśca parjanyaś catvāraścaiva diggajāḥ // MatsP_125.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11072: gajānāṃ parvatānāṃ ca meghānāṃ bhogibhiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:11073: kulamekaṃ dvidhā bhūtaṃ yonirekā jalaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_125.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11079: tasyā vispanditaṃ toyaṃ diggajāḥ pṛthubhiḥ karaiḥ // MatsP_125.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11080: śīkarān sampramuñcanti nīhāra iti sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11081: dakṣiṇena giriryo 'sau hemakūṭa iti smṛtaḥ // MatsP_125.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:11085: tato himavato vāyur himaṃ tatra samudbhavam // MatsP_125.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11088: ibhāsye ca tataḥ paścād idaṃ bhūtavivṛddhaye /
GP12mtp176pu:11091: sūrya eva tu vṛṣṭīnāṃ sraṣṭā samupadiśyate // MatsP_125.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11092: varṣaṃ gharmaṃ himaṃ rātriṃ saṃdhye caiva dinaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11095: sarvabhūtaśarīreṣu tv āpo hyanuśritāśca yāḥ // MatsP_125.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:11097: dhūmabhūtāstu tā hyāpo niṣkrāmantīha sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_125.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11105: vāyubhiḥ stanitaṃ caiva vidyutastvagnijāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_125.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:11106: mehanācca miher dhātor meghatvaṃ vyañjayanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11107: na bhraśyante tato hyāpas tasmādabhrasya vai sthitiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11115: cakreṇa bhāsvatā sūryaḥ syandanena prasarpiṇā // MatsP_125.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:11117: dviguṇā ca rathopasthād īṣādaṇḍaḥ pramāṇataḥ // MatsP_125.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:11118: sa tasya brahmaṇā sṛṣṭo ratho hyarthavaśena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11119: asaṅgaḥ kāñcano divyo yuktaḥ pavanagairhayaiḥ // MatsP_125.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:11121: vāruṇasya rathasyeha lakṣaṇaiḥ sadṛśaśca saḥ // MatsP_125.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:11123: athāṅgāni tu sūryasya pratyaṅgāni rathasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11126: arāḥ saṃvatsarāstasya nemyaḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_125.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:11129: tasya kāṣṭhā smṛtā ghoṇā dantapaṅktiḥ kṣaṇāstu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:11130: nimeṣaścānukarṣo 'sya īṣā cāsya kalā smṛtā // MatsP_125.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11134: paṅktiśca bṛhatī caiva uṣṇigeva tu saptamam // MatsP_125.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:11135: cakramakṣe nibaddhaṃ tu dhruve cākṣaḥ samarpitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11136: sahacakro bhramatyakṣaḥ sahākṣo bhramati dhruvaḥ // MatsP_125.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11139: tathā saṃyogabhāgena siddho vai bhāskaro rathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11140: tenāsau taraṇirdevo nabhasaḥ sarpate divam // MatsP_125.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:11141: yugākṣakoṭī te tasya dakṣiṇe syandanasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11142: bhramato bhramato raśmī tau cakrayugayostu vai // MatsP_125.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:11145: yugākṣakoṭī te tasya vātormī syandanasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11148: vardhete dakṣiṇeṣvatra bhramato maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_125.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:11150: dhruveṇa pragṛhītau tau rathau yau vanato ravim // MatsP_125.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:11151: ākṛṣyete yadā te tu dhruveṇa samadhiṣṭhite /
GP12mtp176pu:11152: tadā so 'bhyantare sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_125.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:11154: dhruveṇa mucyamānena punā raśmiyugena ca // MatsP_125.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:11155: tathaiva bāhyataḥ sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11156: udveṣṭayanvai vegena maṇḍalāni tu gacchati // MatsP_125.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:11160: sa ratho 'dhiṣṭhito devair māsi māsi yathākramam /
GP12mtp176pu:11161: tato vahatyathādityaṃ bahubhir ṛṣibhiḥ saha // MatsP_126.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11163: ete vasanti vai sūrye māsau dvau dvau krameṇa ca // MatsP_126.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11167: kṛtasthalāpsarāścaiva yā ca sā puñjikasthalā // MatsP_126.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11169: rakṣo hetiḥ prahetiśca yātudhānāvubhau ṛtau // MatsP_126.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11171: vasangrīṣme tu dvau māsau mitraśca varuṇaśca vai // MatsP_126.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11173: menakā sahajanyā ca hāhā hūhūśca gāyakau // MatsP_126.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11175: puruṣādo vadhaścaiva yātudhānau tu tau smṛtau // MatsP_126.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11176: ete vasanti vai sūrye māsayoḥ śuciśukrayoḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11177: tataḥ sūrye punaścānyā nivasanti sma devatāḥ // MatsP_126.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11181: pramlocetyapsarāścaiva nimrocantī ca te ubhe // MatsP_126.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11184: māsau dvau devatāḥ sūrye vasanti ca śaradṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:11185: parjanyaścaiva pūṣā ca bharadvājaḥ sagautamaḥ // MatsP_126.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11186: citrasenaśca gandharvas tathā vā suruciśca yaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11187: viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca ubhe te puṇyalakṣaṇe // MatsP_126.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11189: senajicca suṣeṇaśca senānīr grāmaṇīs tathā // MatsP_126.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11191: vasantyete ca vai sūrye māsayośca tviṣorjayoḥ // MatsP_126.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11192: haimantikau ca dvau māsau nivasanti divākare /
GP12mtp176pu:11193: aṃśo bhagaśca dvāvetau kaśyapaśca kratuśca tau // MatsP_126.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11196: apsarāḥ pūrvacittiśca gandharvā hyurvaśī ca yā /
GP12mtp176pu:11197: tārkṣyaścāriṣṭanemiśca senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tau // MatsP_126.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11198: vidyutsūryaśca tāvugrau yātudhānau tu tau smṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:11199: sahe caiva sahasye ca vasantyete divākare // MatsP_126.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11207: ityete nivasanti sma dvau dvau māsau divākare // MatsP_126.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11213: sarpāḥ sarpanti vai sūrye yātudhānānuyānti ca // MatsP_126.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11217: tathā tapatyasau sūryas teṣāmiddhastu tejasā // MatsP_126.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:11219: mānavānāṃ śubhairhyetair hriyate duritaṃ tu vai // MatsP_126.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11221: ete sahaiva sūryeṇa bhramanti sānugā divi // MatsP_126.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11223: gopāyanti sma bhūtāni īhante hyanukampayā // MatsP_126.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:11225: atītānāgatānāṃ ca vartante sāmprataṃ ca ye // MatsP_126.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:11226: evaṃ vasanti vai sūrye saptakāste caturdaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:11227: caturdaśeṣu vartante gaṇā manvantareṣu vai // MatsP_126.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:11228: grīṣme hime ca varṣāsu muñcamānā yathākramam /
GP12mtp176pu:11229: dharmaṃ himaṃ ca varṣaṃ ca yathākramamaharniśam // MatsP_126.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:11230: gacchatyasāvanudinaṃ parivṛtya raśmīn devānpitṝṃśca manujāṃśca sutarpayanvai /
GP12mtp176pu:11231: śukle ca kṛṣṇe tadahaḥkrameṇa kālakṣaye caiva surāḥ pibanti // MatsP_126.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:11232: māsena taccāmṛtamasya mṛṣṭaṃ suvṛṣṭaye raśmiṣu rakṣitaṃ tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11233: sarve 'mṛtaṃ tatpitaraḥ pibanti devāśca saumyāśca tathaiva kāvyāḥ // MatsP_126.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:11234: sūryeṇa gobhirhi vivardhitābhir adbhiḥ punaścaiva samucchritābhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11235: vṛṣṭyābhivṛṣṭābhir athauṣadhībhir martyā athānnena kṣudhaṃ jayanti // MatsP_126.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:11236: tṛptiśca tenārdhamāsaṃ surāṇāṃ māsaṃ sudhābhiḥ svadhayā pitṝṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:11237: annena jīvantyaniśaṃ manuṣyāḥ sūryaḥ śritaṃ taddhi bibharti gobhiḥ // MatsP_126.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:11240: harir haridbhir hriyate turaṃgamaiḥ pibatyathāpo haribhiḥ sahasradhā /
GP12mtp176pu:11241: punaḥ pramuñcatyatha tāśca yo hariḥ sa muhyamāno haribhisturaṃgamaiḥ // MatsP_126.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:11249: āvṛto vālakhilyaiśca bhramate rātryahāni tu // MatsP_126.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11253: vīthyāśrayāṇi carati nakṣatrāṇi tathā śaśī // MatsP_126.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:11262: ajaśca tripathaścaiva vṛṣo vājī naro hayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11265: evaṃ candramasaṃ devaṃ vahanti smāyugakṣayam // MatsP_126.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:11266: devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ somaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:11267: somasya śuklapakṣādau bhāskare parataḥ sthite // MatsP_126.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:11268: āpūryate paro bhāgaḥ somasya tu ahaḥkramāt /
GP12mtp176pu:11269: tataḥ pītakṣayaṃ somaṃ yupagadvyāpayan raviḥ // MatsP_126.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:11273: tasmāddhrasanti vai kṛṣṇe śukle hyāpyāyayanti ca // MatsP_126.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:11279: pibantyambumayaṃ devā madhu saumyaṃ tathāmṛtam // MatsP_126.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11285: trayaśca triṃśatā sārdhaṃ trayastriṃśacchatāni tu // MatsP_126.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:11287: ityevaṃ pīyamānasya kṛṣṇe vardhanti tāḥ kalāḥ // MatsP_126.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:11288: kṣīyante ca tāḥ śuklāḥ kṛṣṇā hyāpyāyayanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11294: pibanti dvikalaṃ kālaṃ śiṣṭāstāstu kalāstu yāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11297: saumyā barhiṣadaścaiva agniṣvāttāśca ye smṛtāḥ // MatsP_126.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:11298: kāvyāścaiva tu ye proktāḥ pitaraḥ sarva eva te /
GP12mtp176pu:11299: saṃvatsarāśca ye kāvyāḥ pañcābdā vai dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_126.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:11302: pitṛbhiḥ pīyamānāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ tu vai kalām /
GP12mtp176pu:11303: yāvacca kṣīyate tasmād bhāgaḥ pañcadaśastu saḥ // MatsP_126.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:11304: amāvāsyāṃ tathā tasya antarā pūryate paraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11305: vṛddhikṣayau vai pakṣādau ṣoḍaśyāṃ śaśinaḥ mṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:11306: evaṃ sūryanimitte te kṣayavṛddhī niśākare // MatsP_126.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:11311: atha tejomayaḥ śubhraḥ somaputrasya vai rathaḥ // MatsP_127.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11313: śvetaḥ piśaṅgaḥ sāraṅgo nīlaḥ śyāmo vilohitaḥ // MatsP_127.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11320: gaurāśvena tu raukmeṇa syandanena visarpati // MatsP_127.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11322: abdaṃ vasati yo rāśau svadiśaṃ tena gacchati // MatsP_127.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11326: kārṣṇāyasaṃ samāruhya syandanaṃ yātyasau śaniḥ // MatsP_127.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11328: rathaṃ tamomayaṃ tasya vahanti sma sudaṃśitāḥ // MatsP_127.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11333: ete vāhā grahāṇāṃ vai mayā proktā rathaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:11334: sarve dhruve nibaddhāste nibaddhā vātaraśmibhiḥ // MatsP_127.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11335: ete vai bhrāmyamāṇāste yathāyogaṃ vahanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:11338: yāvattamanuparyeti dhruvaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ // MatsP_127.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11341: tasmādyāni pragṛhyante vyomni devagṛhā iti // MatsP_127.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11343: sarvā dhruvanibaddhāstā bhramantyo bhrāmayanti ca // MatsP_127.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11344: tailapīḍaṃ yathā cakraṃ bhramate bhrāmayanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:11345: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātabaddhāni sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_127.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11347: yasmātpravahate tāni pravahastena sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_127.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11348: evaṃ dhruve niyukto 'sau bhramate jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11349: eṣa tārāmayaḥ proktaḥ śiśumāre dhruvo divi // MatsP_127.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11350: yadahnā kurute pāpaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā niśi muñcati /
GP12mtp176pu:11357: varuṇaścāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // MatsP_127.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11359: pucche 'gniśca mahendraśca marīciḥ kaśyapo dhruvaḥ // MatsP_127.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11360: eṣa tārāmayaḥ stambho nāstameti na vodayam /
GP12mtp176pu:11365: āgnīdhrakāśyapānāṃ tu teṣāṃ sa paramo dhruvaḥ // MatsP_127.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11373: kathaṃ devagṛhāṇi syuḥ punarjyotīṃṣi varṇaya // MatsP_128.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11378: avyākṛtamidaṃ tvāsīn naiśena tamasā vṛtam // MatsP_128.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11382: jñātvāgniṃ kalpakālādāv apaḥ pṛthvīṃ ca saṃśritā // MatsP_128.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11384: pācako yastu loke 'smin pārthivaḥ so 'gnirucyate // MatsP_128.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11385: yaścāsau tapate sūrye śuciragniśca sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11388: kāṣṭhendhanastu nirmathyaḥ so 'dbhiḥ śāmyati pāvakaḥ // MatsP_128.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11390: yaścāsau maṇḍale śukle nirūṣmā na prakāśate // MatsP_128.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11391: prabhā saurī tu pādena astaṃ yāti divākare /
GP12mtp176pu:11393: udite tu punaḥ sūrye ūṣmāgnestu samāviśat /
GP12mtp176pu:11394: pādena tejasaścāgnes tasmāt saṃtapate divā // MatsP_128.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11395: prākāśyaṃ ca tathauṣṇyaṃ ca sauryāgneye tu tejasī /
GP12mtp176pu:11397: uttare caiva bhūmyardhe tathā hyasmiṃstu dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:11398: uttiṣṭhati punaḥ sūrye rātrirāviśate hy apaḥ // MatsP_128.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11400: astaṃ gate punaḥ sūrye aharvai praviśaty apaḥ // MatsP_128.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11401: tasmānnaktaṃ punaḥ śuklā hy āpo dṛśyanti bhāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11404: yaścāsau tapate sūryaḥ so 'paḥ pibati raśmibhiḥ // MatsP_128.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11406: ādatte sa tu nāḍīnāṃ sahasreṇa samantataḥ // MatsP_128.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11415: śuklāśca kakubhaścaiva gāvo viśvasṛtaśca yāḥ // MatsP_128.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11417: saṃbibhrati hi tāḥ sarvā manuṣyāndevatāḥ pitṝn // MatsP_128.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:11420: vasante caiva grīṣme ca śanaiḥ saṃtapate tribhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11421: varṣāsu ca śaradyevaṃ caturbhiḥ saṃpravarṣati // MatsP_128.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11422: hemante śiśire caiva himotsargas tribhiḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11423: oṣadhīṣu balaṃ dhatte sudhāṃ ca svadhayā punaḥ // MatsP_128.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11425: evaṃ raśmisahasraṃ tu sauraṃ lokārthasādhakam // MatsP_128.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:11427: ityevaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuklaṃ bhāsvaraṃ lokasaṃjñitam // MatsP_128.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11429: candra ṛkṣagrahāḥ sarve vijñeyāḥ sūryasambhavāḥ // MatsP_128.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11431: harikeśaḥ purastāttu yo vai nakṣatrayonikṛt // MatsP_128.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:11433: viśvāvasuśca yaḥ paścāc chukrayoniśca sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11434: saṃvardhanastu yo raśmiḥ sa yonirlohitasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11435: ṣaṣṭhastu hyaśvabhū raśmir yoniḥ sa hi bṛhaspateḥ // MatsP_128.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11437: na kṣīyate yatastāni tasmānnakṣatratā smṛtā // MatsP_128.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:11439: kṣetrāṇi teṣāmādatte sūryo nakṣatratā tataḥ // MatsP_128.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:11442: divyānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vaṃśānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11443: tapanastejaso yogād āditya iti gadyate // MatsP_128.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:11447: śuklatve hyamṛtatve ca śītatve hlādane 'pi ca // MatsP_128.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:11452: tāni devagṛhāṇi syuḥ sthānākhyāni bhavanti hi /
GP12mtp176pu:11453: sauraṃ sūryo 'viśatsthānaṃ saumyaṃ somastathaiva ca // MatsP_128.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:11455: bṛhaspatirbṛhattvaṃ ca lohitaṃ cāpi lohitaḥ // MatsP_128.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:11457: budho 'pi vai budhasthānaṃ bhānuṃ svarbhānureva ca // MatsP_128.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:11459: jyotīṃṣi sukṛtām ete jñeyā devagṛhāstu vai // MatsP_128.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:11461: manvantareṣu sarveṣu devasthānāni tāni vai // MatsP_128.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:11462: abhimānena tiṣṭhanti tāni devāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11463: atītāstu sahātītair bhāvyā bhāvyaiḥ suraiḥ saha // MatsP_128.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11464: vartante vartamānaiśca suraiḥ sārdhaṃ tu sthāninaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11465: sūryo devo vivasvāṃśca aṣṭamastvaditeḥ sutaḥ // MatsP_128.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:11469: budho manoharaścaiva śaśiputrastu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11471: agnirvikeśyāṃ jajñe tu yuvāsau lohitādhipaḥ // MatsP_128.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:11477: sahasrāṃśutviṣaḥ sthānam ammayaṃ taijasaṃ tathā // MatsP_128.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:11479: śukraḥ ṣoḍaśaraśmistu yastu devo hyapomayaḥ // MatsP_128.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:11480: lohito navaraśmistu sthānamāpyaṃ tu tasya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:11487: maṇḍalaṃ triguṇaṃ cāsya vistāro bhāskarasya tu // MatsP_128.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:11489: triguṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cāsya vaipulyācchaśinaḥ smṛtam // MatsP_128.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:11493: uddhūtya pārthivīṃ chāyāṃ nirmitāṃ maṇḍalākṛtim // MatsP_128.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11494: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ sthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu tamomayam /
GP12mtp176pu:11495: ādityātsa tu niṣkramya somaṃ gacchati parvasu // MatsP_128.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:11497: svabhāsā tudate yasmāt svarbhānuriti sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:11499: viṣkambhānmaṇḍalāccaiva yojanānāṃ tu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:11506: śatāni pañca catvāri trīṇi dve caikameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11507: sarvopari nisṛṣṭāni maṇḍalāni tu tārakāḥ // MatsP_128.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:11509: upariṣṭāttu ye teṣāṃ grahā ye krūrasāttvikāḥ // MatsP_128.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:11513: yāvanti caiva ṛkṣāṇi koṭyastāvanti tārakāḥ // MatsP_128.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:11515: vistīrṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tasyordhvaṃ carate śaśī // MatsP_128.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:11517: nakṣatrebhyo budhaścordhvaṃ budhāccordhvaṃ tu bhārgavaḥ // MatsP_128.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:11521: saptarṣibhyo dhruvaścordhvaṃ samastaṃ tridivaṃ dhruve // MatsP_128.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:11525: grahāśca candrasūryau ca divi divyena tejasā // MatsP_128.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:11528: samāgame ca bhede ca paśyanti yugapatprajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11529: parasparaṃ sthitā hyevaṃ yujyante ca parasparam // MatsP_128.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:11530: asaṃkareṇa vijñeyas teṣāṃ yogastu vai budhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11531: ityevaṃ saṃniveśo vai pṛthivyā jyotiṣāṃ ca yaḥ // MatsP_128.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:11533: varṣāṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca ye ca teṣu vasanti vai // MatsP_128.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:11535: āvartaḥ sāntaro madhye saṃkṣiptaśca dhruvāttu sa // MatsP_128.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:11539: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vai sarvasya jyotirātmakaḥ // MatsP_128.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:11541: teṣāṃ śakyaṃ na saṃkhyātuṃ yāthātathyena kenacit /
GP12mtp176pu:11547: dadāha ca kathaṃ devas tanno vistarato vada // MatsP_129.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11550: devenaikeṣuṇā dagdhaṃ tathā no vada mānada // MatsP_129.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11552: śṛṇudhvaṃ tripuraṃ devo yathā dāritavān bhavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11553: mayo nāma mahāmāyo māyānāṃ janako 'suraḥ // MatsP_129.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11554: nirjitaḥ sa tu saṃgrāme tatāpa paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11555: tapasyantaṃ tu taṃ viprā daityāvanyāvanugrahāt // MatsP_129.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11557: vidyunmālī ca balavāṃs tārakākhyaśca vīryavān // MatsP_129.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11559: lokā iva yathā mūrtās trayas traya ivāgnayaḥ // MatsP_129.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11561: hemante jalaśayyāsu grīṣme pañcatape tathā // MatsP_129.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11563: sevānāḥ phalamūlāni puṣpāṇi ca jalāni ca // MatsP_129.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11572: svakaṃ pitāmahaṃ daityās taṃ vai tuṣṭuvureva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11575: varado 'haṃ hi vo vatsās tapastoṣita āgataḥ // MatsP_129.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11579: deva daityāḥ purā devaiḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye // MatsP_129.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11582: śaraṇaṃ naiva jānīmaḥ śarma vā śaraṇārthinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11583: so 'haṃ tapaḥprabhāvena tava bhaktyā tathaiva ca // MatsP_129.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11585: tasmiṃśca tripure durge matkṛte kṛtināṃ vara // MatsP_129.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11587: devapraharaṇānāṃ ca devānāṃ ca prajāpateḥ // MatsP_129.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11588: alaṅghanīyaṃ bhavatu tripuraṃ yadi te priyam /
GP12mtp176pu:11589: viśvakarmā itīvoktaḥ sa tadā viśvakarmaṇā // MatsP_129.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11593: pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā tadaivaṃ dānavo mayaḥ // MatsP_129.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11596: samaṃ sa saṃyuge hanyād avadhyaṃ śeṣato bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:11597: evamastviti cāpyuktvā mayaṃ devaḥ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_129.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11598: svapne labdho yathārtho vai tatraivādarśanaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:11599: gate pitāmahe daityā gatā mayaraviprabhāḥ // MatsP_129.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:11601: sa mayastu mahābuddhir dānavo vṛṣasattamaḥ // MatsP_129.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11603: kathaṃ nāma bhaveddurgaṃ tanmayā tripuraṃ kṛtam // MatsP_129.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11604: vatsyate tatpuraṃ divyaṃ matto nānyairna saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11605: yathācaikeṣuṇā tena tatpuraṃ na hi hanyate // MatsP_129.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:11607: vistāro yojanaśatam ekaikasya purasya tu // MatsP_129.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11609: puṣyayogeṇa nirmāṇaṃ purāṇaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // MatsP_129.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11613: āyasaṃ tu kṣititale rājataṃ tu nabhastale // MatsP_129.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:11619: satārakākhyena mayena guptaṃ svasthaṃ ca guptaṃ taḍinmālināpi /
GP12mtp176pu:11620: ko nāma hantuṃ tripuraṃ samartho muktvā trinetraṃ bhagavantamekam // MatsP_129.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:11629: rathyoparathyāḥ sattrikā iha catvara eva ca // MatsP_130.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11631: savaṭāni taḍāgāni hy atra vāpyaḥ sarāṃsi ca // MatsP_130.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11635: mayena tatpuraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ tripuraṃ tviti naḥ śrutam // MatsP_130.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11645: puṣyasaṃyogamātreṇa kālena sa mayaḥ purā // MatsP_130.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11647: yena yena mayo yāti prakurvāṇaḥ puraṃ purāt // MatsP_130.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11678: diteḥ sutā daivatarājavairiṇaḥ sahasraśaḥ prāpuranantavikramāḥ // MatsP_130.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11680: babhūva pūrṇaṃ tripuraṃ tathā purā yathāmbaraṃ bhūrijalair jalapradaiḥ // MatsP_130.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11685: taddurgaṃ durgatāṃ prāpa baddhavairaiḥ surāsuraiḥ // MatsP_131.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11687: mayādiṣṭāni viviśur gṛhāṇi hṛṣitāśca te // MatsP_131.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11693: upatasthuḥ payodābhā ye ca giryupajīvinaḥ // MatsP_131.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11695: tasya tasya mayastatra māyayā vidadhāti saḥ // MatsP_131.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11701: nārībhiḥ satataṃ remur muditāścaiva dānavāḥ // MatsP_131.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11703: arthe dharme ca kāme ca nidadhuste matīḥ svayam // MatsP_131.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:11705: vrajati sma sukhaṃ kālaḥ svargasthānāṃ yathā tathā // MatsP_131.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11709: arcayanto diteḥ putrās tripurāyatane haram // MatsP_131.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11713: tripure dānavendrāṇāṃ ramatāṃ śrūyate sadā // MatsP_131.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11717: kaliśca kalahaścaiva tripuraṃ viviśuḥ saha // MatsP_131.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11719: samadhyāsuḥ samaṃ ghorāḥ śarīrāṇi yathāmayāḥ // MatsP_131.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11721: svapne bhayāvahā dṛṣṭā āviśantastu dānavān // MatsP_131.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11725: āsīnāḥ kāñcanagireḥ śṛṅge toyamuco yathā // MatsP_131.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11729: upaviṣṭā dṛḍhaṃ viddhā dānavā devaśatravaḥ // MatsP_131.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11731: mayo māyāvijanaka ityuvāca sa dānavān // MatsP_131.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11733: niśāmayadhvaṃ svapno 'yaṃ mayā dṛṣṭo bhayāvahaḥ // MatsP_131.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11737: praviṣṭāḥ sma śarīrāṇi bhūtvā bahuśarīriṇaḥ // MatsP_131.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11739: sagṛhaṃ saha yuṣmābhiḥ sāgarāmbhasi majjitam // MatsP_131.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11740: ulūkaṃ rucirā nārī nagnārūḍhā kharaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11741: saha strībhirhasantī ca cumbane pramadā yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11743: yena sā pramadā nunnā ahaṃ caiva vibodhitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11744: īdṛśī pramadā dṛṣṭā mayā cātibhayāvahā // MatsP_131.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11745: eṣa īdṛśakaḥ svapno dṛṣṭo vai ditinandanāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11746: dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ hi kaṣṭāya asurāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_131.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11747: yadi vo 'haṃ kṣamo rājā yadidaṃ vettha ceddhitam /
GP12mtp176pu:11748: nibodhadhvaṃ sumanaso na cāsūyitum arhatha // MatsP_131.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:11749: kāmaṃ cerṣyāṃ ca kopaṃ ca asūyāṃ saṃvihāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11750: satye dame ca dharme ca munivāde ca tiṣṭhata // MatsP_131.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:11752: yadi nāmāsya svapnasya hy evaṃ coparamo bhavet // MatsP_131.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:11754: bhaviṣyāṇi ca dṛśyante yato nastripure 'surāḥ // MatsP_131.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:11758: krodherṣyāvasthayā yuktā dṛśyante ca vināśagāḥ // MatsP_131.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:11762: hitvā satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca akāryāṇyupacakramuḥ // MatsP_131.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:11763: dviṣanti brāhmaṇānpuṇyān na cārcanti hi devatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11764: guruṃ caiva na manyante hy anyonyaṃ cāpi cukrudhuḥ // MatsP_131.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:11765: kalaheṣu ca sajjante svadharmeṣu hasanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11766: parasparaṃ ca nindanti ahamityeva vādinaḥ // MatsP_131.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:11770: bhakṣayanti ca śeranta ucchiṣṭāḥ saṃvṛtāstathā // MatsP_131.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:11774: bhāryāṃ gatvā na śudhyanti rahovṛttiṣu nistrapāḥ // MatsP_131.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11779: vaibhrājaṃ nandanaṃ caiva tathā caitrarathaṃ vanam /
GP12mtp176pu:11780: aśokaṃ ca varāśokaṃ sarvartukamathāpi ca // MatsP_131.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11792: ādityā vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ pitaro marutāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11799: dānavānāṃ bhayāttadvad bhramāmo hi pitāmaha // MatsP_132.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11803: dānavairlomamohāndhaiḥ kriyante ca bhramanti ca // MatsP_132.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11804: yadi na trāyase lokaṃ dānavairvidrutaṃ drutam /
GP12mtp176pu:11807: pratyāha tridaśān sendrān indutulyānanaḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_132.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:11808: bhayasya yo varo datto mayā matimatāṃ varāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11809: tasyānta eṣa samprāpto yaḥ purokto mayā surāḥ // MatsP_132.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11812: bhavatāṃ ca na paśyāmi kamapyatra surarṣabhāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11813: yastu caikaprahāreṇa puraṃ hanyāt sadānavam // MatsP_132.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11814: tripuraṃ nālpavīryeṇa śakyaṃ hantuṃ śareṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11815: ekaṃ muktvā mahādevaṃ maheśānaṃ prajāpatim // MatsP_132.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11816: te yūyaṃ yadi anye ca kratuvidhvaṃsakaṃ haram /
GP12mtp176pu:11817: yācāmaḥ sahitā devaṃ tripuraṃ sa haniṣyati // MatsP_132.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11818: kṛtaḥ purāṇāṃ viṣkambho yojamānāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GP12mtp176pu:11819: yathā caikaprahāreṇa hanyate vai bhavena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11820: puṣyayogeṇa yuktāni tāni caikakṣaṇena tu // MatsP_132.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11821: tato devaiśca samprokto yāsyāma iti duḥkhitaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11824: paśyanti comayā sārdhaṃ nandinā ca mahātmanā // MatsP_132.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11828: āgamya tamajaṃ devam atha taṃ nīlalohitam /
GP12mtp176pu:11831: namo bhavāya śarvāya rudrāya varadāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11832: paśūnāṃ pataye nityam ugrāya ca kapardine // MatsP_132.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11851: prajāpatimuvācedaṃ devānāṃ kva bhayaṃ mahat // MatsP_133.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11852: bho devāḥ svāgataṃ vo 'stu brūta yadvo manogatam /
GP12mtp176pu:11853: tāvadeva prayacchāmi nāstyadeyaṃ mayā hi vaḥ // MatsP_133.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11854: yuṣmākaṃ nitarāṃ śaṃ vai kartāhaṃ vibudharṣabhāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11855: carāmi mahadatyugraṃ yaccāpi paramaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_133.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11856: vidviṣṭā vo mama dviṣṭāḥ kaṣṭāḥ kaṣṭaparākramāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11857: teṣāmabhāvaḥ saṃpādyo yuṣmākaṃ bhava eva ca // MatsP_133.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11859: rudramāhurmahābhāgaṃ bhāgārhāḥ sarva eva te // MatsP_133.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11861: asurairvadhyamānāḥ sma vayaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // MatsP_133.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11862: mayo nāma diteḥ putras trinetra kalahapriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11863: tripuraṃ yena taddurgaṃ kṛtaṃ pāṇḍuragopuram // MatsP_133.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11866: udyānāni ca bhagnāni nandanādīni yāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11872: ye rathā ye gajāścaiva yāḥ striyo vasu yacca naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11873: tanno vyapahṛtaṃ daityaiḥ saṃśayo jīvite punaḥ // MatsP_133.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11877: tadahaṃ tripuraṃ dhakṣye kriyatāṃ yadbravīmi tat // MatsP_133.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11883: adhiṣṭhānaṃ śiro meror akṣo mandara eva ca // MatsP_133.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11884: cakruścandraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca cakre kāñcanarājate /
GP12mtp176pu:11891: varūthaṃ gaganaṃ cakruś cārurūpaṃ rathasya te // MatsP_133.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11895: vitastā ca vipāśā ca yamunā gaṇḍakī tathā // MatsP_133.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11896: sarasvatī devikā ca tathā ca sarayūrapi /
GP12mtp176pu:11897: etāḥ saridvarāḥ sarvā veṇusaṃjñā kṛtā rathe // MatsP_133.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11898: dhṛtarāṣṭrāśca ye nāgās te ca veśyātmakāḥ kṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11899: vāsukeḥ kulajā ye ca ye ca raivatavaṃśajāḥ // MatsP_133.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11902: surasā saramā kadrūr vinatā śucireva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11903: tṛṣā bubhukṣā sarvogrā mṛtyuḥ sarvaśamastathā // MatsP_133.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11905: gadā bhūtvā śaktayaśca tadā devarathe 'bhyayuḥ // MatsP_133.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11909: dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa nāgena baddhaṃ balavatā mahat // MatsP_133.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11920: pratoda oṃkāra evāsīt tadagraṃ ca vaṣaṭkṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:11921: sinīvālī kuhū rākā tathā cānumatiḥ śubhā /
GP12mtp176pu:11926: ajarā jyābhavaccāpi sāmbikā dhanuṣo dṛḍhā // MatsP_133.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:11927: kālo hi bhagavānrudras taṃ ca saṃvatsaraṃ viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11935: kṛtvā devā rathaṃ cāpi divyaṃ divyaprabhāvataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11940: praśasya devānsādhviti rathaṃ paśyati śaṃkaraḥ // MatsP_133.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11944: īdṛśo rathasampattyā yantā śīghraṃ vidhīyatām // MatsP_133.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:11946: avāpurmahatīṃ cintāṃ kathaṃ kāryamiti bruvan // MatsP_133.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11947: mahādevasya devo 'nyaḥ ko nāma sadṛśo bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:11948: muktvā cakrāyudhaṃ devaṃ so 'pyasyeṣuṃ samāśritaḥ // MatsP_133.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:11949: dhuri yuktā ivokṣāṇo ghaṭanta iva parvataiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11950: niśvasantaḥ surāḥ sarve kathametaditi bruvan // MatsP_133.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:11954: pratodahastaṃ samprekṣya brahmāṇaṃ sūtatāṃ gatam // MatsP_133.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:11956: sadṛśaḥ sūta ityuktvā cāruroha rathaṃ haraḥ // MatsP_133.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:11957: ārohati rathaṃ deve hy aśvā harabharāturāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11958: jānubhiḥ patitā bhūmau rajogrāsaśca grāsitaḥ // MatsP_133.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:11960: ujjahāra pitṝnārtān suputra iva duḥkhitān // MatsP_133.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:11964: svayambhūḥ prayayau vāhān anumantrya yathājavam // MatsP_133.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:11966: mukhebhyaḥ sasṛjuḥ śvāsān ucchvasanta ivoragāḥ // MatsP_133.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:11968: vrajanti te 'śvā javanāḥ kṣayakāla ivānilāḥ // MatsP_133.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:11970: ākramya nandī vṛṣabhas tasthau tasmiñchivecchayā // MatsP_133.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11972: rathacakre tu rakṣete rudrasya priyakāṅkṣiṇau // MatsP_133.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:11974: śarahasto rathaṃ pāti śayanaṃ brahmaṇastadā // MatsP_133.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:11977: mayūraṃ śatacandraṃ ca kūjantaṃ kiṃnaraṃ yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11978: guha āsthāya varado yugopamarathaṃ pituḥ // MatsP_133.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:11982: anujagmū rathaṃ śārvaṃ nakrā iva mahārṇavam // MatsP_133.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:11986: rathastripure sakāñcanācalo vrajati sapakṣa ivādrirambare // MatsP_133.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:11988: pramathagaṇāḥ parivārya devaguptaṃ rathamabhitaḥ prayayuḥ svadarpayuktāḥ // MatsP_133.69 //*
GP12mtp176pu:11994: pūjyamāne rathe tasmiṃl lokairdeve rathe sthite /
GP12mtp176pu:11995: pramatheṣu nadatsūgraṃ pravadatsu ca sādhviti // MatsP_134.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11997: jayatsu vipreṣu tathā garjatsu turageṣu ca // MatsP_134.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12000: autpātikaṃ tu daityānāṃ tripure vartate dhruvam /
GP12mtp176pu:12006: teṣāṃ sa pūjāṃ pūjārhaḥ pratigṛhya tapodhanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12009: yathārhaṃ dānavaiḥ sārdham āsīno dānavādhipaḥ // MatsP_134.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12013: vartate vartamānajña vada tvaṃ hi ca nārada // MatsP_134.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12014: dṛśyante bhayadāḥ svapnā bhajyante ca dhvajāḥ param /
GP12mtp176pu:12015: vinā ca vāyunā ketuḥ patate ca tathā bhuvi // MatsP_134.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12017: hiṃsa hiṃseti śrūyante giraśca bhayadāḥ pure // MatsP_134.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12019: muktvaikaṃ varadaṃ sthāṇuṃ bhaktābhayakaraṃ haram // MatsP_134.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12023: kathayasva muniśreṣṭha prapannasya tu nārada // MatsP_134.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12027: dharmeti dhāraṇe dhātur māhātmye caiva paṭhyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12028: dhāraṇācca mahattvena dharma eṣa nirucyate // MatsP_134.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12032: vināśastasya nirdeśya iti vedavido viduḥ // MatsP_134.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:12034: apakāriṣu devānāṃ kuruṣe tvaṃ sahāyatām // MatsP_134.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:12036: vaināśikāni dṛśyante dānavānāṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_134.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12038: āyāti tripuraṃ hantuṃ maya tvāmasurānapi // MatsP_134.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12039: sa tvaṃ mahaujasaṃ nityaṃ prapadyasva maheśvaram /
GP12mtp176pu:12040: yāsyase saha putreṇa dānavaiḥ saha mānada // MatsP_134.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12043: nārade tu munau yāte mayo dānavanāyakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12045: śūrāḥ stha jātaputrāḥ stha kṛtakṛtyāḥ stha dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12046: yudhyadhvaṃ daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ kartavyaṃ cāpi no bhayam // MatsP_134.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:12052: tiṣṭhadhvaṃ laṅghanīyāni bhaviṣyanti purāṇi ca // MatsP_134.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:12053: namogatāstathā śūrā devatā viditā hi vaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12054: tāḥ prayatnena vāryāśca vidāryāścaiva sāyakaiḥ // MatsP_134.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12056: yuvatijanaviṣaṇṇamānasaṃ tat tripurapuraṃ sahasā viveśa rājā // MatsP_134.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12059: mayamabhayapadaiṣiṇaṃ prapannaṃ na kila bubodha tṛtīyadīptanetraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12060: tadabhimatamadāttataḥ śaśāṅkī sa ca kila nirbhaya eva dānavo 'bhūt // MatsP_134.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12065: āgatya caiva tripurāt sabhāyāmāsthitaḥ svayam // MatsP_135.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12067: yatra yajño balervṛtto baliryatra ca saṃyataḥ // MatsP_135.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12070: devānāṃ yatra vṛttāni kanyādānāni yāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12071: reme nityaṃ bhavo yatra sahāyaiḥ pārṣadairgaṇaiḥ // MatsP_135.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12080: ime ca toyadābhāsā danujā vikṛtānanāḥ // MatsP_135.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12081: nirgacchanti puro daityāḥ sāyudhā vijayaiṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_135.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:12082: sa tvaṃ suraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sasahāyo varāyudhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12085: puraḥ purasya randhrārthī sthāsyāmi vijayāya vaḥ // MatsP_135.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12086: yadā tu puṣyayogeṇa ekatvaṃ sthāsyate puram /
GP12mtp176pu:12089: yayau tattripuraṃ jetuṃ tena sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ // MatsP_135.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12093: utpatya dudruvuśceluḥ sāyudhāḥ khe gaṇeśvarān // MatsP_135.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12103: kecin nadanti danujās toyamattā ivāmbudāḥ // MatsP_135.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:12109: tiṣṭhate tripuraṃ pīḍya dehaṃ vyādhirivocchritaḥ // MatsP_135.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12110: ya eṣo 'sti sa eṣo 'stu kā cintā sambhrame sati /
GP12mtp176pu:12111: ehi āyudham ādāya kva me pṛcchā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_135.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12126: mṛtāḥ stha kva nu yāsyadhvaṃ haniṣyāmo nivartatām /
GP12mtp176pu:12142: jayatīndraśca rudraśca ityeva ca gaṇeśvarāḥ // MatsP_135.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:12148: dṛḍhāhatāḥ patan pūrvaṃ dānavāḥ pramathāstathā // MatsP_135.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:12152: nadanto meghaśabdena śarabhā iva roṣitāḥ // MatsP_135.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12156: saśastrā nipatanti sma sapakṣā iva bhūdharāḥ // MatsP_135.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:12158: vidyunmālī mayaścaiva magnau ca drumavadraṇe // MatsP_135.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12160: ādāya parighaṃ ghoraṃ tāḍayāmāsa nandinam // MatsP_135.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12162: bhramate madhunā vyaktaḥ purā nārāyaṇo yathā // MatsP_135.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12168: bhittvā bhittvā rurāvoccair nabhasyambudharo yathā // MatsP_135.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:12170: saṃjñāṃ prāpya tataḥ so 'pi vidyunmālinamādravat // MatsP_135.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:12172: vajraṃ vajranibhāṅgasya dānavasya sasarja ha // MatsP_135.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:12174: papāta vakṣasi tadā vajraṃ daityasya bhīṣaṇam // MatsP_135.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:12182: kartavyaṃ na viduḥ kiṃcid vandyamādhārmikā iva // MatsP_135.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12184: satarūṇāṃ girīṇāṃ vai tulyarūpadharo babhau // MatsP_135.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12186: virejurbhujagā mantrair vāryamāṇā yathā tathā // MatsP_135.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:12188: bhramanti bahuśabdālāḥ pañjare śakunā iva // MatsP_135.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:12190: dadāha ca balaṃ sarvaṃ śuṣkendhanamivānalaḥ // MatsP_135.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:12193: gaṇeśā vidhurā jātā jīrṇamūlā yathā drumāḥ // MatsP_135.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:12198: te tārakākhyena mayena māyayā saṃmuhyamānā vivaśā gaṇeśvarāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12199: nāśaknuvaṃste manasāpi ceṣṭituṃ yathendriyārthā muninābhisaṃyatāḥ // MatsP_135.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:12203: tataḥ surāṇāṃ pravarābhirakṣituṃ riporbalaṃ saṃviviśuḥ sahāyudhāḥ // MatsP_135.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:12204: yamo gadāstro varuṇaśca bhāskaras tathā kumāro 'marakoṭisaṃyutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12205: svayaṃ ca śakraḥ sitanāgavāhanaḥ kulīśapāṇiḥ suralokapuṃgavaḥ // MatsP_135.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:12206: sa coḍunāthaḥ sasuto divākaraḥ sa sāntakastryakṣapatir mahādyutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12207: ete ripūṇāṃ prabalābhirakṣitaṃ tadā balaṃ saṃviviśurmadoddhatāḥ // MatsP_135.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:12208: yathā vanaṃ darpitakuñjarādhipā yathā nabhaḥ sāmbudharaṃ divākaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12209: yathā ca siṃhairvijaneṣu gokulaṃ tathā balaṃ tattridaśair abhidrutam // MatsP_135.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:12211: svarjyotiṣāṃ jyotir ivoṣmavān harir yathā tamo ghorataraṃ narāṇām // MatsP_135.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:12212: viśāntayāmāsa yathā sadaiva niśākaraḥ saṃcitaśārvaraṃ tamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12213: tato 'pakṛṣṭe ca tamaḥprabhāve astraprabhāve ca vivardhamāne // MatsP_135.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:12215: saṃkhye vibhagnā vikarā vipādāś chinnottamāṅgāḥ śarapūritāṅgāḥ // MatsP_135.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:12216: devetarā devavarairvibhinnāḥ sīdanti paṅkeṣu yathā gajendrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12217: vajreṇa bhīmena ca vajrapāṇiḥ śaktyā ca śaktyā ca mayūraketuḥ // MatsP_135.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:12218: daṇḍena cogreṇa ca dharmarājaḥ pāśena cogreṇa ca vārigoptā /
GP12mtp176pu:12219: śūlena kālena ca yakṣarājo vīryeṇa tejasvitayā sukeśaḥ // MatsP_135.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:12221: utsādayante danuputravṛndān yathaiva indrāśanayaḥ patantyaḥ // MatsP_135.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:12223: śareṇa bhittvā sa hi tārakāsutaṃ sa tārakākhyāsuram ābabhāṣe // MatsP_135.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:12224: kṛtvā prahāraṃ praviśāmi vīraṃ puraṃ hi daityendrabalena yuktaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12225: viśrāmamūrjaskaramapyavāpya punaḥ kariṣyāmi raṇaṃ prapannaiḥ // MatsP_135.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:12229: viveśa tūrṇaṃ tripuraṃ diteḥ sutaiḥ sutairadityā yudhi vṛddhaharṣaiḥ // MatsP_135.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:12235: mayaḥ prahāraṃ kṛtvā tu māyāvī dānavarṣabhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12236: viveśa tūrṇaṃ tripuram abhraṃ nīlamivāmbaram // MatsP_136.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12238: dadhyau lokakṣaye prāpte kālaṃ kāla ivāparaḥ // MatsP_136.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12240: sa cāpi nidhanaṃ prāpto vidyunmālī mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_136.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12241: durgaṃ vai tripurasyāsya na samaṃ vidyate puram /
GP12mtp176pu:12242: tasyāpyeṣo 'nayaḥ prāpto na durgaṃ kāraṇaṃ kvacit // MatsP_136.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12243: kālasyaiva vaśe sarvaṃ durgaṃ durgataraṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:12244: kāle kruddhe kathaṃ kālāt trāṇaṃ no 'dya bhaviṣyati // MatsP_136.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:12245: ekeṣu triṣu yatkiṃcid balaṃ vai sarvajantuṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:12246: kālasya tadvaśaṃ sarvam iti paitāmaho vidhiḥ // MatsP_136.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12248: laṅghane kaḥ samarthaḥ syād ṛte devaṃ maheśvaram // MatsP_136.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12249: bibhemi nendrāddhi yamād varuṇānna ca vittapāt /
GP12mtp176pu:12250: svāmī caiṣāṃ tu devānāṃ durjayaḥ sa maheśvaraḥ // MatsP_136.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12251: aiśvaryasya phalaṃ yattat prabhutvasya ca yatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:12255: iti saṃcintya balavān mayo māyāvināṃ varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12256: māyayā sasṛje vāpīṃ rambhāmiva pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_136.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12265: tāṃ vāpīṃ sṛjya sa mayo gaṅgāmiva maheśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12271: kva nandī saha rudreṇa vṛtaḥ pramathajambukaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12272: yudhyāmo 'rīn viniṣpīḍya dayā deheṣu kā hi naḥ // MatsP_136.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:12274: tairvā vinihatā yuddhe bhaviṣyāmo yamāśanāḥ // MatsP_136.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:12276: taṃ pariṣvajya sārdrākṣa idamāha mahāsuraḥ // MatsP_136.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12277: vidyunmālinna me rājyam abhipretaṃ na jīvitam /
GP12mtp176pu:12278: tvayā vinā mahābāho kimanyena mahāsura // MatsP_136.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12281: diṣṭyā tvāṃ daitya paśyāmi yamalokād ihāgatam /
GP12mtp176pu:12283: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ vāpīṃ māyayā mayanirmitām /
GP12mtp176pu:12287: tataḥ kṣubdhāmbudhinibhā bherī sā tu bhayaṃkarī /
GP12mtp176pu:12288: vādyamānā nanādoccai rauravī sā punaḥ punaḥ // MatsP_136.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12295: nṛtyamānā iva naṭā garjanta iva toyadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12296: karocchrayā iva gajāḥ siṃhā iva ca nirbhayāḥ // MatsP_136.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12297: hradā iva ca gambhīrāḥ sūryā iva pratāpitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12298: drumā iva ca daityendrās trāsayanto balaṃ mahat // MatsP_136.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:12302: cakruḥ saṃhatya saṃgrāmaṃ codyamānā balena ca // MatsP_136.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12310: śirāṃsyurvyāṃ patanti sma girikūṭā ivātyaye // MatsP_136.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:12328: hatānapi hi vo vāpī punarujjīvayiṣyati // MatsP_136.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12332: uttiṣṭhanti punarbhīmāḥ sasyā iva jalokṣitāḥ // MatsP_136.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12334: nihatā nihatā yatra kṣiptā jīvanti dānavāḥ // MatsP_136.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12340: dānavā niḥsṛtā dṛṣṭvā devadevarathe suram // MatsP_136.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:12346: śaithilyaṃ yāti sa rathaḥ sneho viprakṛto yathā // MatsP_136.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:12350: vṛṣarūpaṃ mahatkṛtvā rathaṃ jagrāha durdharam // MatsP_136.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:12352: pragṛhyodvahate sajjaṃ kulaṃ kulavaho yathā // MatsP_136.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12354: abhyadravattadā devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ hatavāṃśca saḥ // MatsP_136.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12356: vijajvāla muhurbrahmā śvāsaṃ vaktrāt samudgiran // MatsP_136.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:12360: dititanayabalaṃ vimardya sarvaṃ tripurapuraṃ praviveśa keśavaḥ // MatsP_136.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:12362: suragururapibatpayo 'mṛtaṃ tad raviriva saṃcitaśārvaraṃ tamo 'ndham // MatsP_136.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:12364: nardamāno mahābāhuḥ praviveśa śaraṃ tataḥ // MatsP_136.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:12366: parāṅmukhā bhīmamukhaiḥ kṛtā raṇe yathā nayābhyudyatatatparairnaraiḥ // MatsP_136.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:12367: sa tārakākhyas taḍinmālireva ca mayena sārdhaṃ pramathairabhidrutāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12368: puraṃ parāvṛtya nu te śarārditā yathā śarīraṃ pavanodaye gatāḥ // MatsP_136.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:12370: vineduruccairjahasuśca durmadā jayema candrādidigīśvaraiḥ saha // MatsP_136.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:12376: śīrṇadaṃṣṭrā yathā nāgā bhagnaśṛṅgā yathā vṛṣāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12377: yathā vipakṣāḥ śakunā nadyaḥ kṣīṇodakā yathā // MatsP_137.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12379: babhūvuste vimanasaḥ kathaṃ kāryamiti bruvan // MatsP_137.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12382: kṛtvā yuddhāni ghorāṇi pramathaiḥ saha sāmaraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12383: toṣayitvā tathā yuddhe pramathānamaraiḥ saha // MatsP_137.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:12387: yatra nāma mahābhāgāḥ praviśanti girervanam // MatsP_137.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12388: aho hi kālasya balam aho kālo hi durjayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12391: babhūvurniṣprabhā daityā grahā indūdaye yathā // MatsP_137.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:12394: yā sāmṛtarasā gūḍhā vāpī vai nirmitā tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:12397: vāpī sā sāmprataṃ dṛṣṭā mṛtasaṃjñā ivāṅganā // MatsP_137.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12400: mayā māyābalakṛtā vāpī pītā tviyaṃ yadi /
GP12mtp176pu:12401: vinaṣṭāḥ sma na saṃdehas tripuraṃ dānavā gatam // MatsP_137.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:12403: pītā vā yadi vā vāpī pītā vai pītavāsasā // MatsP_137.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12407: yatra madvarakauśalyaṃ vijñātaṃ na vṛtaṃ budhaiḥ // MatsP_137.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12414: yudhyatāṃ nighnatāṃ śatrūn bhītānāṃ ca draviṣyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:12417: tripureṇa yayau tūrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ sindhubāndhavam // MatsP_137.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12422: pitāmaha dṛḍhaṃ bhītā bhagavandānavā hi naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12423: vipulaṃ sāgaraṃ te tu dānavāḥ samupāśritāḥ // MatsP_137.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:12424: yata eva hi te yātās tripureṇa tu dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12425: tata eva rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ prāpayasva pitāmaha // MatsP_137.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:12426: siṃhanādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā devā devarathaṃ ca tam /
GP12mtp176pu:12431: tripuramabhisamīkṣya devatā vividhabalā nanaduryathā ghanāḥ // MatsP_137.29 //*
GP12mtp176pu:12435: tridaśagaṇapatirhyuvāca śakraṃ tripuragataṃ sahasā nirīkṣya śatrum // MatsP_137.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12437: yamavaruṇakuberaṣaṇmukhaistat saha gaṇapairapi hanmi tāvadeva // MatsP_137.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:12438: vihitaparabalābhighātabhūtaṃ vraja jaladhestu yataḥ purāṇi tasthuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12439: sa rathavaragato bhavaḥ samartho hy udadhimagāttripuraṃ punarnihantum // MatsP_137.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12440: iti parigaṇayanto diteḥ sutā hy avatasthurlavaṇārṇavopariṣṭāt /
GP12mtp176pu:12450: lokapālā yayuḥ sarve gaṇapālāśca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_138.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12457: ājagmuḥ paramaṃ kṣobham atyayeṣviva sāgarāḥ // MatsP_138.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12465: śaṃsanta iva nāgendrā bhramanta eva pakṣiṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12466: girīndrā iva kampanto garjanta iva toyadāḥ // MatsP_138.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12467: jṛmbhanta iva śārdūlāḥ garjanta iva toyadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12470: yuyudhurniścalā bhūtvā vajrā iva mahācalaiḥ // MatsP_138.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12472: kālānugānāṃ meghānāṃ yathā viyati vāyunā // MatsP_138.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12473: āhuśca yuddhe mā bhaiṣīḥ kva yāsyasi mṛto hyasi /
GP12mtp176pu:12474: praharāśu sthito 'smyatra ehi darśaya pauruṣam // MatsP_138.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12475: gṛhāṇa chinddhi bhinddhīti khāda māraya dāraya /
GP12mtp176pu:12487: bhramante bhakṣayantaśca dānavānāṃ ca lohitam // MatsP_138.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:12491: ambare 'mbhasi ca tathā yuddhaṃ cakrurjalecarāḥ // MatsP_138.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:12492: yathā bhramanti pramathāḥ sadaityās tathā bhramante timayaḥ sanakrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12493: yathaiva chindanti parasparaṃ tu tathaiva krandanti vibhinnadehāḥ // MatsP_138.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12495: kṛto muhūrtena samudradeśaḥ saraktatoyaḥ samudīrṇatoyaḥ // MatsP_138.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12496: pūrvaṃ mahāmbhodharaparvatābhaṃ dvāraṃ mahāntaṃ tripurasya śakraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12497: nipīḍya tasthau mahatā balena yukto 'marāṇāṃ mahatā balena // MatsP_138.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12501: devāriṇastasya purasya dvāraṃ tābhyāṃ tu tatpaścimato niruddham // MatsP_138.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:12505: prahlādarūpāḥ pramathāvaruddhā jyotīṃṣi meghā iva cāśmavarṣāḥ // MatsP_138.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12507: prakṣipya prakṣipya samudramadhye kālāmbudābhāḥ pramathā vineduḥ // MatsP_138.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:12509: gṛhāṇi he nātha pitaḥ suteti bhrāteti kānteti priyeti cāpi /
GP12mtp176pu:12510: utpāṭyamāneṣu gṛheṣu nāryas tv anāryaśabdānvividhānpracakruḥ // MatsP_138.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:12512: mahāsurāḥ sāgaratulyavegā gaṇeśvarāḥ kopavṛtāḥ pratīyuḥ // MatsP_138.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12514: śarīrasadmakṣapaṇaṃ sughoraṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ dṛḍhavairabaddham // MatsP_138.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12515: anyonyamuddiśya vimardatāṃ ca pradhāvatāṃ caiva vinighnatāṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12517: vraṇairajasraṃ kṣatajaṃ vamantaḥ kopoparaktā bahudhā nadantaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12518: gaṇeśvarāste 'surapuṃgavāśca yudhyanti śabdaṃ ca mahadudgirantaḥ // MatsP_138.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12520: kṛtā muhūrtena sukhena gantuṃ chinnottamāṅgāṅghrikarāḥ karālāḥ // MatsP_138.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12521: kopāvṛtākṣaḥ sa tu tārakākhyaḥ saṃkhye savṛkṣaḥ sagirirnilīnaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12522: tasminkṣaṇe dvāravaraṃ rirakṣo ruddhaṃ bhavenādbhutavikrameṇa // MatsP_138.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:12523: sa tatra prākārāgatāṃśca bhūtāñ chātan mahānadbhutavīryasattvaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12524: cacāra cāptendriyagarvadṛptaḥ purādviniṣkramya rarāsa ghoram // MatsP_138.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:12525: tataḥ sa daityottamaparvatābho yathāñjasā nāga ivābhimattaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12526: nivārito rudrarathaṃ jighṛkṣur yathārṇavaḥ sarpati cātivelaḥ // MatsP_138.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12527: śeṣaḥ sudhanvā giriśaśca devaś caturmukho yaḥ sa trilocanaśca /
GP12mtp176pu:12528: te tārakākhyābhigatā gatājau kṣobhaṃ yathā vāyuvaśātsamudrāḥ // MatsP_138.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:12529: śeṣo girīśaḥ sapitāmaheśaś cotkṣubhyamāṇaḥ sa rathe 'mbarasthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12530: bibheda saṃdhīṣu balābhipannaḥ kūjanninādāṃśca karoti ghorān // MatsP_138.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:12531: ekaṃ tu ṛgvedaturaṃgamasya pṛṣṭhe padaṃ nyasya vṛṣasya caikam /
GP12mtp176pu:12532: tasthau bhavaḥ sodyatabāṇacāpaḥ purasya tatsaṅgasamīkṣamāṇaḥ // MatsP_138.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:12534: petuḥ stanāśca dantāśca pīḍitābhyāṃ triśūlinā // MatsP_138.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:12535: tataḥprabhṛti cāśvānāṃ stanā dantā gavāṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:12540: takṣayāmāsa vai takṣā candanaṃ gandhado yathā // MatsP_138.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12542: dudrāva khaḍgaṃ niṣkṛṣya tārakākhyo gaṇeśvaram // MatsP_138.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:12543: yajñopavītam ādāya cicheda ca nanāda ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12548: bahuvadanavatāṃ kimeṣa śabdo nadatāṃ śrūyate bhinnasāgarābhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12549: vada vacanaṃ taḍinmālin kiṃ kim etadgaṇapālā yuyudhuryayurgajendrāḥ // MatsP_138.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12551: raṇaśirasi samāgataḥ surāṇāṃ nijagādedam ariṃdamo 'tiharṣāt // MatsP_138.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12553: sakalasamaraśīrṣaparvatendro yuddhvā yastapati hi tārako gaṇendraiḥ // MatsP_138.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12556: iti suhṛdo vacanaṃ niśamya tat tvaṃ taḍimāleḥ sa mayaḥ suvarṇamālī /
GP12mtp176pu:12557: raṇaśirasy asitāñjanācalābho jagade vākyamidaṃ navendumālim // MatsP_138.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:12562: yena yena tato vidyun mālī yāti mayaśca saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12563: tena tena puraṃ śūnyaṃ pramathaiḥ prahṛtaiḥ kṛtam // MatsP_138.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:12565: sakaratalapuṭaiśca siṃhanādair bhavamabhipūjya tadā surā avatasthuḥ // MatsP_138.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:12567: abhiṣṭutaḥ satyaratais tapodhanair yathāstaśṛṅgābhigato divākaraḥ // MatsP_138.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:12572: uvāca dānavānbhūyo bhūyaḥ sa tu bhayāvṛtān // MatsP_139.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12574: yatkartavyaṃ mayā caiva yuṣmābhiśca mahābalaiḥ // MatsP_139.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12576: yadaikaṃ tripuraṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇamekaṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_139.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12578: sa kālaḥ puṣyayogasya purasya ca mayā kṛtaḥ // MatsP_139.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12580: sa enaṃ kārayeccūrṇaṃ balinaikaiṣuṇā suraḥ // MatsP_139.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:12581: yo vaḥ prāṇo balaṃ yacca yā ca vo vairitāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12582: tatkṛtvā hṛdaye caiva pālayadhvamidaṃ puram // MatsP_139.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12590: tathā kurmo yathā rudro na mokṣyati pure śaram // MatsP_139.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12592: kathayanti diteḥ putrā hṛṣṭā bhinnatanūruhāḥ // MatsP_139.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12593: kalpaṃ sthāsyati vā khasthaṃ tripuraṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam /
GP12mtp176pu:12595: vayaṃ na dharmaṃ hāsyāmo yasminyokṣyasi no bhavān /
GP12mtp176pu:12596: adaivatam adaityaṃ vā lokaṃ drakṣyanti mānavāḥ // MatsP_139.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12600: tamāṃsyutsārya bhagavāṃś candro jṛmbhati so 'mbaram // MatsP_139.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12602: siṃho yathā copaviṣṭo vaiḍūryaśikhare mahān // MatsP_139.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:12605: bhrājate bhrājayaṃl lokān sṛjañjyotsnārasaṃ balāt // MatsP_139.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12607: pradoṣe lalitaṃ cakrur gṛhamātmānameva ca // MatsP_139.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:12610: tadā maṭheṣu te dīpāḥ snehapūrṇāḥ pradīpitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12614: upadravaiḥ kulamiva pīyate tripure tamaḥ // MatsP_139.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12616: ratyarthino vai danujā gṛheṣu sahāṅganābhiḥ suciraṃ viremuḥ // MatsP_139.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12617: vinoditā ye tu vṛṣadhvajasya pañceṣavaste makaradhvajena /
GP12mtp176pu:12619: kalapralāpeṣu ca dānavīnāṃ vīṇāpralāpeṣu ca mūrchiteṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:12620: mattapralāpeṣu ca kokilānāṃ sacāpabāṇo madano mamantha // MatsP_139.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12621: tamāṃsi naiśāni drutaṃ nihatya jyotsnāvitānena jagadvitatya /
GP12mtp176pu:12622: khe rohiṇīṃ tāṃ ca priyāṃ sametya candraḥ prabhābhiḥ kurute 'dhirājyam // MatsP_139.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:12623: sthitvaiva kāntasya tu pādamūle kācidvarastrī svakapolamūle /
GP12mtp176pu:12624: viśeṣakaṃ cārutaraṃ karoti tenānanaṃ svaṃ samalaṃkaroti // MatsP_139.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:12625: dṛṣṭvānanaṃ maṇḍaladarpaṇasthaṃ mahāprabhā me mukhajeti japtvā /
GP12mtp176pu:12626: smṛtvā varāṅgī ramaṇeritāni tenaiva bhāvena ratīmavāpa // MatsP_139.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12628: svayaṃ drutaṃ yānti madābhibhūtāḥ kṣapā yathā cārkadināvasāne // MatsP_139.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:12629: pepīyate cātirasānuviddhā vimārgitānyā ca priyaṃ prasannā /
GP12mtp176pu:12632: manojñarūpā rucirā babhūvuḥ pūrṇāmṛtasyeva suvarṇakumbhāḥ // MatsP_139.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12633: kṣatādharoṣṭhā drutadoṣaraktā lalanti daityā dayitāsu raktāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12634: tantrīpralāpāstripureṣu raktāḥ strīṇāṃ pralāpeṣu punarviraktāḥ // MatsP_139.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12635: kvacitpravṛttaṃ madhurābhigānaṃ kāmasya bāṇaiḥ sukṛtaṃ nidhānam /
GP12mtp176pu:12636: āpānabhūmīṣu sukhaprameyaṃ geyaṃ pravṛttaṃ tvatha sādhayanti // MatsP_139.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:12637: geyaṃ pravṛttaṃ tvatha śodhayanti kecitpriyāṃ tatra ca sādhayanti /
GP12mtp176pu:12638: kecitpriyāṃ samprati bodhayanti saṃbudhya saṃbudhya ca rāmayanti // MatsP_139.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12639: dhūtaprasūnaprabhavaḥ subandhaḥ sūrye gate vai tripure babhūva /
GP12mtp176pu:12640: samarmaro nūpuramekhalānāṃ śabdaśca saṃbādhati kokilānām // MatsP_139.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12644: mādhuryabhūtābharaṇā mahāntaḥ svanā babhūvurmadaneṣu tulyāḥ // MatsP_139.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:12645: pānena khinnā dayitātivelaṃ kapolamājighrasi kiṃ mamedam /
GP12mtp176pu:12646: āroha me śroṇimimāṃ viśālāṃ pīnonnatāṃ kāñcanamekhalāḍhyām // MatsP_139.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12648: daityāṅganā yūthagatā vibhānti tārā yathā candramaso divānte // MatsP_139.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:12649: aṭṭāṭṭahāseṣu ca cāmareṣu preṅkhāsu cānyā madalolabhāvāt /
GP12mtp176pu:12650: saṃdolayante kalasamprahāsāḥ provāca kāñcī guṇasūkṣmanādā // MatsP_139.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:12652: śrūyanti vācaḥ kaladhautakalpā vāpīṣu cānye kalahaṃsaśabdāḥ // MatsP_139.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:12658: dolābhūmistairvicitrā vibhāti candrasya pārśvopagatair vicitrā // MatsP_139.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:12659: sacandrike sopavane pradoṣe ruteṣu vṛndeṣu ca kokilānām /
GP12mtp176pu:12660: śaravyayaṃ prāpya pure 'surāṇāṃ prakṣīṇabāṇo madanaścacāra // MatsP_139.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12661: iti tatra pure 'maradviṣāṇāṃ sapadi hi paścimakaumudī tadāsīt /*
GP12mtp176pu:12662: raṇaśirasi parābhaviṣyatāṃ vai bhavaturagaiḥ kṛtasaṃkṣayā arīṇām // MatsP_139.45 //*
GP12mtp176pu:12664: vichāyatāṃ hi samupetya na bhāti tadvad bhāgyakṣaye dhanapatiśca naro vivarṇaḥ // MatsP_139.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:12666: sthitvodayāgramukuṭe bahureva sūryo bhātyambare timiratoyavahāṃ tariṣyan // MatsP_139.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12670: udite tu sahasrāṃśau merau bhāsākare ravau /
GP12mtp176pu:12671: nadaddevabalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yugānta iva sāgaraḥ // MatsP_140.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12673: savittadaḥ savaruṇas tripuraṃ prayayau haraḥ // MatsP_140.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12677: babhūva tadbalaṃ divyaṃ vanaṃ pracalitaṃ yathā // MatsP_140.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12681: śarāsanāni vajrāṇi gurūṇi musalāni ca // MatsP_140.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12683: nijaghnuḥ parvataghnāya ghanā iva tapātyaye // MatsP_140.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12695: timinakragaṇe caiva patanti pramathāḥ surāḥ // MatsP_140.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12710: yadi tvidānīṃ me jīvan mucyase nandikeśvara /
GP12mtp176pu:12715: śakto hantuṃ kimātmānaṃ jātidoṣād vibṛṃhasi // MatsP_140.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12717: idānīṃ vā kathaṃ nāma na hiṃsye kratudūṣaṇam // MatsP_140.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12719: so 'pi māṃ śaknuyānnaiva cakṣurbhyāṃ samavekṣitum // MatsP_140.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12726: vāyununnaḥ sa ca taruḥ śīrṇapuṣpo mahāravaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12731: dudrāva hantuṃ sa krūraṃ mahiṣaṃ gajarāḍiva // MatsP_140.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12735: arergṛhya rathaṃ tasya mahataḥ prayayau javāt // MatsP_140.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:12739: ājaghāna tadā śaktyā śailādiṃ samavasthitam // MatsP_140.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12745: sādhu sādhviti coktvā te pūjayanta umāpatim // MatsP_140.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12746: nandinā sādite daitye vidyunmālau hate mayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12750: atha vajradharo yamo 'rthadaḥ sa ca nandī sa ca ṣaṇmukho guhaḥ /*
GP12mtp176pu:12752: nāgaṃ tu nāgādhipateḥ śatākṣaṃ mayo vidāryeṣuvareṇa tūrṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:12753: yamaṃ ca vittādhipatiṃ ca viddhvā rarāsa mattāmbudavattadānīm // MatsP_140.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:12755: bhṛśānuviddhāstripuraṃ praveśitā yathā śivaścakradhareṇa saṃyuge // MatsP_140.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:12757: kapardisainye prababhuḥ samantato nipātyamānā yudhi vajrasaṃnibhāḥ // MatsP_140.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:12759: babhūva cāpi saṃyuktaṃ tadyogena puratrayam // MatsP_140.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12760: tato bāṇaṃ tridhā devas tridaivatamayaṃ haraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12763: ākāśaṃ svarṇasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtaṃ sūryeṇa rañjitam // MatsP_140.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:12765: dhigdhiṅ māmiti cakranda kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamiti bruvan // MatsP_140.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12767: kimidaṃ tviti papraccha śūlapāṇiṃ maheśvaram // MatsP_140.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12769: uvāca nandinaṃ bhaktaḥ sa mayo 'dya vinaṅkṣyati // MatsP_140.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12771: śare tripuramāyāti tripuraṃ praviveśa saḥ // MatsP_140.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12772: sa mayaṃ prekṣya gaṇapaḥ prāha kāñcanasaṃnibhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12774: anenaiva gṛheṇa tvam apakrāma bravīmyaham // MatsP_140.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:12778: tridhā iva hutāśaśca somo nārāyaṇastathā // MatsP_140.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:12791: dahyante dānavendrāṇām agninā hyapi tāḥ striyaḥ // MatsP_140.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12793: puraḥ priyasya pañcatvaṃ gatāgnivadane kṣayam // MatsP_140.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12796: dharmasākṣī trilokasya na māṃ spraṣṭumihārhasi // MatsP_140.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:12797: śāyitaṃ ca mayā deva śivayā ca śivaprabha /
GP12mtp176pu:12798: pareṇa praihi muktvedaṃ gṛhaṃ ca dayitaṃ hi me // MatsP_140.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:12805: tāta putreti māteti mātuleti ca vihvalam /
GP12mtp176pu:12812: babhūva kāñcīguṇanūpurāṇām ākranditānāṃ ca ravo 'timiśraḥ // MatsP_140.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:12814: dagdhāni dagdhāni gṛhāṇi tatra patanti rakṣārthamivārṇavaughe // MatsP_140.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:12816: kuputradoṣaiḥ prahatānuviddhaṃ yathā kulaṃ yāti dhanānvitasya // MatsP_140.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:12820: taireva sārdhaṃ bhavanaiḥ papāta śabdaṃ mahāntaṃ janayansamudre // MatsP_140.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:12821: sahasraśṛṅgair bhavanair yadāsīt sahasraśṛṅgaḥ sa ivācaleśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12823: pradahyamānena pureṇa tena jagat sapātāladivaṃ prataptam /
GP12mtp176pu:12824: duḥkhaṃ mahatprāpya jalāvamagnaṃ yasminmahānsaudhavaro mayasya // MatsP_140.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:12829: yasya yasya tu deśasya bhaviṣyati parābhavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12830: drakṣyanti tripuraṃ khaṇḍaṃ tatredaṃ nāśagā janāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12834: tasya no gatimākhyāhi mayasya camasodbhava // MatsP_140.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:12837: devadviṭ tu mayaścātaḥ sa tadā khinnamānasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12838: tataścyuto 'nyaloke 'smiṃs trāṇārthaṃ vai cakāra saḥ // MatsP_140.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:12840: tatrāśaktaṃ tato gantuṃ taṃ caikaṃ puramuttamam // MatsP_140.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:12841: śivaḥ sṛṣṭvā gṛhaṃ prādān mayāyaiva gṛhārthine /
GP12mtp176pu:12843: pūjyamānaṃ ca bhūteśaṃ sarve tuṣṭuvurīśvaram // MatsP_140.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:12844: sampūjyamānaṃ tridaśaiḥ samīkṣya gaṇairgaṇeśādhipatiṃ tu mukhyam /
GP12mtp176pu:12845: harṣād vavalgur jahasuśca devā jagmurnanardustu viṣaktahastāḥ // MatsP_140.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:12846: pitāmahaṃ vandya tato maheśaṃ pragṛhya cāpaṃ pravimṛjya bhūtān /
GP12mtp176pu:12847: rathācca saṃpatya hareṣudagdhaṃ kṣiptaṃ puraṃ tanmakarālaye ca // MatsP_140.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:12849: vijayaṃ tasya kṛtyeṣu dadāti vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ // MatsP_140.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:12850: pitṝṇāṃ vāpi śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ śrāvayiṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:12851: anantaṃ tasya puṇyaṃ syāt sarvayajñaphalapradam // MatsP_140.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:12852: idaṃ svastyayanaṃ puṇyam idaṃ puṃsavanaṃ mahat /
GP12mtp176pu:12853: idaṃ śrutvā paṭhitvā ca yānti rudrasalokatām // MatsP_140.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:12857: kathaṃ gacchatyamāvāsyāṃ māsi māsi divaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12858: ailaḥ purūravāḥ sūta tarpayeta kathaṃ pitṝn /
GP12mtp176pu:12859: etadicchāmahe śrotuṃ prabhāvaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_141.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12861: etadeva tu papraccha manuḥ sa madhusūdanam /
GP12mtp176pu:12862: sūryaputrāya covāca yathā tanme nibodhata // MatsP_141.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12864: tasya cāhaṃ pravakṣyāmi prabhāvaṃ vistareṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12865: ailasya divi saṃyogaṃ somena saha dhīmatā // MatsP_141.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12867: saumyā barhiṣadaḥ kāvyā agniṣvāttāstathaiva ca // MatsP_141.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12872: abhivādya tu tau tatra kālāpekṣaḥ sa tiṣṭhati /
GP12mtp176pu:12873: pracaskanda tataḥ somam arcayitvā pariśramāt // MatsP_141.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12875: tataḥ sa divi somaṃ vai hy upatasthe pitṝnapi // MatsP_141.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12876: dvilavaṃ kuhūmātraṃ ca tāvubhau tu nidhāya saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12879: tamupāsya tataḥ somaṃ kalāpekṣī pratīkṣate // MatsP_141.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12880: svadhāmṛtaṃ tu somādvai vasaṃsteṣāṃ ca tṛptaye /
GP12mtp176pu:12883: sadyo 'bhikṣaratā tena saumyena madhunā ca saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12884: nivāpeṣvatha datteṣu pitryeṇa vidhinā tu vai // MatsP_141.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12886: saumyā barhiṣadaḥ kāvyā agniṣvāttāstathaiva ca // MatsP_141.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12887: ṛturagniḥ smṛto viprair ṛtuṃ saṃvatsaraṃ viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12888: jajñire ṛtavastasmād ṛtubhyo hyārtavā abhavan // MatsP_141.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:12891: prapitāmahāḥ smṛtā devāḥ pañcābdā brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_141.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12892: saumyā barhiṣadaḥ kāvyā agniṣvāttā iti tridhā /
GP12mtp176pu:12893: gṛhasthā ye tu yajvāno haviryajñārtavāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:12894: smṛtā barhiṣadaste vai purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ // MatsP_141.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:12905: etattadamṛtaṃ somam avāpa madhu caiva hi // MatsP_141.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12907: āpyāyate suṣumnena somaṃ tu somapāyinam // MatsP_141.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12908: niḥśeṣā vai kalāḥ pūrvā yugapad vyāpayan purā /
GP12mtp176pu:12910: kalāḥ kṣīyanti kṛṣṇāstāḥ śuklā hyāpyāyayanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12911: evaṃ sā sūryavīryeṇa candrasyāpyāyitā tanuḥ // MatsP_141.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12914: devaiḥ pītasudhaṃ somaṃ purā paścātpibedraviḥ // MatsP_141.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:12918: tasmāddhrasanti vai kṛṣṇāḥ śuklā hyāpyāyayanti ca // MatsP_141.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12919: evamāpyāyate somaḥ kṣayite ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12923: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi parvaṇāṃ saṃdhayaśca yāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12925: tathābdamāsāḥ pakṣāśca śuklāḥ kṛṣṇāstu vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12926: paurṇamāsyāstu yo bhedo granthayaḥ saṃdhayastathā // MatsP_141.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12930: sāyāhne anumatyāśca dvau lavau kāla ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12931: lavau dvāveva rākāyāḥ kālo jñeyo 'parāhṇikaḥ // MatsP_141.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12933: sāyāhne pratipadyeṣa sa kālaḥ paurṇamāsikaḥ // MatsP_141.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12935: yugāntarodite caiva candre lekhopari sthite // MatsP_141.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:12937: tau tu vai pratipadyāvat tasminkāle vyavasthitau // MatsP_141.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:12939: sa caiva satkriyākālaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ kālo 'bhidhīyate // MatsP_141.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12947: rañjanāccaiva candrasya rāketi kavayo viduḥ // MatsP_141.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:12949: ekā pañcadaśī rātrir amāvāsyā tataḥ smṛtā // MatsP_141.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:12951: anyonyaṃ candrasūryau tu darśanāddarśa ucyate // MatsP_141.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:12952: dvau dvau lavāvamāvāsyāṃ sa kālaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:12953: dvyakṣaraḥ kuhūmātraśca parvakālastu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_141.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12955: divā tadūrdhvaṃ rātryāṃ tu sūrye prāpte tu candramāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12956: sūryeṇa sahasodgacchet tataḥ prātastanāttu vai // MatsP_141.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:12960: sa tadānvāhuteḥ kālo darśasya ca vaṣaṭkriyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12961: etadṛtumukhaṃ jñeyam amāvāsyāṃ tu pārvaṇam // MatsP_141.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12962: divā parva tvamāvāsyāṃ kṣīṇendau dhavale tu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12963: tasmāddivā tvamāvāsyāṃ gṛhyate yo divākaraḥ // MatsP_141.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12965: tatkālasaṃjñitā hyeṣā amāvāsyā kuhūḥ smṛtā // MatsP_141.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12967: amāvāsyā viśatyarkaṃ sinīvālī tadā smṛtā // MatsP_141.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12969: etāsāṃ dvilavaḥ kālaḥ kuhūmātrā kuhūḥ smṛtā // MatsP_141.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:12970: ityeṣa parvasaṃdhīnāṃ kālo vai dvilavaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12975: arkanirmaṇḍale some parvakālaḥ kalāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_141.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:12976: yasmād āpūryate somaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ tu pūrṇimā /
GP12mtp176pu:12978: tasmātpañcadaśe some kalā vai nāsti ṣoḍaśī /
GP12mtp176pu:12979: tasmātsomasya viproktaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ mayā kṣayaḥ // MatsP_141.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:12983: teṣāṃ gatiṃ ca sattatvaṃ prāptiṃ śrāddhasya caiva hi // MatsP_141.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:12984: na mṛtānāṃ gatiḥ śakyā jñātuṃ vā punarāgatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12985: tapasā hi prasiddhena kiṃ punarmāṃsacakṣuṣā // MatsP_141.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12987: teṣāṃ te dharmasāmarthyāt smṛtāḥ sāyujyagā dvijaiḥ // MatsP_141.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12989: anye cātra prasīdanti śraddhāyukteṣu karmasu // MatsP_141.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:12991: śrāddhena vidyayā caiva cānnadānena saptadhā // MatsP_141.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:12992: karmasveteṣu ye saktā vartanty ā dehapātanāt /
GP12mtp176pu:12994: svargatā divi modante pitṛmanta upāsate // MatsP_141.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:12995: prajāvatāṃ prasiddhaiṣā uktā śrāddhakṛtāṃ ca vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12996: teṣāṃ nivāpe dattaṃ hi tatkulīnaistu bāndhavaiḥ // MatsP_141.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:12998: ete manuṣyāḥ pitaro māsaśrāddhabhujastu vai // MatsP_141.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:12999: tebhyo 'pare tu ye tvanye saṃkīrṇāḥ karmayoniṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:13007: sthāneṣu pātyamānā ye yātanāstheṣu teṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13010: tatrasthānāṃ tu teṣāṃ vai duḥkhitānām aśāyinām // MatsP_141.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13014: aprāptā yātanāsthānaṃ prabhraṣṭā ye ca pañcadhā /
GP12mtp176pu:13015: paścādye sthāvarānte vai bhūtānīke svakarmabhiḥ // MatsP_141.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:13017: yadāhārā bhavantyete tāsu tāsviha yoniṣu // MatsP_141.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:13018: tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tadāhāre śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ tu prīṇayet /
GP12mtp176pu:13021: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāsu vatso vindati mātaram /
GP12mtp176pu:13022: tathā śrāddheṣu dṛṣṭānto mantraḥ prāpayate tu tam // MatsP_141.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13025: gatāgatajñaḥ pretānāṃ prāptiṃ śrāddhasya caiva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:13027: ityete pitaro devā devāśca pitaraśca vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13028: anyonyapitaro hyete devāśca pitaro divi // MatsP_141.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:13029: ete tu pitaro devā manuṣyāḥ pitaraśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:13032: etatpitṛmahattvaṃ hi purāṇe niścayaṃ gatam // MatsP_141.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:13034: avāptiṃ śraddhayā caiva pitṝṇāṃ caiva tarpaṇam // MatsP_141.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:13035: parvaṇāṃ caiva yaḥ kālo yātanāsthānameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13040: vistareṇānupūrvyācca bhūyaḥ kiṃ kathayāmi vaḥ // MatsP_141.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:13045: eṣāṃ nisargasaṃkhyāṃ ca śrotumicchāma vistarāt // MatsP_142.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:13053: kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caiva triṃśacca kāṣṭhāṃ gaṇayetkalāṃ tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13054: triṃśatkalāścaiva bhavenmuhūrtas taistriṃśatā rātryahanī samete // MatsP_142.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:13056: rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇāmahaḥ // MatsP_142.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13057: pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13058: kṛṣṇapakṣas tvahasteṣāṃ śuklaḥ svapnāya śarvarī // MatsP_142.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13059: triṃśadye mānuṣā māsāḥ pitryo māsaḥ sa ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13060: śatāni trīṇi māsānāṃ ṣaṣṭyā cābhyadhikāni tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13061: pitryaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa vibhāvyate // MatsP_142.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:13063: pitṝṇāṃ tāni varṣāṇi saṃkhyātāni tu trīṇi vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13064: daśa ca dvyadhikā māsāḥ pitṛsaṃkhyeha kīrtitā // MatsP_142.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:13065: laukikena pramāṇena abdo yo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13069: ete rātryahanī divye prasaṃkhyāte tayoḥ punaḥ // MatsP_142.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13070: triṃśadyāni tu varṣāṇi divyo māsastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13071: mānuṣāṇāṃ śataṃ yacca divyā māsāstrayastu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13072: tathaiva saha saṃkhyāto divya eṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_142.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13074: divyaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_142.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13077: nava yāni sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13081: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu prāhuḥ saṃkhyāvido janāḥ // MatsP_142.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13085: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaivaṃ caturyugam // MatsP_142.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13087: dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva yugāni parikalpayet // MatsP_142.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:13089: tasya tāv acchatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaśca tathāvidhaḥ // MatsP_142.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:13091: ekapāde nivartante sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // MatsP_142.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13093: tasyāpi triśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaḥ saṃdhyayā samaḥ // MatsP_142.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:13094: dve sahasre dvāparaṃ tu saṃdhyāṃśau tu catuḥśatam /
GP12mtp176pu:13096: dve śate ca tathānye ca saṃdhyāsaṃdhyāṃśayoḥ smṛte // MatsP_142.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13098: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti catuṣṭayam // MatsP_142.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:13100: niyutāni daśa dve ca pañca caivātra saṃkhyayā /
GP12mtp176pu:13102: prayutaṃ tu tathā pūrṇaṃ dve cānye niyute punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13104: tretāyugasya saṃkhyaiṣā mānuṣeṇa tu saṃjñitā // MatsP_142.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:13107: catvāri niyutāni syur varṣāṇi tu kaliryugam /
GP12mtp176pu:13111: caturyugasya saṃkhyātā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśakaiḥ saha // MatsP_142.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:13115: ekatriṃśattathā koṭyaḥ saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyayā dvijaiḥ // MatsP_142.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:13117: sahasrāṇi tu dvātriṃśac chatānyaṣṭādhikāni ca // MatsP_142.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:13121: sahasrāṇāṃ śatānyāhuḥ sa ca vai parisaṃkhyayā // MatsP_142.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13123: manvantarasya kālastu yugaiḥ saha prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_142.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13127: tatastu pralayaḥ kṛtsnaḥ sa tu saṃpralayo mahān // MatsP_142.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:13129: caturyugākhyā vyākhyātā kṛtaṃ tretāyugaṃ ca vai // MatsP_142.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:13131: yugapatsamavetau dvau dvidhā vaktuṃ na śakyate // MatsP_142.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:13136: śrautasmārtaṃ bruvandharmaṃ brahmaṇā tu pracoditāḥ // MatsP_142.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13146: ādikalpe tu devānāṃ prādurbhūtāstu te svayam // MatsP_142.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:13149: te mantrā vai punasteṣāṃ pratimāyāmupasthitāḥ // MatsP_142.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:13151: saptarṣibhiśca ye proktāḥ smārtaṃ tu manurabravīt // MatsP_142.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:13161: kriyāvantaḥ prajāvantaḥ samṛddhāḥ sukhinaśca vai // MatsP_142.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:13168: sarvasādhāraṇaṃ hyetad āsīttretāyuge tu vai // MatsP_142.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:13170: saṃhitāśca tathā mantrā ārogyaṃ dharmaśīlatā // MatsP_142.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:13171: saṃhitāśca tathā mantrā ṛṣibhir brahmaṇaḥ sutaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13172: yajñaḥ pravartitaścaiva tadā hyeva tu daivataiḥ // MatsP_142.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:13175: svāyambhuve 'ntare devais te yajñāḥ prākpravartitāḥ // MatsP_142.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:13176: satyaṃ japastapo dānaṃ pūrvadharmo ya ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13177: yadā dharmasya hrasate śākhādharmasya vardhate // MatsP_142.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:13178: jāyante ca tadā śūrā āyuṣmanto mahābalāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13184: nyagrodhau tu smṛtau bāhū vyāmo nyagrodha ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13185: vyāmena sūcchrayo yasya ata ūrdhvaṃ tu dehinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13188: proktāni sapta ratnāni pūrvaṃ svāyambhuve 'ntare // MatsP_142.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:13190: manvantareṣu sarveṣu hy atītānāgateṣu vai // MatsP_142.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:13194: atyadbhutāni catvāri balaṃ dharmaṃ sukhaṃ dhanam // MatsP_142.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:13196: artho dharmaśca kāmaśca yaśo vijaya eva ca // MatsP_142.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:13198: śrutena tapasā caiva ṛṣīṃste 'bhibhavanti hi // MatsP_142.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:13201: keśāḥ sthitā lalāṭena jihvā ca parimārjanī /
GP12mtp176pu:13208: antarikṣe samudreṣu pātāle parvateṣu ca // MatsP_142.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:13209: ijyā dānaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ tretādharmāstu vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13213: eko vedaścatuṣpādas tretāyāṃ tu vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13214: trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi jīvante tatra tāḥ prajāḥ // MatsP_142.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:13216: eṣa tretāyuge bhāvas tretāsaṃkhyāṃ nibodhata // MatsP_142.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13218: saṃdhyāpādaḥ svabhāvācca yo 'ṃśaḥ pādena tiṣṭhati // MatsP_142.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13223: pūrve svāyambhuve sarge yathāvatprabravīhi naḥ // MatsP_143.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:13225: kālākhyāyāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ prāpte tretāyuge tadā // MatsP_143.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13227: pratiṣṭhitāyāṃ vārttāyāṃ grāmeṣu ca pureṣu ca // MatsP_143.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:13232: mantrānvai yojayitvā tu ihāmutra ca karmasu /
GP12mtp176pu:13237: hūyamāne devahotre agnau bahuvidhaṃ haviḥ // MatsP_143.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:13240: ālabdheṣu ca madhye tu tathā paśugaṇeṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13241: āhūteṣu ca deveṣu yajñabhukṣu tatastadā // MatsP_143.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:13243: tānyajanti tadā devāḥ kalyādiṣu bhavanti ye // MatsP_143.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13246: viśvabhujaṃ te tvapṛcchan kathaṃ yajñavidhistava // MatsP_143.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13248: navaḥ paśuvidhistviṣṭas tava yajñe surottama // MatsP_143.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13250: nāyaṃ dharmo hyadharmo 'yaṃ na hiṃsā dharma ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13258: jaṅgamaiḥ sthāvaraiḥ kena yaṣṭavyamiti cocyate // MatsP_143.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:13259: te tu khinnā vivādena śaktyā yuktā maharṣayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13260: saṃdhāya samamindreṇa papracchuḥ khacaraṃ vasum // MatsP_143.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13263: auttānapāde prabrūhi saṃśayaṃ nastuda prabho // MatsP_143.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:13269: hiṃsā svabhāvo yajñasya iti me darśanāgamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13270: tathaite bhāvitā mantrā hiṃsāliṅgā maharṣibhiḥ // MatsP_143.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:13272: tatpramāṇaṃ mayā coktaṃ tasmācchamitum arhatha // MatsP_143.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13273: yadi pramāṇaṃ svānyeva mantravākyāṇi vo dvijāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13274: tathā pravartatāṃ yajño hy anyathā mānṛtaṃ vacaḥ // MatsP_143.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:13275: evaṃ kṛtottarāste tu yujyātmānaṃ tato dhiyā /
GP12mtp176pu:13282: bahudhārasya dharmasya sūkṣmā duranugā gatiḥ // MatsP_143.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13283: tasmānna niścayādvaktuṃ dharmaḥ śakyo hi kenacit /
GP12mtp176pu:13285: tasmānna hiṃsā yajñe syād yaduktamṛṣibhiḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:13288: uñchaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ śākam udapātraṃ tapodhanāḥ // MatsP_143.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:13291: brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ śaucam anukrośaṃ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13294: yajñaiśca devānāpnoti vairājaṃ tapasā punaḥ // MatsP_143.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13296: jñānātprāpnoti kaivalyaṃ pañcaitā gatayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_143.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13298: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca pūrve svāyambhuve 'ntare // MatsP_143.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:13299: tataste ṛṣayo dṛṣṭvā hṛtaṃ dharmaṃ balena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13302: śrūyante hi tapaḥsiddhā brahmakṣatrādayo nṛpāḥ // MatsP_143.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:13306: ete cānye ca bahavas te tapobhirdivaṃ gatāḥ // MatsP_143.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:13308: tasmādviśiṣyate yajñāt tapaḥ sarvaistu kāraṇaiḥ // MatsP_143.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13312: tadāprabhṛti yajño 'yaṃ yugaiḥ sārdhaṃ pravartitaḥ // MatsP_143.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13316: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi dvāparasya vidhiṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13317: tatra tretāyuge kṣīṇe dvāparaṃ pratipadyate // MatsP_144.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:13318: dvāparādau prajānāṃ tu siddhistretāyuge tu yā /
GP12mtp176pu:13319: parivṛtte yuge tasmiṃs tataḥ sā vai praṇaśyati // MatsP_144.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13320: tataḥ pravartite tāsāṃ prajānāṃ dvāpare punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13323: yātrā vadhaḥ paro daṇḍo māno darpo 'kṣamā balam // MatsP_144.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:13324: tathā rajastamo bhūyaḥ pravṛtte dvāpare punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13325: ādye kṛte nādharmo 'sti sa tretāyāṃ pravartitaḥ // MatsP_144.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13326: dvāpare vyākulo bhūtvā praṇaśyati kalau punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13327: varṇānāṃ dvāpare dharmāḥ saṃkīryante tathāśramāḥ // MatsP_144.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13329: dvidhā śrutiḥ smṛtiścaiva niścayo nādhigamyate // MatsP_144.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:13334: eko vedaścatuṣpādaḥ saṃhṛtya tu punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13342: anye tu prasthitāstānvai kecit tān pratyavasthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13347: tathaivātharvaṇāṃ sāmnāṃ vikalpaiḥ svasya saṃkṣayaiḥ // MatsP_144.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:13349: dvāpare saṃnivṛtte te vedā naśyanti vai kalau // MatsP_144.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13363: manasā karmaṇā vācā kṛcchrādvārttā prasidhyati // MatsP_144.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:13369: niḥśeṣe dvāpare tasmiṃs tasya saṃdhyā tu pādataḥ // MatsP_144.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13371: tathaiva saṃdhyā pādena aṃśastasyāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // MatsP_144.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:13372: dvāparasya tu paryāye puṣyasya ca nibodhata /
GP12mtp176pu:13375: ete svabhāvāḥ puṣyasya sādhayanti ca tāḥ prajāḥ // MatsP_144.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:13376: eṣa dharmaḥ smṛtaḥ kṛtsno dharmaśca parihīyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13377: manasā karmaṇā vācā vārttāḥ sidhyanti vā na vā // MatsP_144.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:13378: kaliḥ pramārako rogaḥ satataṃ cāpi kṣudbhayam /
GP12mtp176pu:13379: anāvṛṣṭibhayaṃ caiva deśānāṃ ca viparyayaḥ // MatsP_144.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:13380: na pramāṇe sthitirhyasti puṣye ghore yuge kalau /
GP12mtp176pu:13381: garbhastho mriyate kaścid yauvanasthastathā paraḥ // MatsP_144.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13382: sthāvirye madhyakaumāre mriyante ca kalau prajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13388: puṣye bhavanti jantūnāṃ lobho mohaśca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13389: saṃkṣobho jāyate 'tyarthaṃ kalimāsādya vai yugam // MatsP_144.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:13390: nādhīyate tathā vedān na yajante dvijātayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13391: utsīdanti tathā caiva vaiśyaiḥ sārdhaṃ tu kṣatriyāḥ // MatsP_144.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:13395: kāṣāyiṇaśca niṣkacchās tathā kāpālinaśca ha // MatsP_144.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13396: ye cānye devavratinas tathā ye dharmadūṣakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13397: divyavṛttāśca ye kecid vṛttyarthaṃ śrutiliṅginaḥ // MatsP_144.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:13398: evaṃvidhāśca ye kecid bhavantīha kalau yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:13399: adhīyate tadā vedāñ chūdrā dharmārthakovidāḥ // MatsP_144.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13401: strībālagovadhaṃ kṛtvā hatvā caiva parasparam // MatsP_144.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:13405: bhrūṇahatyā prajānāṃ na tathā hyevaṃ pravartate // MatsP_144.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:13407: duḥkhenābhiplutānāṃ ca paramāyuḥ śataṃ nṛṇām // MatsP_144.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:13408: bhūtvā ca na bhavantīha vedāḥ kaliyuge 'khilāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13409: utsīdante tathā yajñāḥ kevalaṃ dharmahetavaḥ // MatsP_144.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:13411: yuge yuge tu hīyante trīṃstrīnpādāṃśca siddhayaḥ // MatsP_144.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:13414: evaṃ saṃdhyāṃśake kāle samprāpte tu yugāntike /
GP12mtp176pu:13415: teṣāmadharmiṇāṃ śāstā bhṛgūṇāṃ ca kule sthitaḥ // MatsP_144.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:13419: aśvakarmā sa vai senāṃ hastyaśvarathasaṃkulām // MatsP_144.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:13421: sa tadā taiḥ parivṛto mlecchānsarvān nijaghnivān // MatsP_144.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:13433: mānavasya tu vaṃśe tu nṛdevasyeha jajñivān // MatsP_144.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:13435: sutaḥ sa vai candramasaḥ pūrve kaliyuge prabhuḥ // MatsP_144.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:13438: kṛtvā bījāvaśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ pṛthvīṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:13440: saṃsthitā sahasā yā tu senā pramatinā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:13443: utsādya pārthivānsarvāṃs teṣvatīteṣu vai tadā // MatsP_144.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:13444: tataḥ saṃdhyāṃśake kāle samprāpte ca yugāntike /
GP12mtp176pu:13446: svāpradānās tadā te vai lobhāviṣṭāstu vṛndaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13449: prajāstā vai tadā sarvāḥ parasparabhayārditāḥ // MatsP_144.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:13450: vyākulāstāḥ parāvṛttās tyaktvā devaṃ gṛhāṇi tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13457: āśrayanti sma pratyantān hitvā janapadānsvakān // MatsP_144.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13461: evaṃ kaṣṭamanuprāptā hy alpaśeṣāḥ prajāstataḥ // MatsP_144.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:13464: tataḥ prajāstu tāḥ sarvā māṃsāhārā bhavanti hi /
GP12mtp176pu:13467: samudraṃ saṃśritā yāstu nadīścaiva prajāstu tāḥ // MatsP_144.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13472: evaṃ varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ divyaṃ teṣāṃ nyavartata /
GP12mtp176pu:13473: ṣaṭtriṃśacca sahasrāṇi mānuṣāṇi tu tāni vai // MatsP_144.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:13475: matsyāścaiva hatāḥ sarvaiḥ kṣudhāviṣṭaiśca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_144.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:13477: saṃdhyāṃśe pratipanne tu niḥśeṣāstu tadā kṛtāḥ // MatsP_144.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:13482: evaṃ kṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti hy alpaśiṣṭāḥ prajāstadā /
GP12mtp176pu:13485: tato varṣaśatasyānte alpaśiṣṭāḥ striyaḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_144.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:13486: mithunāni tu tāḥ sarvā hy anyonyaṃ samprajajñire /
GP12mtp176pu:13487: tatastāstu mriyante vai pūrvotpannāḥ prajāstu yāḥ // MatsP_144.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:13489: yathā svarge śarīrāṇi narake caiva dehinām // MatsP_144.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:13491: evaṃ kṛtasya saṃtānaḥ kaleścaiva kṣayastathā // MatsP_144.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:13495: bhāvino 'rthasya ca balāt tataḥ kṛtamavartata // MatsP_144.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:13499: pravṛtte tu tatastasmin punaḥ kṛtayuge tu vai // MatsP_144.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:13501: tiṣṭhanti ceha ye siddhā adṛṣṭā viharanti ca // MatsP_144.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:13502: saha saptarṣibhirye tu tatra ye ca vyavasthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13503: brahmakṣatraviśaḥ śūdrā bījārthe ya iha smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13505: teṣāṃ saptarṣayo dharmaṃ kathayantīha teṣu ca // MatsP_144.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:13507: evaṃ teṣu kriyāvatsu pravartantīha vai kṛte // MatsP_144.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:13509: te tu dharmavyavasthārthaṃ tiṣṭhantīha kṛte yuge // MatsP_144.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:13512: vanānāṃ prathamaṃ vṛṣṭyā teṣāṃ mūleṣu sambhavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13513: evaṃ yugādyugānāṃ vai saṃtānastu parasparam // MatsP_144.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:13515: sukhamāyurbalaṃ rūpaṃ dharmārthau kāma eva ca // MatsP_144.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:13516: yugeṣvetāni hīyante trayaḥ pādāḥ krameṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13517: ityeṣa pratisaṃdhirvaḥ kīrtitastu mayā dvijāḥ // MatsP_144.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:13519: eṣāṃ caturyugāṇāṃ tu gaṇitā hyekasaptatiḥ // MatsP_144.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:13521: yugākhyāsu tu sarvāsu bhavatīha yadā ca yat // MatsP_144.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:13523: sarge sarge yathā bhedā hy utpadyante tathaiva ca // MatsP_144.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:13525: āsurī yātudhānī ca paiśācī yakṣarākṣasī // MatsP_144.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:13526: yuge yuge tadā kāle prajā jāyanti tāḥ śṛṇu /
GP12mtp176pu:13528: ityetallakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yugānāṃ vai yathākramam // MatsP_144.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:13530: kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ // MatsP_144.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:13532: manvantarāṇi yānyasmin kalpe vakṣyāmi tāni ca // MatsP_144.108 //
