GP12mtp176pu:13536: manvantarāṇi yāni syuḥ kalpe kalpe caturdaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:13539: tasminyuge ca sambhūtir yāsāṃ yāvacca jīvitam // MatsP_145.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13540: yugamātraṃ tu jīvanti nyūnaṃ tatsyāddvayena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13542: manuṣyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ sthāvaraiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:13545: asthitiṃ ca kalau dṛṣṭvā bhūtānāmāyuṣaśca vai // MatsP_145.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13546: paramāyuḥ śataṃ tvetan mānuṣāṇāṃ kalau smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:13548: pariṇāhocchraye tulyā jāyante ha kṛte yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:13555: ā pādatalamastako navatālo bhavettu yaḥ // MatsP_145.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13557: gavāṃ ca hastināṃ caiva mahiṣasthāvarātmanām // MatsP_145.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13562: śatārdhamaṅgulānāṃ tu hy utsedhaḥ śākhināṃ paraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13567: ityeva hi parikrāntā bhāvā ye divyamānuṣāḥ // MatsP_145.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:13568: paśūnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ caiva sthāvarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13569: gāvo 'jāśvāśca vijñeyā hastinaḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāḥ // MatsP_145.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13576: saṃyujya brahmaṇā hyantas tena santaḥ pracakṣate // MatsP_145.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13577: sāmānyeṣu ca dharmeṣu tathā vaiśiṣikeṣu ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13580: śrautasmārto hi yo dharmo jñānadharmaḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_145.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13584: yatamāno yatiḥ sādhuḥ smṛto yogasya sādhanāt // MatsP_145.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:13585: dharmo dharmagatiḥ proktaḥ śabdo hyeṣa kriyātmakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13588: ayaṃ dharmo hyayaṃ neti bruvate maunamūrtinā // MatsP_145.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:13589: dharmeti dhāraṇe dhātur mahattve caiva ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13590: ādhāraṇe mahattve vā dharmaḥ sa tu nirucyate // MatsP_145.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13599: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni brahmaṇo 'ṅgāni vai śrutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13602: evaṃ vai dvividho dharmaḥ śiṣṭācāraḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_145.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13604: manvantareṣu ye śiṣṭā iha tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_145.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13607: taiḥ śiṣṭaiścalito dharmaḥ sthāpyate vai yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:13611: dānaṃ satyaṃ tapo loko vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13612: aṣṭau tāni caritrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:13617: pratyaṅgāni pravakṣyāmi dharmasyeha tu lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13618: dṛṣṭānubhūtamarthaṃ ca yaḥ pṛṣṭo na vigūhate /
GP12mtp176pu:13621: ityetattapaso rūpaṃ sughoraṃ tu durāsadam // MatsP_145.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13623: ṛtvijāṃ dakṣiṇāyāśca saṃyogo yajña ucyate // MatsP_145.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:13625: vartate satataṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kriyā śreṣṭhā dayā smṛtā // MatsP_145.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:13627: aduṣṭo vāṅmanaḥkāyais titikṣuḥ sā kṣamā smṛtā // MatsP_145.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:13629: parasvānām anādānam alobha iti saṃjñitam // MatsP_145.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:13632: ātmārthe vā parārthe vā indriyāṇīha yasya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13633: viṣaye na pravartante damasyaitattu lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:13635: na krudhyeta pratihataḥ sa jitātmā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_145.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:13643: kuśalākuśalābhyāṃ tu prahāṇaṃ nyāsa ucyate // MatsP_145.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:13645: cetanācetanaṃ jñātvā jñāne jñānī sa ucyate // MatsP_145.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:13648: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi vidhiṃ manvantarasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13649: tathaiva cāturhotrasya cāturvarṇyasya caiva hi // MatsP_145.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:13653: dravyastotraṃ guṇastotraṃ karmastotraṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_145.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:13655: manvantareṣu sarveṣu yathā bhedā bhavanti hi // MatsP_145.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:13656: pravartayanti teṣāṃ vai brahmastotraṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13659: ṛṣīṇāṃ tapyatāṃ teṣāṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram // MatsP_145.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:13663: ṛṣīṇāṃ yādṛśatvaṃ hi tadvakṣyāmīha lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:13665: tathā ṛṣīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi ārṣasyeha samudbhavam // MatsP_145.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:13670: pravartate tathā te tu yathā matsyodakāvubhau /
GP12mtp176pu:13678: saṃsiddhikāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sadya eva vivartate // MatsP_145.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:13680: tathā pravṛttāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ kālenaikena kāraṇāt // MatsP_145.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13682: tathā nivṛtto hyavyaktaḥ khadyota iva saṃjvalan // MatsP_145.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:13685: tatraiva saṃsthito vidvāṃs tapaso 'nta iti śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:13690: puri śete yataḥ pūrvaṃ kṣetrajñānaṃ tathāpi ca // MatsP_145.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13692: yasmāddharmātprasūte hi tasmādvai dhārmikastu saḥ // MatsP_145.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13694: evaṃ vivṛttaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetraṃ hyanabhisaṃdhitaḥ // MatsP_145.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:13696: kṣetrajñena parijñātaṃ bhogyo 'yaṃ viṣayo mama // MatsP_145.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:13697: ṛṣirhiṃsāgatau dhātur vidyā satyaṃ tapaḥ śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:13698: eṣa sannilayo yasmād brāhmaṇastutatas tv ṛṣiḥ // MatsP_145.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:13700: ṛṣate paramaṃ yasmāt paramarṣistataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_145.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:13702: yasmādeṣa svayaṃbhūtas tasmācca ṛṣitā matā // MatsP_145.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:13710: ṛṣikāṇāṃ sutā ye tu vijñeyā ṛṣiputrakāḥ // MatsP_145.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:13712: avyaktātmā mahātmā vā-haṃkārātmā tathaiva ca // MatsP_145.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:13716: manurdakṣo vasiṣṭhaśca pulastyaścāpi te daśa // MatsP_145.89 //
GP12mtp176pu:13723: ityete ṛṣayaḥ proktās tapasā ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13728: śṛṅgī ca śaṅkhapāc caiva rājā vaiśravaṇastathā // MatsP_145.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:13729: ityete ṛṣikāḥ sarve satyena ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13730: īśvarā ṛṣayaścaiva ṛṣīkā ye ca viśrutāḥ // MatsP_145.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:13732: bhṛguḥ kāśyapaḥ pracetā dadhīco hyātmavānapi // MatsP_145.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:13746: kakṣīvāṃśca trayastriṃśat smṛtā hyaṅgirasāṃ varāḥ // MatsP_145.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:13748: kāśyapaḥ sahavatsāro naidhruvo nitya eva ca // MatsP_145.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:13751: karṇakaśca ṛṣiḥ siddhas tathā pūrvātithiśca yaḥ // MatsP_145.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:13761: śiśiraśca mahātejāḥ śālaṅkāyana eva ca // MatsP_145.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:13767: bhalandakaśca vāsāśvaḥ saṃkīlaścaiva te trayaḥ // MatsP_145.115 //
GP12mtp176pu:13768: ete mantrakṛto jñeyā vaiśyānāṃ pravarāḥ sadā /
GP12mtp176pu:13769: iti dvinavatiḥ proktā mantrāyaiśca bahiṣkṛtāḥ // MatsP_145.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:13771: ṛṣīkāṇāṃ sutā hyete ṛṣiputrāḥ śrutarṣayaḥ // MatsP_145.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:13775: kathaṃ matsyena kathitas tārakasya vadho mahān /
GP12mtp176pu:13778: karṇābhyāṃ pibatāṃ tṛptir asmākaṃ na prajāyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13779: idaṃ mune samākhyāhi mahābuddhe manogatam // MatsP_146.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13782: kathaṃ śaravaṇe jāto devaḥ ṣaḍvadano vibho // MatsP_146.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:13786: vajrāṅgo nāma daityo 'bhūt tasya putrastu tārakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13789: bhītāṃśca tridaśāndṛṣṭvā brahmā teṣāmuvāca ha // MatsP_146.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13792: tataḥ kāle tu kasmiṃścid dṛṣṭvā vai śailajāṃ śivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13795: vidārya jaṭharāṇyeṣām ajīrṇaṃ nirgataṃ mune // MatsP_146.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:13797: tasmāttu sa samudbhūto guho dinakaraprabhaḥ // MatsP_146.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13799: evaṃ śrutvā tato vākyaṃ tam ūcur ṛṣisattamāḥ // MatsP_146.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13802: vistareṇa hi no brūhi yāthātathyena śṛṇvatām // MatsP_146.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13803: vajrāṅgo nāma daityendraḥ kasya vaṃśodbhavaḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:13805: nirmitaḥ ko vadhe cābhūt tasya daityeśvarasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13806: guhajanma tu kārtsnyena asmākaṃ brūhi mānada // MatsP_146.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:13808: mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putro dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13809: ṣaṣṭiṃ so 'janayatkanyā vairiṇyāmeva naḥ śrutam // MatsP_146.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13810: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:13812: dve vai bāhukaputrāya dve vai cāṅgirase tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:13813: dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_146.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13815: surabhirvinatā caiva tāmrā krodhavaśā irā // MatsP_146.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:13819: devendropendrapūṣādyāḥ sarve te ditijā matāḥ // MatsP_146.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13821: dānavāśca danoḥ putrā gāvaśca surabhīsutāḥ // MatsP_146.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:13823: nāgāḥ kadrūsutā jñeyāḥ śeṣāścānye 'pi jantavaḥ // MatsP_146.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13827: nihatā viṣṇunā saṃkhye śeṣāścendreṇa dānavāḥ // MatsP_146.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:13829: bhartāraṃ kaśyapaṃ devaṃ putramanyaṃ mahābalam // MatsP_146.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:13830: samare śakrahantāraṃ sa tasyā adadātprabhuḥ // MatsP_146.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:13831: niyame varta he devi sahasraṃ śucimānasā /
GP12mtp176pu:13832: varṣāṇāṃ lapsyase putram ityuktā sā tathākarot // MatsP_146.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13836: uvāca śakraṃ suprītā varadā tapasi sthitā // MatsP_146.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:13839: bhaviṣyati ca te bhrātā tena sārdhamimāṃ śriyam // MatsP_146.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:13843: tattu randhraṃ samāsādya jaṭharaṃ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_146.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:13844: cakāra saptadhā garbhaṃ kuliśena tu devarāṭ /
GP12mtp176pu:13845: ekaikaṃ tu punaḥ khaṇḍaṃ cakāra maghavā tataḥ // MatsP_146.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13846: saptadhā saptadhā kopāt prābudhyata tato ditiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13847: vibudhyovāca mā śakra ghātayethāḥ prajāṃ mama // MatsP_146.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13849: uvāca vākyaṃ saṃtrasto māturvai vadaneritam // MatsP_146.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:13852: saptasaptabhirevātas tava garbhaḥ kṛto mayā // MatsP_146.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:13854: dāsyāmi teṣāṃ sthānāni divi daivatapūjite // MatsP_146.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:13860: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapaḥ kṛtvā tu lapsyase // MatsP_146.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13862: vajrāṅgo nāma putraste bhavitā putravatsale // MatsP_146.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:13863: sā tu labdhavarā devī jagāma tapase vanam /
GP12mtp176pu:13864: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi sā tapo ghoramācarat // MatsP_146.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13868: uvāca mātaraṃ bhaktyā mātaḥ kiṃ karavāṇyaham // MatsP_146.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:13869: tamuvāca tato hṛṣṭā ditirdaityādhipaṃ ca sā /
GP12mtp176pu:13870: bahavo me hatāḥ putrāḥ sahasrākṣeṇa putraka // MatsP_146.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:13871: teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratikartuṃ vai gaccha śakravadhāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13872: bāḍhamityeva tāmuktvā jagāma tridivaṃ balī // MatsP_146.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:13877: dṛṣṭvā tu tāvuvācedaṃ brahmā kaśyapa eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13878: muñcainaṃ putra devendraṃ kimanena prayojanam // MatsP_146.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:13879: apamāno vadhaḥ proktaḥ putra saṃbhāvitasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13880: asmadvākyena yo mukto viddhi taṃ mṛtameva ca // MatsP_146.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:13882: jīvanneva mṛto vatsa divase divase sa tu // MatsP_146.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:13884: etacchrutvā tu vajrāṅgaḥ praṇato vākyamabravīt // MatsP_146.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:13885: na me kṛtyamanenāsti māturājñā kṛtā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:13886: tvaṃ surāsuranātho 'si mama ca prapitāmahaḥ // MatsP_146.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:13887: kariṣye tvadvaco deva eṣa muktaḥ śatakratuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13888: tapase me ratirdeva nirvighnaṃ caiva me bhavet // MatsP_146.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:13890: tasmiṃstūṣṇīṃ sthite daitye provācedaṃ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_146.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:13893: anayā cittaśuddhyā te paryāptaṃ janmanaḥ phalam // MatsP_146.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:13895: tāmasmai pradadau devaḥ patnyarthaṃ padmasambhavaḥ // MatsP_146.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:13896: varāṅgīti ca nāmāsyāḥ kṛtvā yātaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13897: vajrāṅgo 'pi tayā sārdhaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // MatsP_146.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:13903: jalāntaraṃ praviṣṭasya tasya patnī mahāvratā // MatsP_146.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:13905: nirāhārā tapo ghoraṃ praviveśa mahādyutiḥ // MatsP_146.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:13907: bhūtvā tu markaṭastatra tadāśramapadaṃ mahān // MatsP_146.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:13912: tapobalāḍhyā sā tasya na vadhyatvaṃ jagāma ha /
GP12mtp176pu:13917: śailasya duṣṭatāṃ matvā śāpaṃ dātuṃ vyavasthitā // MatsP_146.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:13919: uvāca tāṃ varārohāṃ varāṅgīṃ bhīrucetanaḥ // MatsP_146.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:13921: vibhramaṃ tu karotyeṣa ruṣitaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_146.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:13924: tuṣṭaḥ provāca vajrāṅgaṃ tamāgamya jalāśrayam // MatsP_146.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13930: āsuro māstu me bhāvaḥ santu lokā mamākṣayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13931: tapasyeva ratir me'stu śarīrasyāstu vartanam // MatsP_146.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:13933: vajrāṅgo 'pi samāpte tu tapasi sthirasaṃyamaḥ // MatsP_146.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:13935: kṣudhāviṣṭaḥ sa śailasya gahanaṃ praviveśa ha // MatsP_146.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:13938: tāṃ vilokya sa daityendraḥ provāca parisāntvayan // MatsP_146.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13941: kaṃ vā kāmaṃ prayacchāmi śīghraṃ me brūhi bhāmini // MatsP_146.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13948: putraṃ me tārakaṃ dehi duḥkhaśokamahārṇavāt // MatsP_147.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13952: jñātvā tu tasya saṃkalpaṃ brahmā krūrataraṃ punaḥ // MatsP_147.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:13954: uvāca tasmai bhagavān prabhurmadhurayā girā // MatsP_147.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13957: āhārābhimukho daitya tanno brūhi mahāvrata // MatsP_147.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13960: tyāgo hyaprāptakāmānāṃ kāmebhyo na tathā guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13961: yathā prāptaṃ parityajya kāmaṃ kamalalocana // MatsP_147.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:13966: mahiṣī bhīṣitā dīnā rudatī śākhinastale // MatsP_147.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13967: sā mayoktā tu tanvaṅgī dūyamānena cetasā /
GP12mtp176pu:13968: kimevaṃ vartase bhīru vada tvaṃ kiṃ cikīrṣasi // MatsP_147.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13969: ityuktā sā mayā deva provāca skhalitākṣaram /
GP12mtp176pu:13970: vākyaṃ covāca tanvaṅgī bhītā sā hetusaṃhitam // MatsP_147.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13975: putraṃ me tārakaṃ dehi hy asmādduḥkhamahārṇavāt // MatsP_147.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:13977: tapo ghoraṃ kariṣyāmi jayāya tridivaukasām // MatsP_147.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13981: alaṃ te tapasā vatsa mā kleśe dustare viśa /
GP12mtp176pu:13982: putraste tārako nāma bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ // MatsP_147.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13986: tau dampatī kṛtārthau tu jagmatuḥ svāśramaṃ mudā // MatsP_147.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:13988: pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca dadhārodara eva hi // MatsP_147.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13994: candrasūryau jahuḥ kāntiṃ sanīhārā diśo 'bhavan // MatsP_147.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:13995: jāte mahāsure tasmin sarve cāpi mahāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13998: tato mahotsavo jāto dānavānāṃ dvijottamāḥ // MatsP_147.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:14000: varāṅgī svasutaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣeṇāpūritā tadā // MatsP_147.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:14001: bahu mene na devendra-vijayaṃ tu tadeva sā /
GP12mtp176pu:14005: sa tu prāpya mahārājyaṃ tārako munisattamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14011: śreyase kriyatāṃ buddhiḥ sarvaiḥ kṛtyasya saṃvidhau // MatsP_148.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:14013: asmākaṃ jātidharmo vai virūḍhaṃ vairamakṣayam // MatsP_148.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:14015: svabāhubalamāśritya sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_148.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:14017: ahamādau kariṣyāmi tato ghoraṃ diteḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_148.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:14019: sthiropāyo hi puruṣaḥ sthiraśrīrapi jāyate // MatsP_148.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:14021: tacchrutvā dānavāḥ sarve vākyaṃ tasyāsurasya tu // MatsP_148.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:14029: prāpya tatkandaraṃ daityaś cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_148.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:14031: śataṃ śataṃ samānāṃ tu tapāṃsyetāni so 'karot // MatsP_148.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14032: tataḥ svadehādutkṛtya karṣaṃ karṣaṃ dine dine /
GP12mtp176pu:14033: māṃsasyāgnau juhāvāsau tato nirmāṃsatāṃ gataḥ // MatsP_148.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14035: jajvaluḥ sarvabhūtāni tejasā tasya sarvataḥ // MatsP_148.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:14036: udvignāśca surāḥ sarve tapasā tasya bhīṣitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14039: prāpya taṃ śailarājānaṃ sa gireḥ kandarasthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:14040: uvāca tārakaṃ devo girā madhurayā yutaḥ // MatsP_148.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:14043: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva ruciraṃ yatte manasi vartate // MatsP_148.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:14050: taiśca niḥśeṣitā daityāḥ krūraiḥ saṃtyajya dharmitām /
GP12mtp176pu:14051: teṣāmahaṃ samuddhartā bhaveyamiti me matiḥ // MatsP_148.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:14053: syāmahaṃ paramo hyeṣa varo mama hṛdi sthitaḥ // MatsP_148.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:14054: etanme dehi deveśa nānyo me rocate varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14055: tamuvāca tato daityaṃ viriñciḥ suranāyakaḥ // MatsP_148.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:14056: na yujyante vinā mṛtyuṃ dehino daityasattama /
GP12mtp176pu:14057: yatastato 'pi varaya mṛtyuṃ yasmānna śaṅkase // MatsP_148.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:14059: vavre mahāsuro mṛtyum avalepena mohitaḥ // MatsP_148.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14061: jagāma tridivaṃ devo daityo 'pi svakamālayam // MatsP_148.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:14063: parivavruḥ sahasrākṣaṃ divi devagaṇā yathā // MatsP_148.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:14071: vījayantyapsaraḥśreṣṭhā bhṛśaṃ muñcanti naiva tāḥ // MatsP_148.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:14074: evaṃ prayāti kāle tu vitate tārakāsuraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14077: rājyena kāraṇaṃ kiṃ me tv anākramya triviṣṭapam /
GP12mtp176pu:14078: aniryāpya surairvairaṃ kā śāntirhṛdaye mama // MatsP_148.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:14079: bhuñjate 'dyāpi yajñāṃśān amarā nāka eva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:14080: viṣṇuḥ śriyaṃ na jahati tiṣṭhate ca gatabhramaḥ // MatsP_148.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:14082: sotpalā madirāmodā divi krīḍāyaneṣu ca // MatsP_148.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:14083: labdhvā janma na yaḥ kaścid ghaṭayetpauruṣaṃ naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14084: janma tasya vṛthā bhūtam ajanmā tu viśiṣyate // MatsP_148.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:14085: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ na karoti kāmān bandhūnaśokānna karoti yo vā /
GP12mtp176pu:14086: kīrtiṃ hi vā nārjayate himābhāṃ pumānsa jāto 'pi mṛto mataṃ me // MatsP_148.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:14088: saṃyojyatāṃ me rathamaṣṭacakraṃ balaṃ ca me durjayadaityacakram /
GP12mtp176pu:14089: dhvajaṃ ca me kāñcanapaṭṭanaddhaṃ chattraṃ ca me mauktikajālabaddham // MatsP_148.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:14090: tārakasya vacaḥ śrutvā grasano nāma dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14091: senānīr daityarājasya tathā cakre balānvitaḥ // MatsP_148.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:14100: mathano jambhakaḥ śumbho daityendrā daśa nāyakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14109: dhvāṅkṣo dhvaje tu śumbhasya kṛṣṇāyomayamucchritam // MatsP_148.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:14113: śatenāpi ca siṃhānāṃ ratho jambhasya durjayaḥ // MatsP_148.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:14115: rathastu mahiṣasyoṣṭrair gajasya tu turaṃgamaiḥ // MatsP_148.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:14135: dṛṣṭvā sa dānavabalaṃ jagāmendrasya śaṃsitum // MatsP_148.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:14136: sa gatvā tu sabhāṃ divyāṃ mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14137: śaśaṃsa madhye devānāṃ tatkāryaṃ samupasthitam // MatsP_148.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:14150: saṃtāpitaḥ khalo yāti sādhyatāṃ bhraṣṭasaṃśayaḥ // MatsP_148.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:14152: jātidharmeṇa vā bhedyā dānaṃ prāptaśriye ca kim // MatsP_148.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:14154: durjaneṣu kṛtaṃ sāma mahadyāti ca vandhyatām // MatsP_148.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:14157: manyante durjanā nityaṃ sāma cāpi bhayodayāt /
GP12mtp176pu:14160: durjanaḥ sujanatvāya kalpate na kadācana // MatsP_148.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:14162: evaṃ me budhyate buddhir yūyamatra vyavasyata // MatsP_148.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:14168: sve mahimni sthitā nityaṃ jagataḥ paripālakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14170: teṣāṃ sāmādi naivāsti daṇḍa eva vidhīyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:14171: kriyatāṃ samarodyogaḥ sainyaṃ saṃyojyatāṃ mama // MatsP_148.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:14173: vāhanāni ca yānāni yojayantu mamāmarāḥ // MatsP_148.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:14175: ityuktāḥ samanahyanta devānāṃ ye pradhānataḥ // MatsP_148.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:14222: camūśca sā durjayapattrisaṃtatā vibhāti nānāyudhayodhadustarā // MatsP_148.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:14229: tūryāṇāṃ caiva nirghoṣair mātaṃgānāṃ ca bṛṃhitaiḥ // MatsP_149.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:14251: ākāśasaraso bhraṣṭaiḥ paṅkajairiva bhūḥ stṛtā // MatsP_149.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:14253: gajāḥ śalanibhāḥ petur dharaṇyāṃ rudhirasravāḥ // MatsP_149.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:14255: petuḥ śakalatāṃ yātās turaṃgāśca sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_149.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:14267: sa vicintya yamo bāṇān grasanasyātipauruṣam // MatsP_150.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:14271: viphalāṃ tāṃ samālokya yamastāṃ śarasaṃtatim // MatsP_150.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:14272: sa vicintya śaravrātaṃ grasanasya rathaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:14273: cikṣepa mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ tarasā tasya cāntakaḥ // MatsP_150.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:14274: sa taṃ mudgaram āyāntam utplutya gaganasthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:14276: tameva mudgaraṃ gṛhya yamasya mahiṣaṃ ruṣā /
GP12mtp176pu:14277: pātayāmāsa vegena sa papāta mahītale // MatsP_150.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:14279: prāsena tāḍayāmāsa grasanaṃ vadane dṛḍham // MatsP_150.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:14281: grasanaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā jambho bhīmaparākramaḥ // MatsP_150.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:14283: yamastena prahāreṇa susrāva rudhiraṃ mukhāt // MatsP_150.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14285: vṛto yakṣāyutaśatair jambhaṃ pratyudyayau ruṣā // MatsP_150.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14287: uvāca prājño vākyaṃ tu yathā snigdhena bhāṣitam // MatsP_150.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:14293: sa gadāṃ viyati prāpya rarāsāmbudharo yathā // MatsP_150.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:14299: nihatyātha gadāṃ daṇḍas tato grasanamūrdhani // MatsP_150.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:14301: sa tu tena prahāreṇa dṛṣṭvā satimirā diśaḥ // MatsP_150.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:14307: madvidhe vastuni puṃsi prabhoḥ paribhavodayāt // MatsP_150.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14311: evaṃ saṃcintya vegena samuttasthau mahābalaḥ // MatsP_150.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:14315: samāsādya yamaṃ yuddhe grasano bhrāmya mudgaram // MatsP_150.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:14317: vilokya mudgaraṃ dīptaṃ yamaḥ saṃbhrāntalocanaḥ // MatsP_150.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:14320: yāmyānāṃ kiṃkarāṇāṃ tu sahasraṃ niṣpipeṣa ha /
GP12mtp176pu:14321: tatastāṃ nihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ kiṃkaravāhinīm // MatsP_150.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:14323: grasanastu samālokya tāṃ kiṃkaramayīṃ camūm // MatsP_150.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:14333: apare muṣṭibhiḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kiṃkarāḥ praharanti ca // MatsP_150.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:14335: utsṛjya gātraṃ bhūpṛṣṭhe niṣpipeṣa sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:14337: sa tu kiṃkarayuddhena grasanaḥ śramamāptavān // MatsP_150.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:14338: tamālokya yamaḥ śrāntaṃ nihatāṃ ca svavāhinīm /
GP12mtp176pu:14343: sa ratho daṇḍamathitair vyāghrairardhair vikṛṣyate // MatsP_150.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:14345: samutsṛjya rathaṃ daityaḥ padātirdharaṇīṃ gataḥ // MatsP_150.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:14357: yāvadyamasya vadanāt susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu // MatsP_150.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:14358: nirjīvitaṃ yamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ saṃtyajya dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14359: jayaṃ prāpyoddhataṃ daityo nādaṃ muktvā mahāsvanaḥ // MatsP_150.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:14365: sārathiṃ ca śatenājau dhvajaṃ daśabhireva ca // MatsP_150.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:14368: siṃhamekena taṃ tīkṣṇair vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14373: vivyādha dhanadaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ śarairvakṣasi dānavaḥ // MatsP_150.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:14378: mohaṃ paramato gacchan dṛḍhaviddho hi vittapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14381: diśaḥ khaṃ vidiśo bhūmīr anīkānyasurasya ca // MatsP_150.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:14385: tato dhaneśaḥ saṃkruddho dānavendrasya karmaṇā // MatsP_150.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:14387: taddṛṣṭvā duṣkṛtaṃ karma dhanādhyakṣasya dānavaḥ // MatsP_150.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:14391: rathaṃ dhanapateḥ sarve parivārya vyavasthitāḥ // MatsP_150.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:14395: jagrāha paraśuṃ daityo mardanaṃ daityavidviṣām // MatsP_150.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:14397: cicheda śataśo daityo hy ākhuḥ snigdhamivāmbaram // MatsP_150.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:14403: cikṣepa mūrdhni saṃkruddho jambhasya tu dhanādhipaḥ // MatsP_150.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:14405: daityo gadābhighātārthaṃ śastravṛṣṭiṃ mumoca ha // MatsP_150.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:14412: jambhaṃ tu nihataṃ matvā kujambho bhairavasvanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14414: cakre bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ dikṣu yakṣādhipasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:14415: cicheda bāṇajālaṃ tad ardhacandraiḥ śitaistataḥ // MatsP_150.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:14416: mumoca śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tasmai yakṣādhipo balī /
GP12mtp176pu:14417: sa taṃ daityaḥ śaravrātaṃ cicheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:14418: vyarthīkṛtāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śaravṛṣṭiṃ dhanādhipaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14421: sa tāṃ nirūpya vegena kujambhāya mumoca ha // MatsP_150.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:14427: sa tena paṭṭiśenājau dhanadasya stanāntaram // MatsP_150.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:14431: nipapāta rathopasthe jarjaro dhūrvaho yathā // MatsP_150.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:14432: tathāgataṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā dhaneśaṃ naravāhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:14435: atha dṛṣṭvā tu durdharṣaṃ kujambho rākṣaseśvaram // MatsP_150.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:14437: sa dṛṣṭvā coditāṃ senāṃ bhallanānāstrabhīṣaṇām // MatsP_150.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:14447: jīvagrāhānsa jagrāha baddhvā pāśaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:14448: mūrtimanti tu ratnāni vividhāni ca dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14449: vāhanāni ca divyāni vimānāni sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.94 //
GP12mtp176pu:14452: dhyātvāstraṃ gāruḍaṃ divyaṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke /
GP12mtp176pu:14453: mumoca dānavānīke taṃ bāṇaṃ śatrudāraṇam // MatsP_150.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:14457: tataḥ krameṇa durvāraṃ nānārūpaṃ tadābhavat // MatsP_150.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:14459: tato 'ntarikṣe śaṃsanti tejaste tu pariṣkṛtam // MatsP_150.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:14469: yuyutsavaḥ sthitā yakṣā mukuṭaṃ parivārya tam // MatsP_150.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:14476: dhanāni ratnāni ca mūrtimanti tathā nidhānāni śarīriṇaśca /
GP12mtp176pu:14477: ādāya sarvāṇi jagāma daityo jambhaḥ svasainyaṃ danujendrasiṃhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14478: dhanādhipo vai vinikīrṇamūrdhajo jagāma dīnaḥ surabharturantikam // MatsP_150.108 //
GP12mtp176pu:14482: tato viphalanetrāṇi dānavānāṃ balāni tu // MatsP_150.110 //
GP12mtp176pu:14483: na śekuścalitaṃ tatra padādapi padaṃ tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:14494: cakruḥ krūreṇa manasā devānīkaiḥ sahādbhutam // MatsP_150.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:14500: tadādānaṃ ca saṃdhānaṃ na mokṣaścāpi lakṣyate // MatsP_150.119 //
GP12mtp176pu:14504: kujambhaḥ karma taddṛṣṭvā rākṣasendrasya saṃyuge // MatsP_150.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:14510: sa tu tena prahāreṇa kṣīṇaḥ saṃbhrāntamānasaḥ // MatsP_150.124 //
GP12mtp176pu:14514: keśeṣu nirṛtiṃ daityo jānunākramya dhiṣṭhitam // MatsP_150.126 //
GP12mtp176pu:14520: sa tu tena prahāreṇa srotobhiḥ kṣatajaṃ vaman // MatsP_150.129 //
GP12mtp176pu:14527: bhṛśaṃ drutau javād digbhyām ubhābhyāṃ bhayavihvalau /
GP12mtp176pu:14528: jagāma nirṛtiḥ kṣipraṃ śaraṇaṃ pākaśāsanam // MatsP_150.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:14533: vāyunā tena candreṇa saṃśuṣkeṇa himena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:14534: vyathitā dānavāḥ sarve śītocchinnā vipauruṣāḥ // MatsP_150.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:14540: sarve te niṣpratīkārā daityāścandramasā jitāḥ // MatsP_150.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:14543: bho bhoḥ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ śarāḥ sarve śastrāstrapāragāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14546: ekaikasyāpi paryāptā na sarve 'pi divaukasaḥ // MatsP_150.142 //
GP12mtp176pu:14556: āśritya dānavīṃ māyāṃ vitatya svaṃ mahāvapuḥ // MatsP_150.147 //
GP12mtp176pu:14557: pūrayāmāsa gaganaṃ diśo vidiśa eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:14562: tataḥ krameṇa vibhraṣṭaṃ śītadurdinam ābabhau // MatsP_150.150 //
GP12mtp176pu:14572: jagaddīpo 'tha bhagavāñ jagrāha vitataṃ dhanuḥ // MatsP_150.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:14574: saṃcārāstreṇa saṃdhāya bāṇamekaṃ sasarja saḥ // MatsP_150.155 //
GP12mtp176pu:14577: devānāṃ dānavaṃ rūpaṃ dānavānāṃ ca daivikam /
GP12mtp176pu:14583: kāṃścit pipeṣātha rathasya vegāt kāṃścitkrudhā coddhatamuṣṭipātaiḥ // MatsP_150.159 //
GP12mtp176pu:14585: rūpaṃ svaṃ tu prapadyanta hy asurāḥ suradharṣitāḥ // MatsP_150.160 //
GP12mtp176pu:14586: kālanemī ruṣāviṣṭas teṣāṃ rūpaṃ na buddhavān /
GP12mtp176pu:14588: ahaṃ nemiḥ suro naiva kālaneme vidasva mām /
GP12mtp176pu:14593: yojayāmāsa bāṇaṃ hi brahmāstravihitena tu // MatsP_150.164 //
GP12mtp176pu:14594: mumoca cāpi daityendraḥ sa svayaṃ surakaṇṭakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14597: saṃcarāstraṃ ca saṃśāntaṃ svayamāyodhane babhau // MatsP_150.166 //
GP12mtp176pu:14603: cakṣūṃṣi dānavendrāṇāṃ cakārāndhāni ca prabhuḥ // MatsP_150.169 //
GP12mtp176pu:14605: turagā niḥśvasantaśca gharmārtā rathino 'pi ca // MatsP_150.170 //
GP12mtp176pu:14610: toyārthinaḥ puro dṛṣṭvā toyaṃ kallolamālinam // MatsP_150.172 //
GP12mtp176pu:14612: aprāpya salilaṃ bhūmau vyāttāsyā gatacetasaḥ // MatsP_150.173 //
GP12mtp176pu:14613: tatra tatra vyadṛśyanta mṛtā daityeśvarā bhuvi /
GP12mtp176pu:14614: rathā gajāśca patitās turagāśca samāpitāḥ // MatsP_150.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:14616: dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi vyadṛśyanta mṛtāni tu // MatsP_150.175 //
GP12mtp176pu:14622: śītaṃ vavarṣa salilaṃ dānavendrabalaṃ prati // MatsP_150.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:14624: bījāṅkurā ivāmlānāḥ prāpya vṛṣṭiṃ dharātale // MatsP_150.179 //
GP12mtp176pu:14628: gatiṃ kāṃ ca na paśyanto gāvaḥ śītārditā iva // MatsP_150.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:14630: sveṣu bādhe vyalīyanta gajeṣu turageṣu ca // MatsP_150.182 //
GP12mtp176pu:14634: evaṃvidhe tu saṃgrāme tumule devasaṃkṣaye // MatsP_150.184 //
GP12mtp176pu:14642: yakṣāṇāṃ pañca lakṣāṇi rakṣasāmayutāni ṣaṭ // MatsP_150.188 //
GP12mtp176pu:14643: trīṇi lakṣāṇi jaghne sa kiṃnarāṇāṃ tarasvinām /
GP12mtp176pu:14644: jaghne piśācamukhyānāṃ sapta lakṣāṇi nirbhayaḥ // MatsP_150.189 //
GP12mtp176pu:14646: jaghne sa koṭīḥ saṃkruddhaś citrāstrairastrakovidaḥ // MatsP_150.190 //
GP12mtp176pu:14650: tamāsādya raṇe ghoram ekaikaḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.192 //
GP12mtp176pu:14654: tena cakreṇa so 'śvibhyāṃ cicheda rathakūbaram // MatsP_150.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:14658: tacca karma tayordṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ kopamāviśat // MatsP_150.196 //
GP12mtp176pu:14661: sa tato bhrāmya vegena cikṣepāśvirathaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:14662: taṃ tu mudgaram āyāntam ālokyāmbaragocaram // MatsP_150.198 //
GP12mtp176pu:14663: tyaktvā rathau tu tau vegād āplutau tarasāśvinau /
GP12mtp176pu:14664: tau rathau sa tu niṣpiṣya mudgaro 'calasaṃnibhaḥ // MatsP_150.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:14666: tasya karmāśvinau dṛṣṭvā bhiṣajau citrayodhinau // MatsP_150.200 //
GP12mtp176pu:14668: tato vajramayaṃ varṣaṃ prāvartad atidāruṇam // MatsP_150.201 //
GP12mtp176pu:14670: ratho dhvajo dhanuścakraṃ kavacaṃ cāpi kāñcanam // MatsP_150.202 //
GP12mtp176pu:14672: taddṛṣṭvā duṣkaraṃ karma so 'śvibhyāṃ bhīmavikramaḥ // MatsP_150.203 //
GP12mtp176pu:14676: jīvagrāhaṃ grāhayitum aśvinau tu pracakrame // MatsP_150.205 //
GP12mtp176pu:14678: prayātau vepamānau tu padā śastravivarjitau // MatsP_150.206 //
GP12mtp176pu:14682: dṛṣṭvā daityasya tatkrauryaṃ sarvabhūtāni menire // MatsP_150.208 //
GP12mtp176pu:14684: celuḥ śikhariṇo mukhyāḥ peturulkā nabhastalāt // MatsP_150.209 //
GP12mtp176pu:14696: yathā hi puruṣaṃ ghorair abhāgyairvaṃśaśālibhiḥ // MatsP_150.215 //
GP12mtp176pu:14704: ayaṃ vai devasarvasvaṃ jite 'sminnirjitāḥ surāḥ // MatsP_150.219 //
GP12mtp176pu:14708: nijaghnurvividhairastrais te tam āyāntam āhave // MatsP_150.221 //
GP12mtp176pu:14712: jambhakaścaiva saptatyā śumbho daśabhireva ca // MatsP_150.223 //
GP12mtp176pu:14714: daśabhiścaiva yattāste jaghnuḥ sagaruḍaṃ raṇe // MatsP_150.224 //
GP12mtp176pu:14716: ekaikaṃ dānavaṃ jaghne ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍbhirajihmagaiḥ // MatsP_150.225 //
GP12mtp176pu:14722: satataṃ bhrāmya vegena dānavāya vyasarjayat // MatsP_150.228 //
GP12mtp176pu:14725: tato viṣṇuḥ prakupitaḥ prāsaṃ jagrāha bhairavam /
GP12mtp176pu:14726: tena daityasya hṛdayaṃ tāḍayāmāsa gāḍhataḥ // MatsP_150.230 //
GP12mtp176pu:14730: bhinnaḥ śaktyā bhujastasya srutaśoṇita ābabhau // MatsP_150.232 //
GP12mtp176pu:14732: tato viṣṇuḥ prakupito jagrāha vipulaṃ dhanuḥ // MatsP_150.233 //
GP12mtp176pu:14734: daityasya hṛdayaṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādha ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.234 //
GP12mtp176pu:14735: caturbhiḥ sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ caikena pattriṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:14736: dvābhyāṃ jyādhanuṣī cāpi bhujaṃ savyaṃ ca pattriṇā // MatsP_150.235 //
GP12mtp176pu:14737: sa viddho hṛdaye gāḍhaṃ daityo hariśilīmukhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14741: tāṃ ca vegena cikṣepa kālanemirathaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:14742: sā papāta śirasyugrā vipulā kālaneminaḥ // MatsP_150.238 //
GP12mtp176pu:14748: gacchāsura vimukto 'si sāmprataṃ jīva nirbhayaḥ // MatsP_150.241 //
GP12mtp176pu:14755: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavāḥ kruddhāśceruḥ svaiḥ svairbalairvṛtāḥ /*
GP12mtp176pu:14760: āruhyājau nimirdaityo hariṃ pratyudyayau balī // MatsP_151.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:14768: śumbhaḥ śūlena tīkṣṇena prāsena grasanastathā // MatsP_151.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:14769: cakreṇa mahiṣaḥ kruddho jambhaḥ śaktyā mahāraṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:14773: asambhrānto raṇe viṣṇur atha jagrāha kārmukam /
GP12mtp176pu:14776: abhyadravadraṇe kruddho daityānīke tu pauruṣāt // MatsP_151.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14778: mathanaṃ daśabhirbāṇaiḥ śumbhaṃ pañcabhireva ca // MatsP_151.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14784: saṃdhyamānaṃ śaraṃ haste cicheda mahiṣāsuraḥ // MatsP_151.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:14787: chinne dhanuṣi govindo gadāṃ jagrāha bhīṣaṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:14788: tāṃ prāhiṇotsa vegena mathanāya mahāhave // MatsP_151.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:14790: tāṃ nāśamāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā hīnāgre prārthanāmiva // MatsP_151.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:14792: taṃ mumocātha vegena nimimuddiśya dānavam // MatsP_151.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:14793: tam āyāntaṃ viyatyeva trayo daityā nyavārayan /
GP12mtp176pu:14794: gadayā jambhadaityastu grasanaḥ paṭṭiśena tu // MatsP_151.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:14796: nirākṛtaṃ tamālokya durjane praṇayaṃ yathā // MatsP_151.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:14800: gṛhītāṃ tāṃ samālokya śikṣāmiva vivekibhiḥ // MatsP_151.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14804: tato bāṇamayaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ samadṛśyata // MatsP_151.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:14808: tena tatpraśamaṃ yātaṃ raudrāstraṃ lokaghasmaram // MatsP_151.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:14812: cakampe ca mahī devī daityā bhinnadhiyo 'bhavan // MatsP_151.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:14815: nārāyaṇāstraṃ grasano gṛhītvā cakraṃ nimiḥ svāstravaraṃ mumoca /
GP12mtp176pu:14816: aiṣīkamastraṃ ca cakāra jambhas tatkāladaṇḍāstranivāraṇāya // MatsP_151.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:14817: yāvanna saṃdhyā na daśāṃ prayānti daityeśvarāścāstranivāraṇāya /
GP12mtp176pu:14818: tāvatkṣaṇenaiva jaghāna koṭīr daityeśvarāṇāṃ sagajānsahāśvān // MatsP_151.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:14820: śāntaṃ tadālokya hariḥ svaśastraṃ svavikrame manyuparītamūrtiḥ // MatsP_151.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:14823: cakraṃ tadākāśagataṃ vilokya sarvātmanā daityavarāḥ svavīryaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14824: nāśaknuvanvārayituṃ pracaṇḍaṃ daivaṃ yathā karma mudhā prapannam // MatsP_151.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:14825: tamapratarkyaṃ janayannajayyaṃ cakraṃ papāta grasanasya kaṇṭhe /
GP12mtp176pu:14826: dvidhā tu kṛtvā grasanasya kaṇṭhaṃ tadraktadhārāruṇaghoranābhi /
GP12mtp176pu:14827: jagāma bhūyo 'pi janārdanasya pāṇiṃ pravṛddhānalatulyadīpti // MatsP_151.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:14833: tīkṣṇānanaiśca nārācaiś cakraiḥ śaktibhireva ca // MatsP_152.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:14841: uvāca ca garutmantaṃ tasminsutumule raṇe // MatsP_152.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:14843: yadyaśrānto 'si tadyāhi mathanasya rathaṃ prati // MatsP_152.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:14851: punardaśabhir ākṛṣṭais taṃ tatāḍa stanāntare // MatsP_152.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14853: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvāsya jagrāha parighaṃ tadā // MatsP_152.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14857: mathanaṃ sarathaṃ roṣān niṣpipeṣātha roṣataḥ // MatsP_152.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:14865: śaktyā ca garuḍaṃ vīro mahiṣo 'bhyahanaddhṛdi // MatsP_152.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:14873: parivartitakāyo 'dhaḥ papāta na mamāra ca // MatsP_152.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:14874: mahiṣaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūmau provāca keśavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14881: sajyaṃ cakāra sa dhanuḥ śarāṃścāśīviṣopamān // MatsP_152.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:14882: sa citrayodhī dṛḍhamuṣṭipātas tatastu viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ ca daityaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14885: tayā bhuśuṇḍyā ca pipeṣa meṣaṃ śumbhasya pattraṃ dharaṇīdharābham // MatsP_152.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:14886: tasmādavaplutya hatācca meṣād bhūbhau padātiḥ sa tu daityanāthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14887: tato mahīsthasya hariḥ śaraughān mumoca kālānalatulyabhāsaḥ // MatsP_152.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:14888: śaraistribhistasya bhujaṃ bibheda ṣaḍbhiśca śīrṣaṃ daśabhiśca ketum /
GP12mtp176pu:14889: viṣṇurvikṛṣṭaiḥ śravaṇāvasānaṃ daityasya vivyādha vivṛttanetraḥ // MatsP_152.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:14890: sa tena viddho vyathito babhūva daityeśvaro visrutaśoṇitaughaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14891: tato 'sya kiṃcic calitasya dhairyād uvāca śaṅkhāmbujaśārṅgapāṇiḥ // MatsP_152.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:14893: vadhaṃ na matto 'rhasi ceha mūḍha vṛthaiva kiṃ yuddhasamutsuko 'si // MatsP_152.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:14894: jambho vaco viṣṇumukhānniśamya nimiśca niṣpeṣṭumiyeṣa viṣṇum /
GP12mtp176pu:14895: gadāmathodyamya nimiḥ pracaṇḍāṃ jaghāna gāḍhāṃ garuḍaṃ śirastaḥ // MatsP_152.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:14897: tau dānavābhyāṃ viṣamaiḥ prahārair nipetururvyāṃ ghanapāvakābhau // MatsP_152.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:14898: tatkarma dṛṣṭvā ditijāstu sarve jagarjuruccaiḥ kṛtasiṃhanādāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14900: vāsāṃsi caivādudhuvuḥ pare tu dadhmuśca śaṅkhānakagomukhaughān // MatsP_152.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:14907: hariṃ devaḥ sahasrākṣo mene bhagnaṃ durāhave // MatsP_153.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:14914: tasmānna nīcaṃ matimān durgahīnaṃ hi saṃtyajet /
GP12mtp176pu:14919: pūrve 'pyatibalā ye ca daityendrāḥ suravidviṣaḥ // MatsP_153.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:14921: yuge yuge ca daityānāṃ tvamevāntakaro hare // MatsP_153.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:14926: daityendrāḥ svairvadhopāyaiḥ śakyā hantuṃ hi nānyataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14927: durjayastārako daityo muktvā saptadinaṃ śiśum // MatsP_153.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14929: jambhastu vadhyatāṃ prāpto dānavaḥ krūravikramaḥ // MatsP_153.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14931: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvāṃ vinā sa tu dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:14935: yatsāraṃ sarvalokeṣu vīryasya tapaso 'pi ca // MatsP_153.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:14943: ajeśaḥ śāsanaḥ śāstā śaṃbhuścaṇḍo dhruvastathā // MatsP_153.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:14951: tasthau himagireḥ śṛṅge bhānumāniva dīptimān // MatsP_153.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14966: mamarda ca raṇe devāṃś cikṣepānyānkareṇa tu // MatsP_153.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:14974: vicacāra raṇe devān duṣprekṣye gajadānavaḥ // MatsP_153.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:14977: atha vidravamāṇaṃ tad balaṃ prekṣya samantataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14979: bho bho gṛhṇīta daityendraṃ mardatainaṃ hatāśrayam /
GP12mtp176pu:14980: karṣatainaṃ śitaiḥ śūlair bhañjatainaṃ ca marmasu // MatsP_153.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:14984: dṛḍhena muṣṭibandhena śūlaṃ viṣṭabhya nirmalam // MatsP_153.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:14986: tato daśāpi te rudrā nirmalāyomayai raṇe // MatsP_153.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:14994: dṛṣṭvā saktaṃ tu rudrābhyāṃ nava rudrāstato 'dbhutam // MatsP_153.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:14996: nirbhayā balino yuddhe raṇabhūmau vyavasthitāḥ // MatsP_153.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:15000: mamarda caraṇāghātair dantaiścāpi kareṇa ca // MatsP_153.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:15002: tadā kapālī jagrāha karaṃ tasyāmaradviṣaḥ // MatsP_153.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:15003: bhrāmayāmāsa vegena hy atīva ca gajāsuram /
GP12mtp176pu:15006: tataḥ patata evāsya carma cotkṛtya bhairavam // MatsP_153.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:15008: dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ daityaṃ dānavendrā mahābalāḥ // MatsP_153.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:15011: dikṣu bhūmau tamevograṃ rudraṃ daityā vyalokayan /
GP12mtp176pu:15012: evaṃ vilulite tasmin dānavendre mahābale // MatsP_153.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:15016: yāṃ yāṃ nimigajo yāti diśaṃ tāṃ tāṃ savāhanā /
GP12mtp176pu:15020: tasthau dikpālakaiḥ sārdham aṣṭabhiḥ keśavena ca // MatsP_153.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:15022: tāvacchakragajo yāto muktvā nādaṃ sa bhairavam // MatsP_153.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:15023: dhriyamāṇo 'pi yatnena sa raṇe naiva tiṣṭhati /
GP12mtp176pu:15024: palāyite gaje tasminn ārūḍhaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_153.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:15030: sa hato mudgareṇātha śakrakuñjara āhave // MatsP_153.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:15036: srutarakto babhau śailo ghanadhātuhrado yathā // MatsP_153.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:15041: patite tu gaje tasmin siṃhanādo mahānabhūt /
GP12mtp176pu:15044: gajaṃ taṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā nimiṃ cāpi parāṅmukham // MatsP_153.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:15046: jambho jajvāla kopena pītājya iva pāvakaḥ // MatsP_153.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:15052: śaśiśubhrātapatreṇa sa tena syandanena tu // MatsP_153.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:15057: tenāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ raṇe cicheda vṛtrahā /
GP12mtp176pu:15058: kṣipraṃ saṃtyajya taccāpaṃ jambho dānavanandanaḥ // MatsP_153.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:15061: śakraṃ vivyādha daśabhir jatrudeśe tu pattribhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15062: hṛdaye ca tribhiścāpi dvābhyāṃ ca skandhayor dvayoḥ // MatsP_153.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:15068: daityo 'pi bāṇajālaṃ tad vyadhamatsāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ // MatsP_153.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:15070: śakro 'tha krodhasaṃrambhān na viśeṣayate yadā // MatsP_153.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:15086: tataḥ surādhipastvāṣṭram astraṃ ca samudīrayat // MatsP_153.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:15090: vitānakena tenātha praśamaṃ mausale gate // MatsP_153.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:15106: tenāstreṇa tadastraṃ ca babhraṃśe tadanantaram // MatsP_153.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:15108: jajvāla kāyaṃ jambhasya sarathaṃ ca sasārathim // MatsP_153.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:15120: na śekustatra te sthātuṃ raṇe 'tibalino 'pi ye // MatsP_153.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:15124: tataḥ praśamite vāyau daityendre parvatākṛtau // MatsP_153.109 //
GP12mtp176pu:15128: tataḥ sā dānavendrasya śailamāyā nyavartata // MatsP_153.111 //
GP12mtp176pu:15132: babhañja pṛṣṭhataḥ kāṃścit kareṇāveṣṭya dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.113 //
GP12mtp176pu:15134: astraṃ trailokyadurdharṣaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ mumoca ha // MatsP_153.114 //
GP12mtp176pu:15143: kṛtastu khaṇḍaśo daityaḥ sāsya māyā vyanaśyata // MatsP_153.118 //
GP12mtp176pu:15144: pranaṣṭāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ tato jambho mahāsuraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15150: śakro dainyaṃ samāpannaḥ śrāntabāhuḥ savāhanaḥ // MatsP_153.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:15156: vardhasvāśu mahāmāyāṃ puraṃdara ripuṃ prati // MatsP_153.124 //
GP12mtp176pu:15158: mā śakra mohamāgaccha kṣipramastraṃ smara prabho // MatsP_153.125 //
GP12mtp176pu:15159: tataḥ śakraḥ prakupito dānavaṃ prati devarāṭ /
GP12mtp176pu:15164: mahāstrabhinnahṛdayaḥ susrāva rudhiraṃ ca saḥ // MatsP_153.127 //
GP12mtp176pu:15166: tadastratejasā tasya rūpaṃ daityasya nāśitam // MatsP_153.128 //
GP12mtp176pu:15172: vavarṣa dānavo raudro hy abandhyānakṣayānapi // MatsP_153.131 //
GP12mtp176pu:15180: śṛgālagṛdhravāyasāḥ paraṃ pramodamādadhuḥ kvacidvikṛṣṭalocanaḥ śavasya rauti vāyasaḥ // MatsP_153.135 //
GP12mtp176pu:15181: vikṛṣṭapīvarāntrakāḥ prayānti jambukāḥ kvacit kvacitsthito 'tibhīṣaṇaḥ śvacañcucarvito bakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15182: mṛtasya māṃsamāharañchvajātayaśca saṃsthitāḥ kvacidvṛko gajāsṛjaṃ papau nilīyatāntrataḥ // MatsP_153.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:15183: kvacit turaṃgamaṇḍalī vikṛṣyate śvajātibhiḥ kvacitpiśācajātakaiḥ prapītaśoṇitāsavaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15184: svakāminīyutairdrutaṃ pramodamattasaṃbhramair mamaitadānayānanaṃ khuro 'yamastu me priyaḥ // MatsP_153.137 //
GP12mtp176pu:15185: karo 'yamabjasaṃnibho mamāstu karṇapūrakaḥ saroṣamīkṣate 'parā vapāṃ vinā priyaṃ tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:15186: parā priyā hyavāpa yadbhṛtoṣṇaśoṇitāsavaṃ vikṛṣya śavacarma tatprabaddhasāndrapallavam // MatsP_153.138 //
GP12mtp176pu:15187: cakāra yakṣakāminī taruṃ kuṭhārapāṭitaṃ gajasya dantamātmajaṃ pragṛhya kumbhasaṃpuṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:15188: vipāṭya mauktikaṃ paraṃ priyaprasādamicchate samāṃsaśoṇitāsavaṃ papuśca yakṣarākṣasāḥ // MatsP_153.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:15189: mṛtāśvakeśavāsitaṃ rasaṃ pragṛhya pāṇinā priyāvimuktajīvitaṃ samānayāsṛgāsavam /
GP12mtp176pu:15190: na pathyatāṃ prayāti me gataṃ śmaśānagocaraṃ narasya tajjahātyasau praśasya kiṃnarānanam // MatsP_153.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:15191: sa nāga eṣa no bhayaṃ dadhāti muktajīvito na dānavasya śakyate mayā tadekayānanam /
GP12mtp176pu:15192: iti priyāya vallabhā vadanti yakṣayoṣitaḥ pare kapālapāṇayaḥ piśācayakṣarākṣasāḥ // MatsP_153.141 //
GP12mtp176pu:15193: vadanti dehi dehi me mamātibhakṣyacāriṇaḥ pare 'vatīrya śoṇitāpagāsu dhautamūrtayā /
GP12mtp176pu:15194: pitṝn pratarpya devatāḥ samarcayanti cāmiṣair gajoḍupe susaṃsthitāstaranti śoṇitaṃ hradam // MatsP_153.142 //
GP12mtp176pu:15195: iti pragāḍhasaṃkaṭe surāsure susaṃgare bhayaṃ samujhya durjayā bhaṭāḥ sphuṭanti māninaḥ // MatsP_153.143 //
GP12mtp176pu:15199: astrāṇi vyarthatāṃ jagmur devānāṃ dānavānprati // MatsP_153.145 //
GP12mtp176pu:15201: gatiṃ na vividuścāpi śrāntā daityasya devatāḥ // MatsP_153.146 //
GP12mtp176pu:15203: parasparaṃ vyalīyanta gāvaḥ śītārditā iva // MatsP_153.147 //
GP12mtp176pu:15205: brahmāstraṃ smara devendra yasyāvadhyo na vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:15206: viṣṇunā coditaḥ śakraḥ sasmārāstraṃ mahaujasam // MatsP_153.148 //
GP12mtp176pu:15208: dhanuṣyajayye viniyojya buddhimān abhūttato mantrasamādhimānasaḥ // MatsP_153.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:15209: sa mantramuccārya yatāntarāśayo vadhāya daityasya dhiyābhisaṃdhya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15210: vikṛṣya karṇāntam akuṇṭhadīdhitiṃ mumoca vīkṣyāmbaramārgamunmukhaḥ // MatsP_153.150 //
GP12mtp176pu:15211: athāsuraḥ prekṣya mahāstramāhitaṃ vihāya māyāmavanau vyatiṣṭhata /
GP12mtp176pu:15212: pravepamānena mukhena śuṣyatā balena gātreṇa ca saṃbhramākulaḥ // MatsP_153.151 //
GP12mtp176pu:15214: puraṃdarasyāsanabandhutāṃ gato navārkabimbaṃ vapuṣā viḍambayan // MatsP_153.152 //
GP12mtp176pu:15216: prakīrṇadhūmajvalanābhamūrdhajaṃ papāta jambhasya śiraḥ sakuṇḍalam // MatsP_153.153 //
GP12mtp176pu:15220: sa jambhadānavendraṃ tu surai raṇamukhe hatam // MatsP_153.155 //
GP12mtp176pu:15234: taṃ rathaṃ devarājasya parivārya samantataḥ // MatsP_153.162 //
GP12mtp176pu:15236: tataścacāla vasudhā tato rūkṣo marudvavau // MatsP_153.163 //
GP12mtp176pu:15246: astrāṇi tejāṃsi dhanāni dhairyaṃ senābalaṃ vīryaparākramau ca /
GP12mtp176pu:15247: sattvaujasāṃ tannikaraṃ babhūva surāsurāṇāṃ tapaso balena // MatsP_153.168 //
GP12mtp176pu:15253: tato 'cchinnaṃ śaravrātaṃ saṃgrāme mumucuḥ surāḥ // MatsP_153.171 //
GP12mtp176pu:15257: sunirmalaṃ kramāyātaṃ kuputraḥ svaṃ mahākulam // MatsP_153.173 //
GP12mtp176pu:15259: bāṇairvyoma diśaḥ pṛthvīṃ pūrayāmāsa dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:15260: cicheda puṅkhadeśeṣu svake sthāne ca lāghavāt /
GP12mtp176pu:15264: tataḥ śatena bāṇānāṃ śakraṃ vivyādha dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15265: nārāyaṇaṃ ca saptatyā navatyā ca hutāśanam // MatsP_153.177 //
GP12mtp176pu:15267: dhanadaṃ caiva saptatyā varuṇaṃ ca tathāṣṭabhiḥ // MatsP_153.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:15270: tathā ca mātaliṃ daityo vivyādha tribhirāśugaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15271: garuḍaṃ daśabhiścaiva sa vivyādha patatribhiḥ // MatsP_153.180 //
GP12mtp176pu:15273: cakāra varmajātāni cicheda ca dhanūṃṣi tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15274: tato vikavacā devā vidhanuṣkāḥ śaraiḥ kṛtāḥ // MatsP_153.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:15275: athānyāni cāpāni tasminsaroṣā raṇe lokapālā gṛhītvā samantāt /
GP12mtp176pu:15278: jaghānorasi kṣipramindraṃ subāhuṃ mahendro vyakampadrathopastha eva // MatsP_153.183 //
GP12mtp176pu:15280: śarābhyāṃ jaghānāṃsamūle salīlaṃ tataḥ keśavasyāpatacchārṅgamagre // MatsP_153.184 //
GP12mtp176pu:15281: tatastārakaḥ pretanāthaṃ pṛṣatkair vasuṃ tasya savye smarankṣudrabhāvam /
GP12mtp176pu:15285: kṣaṇāllabdhacittāḥ svayaṃ viṣṇuśakrānalādyāḥ susaṃhatya tīkṣṇaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ /*
GP12mtp176pu:15286: pracakruḥ pracaṇḍena daityena sārdhaṃ mahāsaṃgaraṃ saṃgaragrāsakalpam // MatsP_153.187 //*
GP12mtp176pu:15287: athānamya cāpaṃ haristīkṣṇabāṇair hanatsārathiṃ daityarājasya hṛdyam /
GP12mtp176pu:15288: dhvajaṃ dhūmaketuḥ kirīṭaṃ mahendro dhaneśo dhanuḥ kāñcanānaddhapṛṣṭham /
GP12mtp176pu:15289: yamo bāhudaṇḍaṃ rathāṅgāni vāyur niśācāriṇām īśvarasyāpi varma // MatsP_153.188 //
GP12mtp176pu:15296: sa rathaṃ cūrṇayāmāsa na mamāra ca mātaliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15297: gṛhītvā paṭṭiśaṃ daityo jaghānorasi keśavam // MatsP_153.192 //
GP12mtp176pu:15299: khaḍgena rākṣasendrasya nicakarta ca vāhanam // MatsP_153.193 //
GP12mtp176pu:15300: yamaṃ ca pātayāmāsa bhūmau daityo bhuśuṇḍinā /
GP12mtp176pu:15301: vahniṃ ca bhindipālena tāḍayāmāsa mūrdhani // MatsP_153.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:15303: dhaneśaṃ ca dhanuṣkoṭyā kuṭṭayāmāsa kopanaḥ // MatsP_153.195 //
GP12mtp176pu:15309: papāta cakraṃ daityasya hṛdaye bhāskaradyuti // MatsP_153.198 //
GP12mtp176pu:15311: tato vajraṃ mahendrastu pramumocārcitaṃ ciram // MatsP_153.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:15323: daityendraṃ mūrdhni cikṣepa bhrāmya vegena durjayaḥ // MatsP_153.205 //
GP12mtp176pu:15330: cikṣepa dānavendrāya tasya mūrdhni papāta ca /
GP12mtp176pu:15339: na cāstrāṇyasya sajanti gātre vajrācalopame // MatsP_153.213 //
GP12mtp176pu:15341: jaghāna koṭiśo devān karapārṣṇibhireva ca // MatsP_153.214 //
GP12mtp176pu:15343: diśo bhītāni saṃtyajya raṇopakaraṇāni tu // MatsP_153.215 //
GP12mtp176pu:15357: sa jānubhyāṃ mahīṃ gatvā pihitāsyaḥ svapāṇinā // MatsP_154.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:15361: sa vijñāpayati stheyaṃ kva bandibhiriti prabho // MatsP_154.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:15363: yatheṣṭaṃ sthīyatāmebhir gṛhaṃ me bhuvanatrayam // MatsP_154.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:15365: evaṃ kṛte tato devā dūyamānena cetasā // MatsP_154.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:15371: sambhūtasyānantaraṃ sattvamūrte saṃhārecchoste namo rudramūrte // MatsP_154.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:15372: vyaktiṃ nītvā tvaṃ vapuḥ svaṃ mahimnā tasmādaṇḍāt sābhidhānādacintyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15373: dyāvāpṛthvyor ūrdhvakhaṇḍāvarāmyāṃ hy aṇḍādasmāttvaṃ vibhāgaṃ karoṣi // MatsP_154.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:15375: vyaktaṃ devā janmanaḥ śāśvatasya dyauste mūrdhā locane candrasūryau // MatsP_154.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:15376: vyālāḥ keśāḥ śrotrarandhrā diśaste pādau bhūmirnābhirandhre samudrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15377: māyākāraḥ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ prasiddho vedaiḥ śānto jyotiṣā tvaṃ vimuktaḥ // MatsP_154.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:15378: vedārtheṣu tvāṃ vivṛṇvanti buddhvā hṛtpadmāntaḥsaṃniviṣṭaṃ purāṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:15379: tvāmātmānaṃ labdhayogā gṛṇanti sāṃkhyairyāstāḥ sapta sūkṣmāḥ praṇītāḥ // MatsP_154.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:15380: tāsāṃ heturyāṣṭamī cāpi gītā tasyāṃ tasyāṃ gīyase vai tvamantam /
GP12mtp176pu:15381: dṛṣṭvā mūrtiṃ sthūlasūkṣmāṃ cakāra devairbhāvāḥ kāraṇaiḥ kaiściduktāḥ // MatsP_154.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:15382: sambhūtāste tvatta evādisarge bhūyastāṃ tāṃ vāsanāṃ te 'bhyupeyuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15385: ye 'nye sūkṣmāḥ santi tebhyo 'bhigītaḥ sthūlā bhāvāścāvṛtāraśca teṣām // MatsP_154.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:15386: tebhyaḥ sthūlaistaiḥ purāṇaiḥ pratīto bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ caivamudbhūtibhājām /
GP12mtp176pu:15387: bhāve bhāve bhāvitaṃ tvā yunakti yuktaṃ yuktaṃ vyaktibhāvānnirasya /
GP12mtp176pu:15388: itthaṃ devo bhaktibhājāṃ śaraṇyas trātā goptā no bhavānantamūrtiḥ // MatsP_154.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:15391: evaṃ stuto viriñcistu prasādaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15395: na rājate tathā śakra mlānavaktraśiroruhā // MatsP_154.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:15399: daṇḍasyālambaneneva hy akṛcchrastu pade pade // MatsP_154.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:15404: vāyo bhavān vicetaskas tvaṃ snigdhairiva nirjitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15405: kiṃ tvaṃ bibheṣi dhanada saṃnyasyaiva kuberatām // MatsP_154.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:15407: bhavantaḥ kena tatkṣiptaṃ tejastu bhavatāmapi // MatsP_154.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:15415: caturmukhaṃ tadā prāha carācaraguruṃ vibhum // MatsP_154.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:15416: na tu vetsi carācarabhūtagataṃ bhavabhāvamatīva mahānucchritaḥ prabhavaḥ /*
GP12mtp176pu:15419: amarāsurametadaśeṣamapi tvayi tulyamaho janako 'si yataḥ // MatsP_154.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:15420: piturasti tathāpi manovikṛtiḥ saguṇo viguṇo balavānabalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15422: sacarācaranirmathane kimiti kitavastu kṛto vihito bhavatā /
GP12mtp176pu:15423: kila deva tvayā sthitaye jagatāṃ mahadadbhutacitraviciguṇāḥ // MatsP_154.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:15424: api tuṣṭikṛtaḥ śrutakāmaphalā vihitā dvijanāyaka devagaṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15425: api nākamabhūtkila yajñabhujāṃ bhavato viniyogavaśātsatatam // MatsP_154.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:15426: apahṛtya vimānagaṇaṃ sa kṛto ditijena mahāmarubhūmisamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15428: samamiṅgitabhāvavidhiḥ sa girir gaganena sadocchrayatāṃ hi gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15431: surarāja sa tasya bhayena gataṃ vyadadhādaśarīra ito 'pi vṛthā // MatsP_154.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:15440: cāṭuyuktamatho karma hy amarā bahu bhāṣata // MatsP_154.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:15442: vadateti ca daityasya preṣyairvihasitā bahu // MatsP_154.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:15446: surāgam upadhā nityaṃ gīyate tasya veśmasu // MatsP_154.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:15449: iti niḥśeṣamathavā niḥśeṣaṃ vai na śakyate /
GP12mtp176pu:15455: yasya vadhyaḥ sa nādyāpi jātastribhuvane pumān // MatsP_154.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:15458: sa ca vavre vadhaṃ daityaḥ śiśutaḥ saptavāsarāt /
GP12mtp176pu:15459: sa saptadivaso bālaḥ śaṃkarādyo bhaviṣyati // MatsP_154.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:15463: uttāno varadaḥ pāṇir eṣa devyāḥ sadaiva tu // MatsP_154.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:15464: himācalasya duhitā sā tu devī bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:15465: tasyāḥ sakāśādyaḥ śarvas tv araṇyāṃ pāvako yathā // MatsP_154.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:15467: mayāpyupāyaḥ sa kṛto yathaivaṃ hi bhaviṣyati // MatsP_154.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:15473: niśāṃ sasmāra bhagavān svatanoḥ pūrvasaṃbhavām // MatsP_154.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:15475: tāṃ vivikte samālokya brahmovāca vibhāvarīm // MatsP_154.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:15478: tatkartavyaṃ tvayā devi śṛṇu kāryasya niścayam // MatsP_154.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:15482: śaṃkarasyābhavatpatnī satī dakṣasutā tu yā // MatsP_154.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:15488: tayoḥ sutaptatapasor bhavitā yo mahābalaḥ // MatsP_154.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:15490: jātamātrā tu sā devī svalpasaṃjñā ca bhāminī // MatsP_154.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:15493: tatastābhyāṃ tu janitaḥ svalpo vākkalaho bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:15494: tato 'pi saṃśayo bhūyas tārakaṃ prati dṛśyate // MatsP_154.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:15496: vighnastvayā vidhātavyo yathā tābhyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // MatsP_154.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:15497: garbhasthāne ca tanmātuḥ svena rūpeṇa rañjaya /
GP12mtp176pu:15498: tato vihāya śarvastāṃ viśrānto narmapūrvakam // MatsP_154.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:15499: bhartsayiṣyati tāṃ devīṃ tataḥ sā kupitā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:15502: sa bhaviṣyati hantā vai surārīṇāmasaṃśayam // MatsP_154.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:15508: tadā svameva tadrūpaṃ śailajā pratipatsyate // MatsP_154.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:15510: rūpāṃśena tu saṃyuktā tvamumāyāṃ bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_154.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:15515: tvaṃ bhūriti viśāṃ mātā śūdraiḥ śaivīti pūjitā /
GP12mtp176pu:15519: tvaṃ muktiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvadehinām /
GP12mtp176pu:15520: tvaṃ ca kīrtimatāṃ kīrtis tvaṃ mūrtiḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:15522: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kṛtabhūṣāṇāṃ tvaṃ śāntirduḥkhakarmaṇām // MatsP_154.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:15523: tvaṃ bhrāntiḥ sarvabodhānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ kratuyājinām /
GP12mtp176pu:15524: jaladhīnāṃ mahāvelā tvaṃ ca līlā vilāsinām // MatsP_154.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:15529: ye tvāṃ stoṣyanti varade pūjayiṣyanti vāpi ye /
GP12mtp176pu:15530: te sarvakāmānāpsyanti niyatā nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_154.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:15531: ityuktā tu niśā devī tathetyuktvā kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15532: jagāma tvaritā tūrṇaṃ gṛhaṃ himagireḥ param // MatsP_154.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:15542: tataḥ krameṇa divase gate dūraṃ vibhāvarī // MatsP_154.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:15551: āviveśāntaraṃ janma manyamānā kṣapā tu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:15554: brāhme muhūrte subhage vyasūyata guhāraṇim // MatsP_154.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:15558: abhavatkrūrasattvānāṃ cetaḥ śāntaṃ ca dehinām // MatsP_154.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:15561: gandhavanti ca mālyāni vimalaṃ ca nabho 'bhavat /
GP12mtp176pu:15586: smṛtiṃ śakrasya vijñāya jātāṃ tu bhagavāṃstadā // MatsP_154.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:15588: taṃ sa dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ samutthāya mahāsanāt // MatsP_154.113 //
GP12mtp176pu:15590: śakrapraṇītāṃ tāṃ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya yathāvidhi // MatsP_154.114 //
GP12mtp176pu:15592: pṛṣṭe ca kuśale śakraḥ provāca vacanaṃ prabhuḥ // MatsP_154.115 //
GP12mtp176pu:15597: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ yāti nivedyārthaṃ suhṛjjane // MatsP_154.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:15603: vandito himaśailena nirgatena puro muniḥ // MatsP_154.120 //
GP12mtp176pu:15604: saha praviśya bhavanaṃ bhuvo bhūṣaṇatāṃ gatam /
GP12mtp176pu:15605: nivedite svayaṃ haime himaśaile na vistṛte // MatsP_154.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:15607: yathārhaṃ cārghyapādyaṃ ca śailastasmai nyavedayat // MatsP_154.122 //
GP12mtp176pu:15614: pṛthutvaṃ manasā tulyaṃ kandarāṇāṃ tathācala // MatsP_154.125 //
GP12mtp176pu:15616: prasannatā ca toyasya manaso 'pyadhikā ca te // MatsP_154.126 //
GP12mtp176pu:15618: na ca lakṣmīstathā svarge kutrādhikatayā sthitā // MatsP_154.127 //
GP12mtp176pu:15623: aho dhanyo 'si śailendra yasya te kandaraṃ haraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15629: tatra sthito munivaraḥ śailena sahito vaśī /
GP12mtp176pu:15630: dṛṣṭvā tu tejaso rāśiṃ muniṃ śailapriyā tadā // MatsP_154.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:15632: tāṃ vilokya mahābhāgo maharṣir amitadyutiḥ // MatsP_154.134 //
GP12mtp176pu:15636: ehi vatseti cāpyuktā ṛṣiṇā snigdhayā girā // MatsP_154.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:15638: uvāca mātā tāṃ devīm abhivandaya putrike // MatsP_154.137 //
GP12mtp176pu:15640: ityuktā tu tato mātrā vastrāntapihitānanā // MatsP_154.138 //
GP12mtp176pu:15642: tataḥ punaruvācedaṃ vākyaṃ mātā sutāṃ tadā // MatsP_154.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:15643: vatse vandaya devarṣiṃ tato dāsyāmi te śubham /
GP12mtp176pu:15644: ratnakrīḍanakaṃ ramyaṃ sthāpitaṃ yacciraṃ mayā // MatsP_154.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:15645: ityuktā tu tato vegād uddhṛtya caraṇau tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:15647: kṛte tu vandane tasyā mātā sakhīmukhena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15651: jñātvā tadiṅgitaṃ śailo mahiṣyā hṛdayena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15654: smitānano mahābhāgo vākyaṃ provāca nāradaḥ // MatsP_154.145 //
GP12mtp176pu:15664: yo jāyate hi yadbījo janituḥ sa hyasārthakaḥ // MatsP_154.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:15665: janitā cāpi jātasya na kaściditi yatsphuṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:15674: saṃsārasya kuto vṛddhiḥ sarve syuryadatigrahāḥ // MatsP_154.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:15675: ataḥ kartrā tu śāstreṣu sutalābhaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15681: daśaputrasamā kanyā yā na syācchīlavarjitā // MatsP_154.157 //
GP12mtp176pu:15683: kanyā hi kṛpaṇā śocyā piturduḥkhavivardhinī // MatsP_154.158 //
GP12mtp176pu:15687: aho muhyāmi śuṣyāmi glāmi sīdāmi nārada // MatsP_154.160 //
GP12mtp176pu:15689: anugraheṇa me chinddhi duḥkhaṃ kanyāśrayaṃ mune // MatsP_154.161 //
GP12mtp176pu:15694: durlabhaḥ satpatiḥ strīṇāṃ viguṇo 'pi patiḥ kila /
GP12mtp176pu:15695: na prāpyate vinā puṇyaiḥ patirnāryā kadācana // MatsP_154.164 //
GP12mtp176pu:15697: dhanaṃ jīvitaparyāptaṃ patyau nāryāḥ pratiṣṭhitam // MatsP_154.165 //
GP12mtp176pu:15699: daivataṃ paramaṃ nāryāḥ patiruktaḥ sadaiva hi // MatsP_154.166 //
GP12mtp176pu:15700: tvayā coktaṃ hi devarṣe na jāto 'syāḥ patiḥ kila /
GP12mtp176pu:15702: carācare bhūtasarge yadadyāpi ca no mune /
GP12mtp176pu:15703: na sa jāta iti brūṣe tena me vyākulaṃ manaḥ // MatsP_154.168 //
GP12mtp176pu:15710: tatrāpi śreyasāṃ hyāśā mune na pratibhāti naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15714: tvaṃ me sarvaṃ vijānāsi satyavāgasi cāpyataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15715: muhyāmi muniśārdūla hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me // MatsP_154.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:15726: śaraṇyaḥ śāśvataḥ śāstā śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ // MatsP_154.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:15728: tasyaite parameśasya sarve krīḍanakā gire // MatsP_154.179 //
GP12mtp176pu:15731: manyase māyayā jātaṃ viṣṇuṃ cāpi yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:15732: ātmano na vināśo 'sti sthāvarānte 'pi bhūdhara // MatsP_154.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:15734: naśyate deha evātra nātmano nāśa ucyate // MatsP_154.182 //
GP12mtp176pu:15736: sa janmamṛtyuduḥkhārto hy avaśaḥ parivartate // MatsP_154.183 //
GP12mtp176pu:15738: bhaviṣyati patiḥ so 'syā jagannātho nirāmayaḥ // MatsP_154.184 //
GP12mtp176pu:15739: yaduktaṃ ca mayā devī lakṣaṇairvarjitā tava /
GP12mtp176pu:15740: śṛṇu tasyāpi vākyasya samyaktvena vicāraṇam // MatsP_154.185 //
GP12mtp176pu:15745: ato 'syā lakṣaṇaṃ gātre śaila nāsti mahāmate /
GP12mtp176pu:15747: uttāno varadaḥ pāṇir eṣa devyāḥ sadaiva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15750: asyāḥ śṛṇu mamātrāpi vāgyuktiṃ śailasattama // MatsP_154.190 //
GP12mtp176pu:15759: atyantaṃ hi mahatkāryaṃ devānāṃ himabhūdhara // MatsP_154.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:15761: evaṃ śrutvā tu śailendro nāradātsarvameva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:15762: ātmānaṃ sa punarjātaṃ mene menāpatistadā // MatsP_154.195 //
GP12mtp176pu:15764: uvāca so 'pi saṃhṛṣṭo nāradaṃ tu himācalaḥ // MatsP_154.196 //
GP12mtp176pu:15772: yadi vācāmadhīśaḥ syāṃ tvadguṇānāṃ vicāraṇe // MatsP_154.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:15774: tavāsmānprati cāpalyaṃ vyaktaṃ mama mahāmune // MatsP_154.200 //
GP12mtp176pu:15776: munīnāṃ devatānāṃ ca svayaṃkartāpi kalmaṣam // MatsP_154.201 //
GP12mtp176pu:15778: ityuktavati śailendre sa tadā harṣanirbhare // MatsP_154.202 //
GP12mtp176pu:15779: tathā ca nārado vākyaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvamiti prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:15780: surakārye ya evārthas tavāpi sumahattaraḥ // MatsP_154.203 //
GP12mtp176pu:15781: ityuktvā nāradaḥ śīghraṃ jagāma tridivaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:15782: sa gatvā śakrabhavanam amareśaṃ dadarśa ha // MatsP_154.204 //
GP12mtp176pu:15784: pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa provāca himajāsaṃśrayāṃ kathām // MatsP_154.205 //
GP12mtp176pu:15786: samūhya yattu kartavyaṃ tanmayā kṛtameva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:15792: prādurbhūtaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śakraḥ provāca sādaram // MatsP_154.208 //
GP12mtp176pu:15794: upadeśena bahunā kiṃ tvāṃ prati vade priyam /
GP12mtp176pu:15795: manobhavo 'si tena tvaṃ vetsi bhūtamanogatam // MatsP_154.209 //
GP12mtp176pu:15798: saṃyuto madhunā caiva ṛturājena durjaya // MatsP_154.210 //
GP12mtp176pu:15800: provāca pañcabāṇo 'tha vākyaṃ bhītaḥ śatakratum // MatsP_154.211 //
GP12mtp176pu:15803: duḥsādhyaḥ śaṃkaro devaḥ kiṃ na vetsi jagatprabho // MatsP_154.212 //
GP12mtp176pu:15804: tasya devasya vettha tvaṃ kāraṇaṃ tu yadavyayam /
GP12mtp176pu:15805: prāyaḥ prasādaḥ kopo 'pi sarvo hi mahatāṃ mahān // MatsP_154.213 //
GP12mtp176pu:15807: adhyāśritaṃ ca yatsaukhyaṃ bhavatā naṣṭaceṣṭitam // MatsP_154.214 //
GP12mtp176pu:15809: prāgeva ceha dṛśyante bhūtānāṃ kāryasaṃbhavāḥ // MatsP_154.215 //
GP12mtp176pu:15813: vayaṃ pramāṇāste hyatra ratikānta na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15815: kasyacic ca kvaciddṛṣṭaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na tu sarvataḥ // MatsP_154.217 //
GP12mtp176pu:15817: ratiyukto jagāmāśu prasthaṃ tu himabhūbhṛtaḥ // MatsP_154.218 //
GP12mtp176pu:15819: mahārthā ye hi niṣkampā manasteṣāṃ sudurjayam // MatsP_154.219 //
GP12mtp176pu:15821: saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuyuścaiva pūrvaṃ saṃśodhya mānasam // MatsP_154.220 //
GP12mtp176pu:15825: tāmasya viniyokṣyāmi manaso vikṛtiṃ parām // MatsP_154.222 //
GP12mtp176pu:15827: avagantuṃ hi māṃ tatra na kaścidatipaṇḍitaḥ // MatsP_154.223 //
GP12mtp176pu:15853: tataḥ sā tasya śanakais tirobhūyātinirmalā // MatsP_154.236 //
GP12mtp176pu:15859: sa tayā māyayāviṣṭo jajvāla madanastataḥ // MatsP_154.239 //
GP12mtp176pu:15863: anuyāto 'tha hṛdyena mitreṇa madhunā saha // MatsP_154.241 //
GP12mtp176pu:15865: stabakaṃ madano ramyaṃ haravakṣasi satvaram // MatsP_154.242 //
GP12mtp176pu:15867: śivasya hṛdaye śuddhe nāśaśālī mahāśaraḥ // MatsP_154.243 //
GP12mtp176pu:15869: tataḥ karaṇasaṃdeho viddhastu hṛdaye bhavaḥ // MatsP_154.244 //
GP12mtp176pu:15879: sa tu taṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā haranetrodbhavo 'nalaḥ // MatsP_154.249 //
GP12mtp176pu:15887: samprāpya snehasaṃpṛktaṃ kāmināṃ hṛdayaṃ kila // MatsP_154.253 //
GP12mtp176pu:15890: vilalāpa ratiḥ krūraṃ bandhunā madhunā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:15891: tato vilapya bahuśo madhunā parisāntvitā // MatsP_154.255 //
GP12mtp176pu:15895: nirbadhya tu jaṭājūṭaṃ kuṭilair alakai ratiḥ // MatsP_154.257 //
GP12mtp176pu:15899: namaḥ śivāyāstu nirāmayāya namaḥ śivāyāstu manomayāya /
GP12mtp176pu:15900: namaḥ śivāyāstu surārcitāya tubhyaṃ sadā bhaktakṛpāparāya // MatsP_154.259 //
GP12mtp176pu:15901: namo bhavāyāstu bhavodbhavāya namo 'stu te dhvastamanobhavāya /
GP12mtp176pu:15902: namo 'stu te gūḍhamahāvratāya namo 'stu māyāgahanāśrayāya // MatsP_154.260 //
GP12mtp176pu:15903: namo 'stu śarvāya namaḥ śivāya namo 'stu siddhāya purātanāya /
GP12mtp176pu:15904: namo 'stu kālāya namaḥ kalāya namo 'stu te jñānavarapradāya // MatsP_154.261 //
GP12mtp176pu:15908: namo 'stu nānājagatāṃ vidhātre namo 'stu te citraphalaprayoktre // MatsP_154.263 //
GP12mtp176pu:15910: namo 'stu bhaktābhimatapradātre namaḥ sadā te bhavasaṅgahartre // MatsP_154.264 //
GP12mtp176pu:15911: anantarūpāya sadaiva tubhyam asahyakopāya namo 'stu tubhyam /
GP12mtp176pu:15912: śaśāṅkacihnāya sadaiva tubhyam ameyamānāya namaḥ stutāya // MatsP_154.265 //
GP12mtp176pu:15914: namo 'stu bhaktyābhimatapradāya namo 'stu sarvārtiharāya tubhyam // MatsP_154.266 //
GP12mtp176pu:15916: tvāmindumauliṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannā priyāprameyaṃ mahatāṃ maheśam // MatsP_154.267 //
GP12mtp176pu:15917: prayaccha me kāmayaśaḥsamṛddhiṃ punaḥ prabho jīvatu kāmadevaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15918: priyaṃ vinā tvāṃ priyajīviteṣu tvatto 'paraḥ ko bhuvaneṣvihāsti // MatsP_154.268 //
GP12mtp176pu:15922: itthaṃ stutaḥ śaṃkara īḍya īśo vṛṣākapirmanmathakāntayā tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15923: tutoṣa doṣākarakhaṇḍadhārī uvāca caināṃ madhuraṃ nirīkṣya // MatsP_154.270 //
GP12mtp176pu:15926: anaṅga iti lokeṣu sa vikhyātiṃ gamiṣyati // MatsP_154.271 //
GP12mtp176pu:15929: ruroda cāpi bahuśo dīnā ramye sthale tu sā /
GP12mtp176pu:15934: śarābhyāṃ saṃyutāṃ śailo gṛhītvā svasutāṃ tataḥ // MatsP_154.275 //
GP12mtp176pu:15939: kautukena parāmṛśya tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rudatīṃ giriḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15942: kāsi kasyāsi kalyāṇi kimarthaṃ cāpi rodiṣi /
GP12mtp176pu:15944: sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā uvāca madhunā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:15947: kāmasya dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ ratiṃ māṃ viddhi suvrata /
GP12mtp176pu:15951: ahaṃ tu śaraṇaṃ yātā taṃ devaṃ bhayavihvalā /
GP12mtp176pu:15952: stutavatyatha saṃstutyā tato māṃ giriśo 'bravīt // MatsP_154.283 //
GP12mtp176pu:15955: lapsyate kāṅkṣitaṃ kāmaṃ nivartya maraṇāditaḥ // MatsP_154.284 //
GP12mtp176pu:15959: pāṇāvādāya hi sutāṃ gantumaicchatsvakaṃ puram // MatsP_154.286 //
GP12mtp176pu:15961: lajjamānā sakhimukhair uvāca pitaraṃ girim // MatsP_154.287 //
GP12mtp176pu:15964: kathaṃ ca tādṛśaṃ prāptaṃ sukhaṃ me sa patirbhavet // MatsP_154.288 //
GP12mtp176pu:15966: durbhagatvaṃ vṛthā loko vahate sati sādhane // MatsP_154.289 //
GP12mtp176pu:15968: bhaviṣyāmi na saṃdeho niyamaiḥ śoṣaye tanum // MatsP_154.290 //
GP12mtp176pu:15970: sāhaṃ tapaḥ kariṣyāmi yadahaṃ prāpya durlabhā // MatsP_154.291 //
GP12mtp176pu:15974: umeti capale putri na kṣamaṃ tāvakaṃ vapuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15979: bhavanāyaiva gacchāmaś cintayiṣyāmi tatra vai // MatsP_154.295 //
GP12mtp176pu:15980: ityuktā tu yadā naiva guhāyābhyeti śailajā /
GP12mtp176pu:15981: tataḥ sa cintayāviṣṭo duhitāṃ praśaśaṃsa ca // MatsP_154.296 //
GP12mtp176pu:15983: umeti capale putri tvayoktā tanayā tataḥ // MatsP_154.297 //
GP12mtp176pu:15985: siddhiṃ ca mūrtimatyeṣā sādhayiṣyati cintitām // MatsP_154.298 //
GP12mtp176pu:15987: anujñāya sutāṃ śailo jagāmāśu svamandiram // MatsP_154.299 //
GP12mtp176pu:16007: nirāhārā śataṃ sābhūt samānāṃ tapasāṃ nidhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16010: te samāgamya munayaḥ sarve samuditāstataḥ // MatsP_154.310 //
GP12mtp176pu:16012: kimarthaṃ tu suraśreṣṭha saṃsmṛtāstu vayaṃ tvayā // MatsP_154.311 //
GP12mtp176pu:16015: tasyā hyabhimataṃ kāmaṃ bhavantaḥ kartumarhatha // MatsP_154.312 //
GP12mtp176pu:16019: putri kiṃ te vyavasitaḥ kāmaḥ kamalalocane // MatsP_154.314 //
GP12mtp176pu:16021: tapasyato mahābhāgāḥ prāpya maune bhavādṛśān // MatsP_154.315 //
GP12mtp176pu:16028: tyaktvā vratātmakaṃ maunaṃ maunaṃ jagrāha hrīmayam /
GP12mtp176pu:16029: bhāvaṃ tasyāstu maunāntaṃ tasyāḥ saptarṣayo yathā // MatsP_154.319 //
GP12mtp176pu:16033: bhagavanto vijānanti prāṇināṃ mānasaṃ hitam // MatsP_154.321 //
GP12mtp176pu:16035: kecit tu nipuṇāstatra ghaṭante vibudhodyamaiḥ // MatsP_154.322 //
GP12mtp176pu:16040: vandhyā sutaṃ prāptukāmā manaḥ prasarate muhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16041: ahaṃ kila bhavaṃ devaṃ patiṃ prāptuṃ samudyatā // MatsP_154.325 //
GP12mtp176pu:16049: dvividhaṃ tu sukhaṃ tāvat putri lokeṣu bhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:16051: prakṛtyā sa tu digvāsā bhīmaḥ pitṛvaṇeśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16052: kapālī bhikṣuko nagno virūpākṣaḥ sthirakriyaḥ // MatsP_154.330 //
GP12mtp176pu:16054: yatinā tena kaste 'rtho mūrtānarthena kāṅkṣitaḥ // MatsP_154.331 //
GP12mtp176pu:16056: tatkathaṃ te mahādevād bhayabhājo jugupsitāt // MatsP_154.332 //
GP12mtp176pu:16064: vāyurasti jagaddhātā yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.336 //
GP12mtp176pu:16066: ebhya ekatamaṃ kasmān na tvaṃ samprāptumicchasi // MatsP_154.337 //
GP12mtp176pu:16073: asya te vidhiyogasya dhātā kartātra caiva hi // MatsP_154.340 //
GP12mtp176pu:16075: ityuktā sā tu kupitā munivaryeṣu śailajā /
GP12mtp176pu:16078: asadgrahasya kā prītir vyasanasya kva yantraṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:16080: evaṃ māṃ vettha duṣprajñāṃ hy asthānāsadgrahapriyām /
GP12mtp176pu:16083: nūnaṃ na vettha taṃ devaṃ śāśvataṃ jagataḥ prabhum // MatsP_154.344 //
GP12mtp176pu:16086: viduryaṃ na haribrahma-pramukhā hi sureśvarāḥ // MatsP_154.346 //
GP12mtp176pu:16088: prakaṭaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tadapyatra na vettha kim // MatsP_154.347 //
GP12mtp176pu:16090: kasya bhūḥ kasya varuṇaḥ kaścandrārkavilocanaḥ // MatsP_154.348 //
GP12mtp176pu:16092: yaṃ bruvantīśvaraṃ devā vidhīndrādyā maharṣayaḥ // MatsP_154.349 //
GP12mtp176pu:16093: prabhāvaṃ prabhavaṃ caiṣa teṣāmapi na vettha kim /
GP12mtp176pu:16094: aditiḥ kasya māteyaṃ kasmājjāto janārdanaḥ // MatsP_154.350 //
GP12mtp176pu:16096: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putro hy aditirdakṣaputrikā // MatsP_154.351 //
GP12mtp176pu:16097: marīciścāpi dakṣaśca putrau tau brahmaṇaḥ kila /
GP12mtp176pu:16106: kṛtvānyaṃ deham anyā dṛk tādṛk kṛtvā punarhariḥ // MatsP_154.356 //
GP12mtp176pu:16108: evameva hi saṃsāro yo janmamaraṇātmakaḥ // MatsP_154.357 //
GP12mtp176pu:16110: atha nārāyaṇo devaḥ svakāṃ chāyāṃ samāśrayat // MatsP_154.358 //
GP12mtp176pu:16112: sāpi karmaṇa evoktā preraṇā vivaśātmanām // MatsP_154.359 //
GP12mtp176pu:16118: na hyasya jīvitaṃ dīrghaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dehe tu kutracit // MatsP_154.362 //
GP12mtp176pu:16122: kvacitsamāḥ śataṃ jīvet kvacidbālye vipadyate // MatsP_154.364 //
GP12mtp176pu:16124: jīvito na mriyatyagre tasmātso 'mara ucyate // MatsP_154.365 //
GP12mtp176pu:16130: sthitaṃ ca tāratamyena prāṇināṃ paramaṃ tvidam // MatsP_154.368 //
GP12mtp176pu:16136: evaṃ niśamya vacanaṃ devyā munivarāstadā // MatsP_154.371 //
GP12mtp176pu:16138: ūcuśca paramaprītāḥ śailajāṃ madhuraṃ vacaḥ // MatsP_154.372 //
GP12mtp176pu:16145: kvādityasya prabhā yāti ratnebhyaḥ kva dyutiḥ pṛthak // MatsP_154.375 //
GP12mtp176pu:16146: ko 'rtho varṇālikāvyaktaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ giriśaṃ vinā /
GP12mtp176pu:16148: asmākamapi vai so 'rthaḥ sutarāṃ hṛdi vartate /
GP12mtp176pu:16149: atastvameva sā buddhir yato nītistvameva hi // MatsP_154.377 //
GP12mtp176pu:16151: ityuktvā pūjitā yātā munayo girikanyayā // MatsP_154.378 //
GP12mtp176pu:16155: gireḥ samprāpya te prasthaṃ dadṛśuḥ śaṃkarāśramam // MatsP_154.380 //
GP12mtp176pu:16159: sapta te munayaḥ pūjyā vinītāḥ kāryagauravāt // MatsP_154.382 //
GP12mtp176pu:16163: tvameva no gatistattvaṃ yathā kālānatikramaḥ // MatsP_154.384 //
GP12mtp176pu:16165: ityukto munibhiḥ so 'tha gauravāttānuvāca saḥ // MatsP_154.385 //
GP12mtp176pu:16167: kṣaṇena bhavitā viprās tatra drakṣyatha śūlinam // MatsP_154.386 //
GP12mtp176pu:16174: samprāptā munayaḥ sapta tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ dīptatejasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16178: bhūbhaṅgasaṃjñayā teṣāṃ praveśājñāṃ dadau tadā // MatsP_154.391 //
GP12mtp176pu:16186: manmathāriṃ tato hṛṣṭāḥ samaṃ tuṣṭuvurādṛtāḥ // MatsP_154.395 //
GP12mtp176pu:16188: aho kṛtārthā vayameva sāṃprataṃ sureśvaro 'pyatra varo bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:16189: bhavatprasādāmalavārisekataḥ phalena kācit tapasā niyujyate // MatsP_154.396 //
GP12mtp176pu:16190: jayatyasau dhanyataro himācalas tadāśrayaṃ yasya sutā tapasyati /
GP12mtp176pu:16191: sa daityarājo 'pi mahāphalodayo vimūlitāśeṣasuro hi tārakaḥ // MatsP_154.397 //
GP12mtp176pu:16192: tvadīyamaṃśaṃ pravilokya kalmaṣāt svakaṃ śarīraṃ parimokṣyate hi yaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16193: sa dhanyadhīrlokapitā caturmukho hariśca yatsaṃbhramavahnidīpitaḥ // MatsP_154.398 //
GP12mtp176pu:16195: tvameva caiko vividhākṛtakriyaḥ kileti vācā vidhurair vibhāṣyate // MatsP_154.399 //
GP12mtp176pu:16196: athādya ekastvamavādi nānyathā jagattathā nirghṛṇatāṃ tava spṛśet /
GP12mtp176pu:16197: na vetsi vā duḥkhamidaṃ prajātmakaṃ vihanyate te khalu sarvataḥ kriyā // MatsP_154.400 //
GP12mtp176pu:16198: upekṣase cej jagatāmupadravaṃ dayāmayatvaṃ tava kena kathyate /
GP12mtp176pu:16200: vayaṃ ca te dhanyatarāḥ śarīriṇāṃ yadīdṛśaṃ tvāṃ pravilokayāmahe /
GP12mtp176pu:16201: adarśanaṃ tena manoratho yathā prayāti sāphalyatayā manogatam // MatsP_154.402 //
GP12mtp176pu:16203: vinemuritthaṃ munayo visṛjya tāṃ giraṃ girīśaśrutibhūmisaṃnidhau // MatsP_154.403 //
GP12mtp176pu:16204: utkṛṣṭakedāra ivāvanītale subījamuṣṭiṃ suphalāya karṣakāḥ // MatsP_154.404 //
GP12mtp176pu:16205: teṣāṃ śrutvā tu tāṃ ramyāṃ prakramopakramakriyām /
GP12mtp176pu:16211: teṣāṃ tvaranti cetāṃsi kiṃtu kāryaṃ vivakṣitam // MatsP_154.407 //
GP12mtp176pu:16213: sevante te yato dharmaṃ tatprāmāṇyātpare sthitāḥ // MatsP_154.408 //
GP12mtp176pu:16218: devo duhitaraṃ sākṣāt pinākī tava mārgate /
GP12mtp176pu:16230: varastasyāpi cāhūya sutā deyā hyayācataḥ // MatsP_154.415 //
GP12mtp176pu:16238: yasyopayogi yadrūpaṃ sā ca tatprāptaye ciram /
GP12mtp176pu:16239: ghoraṃ tapasyate bālā tena rūpeṇa nirvṛtiḥ // MatsP_154.419 //
GP12mtp176pu:16241: tatra sāvahitā tāvat tasmāt saiva bhaviṣyati // MatsP_154.420 //
GP12mtp176pu:16242: ityuktvā giriṇā sārdhaṃ te yayuryatra śailajā /
GP12mtp176pu:16245: ramyaṃ priyaṃ manohāri mā rūpaṃ tapasā daha // MatsP_154.422 //
GP12mtp176pu:16246: prātaste śaṃkaraḥ pāṇim eṣa putri grahīṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:16248: pitrā saha gṛhaṃ gaccha vayaṃ yāmaḥ svamandiram // MatsP_154.424 //
GP12mtp176pu:16249: ityuktā tapasaḥ satyaṃ phalamastīti cintya sā /
GP12mtp176pu:16251: sā tatra rajanīṃ mene varṣāyutasamāṃ satī /
GP12mtp176pu:16253: tato muhūrte brāhme tu tasyāścakruḥ surastriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16256: upāsata giriṃ mūrtā ṛtavaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ // MatsP_154.428 //
GP12mtp176pu:16258: harmyeṣu śrīḥ svayaṃ devī kṛtanānāprasādhanā // MatsP_154.429 //
GP12mtp176pu:16265: nadyaḥ samudrā nikhilāḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:16273: uvāca cāpi vacanaṃ putraṃ janaya śaṃkara /
GP12mtp176pu:16274: yo daityendrakulaṃ hatvā māṃ raktaistarpayiṣyati // MatsP_154.437 //
GP12mtp176pu:16276: bhujagābharaṇaṃ gṛhya sajjaṃ śaṃbhoḥ puro 'bhavat // MatsP_154.438 //
GP12mtp176pu:16282: svāṃ dyutiṃ lokanāthasya jagataḥ karmasākṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_154.441 //
GP12mtp176pu:16284: manujāsthimayīṃ mālām ābabandha ca pāṇinā // MatsP_154.442 //
GP12mtp176pu:16288: karṇottaṃsaṃ cakāreśo vāsukiṃ takṣakaṃ svayam // MatsP_154.444 //
GP12mtp176pu:16290: tatastu te gaṇādhīśā vinayāttatra vīrakam // MatsP_154.445 //
GP12mtp176pu:16300: ratiḥ purastava prāptā nābhāti madanojjhitā // MatsP_154.450 //
GP12mtp176pu:16303: tato haro himagirikandarākṛtiṃ sitaṃ kaśāmṛduhatibhiḥ pracodayat /
GP12mtp176pu:16304: mahāvṛṣaṃ gaṇatumulāhitekṣaṇaṃ sa bhūdharānaśaniriva prakampayan // MatsP_154.452 //
GP12mtp176pu:16306: dharārajaḥśabalitabhūṣaṇo 'bravīt prayāta mā kuruta patho 'sya saṃkaṭam // MatsP_154.453 //
GP12mtp176pu:16307: prabhoḥ punaḥ prathamaniyogamūrjayan suto 'bravīd bhrukuṭimukho 'pi vīrakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16308: viyaccarā viyati kimasti kāntakaṃ prayāta no dharaṇidharāvidūrataḥ // MatsP_154.454 //
GP12mtp176pu:16310: gaṇeśvarāś capalatayā na gamyatāṃ sureśvaraiḥ sthiramatibhir nirīkṣyate // MatsP_154.455 //
GP12mtp176pu:16311: na bhṛṅgiṇā svatanumavekṣya nīyate pinākinaḥ pṛthumukhamaṇḍam agrataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16312: vṛthā yamaḥ prakaṭitadantakoṭaraṃ tvamāyudhaṃ vahasi vihāya saṃbhramam // MatsP_154.456 //
GP12mtp176pu:16313: padaṃ na yadrathaturagaiḥ puradviṣaḥ pramucyate bahutaramātṛsaṃkulam /
GP12mtp176pu:16314: amī surāḥ pṛthaganuyāyibhirvṛtāḥ padātayo dviguṇapathān harapriyāḥ // MatsP_154.457 //
GP12mtp176pu:16316: surāḥ svakaṃ kimiti sarāgamūrjitaṃ vicāryate niyatalayatrayānugam // MatsP_154.458 //
GP12mtp176pu:16317: na kiṃnarair abhibhavituṃ hi śakyate vibhūṣaṇacayasamudbhavo dhvaniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16318: ajātijāḥ kimiti na ṣaḍjamadhyam apṛthusvaraṃ bahutaramatra vakṣyate // MatsP_154.459 //
GP12mtp176pu:16320: viśaṅkitā bhavadatibhedaśīlinaḥ prayāntyamī drutapadameva gauḍakāḥ // MatsP_154.460 //
GP12mtp176pu:16321: visaṃhatāḥ kimiti na ṣāḍgavādayaḥ svagītakair lalitapadaprayogajaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16322: prabhoḥ puro bhavati hi yasya cākṣataṃ samudgatārthakamiti tatpratīyate // MatsP_154.461 //
GP12mtp176pu:16325: amī kathaṃ kakubhi kathāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ dhvananti te vividhavadhūvimiśritāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16326: na jātayo dhvanimurajāsamīritā na mūrchitāḥ kimiti ca mūrchanātmakāḥ // MatsP_154.463 //
GP12mtp176pu:16328: na hanyate bahuvidhavādyaḍambaraṃ prakīrṇavīṇāmurajādi nāma yat // MatsP_154.464 //*
GP12mtp176pu:16329: itīrate girimavadhānaśālinaḥ surāsurāḥ sapadi tu vīrakājñayā /
GP12mtp176pu:16330: niyāmitāḥ prayayuratīva harṣitāś carācaraṃ jagadakhilaṃ hyapūrayan // MatsP_154.465 //
GP12mtp176pu:16332: jagatyabhūttumula ivākulīkṛtaḥ pinākinā tvaritagatena bhūdharaḥ // MatsP_154.466 //
GP12mtp176pu:16334: kvacit kvacid vimalavidūravedikaṃ kvacid galajjaladhararamyanirjharam // MatsP_154.467 //
GP12mtp176pu:16344: kāciduvāca kalaṃ gatamānā kātaratāṃ sakhi mā kuru mūḍhe // MatsP_154.472 //
GP12mtp176pu:16345: dagdhamanobhava eva pinākī kāmayate svayameva vihartum /
GP12mtp176pu:16346: kācidapi svayameva patantī prāha parāṃ virahaskhalitāṅgīm // MatsP_154.473 //
GP12mtp176pu:16347: mā capale madanavyatiṣaṅgaṃ śaṃkarajaṃ skhalanena vada tvam /
GP12mtp176pu:16349: eṣa sa yatra sahasramakhādyā nākasadāmadhipāḥ svayamuktaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16350: nāmabhir indujaṭaṃ nijasevā-prāptaphalāya natāstu ghaṭante // MatsP_154.475 //
GP12mtp176pu:16351: eṣa na caiṣa sa eṣa yadagre carmaparītatanuḥ śaśimaulī /
GP12mtp176pu:16354: sapraṇayaṃ karaghaṭṭitavaktraḥ kiṃciduvāca mitaṃ śrutimūle // MatsP_154.477 //
GP12mtp176pu:16356: śaṃkarasaṃśrayaṇād girijāyāj-anmaphalaṃ paramaṃ tviti cocuḥ // MatsP_154.478 //
GP12mtp176pu:16362: netrāṇi saphalānyadya manobhiriti te dadhuḥ // MatsP_154.481 //
GP12mtp176pu:16368: dātā mahībhṛtāṃ nātho hotā devaścaturmukhaḥ // MatsP_154.484 //
GP12mtp176pu:16376: tasthau sābharaṇo devo harṣadaḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.488 //
GP12mtp176pu:16384: mūrtāśca ṛtavastatra jaguśca nanṛtuśca vai // MatsP_154.492 //
GP12mtp176pu:16389: avasattāṃ kṣapāṃ tatra patnyā saha purāntakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16394: tato gate bhagavati nīlalohite sahomayā ratimalabhanna bhūdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16395: sabāndhavo bhavati ca kasya no mano vihvalaṃ ca jagati hi kanyakāpituḥ // MatsP_154.497 //
GP12mtp176pu:16397: haro girau ciramanukalpitaṃ tadā visarjitāmaranivaho 'viśatsvakam // MatsP_154.498 //
GP12mtp176pu:16399: purodyāneṣu ramyeṣu vivikteṣu vaneṣu ca // MatsP_154.499 //
GP12mtp176pu:16401: tato bahutithe kāle sutakāmā gireḥ sutā // MatsP_154.500 //
GP12mtp176pu:16405: tadudvartanakaṃ gṛhya naraṃ cakre gajānanam // MatsP_154.502 //
GP12mtp176pu:16409: putretyuvāca te devī putretyūce ca jāhnavī // MatsP_154.504 //
GP12mtp176pu:16412: punaḥ sā krīḍanaṃ cakre putrārthaṃ varavarṇinī /
GP12mtp176pu:16416: tato devaiśca munibhiḥ proktā devī tvidaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16417: bhavāni bhavatī bhavyā sambhūtā lokabhūtaye // MatsP_154.508 //
GP12mtp176pu:16419: aputrāśca prajāḥ prāyo dṛśyante daivahetavaḥ // MatsP_154.509 //
GP12mtp176pu:16422: ityuktā harṣapūrṇāṅgī provācomā śubhāṃ giram // MatsP_154.510 //
GP12mtp176pu:16423: evaṃ nirudake deśe yaḥ kūpaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16424: bindau bindau ca toyasya vasetsaṃvatsaraṃ divi // MatsP_154.511 //
GP12mtp176pu:16427: eṣaiva mama maryādā niyatā lokabhāvinī // MatsP_154.512 //
GP12mtp176pu:16429: jagmuḥ svamandirāṇyeva bhavānīṃ vandya sādaram // MatsP_154.513 //
GP12mtp176pu:16449: papraccha taṃ śubhatanur haraṃ vismayapūrvakam // MatsP_154.523 //
GP12mtp176pu:16451: ete gaṇeśāḥ krīḍante śaile 'sminmatpriyāḥ sadā // MatsP_154.524 //
GP12mtp176pu:16453: yairahaṃ toṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ ta ete manujottamāḥ // MatsP_154.525 //
GP12mtp176pu:16460: hṛdyā me cārusarvāṅgi ta ete krīḍitā girau /
GP12mtp176pu:16461: ityuktā tu tato devī tyaktvā tadvismayākulā // MatsP_154.529 //
GP12mtp176pu:16463: yāvantaste kṛśā dīrghā hrasvāḥ sthūlā mahodarāḥ // MatsP_154.530 //
GP12mtp176pu:16475: gaṇeśāṃstāṃstathā dṛṣṭvā devī provāca śaṃkaram // MatsP_154.536 //
GP12mtp176pu:16478: ekaikaśo mama brūhi dhiṣṭhitā ye pṛthakpṛthak // MatsP_154.537 //
GP12mtp176pu:16488: na hyeṣāṃ vai anantatvād guṇānvaktuṃ hi śakyate // MatsP_154.541 //
GP12mtp176pu:16495: ya eṣa gaṇagīteṣu dattakarṇo muhurmuhuḥ // MatsP_154.544 //
GP12mtp176pu:16496: sa eṣa vīrako devi sadā maddhṛdayapriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16503: tvayā mātrā kṛtārtho 'stu vīrako 'pi sumadhyame // MatsP_154.547 //
GP12mtp176pu:16509: ehi vīraka cāpalyāt tvayā devaḥ prakopitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16510: kimuttaraṃ vadatyarthe nṛtyaraṅge tu śailajā // MatsP_154.550 //
GP12mtp176pu:16518: ehyehi yāto 'si me putratāṃ devadevena datto 'dhunā vīraka // MatsP_154.554 //
GP12mtp176pu:16519: ityevamaṅke nidhāyātha taṃ paryacumbatkapole kalavādinam // MatsP_154.555 //
GP12mtp176pu:16520: mūrdhnyupāghrāya saṃmārjya gātrāṇi bhūṣayāmāsa divyaiḥ svayaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ kiṅkiṇīmekhalānūpurair māṇikyakeyūrahārorumūlaguṇaiḥ // MatsP_154.556 //
GP12mtp176pu:16521: komalaiḥ pallavaiścitritaiścārubhir divyamantrodbhavais tasya śubhaistato bhūribhiścākaronmiśrasiddhārthakair aṅgarakṣāvidhim // MatsP_154.557 //
GP12mtp176pu:16522: evamādāya covāca kṛtvā srajaṃ mūrdhni gorocanāpatrabhaṅgojjvalam // MatsP_154.558 //
GP12mtp176pu:16523: gaccha gacchādhunā krīḍa sārdhaṃ gaṇairapramatto nage śvabhravarja śanairvyālamālākulāḥ śailasānudrumadantibhir bhinnasārāḥ pare saṅginaḥ // MatsP_154.559 //
GP12mtp176pu:16524: jāhnavīyaṃ jalaṃ kṣubdhatoyākulaṃ kūlaṃ mā viśethā bahuvyāghraduṣṭe vane // MatsP_154.560 //
GP12mtp176pu:16525: vatsāsaṃkhyeṣu durgā gaṇeśeṣvetasminvīrake putrabhāvopatuṣṭāntaḥkaraṇā tiṣṭhatu // MatsP_154.561 //
GP12mtp176pu:16527: so 'pi nirvartya sarvān gaṇān sasmayamāha bālatvalīlārasāviṣṭadhīḥ // MatsP_154.563 //
GP12mtp176pu:16528: eṣa mātrā svayaṃ me kṛtabhūṣaṇo 'tra eṣa paṭaḥ pāṭalairbindubhiḥ sinduvārasya puṣpairiyaṃ mālatīmiśritā mālikā me śirasyāhitā // MatsP_154.564 //
GP12mtp176pu:16529: ko 'yamātodyadhārī gaṇastasya dāsyāmi hastādidaṃ krīḍanam // MatsP_154.565 //
GP12mtp176pu:16530: dakṣiṇātpaścimaṃ paścimāduttaramuttarātpūrvamabhyetya sakhyā yutā prekṣatī taṃ gavākṣāntarādvīrakaṃ śailaputrī bahiḥ krīḍanaṃ yajjaganmāturapyeṣa cittabhramaḥ // MatsP_154.566 //
GP12mtp176pu:16531: putralubdho janastatra ko mohamāyāti na svalpacetā jaḍo māṃsaviṇmūtrasaṃghātadehaḥ // MatsP_154.567 //
