GP12mtp176pu:16532: draṣṭumabhyantare nākavāseśvarair indumauliṃ praviṣṭeṣu kakṣāntaram // MatsP_154.568 //
GP12mtp176pu:16533: vāhanātyāvarohā gaṇāstairyuto lokapālāstramūrto hyayaṃ khaḍgo vikhaḍgakaro nirmamaḥ kṛtāntaḥ kasya kenāhato brūta maune bhavanto 'stradaṇḍena kiṃ duḥspṛhāḥ // MatsP_154.569 //
GP12mtp176pu:16534: bhīmamūrtyānanenāsti kṛtyaṃ girau ya eṣo 'strajñena kiṃ vadhyate // MatsP_154.570 //
GP12mtp176pu:16535: mā vṛthā lokapālānugacittatā evam evaitad ityūcurasmai tadā devatāḥ // MatsP_154.571 //
GP12mtp176pu:16536: devadevānugaṃ vīrakaṃ lakṣaṇā prāha devī vanaṃ parvatā nirjharāṇyagnidevyānyatho bhūtapā nirjharāmbhonipāteṣu nimajjata // MatsP_154.572 //
GP12mtp176pu:16537: puṣpajālāvanaddheṣu dhāmasvapi prottuṅganānādrikuñjeṣvanugarjantu hemārutāsphoṭasaṃkṣepaṇāt kāmataḥ // MatsP_154.573 //
GP12mtp176pu:16538_2: siddhanārībhir āpītarūpāmṛtaṃ vistṛtair netrapātrair anunmeṣibhir vīrake śailaputrī
GP12mtp176pu:16539_0: so 'pi tādṛkkṣaṇāvāptapuṇyodayo yo 'pi janmāntarasyātmajatvaṃ gataḥ krīḍatastasya
GP12mtp176pu:16539_1: tṛptiḥ kathaṃ jāyate yo 'pi bhāvijagadvedhasā tejasaḥ kalpitaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ divyagītakṣaṇo
GP12mtp176pu:16541: kṣaṇaṃ phullanānātamālālikāle kṣaṇaṃ vṛkṣamūle vilolo marāle // MatsP_154.576 //
GP12mtp176pu:16542: kṣaṇe svalpapaṅke jale paṅkajāḍhye kṣaṇaṃ māturaṅke śubhe niṣkalaṅke /
GP12mtp176pu:16544: nikuñjeṣu vidyādharairgītaśīlaḥ pinākīva līlāvilāsaiḥ salīlaḥ // MatsP_154.577 //
GP12mtp176pu:16572: bhujaṃgīvāsitā śuddhā saṃśliṣṭā candane tarau // MatsP_155.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:16574: rajanīvāsite pakṣe dṛṣṭidoṣaṃ dadāsi me // MatsP_155.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16581: tasyā me niyatastveṣa hy avamānaḥ pade pade // MatsP_155.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:16582: naivāsmi kuṭilā śarva viṣamā naiva dhūrjaṭe /
GP12mtp176pu:16584: nāhaṃ pūṣṇo 'pi daśanā netre cāsmi bhagasya hi /
GP12mtp176pu:16587: yastvaṃ māmāha kṛṣṇeti mahākāleti viśrutaḥ // MatsP_155.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16589: jīvantyā nāsti me kṛtyaṃ dhūrtena paribhūtayā // MatsP_155.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16596: yadyevaṃ kupitā bhīru tvaṃ tavāhaṃ na vai punaḥ // MatsP_155.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16600: tasmānna jātu ruṣṭasya narmaspṛṣṭo janaḥ kila // MatsP_155.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:16602: kopaṃ tīvraṃ na tatyāja satī marmaṇi ghaṭṭitā // MatsP_155.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:16606: satyaṃ sarvairavayavaiḥ sutāsi sadṛśī pituḥ // MatsP_155.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16612: ityuktā sā punaḥ prāha giriśaṃ śailajā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:16616: tavāpi duṣṭasaṃparkāt saṃkrāntaṃ sarvameva hi // MatsP_155.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16619: tathā bahu kimuktena alaṃ vācā śrameṇa te /
GP12mtp176pu:16620: śmaśānavāsān nirbhīs tvaṃ nagnatvānna tava trapā /
GP12mtp176pu:16621: nirghṛṇatvaṃ kapālitvād dayā te vigatā ciram // MatsP_155.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16625: kva mātargacchasi tyaktvā rudanto dhāvitāḥ punaḥ // MatsP_155.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:16627: provāca mātaḥ kiṃtvetat kva yāsi kupitāntarā // MatsP_155.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:16629: no cetpatiṣye śikharāt taponiṣṭhe tvayojjhitaḥ // MatsP_155.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:16630: unnāmya vadanaṃ devī dakṣiṇena tu pāṇinā /
GP12mtp176pu:16631: uvāca vīrakaṃ mātā śokaṃ putraka mā kṛthāḥ // MatsP_155.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:16632: śailāgrātpatituṃ naiva na cāgantuṃ mayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:16633: yuktaṃ te putra vakṣyāmi yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu // MatsP_155.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:16635: sārhaṃ tapaḥ kariṣyāmi yena gaurītvamāpnuyām // MatsP_155.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:16637: dvārarakṣā tvayā kāryā nityaṃ randhrānvavekṣiṇā // MatsP_155.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:16638: yathā na kācit praviśed yoṣidatra harāntikam /
GP12mtp176pu:16639: dṛṣṭvā parāṃstriyaṃ cātra vadethā mama putraka // MatsP_155.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16641: evamastviti devīṃ sa vīrakaḥ prāha sāṃpratam // MatsP_155.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:16643: jagāma kakṣāṃ saṃdraṣṭuṃ praṇipatya ca mātaram // MatsP_155.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:16648: kusumamodinīṃ nāma tasya śailasya devatām // MatsP_156.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:16650: kva putri gacchasītyuccair āliṅgyovāca devatā // MatsP_156.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16655: sarvataḥ saṃnidhānaṃ te mama cātīva vatsalā // MatsP_156.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:16659: pinākinaḥ praviṣṭāyāṃ vaktavyaṃ me tvayānaghe // MatsP_156.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:16661: ityuktā sā tathetyuktvā jagāma svagiriṃ śubham // MatsP_156.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16665: grīṣme pañcāgnisaṃtaptā varṣāsu ca jaloṣitā // MatsP_156.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16667: evaṃ sādhayatī tatra tapasā saṃvyavasthitā // MatsP_156.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16668: jñātvā tu tāṃ girisutāṃ daityastatrāntare vaśī /
GP12mtp176pu:16673: sa tatrāgatya dadṛśe vīrakaṃ dvāryavasthitam // MatsP_156.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:16681: na kaścic ca vinā mṛtyuṃ naro dānava vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:16682: yatastato 'pi daityendra mṛtyuḥ prāpyaḥ śarīriṇā // MatsP_156.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16684: rūpasya parivarto me yadā syātpadmasaṃbhava // MatsP_156.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16685: tadā mṛtyurmama bhaved anyathā tvamaro hyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:16688: tadā te bhavitā mṛtyur anyathā na bhaviṣyati // MatsP_156.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16692: bhujaṃgarūpī randhreṇa praviveśa dṛśaḥ patham // MatsP_156.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16705: apṛcchatsādhu te bhāvo giriputri na kṛtrimaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16706: yā tvaṃ madāśayaṃ jñātvā prāpteha varavarṇinī // MatsP_156.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:16713: ratiśca tatra me nābhūt tataḥ prāptā tvadantikam // MatsP_156.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16716: kupitā mayi tanvaṅgī prakṛtyā ca dṛḍhavratā /
GP12mtp176pu:16720: lomāvartaṃ tu racitaṃ tato devaḥ pinākadhṛk /
GP12mtp176pu:16735: gaṇeśa kṣārasadṛśī śilā mātā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_157.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16743: tasyāśu vartituṃ devī vyavasyata satī tadā // MatsP_157.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:16746: āgamyovāca deveśo girijāṃ spaṣṭayā girā // MatsP_157.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16748: kiṃ putri prāptukāmāsi kimalabhyaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:16754: sa māṃ śyāmalavarṇeti bahuśaḥ proktavānbhavaḥ // MatsP_157.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16758: evaṃ bhava tvaṃ bhūyaśca bhartṛdehārdhadhāriṇī // MatsP_157.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16765: ya eṣa siṃhaḥ prodbhūto devyāḥ krodhādvarānane // MatsP_157.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:16766: sa te 'stu vāhanaṃ devi ketau cāstu mahābalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16767: gaccha vindhyācalaṃ tatra surakāryaṃ kariṣyasi // MatsP_157.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16769: dattaste kiṃkaro devi mayā māyāśatairyutaḥ // MatsP_157.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16770: ityuktā kauśikī devī vindhyaśailaṃ jagāma ha /
GP12mtp176pu:16772: praviśantīṃ tu tāṃ dvārād apakṛṣya samāhitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16775: prayojanaṃ na te 'stīha gaccha yāvanna bhetsyase // MatsP_157.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16776: devyā rūpadharo daityo devaṃ vañcayituṃ tviha /
GP12mtp176pu:16777: praviṣṭo na ca dṛṣṭo 'sau sa vai devena ghātitaḥ // MatsP_157.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16779: dvāreṣu nāvadhānaṃ te yasmātpaśyāmi vai tataḥ // MatsP_157.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16781: ataste 'tra na dāsyāmi praveśaṃ gamyatāṃ drutam // MatsP_157.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16786: praveśaṃ labhate nānyā nārī kamalalocane // MatsP_158.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:16787: ityuktā tu tadā devī cintayāmāsa cetasā /
GP12mtp176pu:16788: na sā nārīti daityo 'sau vāyurme yāmabhāṣata // MatsP_158.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16790: akāryaṃ kriyate mūḍhaiḥ prāyaḥ krodhasamīritaiḥ // MatsP_158.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:16791: krodhena naśyate kīrtiḥ krodho hanti sthirāṃ śriyam /
GP12mtp176pu:16797: ahaṃ vīraka te mātā mā te 'stu manaso bhramaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16799: mama gātracchavibhrāntyā mā śaṅkāṃ putra bhāvaya /
GP12mtp176pu:16800: tuṣṭena gauratā dattā mameyaṃ padmajanmanā // MatsP_158.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16802: jñātvā nārīpraveśaṃ tu śaṃkare rahasi sthite // MatsP_158.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16803: na nivartayituṃ śakyaḥ śāpaḥ kiṃ tu bravīmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:16804: śīghrameṣyasi mānuṣyāt sa tvaṃ kāmasamanvitaḥ // MatsP_158.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16806: śirasā tu tato vandya mātaraṃ pūrṇamānasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16810: nagasute śaraṇāgatavatsale tava nato 'smi natārtivināśini // MatsP_158.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:16813: jagati kaḥ praṇatābhimataṃ dadau jhaṭiti siddhanute bhavatī yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:16814: jagati kāṃ ca na vāñchati śaṃkaro bhuvanadhṛttanaye bhavatīṃ yathā // MatsP_158.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:16821: viyati vāyupathe jvalanojjvale 'vanitale tava devi ca yadvapuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16822: tadajite 'pratime praṇamāmyahaṃ bhuvanabhāvini te bhavavallabhe // MatsP_158.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16828: tvayi mamāstu matiḥ satataṃ śive śaraṇago 'smi nato 'smi namo 'stu te // MatsP_158.19* //
GP12mtp176pu:16830: prasannā tu tato devī vīrakasyeti saṃstutā /
GP12mtp176pu:16831: praviveśa śubhaṃ bhartur bhavanaṃ bhūdharātmajā // MatsP_158.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16832: atha rudro mahāgaurīṃ gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā tu sundarīm /
GP12mtp176pu:16837: sakāmaḥ śaṅkito dīno raudro vīro bhayānakaḥ // MatsP_158.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16840: sā cāpi bhairavī jātā devasya pratirūpiṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:16843: pārvatyā cātha niḥśaṅkaḥ śaṃkaro vābhavattataḥ // MatsP_158.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:16844: dṛṣṭvā jaganmayīṃ tāṃ tu rarāma suratapriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16845: virahotkaṇṭhitāṃ bhāryāṃ prāpya bhūyo himātmajām // MatsP_158.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:16851: nibhṛtaḥ krīḍatītyuktā yayuste ca yathāgatam // MatsP_158.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:16855: dadṛśe śayane śarvaṃ rataṃ girijayā saha // MatsP_158.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16856: dadṛśe taṃ ca deveśo hutāśaṃ śukarūpiṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:16860: lajjayā viratisthāyāṃ tvamardhaṃ piba pāvaka // MatsP_158.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:16864: vipāṭya jaṭharaṃ teṣāṃ vīryaṃ māheśvaraṃ tataḥ // MatsP_158.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:16868: tacchrutvā tu tato devī hemadrumamahājalam // MatsP_158.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:16872: pātukāmā ca tattoyaṃ svādu nirmalapaṅkajam // MatsP_158.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:16874: padmapatre tu tadvāri gṛhītvopasthitā gṛham // MatsP_158.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:16878: dāsyāmo yadi te garbhaḥ sambhūto yo bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:16879: so 'smākamapi putraḥ syād asmannāmnā ca vartatām /
GP12mtp176pu:16883: tatastāṃ kṛttikā ūcur vidhāsyāmo 'sya vai vayam /
GP12mtp176pu:16887: tasyai dadustayā cāpi tatpītaṃ kramaśo jalam /
GP12mtp176pu:16888: pīte tu salile tasmiṃs tatastasminsarovare // MatsP_158.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:16898: vāmaṃ vidārya niṣkrāntaḥ suto devyāḥ punaḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16901: śākhābhidhāḥ samākhyātāḥ ṣaṭsu vaktreṣu vistṛtāḥ // MatsP_159.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16903: skando viśākhaḥ ṣaḍvaktraḥ kārtikeyaśca viśrutaḥ // MatsP_159.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:16908: tasyāmeva tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyām abhiṣikto guhaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16913: sutāmasmai dadau śakro devaseneti viśrutām // MatsP_159.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16918: evaṃ surāstu te sarve parivāramanuttamam // MatsP_159.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16921: stotreṇānena varadaṃ ṣaṇmukhaṃ mukhyaśaḥ surāḥ // MatsP_159.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16923: namaḥ kumārāya mahāprabhāya skandāya ca skanditadānavāya /
GP12mtp176pu:16924: navārkavidyuddyutaye namo 'stute namo 'stu te ṣaṇmukha kāmarūpa // MatsP_159.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:16926: namo 'stu te 'rkapratimaprabhāya namo 'stu guhyāya guhāya tubhyam // MatsP_159.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:16927: namo 'stu trailokyabhayāpahāya namo 'stu te bāla kṛpāparāya /
GP12mtp176pu:16928: namo viśālāmalalocanāya namo viśākhāya mahāvratāya // MatsP_159.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:16929: namo namaste 'stu manoharāya namo namaste 'stu raṇotkaṭāya /
GP12mtp176pu:16930: namo mayūrojjvalavāhanāya namo 'stu keyūradharāya tubhyam // MatsP_159.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:16931: namo dhṛtodagrapatākine namaste namaḥ prabhāvapraṇatāya te 'stu /
GP12mtp176pu:16932: namaste namaste varavīryaśāline kṛpāparo no bhava bhavyamūrte // MatsP_159.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16933: kriyāparā yajñapatiṃ ca stutvā vinemurevaṃ tvamarādhipādyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16934: evaṃ tadā ṣaḍvadanastu sendrān uvāca tuṣṭaśca guhastatastān /
GP12mtp176pu:16935: nirīkṣya netrairamalaiḥ sureśāñ śatrūnhaniṣyāmi gatajvarāḥ stha // MatsP_159.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16937: kaṃ vaḥ kāmaṃ prayacchāmi devatā brūta nirvṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16938: yadyapyasādhyaṃ hṛdyaṃ vo hṛdaye cintitaṃ param // MatsP_159.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:16940: sarva eva mahātmānaṃ guhaṃ tadgatamānasāḥ // MatsP_159.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16943: tameva jahi hṛdyo 'rtha eṣo 'smākaṃ bhayāpaha // MatsP_159.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16949: sa tu gatvābravīddaityaṃ nirbhayo bhīmadarśanaḥ // MatsP_159.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16958: dṛṣṭaṃ te pauruṣaṃ śakra raṇeṣu śataśo mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:16959: nistrapatvānna te lajjā vidyate śakra durmate // MatsP_159.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:16961: nālabdhasaṃśrayaḥ śakro vaktumevaṃ hi cārhati // MatsP_159.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:16962: jitaḥ sa śakro nākasmāj jāyate saṃśrayāśrayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16977: senāṃ nākasadāṃ daityaḥ prāsādastho vyalokayat // MatsP_159.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:16979: apūrvaḥ ko bhavedyoddhā yo mayā na vinirjitaḥ // MatsP_159.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:16984: suravadana kumudakānana-vikāsanendo kumāra jaya ditijakulamahodadhivaḍavānala // MatsP_159.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:16987: jaya viśākha vibho jaya sakalalokatāraka jaya devasenānāyaka /
GP12mtp176pu:16988: skanda jaya gaurīnandana ghaṇṭāpriya priya viśākha vibho dhṛtapatākaprakīrṇapaṭala /
GP12mtp176pu:16990: jaya janitasaṃbhrama līlālūnākhilārāte jaya sakalalokatāraka ditijāsuravaratārakāntaka /
GP12mtp176pu:16991: skanda jaya bāla saptavāsara jaya bhuvanāvaliśokavināśana // MatsP_159.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:16996: sasmāra brahmaṇo vākyaṃ vadhaṃ bālādupasthitam // MatsP_160.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17001: yodhā dhāvata gṛhīta yojayadhvaṃ varūthinīm // MatsP_160.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17003: kiṃ bāla yoddhukāmo 'si krīḍa kandukalīlayā // MatsP_160.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:17005: bālatvādatha te buddhir evaṃ svalpārthadarśinī // MatsP_160.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17007: śṛṇu tāraka śāstrārthas tava caiva nirūpyate // MatsP_160.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17009: śiśutvaṃ māvamaṃsthā me śiśuḥ kālabhujaṃgamaḥ // MatsP_160.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17010: duṣprekṣyo bhāskaro bālas tathāhaṃ durjayaḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17011: alpākṣaro na mantraḥ kiṃ susphuro daitya dṛśyate // MatsP_160.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17018: mene ca durjayaṃ daityas tadā ṣaḍvadanaṃ raṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:17019: cintayāmāsa buddhyā vai prāptaḥ kālo na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_160.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17021: sarve daityeśvarā jaghnuḥ kumāraṃ raṇadāruṇam // MatsP_160.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17023: raṇaśauṇḍāstu daityendrāḥ punaḥ prāsaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // MatsP_160.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17025: kumārasya vyathā nābhūd daityāstranihatasya tu // MatsP_160.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:17031: vidruteṣvatha daityeṣu hateṣu ca samantataḥ // MatsP_160.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17033: jagrāha ca gadāṃ divyāṃ hemajālapariṣkṛtām // MatsP_160.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:17037: bibheda tārakaḥ kruddhaḥ sa sainye 'suranāyakaḥ // MatsP_160.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:17039: jagrāha śaktiṃ vimalāṃ raṇe kanakabhūṣaṇām // MatsP_160.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17043: hato 'syadya mayā śaktyā smara śastraṃ suśikṣitam // MatsP_160.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17044: ityuktvā ca tataḥ śaktiṃ mumoca ditijaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:17047: gatāsuḥ sa papātorvyāṃ pralaye bhūdharo yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:17050: nābhūt kaścit tadā duḥkhī narakeṣvapi pāpakṛt // MatsP_160.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:17052: jagmuḥ svāneva bhavanān bhūridhāmāna utsukāḥ // MatsP_160.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:17053: daduścāpi varaṃ sarve devāḥ skandamukhaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:17060: saṃdhyāmupāsya yaḥ pūrvāṃ skandasya caritaṃ paṭhet /
GP12mtp176pu:17061: sa muktaḥ kilbiṣaiḥ sarvair mahādhanapatirbhavet // MatsP_160.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:17064: tanukṣaye ca sāyujyaṃ ṣaṇmukhasya vrajennaraḥ // MatsP_160.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:17075: tataḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:17076: brahmā prīto 'bhavattasya tapasā niyamena ca // MatsP_161.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:17081: digbhiś caiva vidigbhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgaraistathā /
GP12mtp176pu:17086: brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanamabravīt // MatsP_161.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17088: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmamāpnuhi // MatsP_161.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17091: na mānuṣāḥ piśācā vā hanyurmāṃ devasattama // MatsP_161.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17092: ṛṣayo vā na māṃ śāpaiḥ śapeyuḥ prapitāmaha /
GP12mtp176pu:17093: yadi me bhagavānprīto vara eṣa vṛto mayā // MatsP_161.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17094: na cāstreṇa na śastreṇa giriṇā pādapena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17095: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na divā na niśātha vā // MatsP_161.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17097: salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // MatsP_161.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17098: ahaṃ krodhaśca kāmaśca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17102: sarvānkāmānsadā vatsa prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_161.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17103: evamuktvā sa bhagavāñ jagāmākāśa eva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:17105: tato devāśca nāgāśca gandharvā ṛṣibhiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:17110: sraṣṭā tvaṃ havyakavyānām avyaktaprakṛtir budhaḥ // MatsP_161.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17114: tapaso 'nte 'sya bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati // MatsP_161.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17117: labdhamātre vare cātha sarvāḥ so 'bādhata prajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17122: trailokyaṃ vaśamānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ // MatsP_161.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:17131: trāyasva jahi daityendraṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabho // MatsP_161.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17132: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17133: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devo brahmādīnāṃ surottama // MatsP_161.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:17136: tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipadyata mā ciram // MatsP_161.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:17141: sāhāyyaṃ ca mahābāhur oṃkāraṃ gṛhya satvaram /
GP12mtp176pu:17144: tejasā bhāskarākāraḥ śaśī kāntyeva cāparaḥ // MatsP_161.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:17146: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // MatsP_161.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:17159: susukhā na ca duḥkhā sā na śītā na ca gharmadā /
GP12mtp176pu:17160: na kṣutpipāse glāniṃ vā prāpya tāṃ prāpnuvanti te // MatsP_161.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:17162: stambhairna vibhṛtā sā vai śāśvatī cākṣapā sadā // MatsP_161.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:17163: ati candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca śikhinaṃ ca svayaṃprabhā /
GP12mtp176pu:17165: sarve ca kāmāḥ pracurā ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17168: uṣṇe śītāni toyāni śīte coṣṇāni santi ca // MatsP_161.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:17170: latāvitānasaṃchannā nadīṣu ca saraḥsu ca // MatsP_161.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:17172: gandhavanti ca puṣpāṇi rasavanti phalāni ca // MatsP_161.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:17173: nātiśītāni noṣṇāni tatra tatra sarāṃsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17174: apaśyatsarvatīrthāni sabhāyāṃ tasya sa prabhuḥ // MatsP_161.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:17176: raktaiḥ kuvalayairnīlaiḥ kumudaiḥ saṃvṛtāni ca // MatsP_161.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:17184: cūtā nīpāḥ prasthapuṣpāḥ kadambā bakulā dhavāḥ // MatsP_161.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:17202: madhūkāḥ saptaparṇāśca bahavaḥ kṣīrakā drumāḥ // MatsP_161.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:17204: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra kānanajā drumāḥ // MatsP_161.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:17220: divyātha saurabheyī ca samīcī puñjikasthalī // MatsP_161.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:17221: miśrakeśī ca rambhā ca citralekhā śucismitā /
GP12mtp176pu:17222: cārukeśī ghṛtācī ca menakā corvaśī tathā // MatsP_161.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:17226: upāsate diteḥ putrāḥ sarve labdhavarāstathā // MatsP_161.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:17230: surahantā sunāmā ca pramatiḥ sumatirvaraḥ // MatsP_161.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:17236: sragviṇo vāgminaḥ sarve sadaiva caritavratāḥ // MatsP_161.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:17238: ete cānye ca bahavo hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabhum // MatsP_161.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:17242: bhūṣitāṅgā diteḥ putrās tamupāsanta sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_161.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:17245: na śrutaṃ naiva dṛṣṭaṃ hi hiraṇyakaśiporyathā /
GP12mtp176pu:17246: aiśvaryaṃ daityasiṃhasya yathā tasya mahātmanaḥ // MatsP_161.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:17248: sa dadarśa mṛgādhipaḥ sabhāyāṃ suracitaratnagavākṣaśobhitāyām // MatsP_161.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:17259: vismitā dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuśca saḥ // MatsP_162.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17262: na śrutaṃ na ca no dṛṣṭaṃ nārasiṃhamidaṃ vapuḥ // MatsP_162.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:17264: daityāntakaraṇaṃ ghoraṃ saṃśatīva mano mama // MatsP_162.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17265: asya devāḥ śarīrasthāḥ sāgarāḥ saritaśca yāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17268: dhanado varuṇaścaiva yamaḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ // MatsP_162.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17270: nāgā yakṣāḥ piśācāśca rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ // MatsP_162.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17271: brahmā devaḥ paśupatir lalāṭasthā bhramanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:17272: sthāvarāṇi ca sarvāṇi jaṅgamāni tathaiva ca // MatsP_162.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17277: prajāpatiścātra manur mahātmā grahāśca yogāśca mahīruhāśca /
GP12mtp176pu:17278: utpātakālaśca dhṛtirmatiśca ratiśca satyaṃ ca tapo damaśca // MatsP_162.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17279: sanatkumāraśca mahānubhāvo viśve ca devā ṛṣayaśca sarve /
GP12mtp176pu:17280: krodhaśca kāmaśca tathaiva harṣo dharmaśca mohaḥ pitaraśca sarve // MatsP_162.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17282: uvāca dānavānsarvān gaṇāṃśca sa gaṇādhipaḥ // MatsP_162.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17284: yadi vā saṃśayaḥ kaścid vadhyatāṃ vanagocaraḥ // MatsP_162.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:17288: babhañja tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // MatsP_162.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17292: kālacakraṃ tathāghoraṃ viṣṇucakraṃ tathā param // MatsP_162.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:17295: raudraṃ tathograṃ śūlaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:17298: tathāpratihatāṃ śaktiṃ krauñcamastraṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_162.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17300: kampanaṃ śātanaṃ caiva tvāṣṭraṃ caiva subhairavam // MatsP_162.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17302: saṃvartanaṃ mohanaṃ ca tathā māyādharaṃ param // MatsP_162.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17305: astraṃ pāśupataṃ caiva yasyāpratihatā gatiḥ // MatsP_162.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:17326: kṣipadbhir ugrair jvalitair mahābalair mahāstrapūgaiḥ susamāvṛto babhau /*
GP12mtp176pu:17327: giriryathā saṃtatavarṣibhir ghanaiḥ kṛtāndhakārāntarakaṃdaro drumaiḥ // MatsP_162.36 //*
GP12mtp176pu:17344: avadhyasya mṛgendrasya na vyathāṃ cakrurāhave // MatsP_163.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17348: vilayaṃ jagmurākāśe khadyotā iva parvate // MatsP_163.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17355: tāni cakrāṇi vadane viśamānāni bhānti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:17361: rarāja bhagnā sā śaktir mṛgendreṇa mahītale /
GP12mtp176pu:17365: sa garjitvā yathānyāyaṃ vikramya ca yathāsukham /
GP12mtp176pu:17370: diśo daśa vikīrṇā vai khadyotaprakarā iva // MatsP_163.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17373: na ca taṃ cālayāmāsur daityaughā devasattamam /
GP12mtp176pu:17379: dhārā divi ca sarvatra vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17380: na spṛśanti ca tā devaṃ nipatantyo 'niśaṃ bhuvi // MatsP_163.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17387: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17394: hiraṇyakaśipuṃ daityaṃ vivarṇāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // MatsP_163.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17400: ityevaṃ kṣubhitāḥ sapta maruto gaganecarāḥ // MatsP_163.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:17401: ye grahāḥ sarvalokasya kṣaye prādurbhavanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:17402: te sarve gagane dṛṣṭā vyacaranta yathāsukham // MatsP_163.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:17405: vivarṇatāṃ ca bhagavān gato divi divākaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17406: kṛṣṇaṃ kabandhaṃ ca tathā lakṣyate sumahaddivi // MatsP_163.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:17409: sapta dhūmranibhā ghorāḥ sūryā divi samutthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17411: vāme tu dakṣiṇe caiva sthitau śukrabṛhaspatī /
GP12mtp176pu:17421: akāle ca drumāḥ sarve puṣpanti ca phalanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17422: latāśca saphalāḥ sarvā ye cāhurdaityanāśanam // MatsP_163.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:17423: phalaiḥ phalānyajāyanta puṣpaiḥ puṣpaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17424: unmīlanti nimīlanti hasanti ca rudanti ca // MatsP_163.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:17425: vikrośanti ca gambhīrā dhūmayanti jvalanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17430: na prakāśanti ca diśo raktareṇusamākulāḥ // MatsP_163.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:17432: vāyuvegena hanyante bhajyante praṇamanti ca // MatsP_163.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:17433: yadā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ chāyā na parivartate /
GP12mtp176pu:17439: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorotpātāḥ samutthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17450: tadā kruddhena mahatā kampitāni samantataḥ // MatsP_163.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:17454: nadī bhāgīrathī caiva sarayūḥ kauśikī tathā // MatsP_163.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:17455: yamunā tvatha kāverī kṛṣṇaveṇā ca nimnagā /
GP12mtp176pu:17456: suveṇā ca mahābhāgā nadī godāvarī tathā // MatsP_163.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:17459: narmadā śubhatoyā ca tathā vetravatī nadī /
GP12mtp176pu:17466: māgadhāśca mahāgrāmā muṇḍāḥ śuṅgāstathaiva ca // MatsP_163.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:17470: raktatoyo mahābhīmo lauhityo nāma sāgaraḥ // MatsP_163.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:17503: hemagarbho mahāśailas tathā hemasakho giriḥ // MatsP_163.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:17511: devābhraparvataścaiva tathā vai reṇuko giriḥ // MatsP_163.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:17513: ete cānye ca girayo deśā janapadāstathā // MatsP_163.89 //
GP12mtp176pu:17525: mahī ca kālaśca śaśī nabhaśca grahāśca sūryaśca diśaśca sarvāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17526: nadyaśca śailāśca mahārṇavāśca gatāḥ prasādaṃ ditiputranāśāt // MatsP_163.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:17533: bhavānkartā vikartā ca lokānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ // MatsP_163.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:17534: parāṃ ca siddhiṃ ca paraṃ ca devaṃ paraṃ ca mantraṃ paramaṃ haviśca /
GP12mtp176pu:17535: paraṃ ca dharmaṃ paramaṃ ca viśvaṃ tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam // MatsP_163.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:17536: paraṃ śarīraṃ paramaṃ ca brahma paraṃ ca yogaṃ paramāṃ ca vāṇīm /
GP12mtp176pu:17537: paraṃ rahasyaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam // MatsP_163.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:17538: evaṃ parasyāpi paraṃ padaṃ yat paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ ca devam /
GP12mtp176pu:17539: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ ca bhūtaṃ tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam // MatsP_163.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:17540: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ rahasyaṃ paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ mahattvam /
GP12mtp176pu:17541: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ mahadyat tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam // MatsP_163.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:17542: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ nidhānaṃ paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ pavitram /
GP12mtp176pu:17543: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ ca dāntaṃ tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam // MatsP_163.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:17545: stutvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ brahmalokaṃ gataḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_163.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:17558: kathaṃ ca vaiṣṇavī sṛṣṭiḥ padmamadhye 'bhavatpurā // MatsP_164.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17563: kathaṃ pādme mahākalpe tava padmamayaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:17566: puṣkare ca kathaṃ bhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā // MatsP_164.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17568: śṛṇvatastasya me kīrtiṃ na tṛptirupajāyate // MatsP_164.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17569: kiyatā caiva kālena śete vai puruṣottamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17570: kiyantaṃ vā svapiti ca ko 'sya kālasya saṃbhavaḥ // MatsP_164.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17571: kiyatā vātha kālena hy uttiṣṭhati mahāyaśāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17572: kathaṃ cotthāya bhagavān sṛjate nikhilaṃ jagat // MatsP_164.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17574: kathaṃ nirmitavāṃścaiva citraṃ lokaṃ sanātanam // MatsP_164.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17585: nārāyaṇasya yaśasaḥ śravaṇe yā tava spṛhā /
GP12mtp176pu:17588: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vadatāṃ śrutvā vai sumahātmanām // MatsP_164.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17592: yadvijñātuṃ mayā śakyam ṛṣimātreṇa sattamāḥ // MatsP_164.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17594: viśvāyanaśca yadbrahmā na vedayati tattvataḥ // MatsP_164.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:17597: tadadhyātmavidāṃ cintyaṃ narakaṃ ca vikarmiṇām // MatsP_164.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17600: sa yajño vedanirdiṣṭas tattapaḥ kavayo viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17601: yaḥ kartā kārako buddhir manaḥ kṣetrajña eva ca // MatsP_164.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17603: prāṇaḥ pañcavidhaścaiva dhruva akṣara eva ca // MatsP_164.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17604: kālaḥ pākaśca paktā ca draṣṭā svādhyāya eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17605: ucyate vividhairdevaiḥ sa evāyaṃ na tatparam // MatsP_164.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17606: sa eva bhagavānsarvaṃ karoti vikaroti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17609: yo vaktā yacca vaktavyaṃ yaccāhaṃ tadbravīmi vaḥ // MatsP_164.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:17611: yāḥ kathāścaiva vartante śrutayo vātha tatparāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17612: viśvaṃ viśvapatiryaśca sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_164.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:17613: yatsatyaṃ yadamṛtamakṣaraṃ paraṃ yad yadbhūtaṃ paramamidaṃ ca yadbhaviṣyat /
GP12mtp176pu:17614: yatkiṃcic caramacaraṃ yadasti cānyat tatsarvaṃ puruṣavaraḥ prabhuḥ purāṇaḥ // MatsP_164.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:17618: catvāryāhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tu kṛtaṃ yugam /
GP12mtp176pu:17619: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā ravinandana // MatsP_165.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17621: svadharmaniratāḥ santo jāyante yatra mānavāḥ // MatsP_165.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17622: viprāḥ sthitā dharmaparā rājavṛttau sthitā nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17623: kṛṣyāmabhiratā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣavaḥ sthitāḥ // MatsP_165.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17624: tadā satyaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca dharmaścaiva vivardhate /
GP12mtp176pu:17625: sadbhirācaritaṃ karma kriyate khyāyate ca vai // MatsP_165.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:17627: prāṇināṃ dharmasaṅgānām api vai nīcajanmanām // MatsP_165.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17629: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtyate // MatsP_165.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17631: yatra satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca tretādharmo vidhīyate // MatsP_165.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17632: tretāyāṃ vikṛtiṃ yānti varṇāstvete na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17635: dvāparasya tu yā ceṣṭā tāmapi śrotumarhasi // MatsP_165.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17636: dvāparaṃ dve sahasre tu varṣāṇāṃ ravinandana /
GP12mtp176pu:17637: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā yugamucyate // MatsP_165.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17638: tatra cārthaparāḥ sarve prāṇino rajasā hatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17639: sarve naiṣkṛtikāḥ kṣudrā jāyante ravinandana // MatsP_165.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17644: tathā varṣasahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ dve śate api /
GP12mtp176pu:17645: saṃdhyayā saha saṃkhyātaṃ krūraṃ kaliyugaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_165.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17647: kāminastapasā hīnā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // MatsP_165.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:17648: naivātisāttvikaḥ kaścin na sādhurna ca satyavāk /
GP12mtp176pu:17649: nāstikā brahmabhaktā vā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // MatsP_165.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17651: viprāḥ śūdrasamācārāḥ santi sarve kalau yuge // MatsP_165.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17653: varṇānāṃ caiva saṃdeho yugānte ravinandana // MatsP_165.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17661: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca paśūnāṃ caiva sattama /
GP12mtp176pu:17662: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛmiṇāṃ tathā // MatsP_165.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17665: bhūtvā sūryaścakṣuṣī cādadāno bhūtvā vāyuḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇajālam /
GP12mtp176pu:17666: bhūtvā vahnirnirdahansarvalokān bhūtvā megho bhūya ugro 'pyavarṣat // MatsP_165.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17672: tataḥ pītvārṇavān sarvān nadīḥ kūpāṃśca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17673: parvatānāṃ ca salilaṃ sarvamādāya raśmibhiḥ // MatsP_166.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17680: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve bhūtānyeva ca yāni tu /
GP12mtp176pu:17681: gandho ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivīṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ // MatsP_166.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17682: jihvā rasaśca snehaśca saṃśritāḥ salile guṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17684: sparśaḥ prāṇaśca ceṣṭā ca pavane saṃśritā guṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17685: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ ca khānyeva gagane saṃśritā guṇāḥ // MatsP_166.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17687: mano buddhiśca sarveṣāṃ kṣetrajñaśceti yaḥ śrutaḥ // MatsP_166.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17691: teṣāṃ saṃgharṣaṇodbhūtaḥ pāvakaḥ śatadhā jvalan // MatsP_166.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17694: vimānāni ca divyāni purāṇi vividhāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17695: yāni cāśrayaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi so 'dahat // MatsP_166.12* //
GP12mtp176pu:17697: bhūyo nirvāpayāmāsa yugāntena ca karmaṇā // MatsP_166.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17702: tena rodhena saṃchannā payasāṃ varṣato dharā /
GP12mtp176pu:17707: dagdhvā saṃplāvya ca tathā svapityekaḥ sanātanaḥ // MatsP_166.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17711: na cainaṃ kaścidavyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ veditumarhati // MatsP_166.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17712: kaścaiva puruṣo nāma kiṃyogaḥ kaśca yogavān /
GP12mtp176pu:17713: asau kiyantaṃ kālaṃ ca ekārṇavavidhiṃ prabhuḥ // MatsP_166.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:17714: kariṣyatīti bhagavān iti kaścin na budhyate // MatsP_166.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17715: na draṣṭā naiva gamitā na jñātā naiva pārśvagaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17716: tasya na jñāyate kiṃcit tamṛte devasattamam // MatsP_166.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17717: nabhaḥ kṣitiṃ pavanam apaḥ prakāśakaṃ prajāpatiṃ bhuvanadharaṃ sureśvaram /
GP12mtp176pu:17718: pitāmahaṃ śrutinilayaṃ mahāmuniṃ praśāmya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ hyarocayat // MatsP_166.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17725: virajaskaṃ mahābāhum akṣayaṃ brahma yadviduḥ // MatsP_167.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17728: yāthātathyaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ bhūtaṃ tadbrahmaṇā purā /
GP12mtp176pu:17731: yaścānyaḥ puruṣākhyaḥ syāt sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ // MatsP_167.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17732: ye ca yajñakarā viprā ye cartvija iti smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17733: asmādeva purā bhūtā yajñebhyaḥ śrūyatāṃ tathā // MatsP_167.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17734: brahmāṇaṃ prathamaṃ vaktrād udgātāraṃ ca sāmagam /
GP12mtp176pu:17737: tau mitrāvaruṇau pṛṣṭhāt pratiprastārameva ca // MatsP_167.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17741: grāvastutaṃ tu pādābhyām unnetāraṃ ca yājuṣam // MatsP_167.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17751: āśramāṇi ca puṇyāni devatāyatanāni ca // MatsP_167.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:17753: japahomaparaḥ śāntas tapo ghoraṃ samāsthitaḥ // MatsP_167.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17755: sa niṣkrāmanna cātmānaṃ jānīte devamāyayā // MatsP_167.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17761: kiṃ nu syānmama cinteyaṃ mohaḥ svapno 'nubhūyate // MatsP_167.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17763: na hīdṛśaṃ jagatkleśam ayuktaṃ satyamarhati // MatsP_167.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:17765: katamaḥ syādayaṃ loka iti cintāmavasthitaḥ // MatsP_167.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17769: śarvaryāṃ jāgratamiva bhāsantaṃ svena tejasā // MatsP_167.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17771: tathaiva sa muniḥ kukṣiṃ punareva praveśitaḥ // MatsP_167.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:17774: sa tathaiva yathāpūrvaṃ yo dharāmaṭate purā /
GP12mtp176pu:17779: catvāraścāśramāḥ samyag yathoddiṣṭā mayā tava // MatsP_167.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:17781: carataḥ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ na kukṣyantaḥ samīkṣitaḥ // MatsP_167.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17794: mā bhairvatsa na bhetavyam ihaivāyāhi me 'ntikam /
GP12mtp176pu:17795: mārkaṇḍeyo munistvāha bālaṃ taṃ śramapīḍitaḥ // MatsP_167.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:17797: ko māṃ nāmnā kīrtayati tapaḥ paribhavanmama /
GP12mtp176pu:17798: divyaṃ varṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayanniva me vayaḥ // MatsP_167.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:17799: na hyeṣa vaḥ samācāro deveṣvapi mamocitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17800: māṃ brahmāpi hi deveśo dīrghāyuriti bhāṣate // MatsP_167.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:17807: ahaṃ te janako vatsa hṛṣīkeśaḥ pitā guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17808: āyuṣpradātā paurāṇaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ nopasarpasi // MatsP_167.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:17809: māṃ putrakāmaḥ prathamaṃ pitā te 'ṅgiraso muniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17813: kaḥ samutsahate cānyo yo na bhūtātmakātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17820: iccheyaṃ tattvato māyām imāṃ jñātuṃ tavānagha /
GP12mtp176pu:17823: tarkaye tvāṃ mahātmānaṃ ko hyanyaḥ sthātumarhati // MatsP_167.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:17830: ahaṃ yogī yugākhyasya yugāntāvarta eva ca // MatsP_167.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:17832: bhujaṃgānāmahaṃ śeṣas tārkṣyo vai sarvapakṣiṇām // MatsP_167.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:17836: yattatsatyaṃ ca paramam ahamekaḥ prajāpatiḥ // MatsP_167.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:17838: ahamijyā kriyā cāham ahaṃ vidyādhipaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_167.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:17839: ahaṃ jyotirahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūmirahaṃ nabhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17840: ahamāpaḥ samudrāśca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // MatsP_167.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:17844: ahaṃ purāṇaḥ paramaṃ tathaivāhaṃ parāyaṇam // MatsP_167.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:17846: yatkiṃcitpaśyase vipra yacchṛṇoṣi ca kiṃcana // MatsP_167.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:17848: viśvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ sṛjyaṃ cādyāpi paśya mām // MatsP_167.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:17849: yuge yuge ca srakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyākhilaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:17851: śuśrūṣurmama dharmāṃśca kukṣau cara sukhaṃ mama /
GP12mtp176pu:17852: mama brahmā śarīrastho devaiśca ṛṣibhiḥ saha // MatsP_167.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:17858: tato bhagavataḥ kukṣiṃ praviṣṭo munisattamaḥ // MatsP_167.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:17865: āpavaḥ sa vibhurbhūtvā cārayāmāsa vai tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17870: nirākāśe toyamaye sūkṣme jagati gahvare // MatsP_168.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17887: bahujanmā hi viśvātmā brahmaṇo havirucyate // MatsP_168.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17889: jñānaṃ vṛṣṭaṃ tu viśvārthe yogināṃ yāti mukhyatām // MatsP_168.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17891: pade brahmaṇi viśveśaṃ nyayojayata yogavit // MatsP_168.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17893: jale krīḍaṃśca vidhivan modate sarvalokakṛt // MatsP_168.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17907: yā padmā sā rasā devī pṛthivī paricakṣyate /
GP12mtp176pu:17909: himavantaṃ ca meruṃ ca nīlaṃ niṣadhameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17910: kailāsaṃ muñjavantaṃ ca tathānyaṃ gandhamādanam // MatsP_169.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17911: puṇyaṃ triśikharaṃ caiva kāntaṃ mandarameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17912: udayaṃ piñjaraṃ caiva vindhyavantaṃ ca parvatam // MatsP_169.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17913: ete devagaṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GP12mtp176pu:17916: jambūdvīpasya saṃsthānaṃ yajñiyā yatra vai kriyāḥ // MatsP_169.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17920: asaṃkhyeyāḥ pṛthivyāste viśve vai dhātuparvatāḥ // MatsP_169.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17921: yāni padmasya parṇāni bhūrīṇi tu narādhipa /
GP12mtp176pu:17922: te durgamāḥ śailacitā mlecchadeśā vikalpitāḥ // MatsP_169.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17924: daityānāmuragāṇāṃ ca pataṅgānāṃ ca pārthiva // MatsP_169.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17928: proktātha dikṣu sarvāsu catvāraḥ salilākarāḥ // MatsP_169.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17934: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca hradānāṃ caiva nirmitaḥ // MatsP_169.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17936: śanaiḥ svayaṃbhūḥ śayanaṃ sṛjattadā jaganmayaṃ padmavidhiṃ mahārṇave // MatsP_169.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17941: tenaiva ca sahodbhūto hy asuro nāma kaiṭabhaḥ // MatsP_170.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17942: tau rajastamasau viṣṇoḥ sambhūtau tāmasau gaṇau /
GP12mtp176pu:17952: tau tatra vicarantau sma puṣkare viśvatomukham /
GP12mtp176pu:17959: ādhāya niyamaṃ mohād āste tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ // MatsP_170.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17962: tatra kaścodbhavastubhyaṃ kena vāsi na yojitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17963: kaḥ sraṣṭā kaśca te goptā kena nāmnā vidhīyase // MatsP_170.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17969: āvābhyāṃ chādyate viśvaṃ tamasā rajasātha vai // MatsP_170.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17974: sukhaṃ yatra mudā yuktaṃ yatra śrīḥ kīrtireva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17975: yeṣāṃ yatkāṅkṣitaṃ caiva tattadāvāṃ vicintaya // MatsP_170.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17977: yatnād yogavato dṛṣṭyā yogaḥ pūrvaṃ mayārjitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17978: taṃ samādhāya guṇavat sattvaṃ cāsmi samāśritaḥ // MatsP_170.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17979: yaḥ paro yogamatimān yogākhyaḥ sattvameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17982: sa eva hi yuvāṃ nāṃśe vaśī devo haniṣyati // MatsP_170.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17990: tvamāvāṃ pāhi hetvartham idaṃ nau buddhikāraṇam // MatsP_170.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17991: amoghadarśanaḥ sa tvaṃ yatastvāṃ vidvaḥ śāśvatam /
GP12mtp176pu:17996: kimarthaṃ hi drutaṃ brūtaṃ varaṃ hyasurasattamau /
GP12mtp176pu:17997: dattāyuṣkau punarbhūyo raho jīvitum icchathaḥ // MatsP_170.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:18000: tamicchāvo vadhaścaiva tvatto no 'stu mahāvrata // MatsP_170.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:18003: bhaviṣyato na saṃdehaḥ satyametadbravīmi vām // MatsP_170.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:18004: varaṃ pradāyātha mahāsurābhyāṃ sanātano viśvavaraḥ surottamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18005: rajastamovargabhavāyanau yamau mamantha tāvūrutalena vai prabhuḥ // MatsP_170.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:18009: sthitvā ca tasminkamale brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18015: sāṃkhyācāryo hi matimān kapilo brāhmaṇo varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18022: trīnimān kṛtavāṃllokān yatheyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutiḥ // MatsP_171.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:18026: kiṃ kurmastava sāhāyyaṃ bravītu bhagavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_171.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:18030: brahmaṇastu tadarthaṃ tu tadā bhūyaḥ samutthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18031: śuśrūṣurasmi yuvayoḥ kiṃ karomi kṛtāñjaliḥ // MatsP_171.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:18033: yatsatyamakṣaraṃ brahma hy aṣṭādaśavidhaṃ tu tat /
GP12mtp176pu:18034: yatsatyaṃ yadṛtaṃ tattu paraṃ padamanusmara // MatsP_171.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:18036: gatvā ca tatra brahmatvam agamajjñānatejasā // MatsP_171.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:18038: saṃkalpayitvā manasā tameva ca mahāmanāḥ // MatsP_171.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:18041: brahmābhyāsaṃ tu kṛtavān bhuvaśca pṛthivīṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18042: prāptaśca paramaṃ sthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvamāgataḥ // MatsP_171.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:18049: yaṃ kālaṃ tau gatau muktau brahmā taṃ kālameva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:18050: tato ghoratamaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃśritaḥ paramaṃ vratam // MatsP_171.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:18053: tapasā tejasā caiva varcasā niyamena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:18056: tato jagāda tripadāṃ gāyatrīṃ vedapūjitām // MatsP_171.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:18060: viśve prajānāṃ patayo yebhyo lokā viniḥsṛtāḥ // MatsP_171.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:18062: sarvamantrahitaṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā dharmaṃ sa sṛṣṭavān // MatsP_171.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:18063: dakṣaṃ marīcimatriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum /
GP12mtp176pu:18064: vasiṣṭhaṃ gautamaṃ caiva bhṛgumaṅgirasaṃ manum // MatsP_171.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:18068: tāmrā krodhātha suratā vinatā kadrureva ca // MatsP_171.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:18070: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tapasā nirmitaḥ kila // MatsP_171.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:18071: tasmai kanyā dvādaśānyā dakṣastāḥ pradadau tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:18072: nakṣatrāṇi ca somāya tadā vai dattavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_171.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:18074: lakṣmīrmarutvatī sādhyā viśveśā ca matā śubhā // MatsP_171.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:18075: devī sarasvatī caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:18076: etāḥ pañca variṣṭhā vai suraśreṣṭhāya pārthiva // MatsP_171.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:18078: yā tu rūpavatī patnī brahmaṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇī // MatsP_171.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:18079: surabhiḥ sā hitā bhūtvā brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitā /
GP12mtp176pu:18082: jajñire ca sutāstasyāṃ vipulā dhūmasaṃnibhāḥ // MatsP_171.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:18084: te rudanto dravantaśca garhayantaḥ pitāmaham // MatsP_171.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:18088: ahirbudhnyaśca bhagavān kapālī cāpi piṅgalaḥ // MatsP_171.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:18090: tasyāmeva surabhyāṃ ca gāvo yajñeśvarāśca vai // MatsP_171.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:18095: bhavaṃ ca prabhavaṃ caiva hīśaṃ cāsurahaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:18098: vatsaraṃ caiva bhūtiṃ ca sarvāsuraniṣūdanam // MatsP_171.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:18100: vāsavānugatā devī janayāmāsa vai surān // MatsP_171.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:18101: varaṃ vai prathamaṃ devaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhruvamavyayam /
GP12mtp176pu:18102: viśvāvasuṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ somamīśvaram // MatsP_171.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:18104: saptamaṃ ca tathā vāyum aṣṭamaṃ nirṛtiṃ vasum // MatsP_171.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:18106: viśve devāśca viśvāyāṃ dharmājjātā iti śrutiḥ // MatsP_171.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:18113: agniṃ cakṣuṃ ravirjyotiḥ sāvitraṃ mitrameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:18114: amaraṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca sukarṣaṃ ca mahābhujam // MatsP_171.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:18115: virājaṃ caiva vācaṃ ca viśvāvasumatiṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:18116: aśvamitraṃ citraraśmiṃ tathā niṣadhanaṃ nṛpa // MatsP_171.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:18118: bṛhantaṃ vai bṛhadrūpaṃ tathā vai pūtanānugam // MatsP_171.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:18119: marutvatī purā jajña etānvai marutāṃ gaṇān /
GP12mtp176pu:18122: pūṣā mitraśca dhanado dhātā parjanya eva ca // MatsP_171.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:18124: ādityasya sarasvatyāṃ jajñāte dvau sutau varau // MatsP_171.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:18127: kālā tu vai kālakeyān asurānsurasā tu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:18130: tāmrā tvapsarasāṃ mātā puṇyānāṃ bhāratodbhava // MatsP_171.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:18136: evaṃ vṛddhiṃ samagaman viśve lokāḥ paraṃtapa // MatsP_171.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:18137: tadā vai pauṣkaro rājan prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18141: yaścedamagryaṃ śṛṇuyāt purāṇaṃ sadā naraḥ parvasu gauraveṇa /
GP12mtp176pu:18142: avāpya lokānsa hi vītarāgaḥ paratra ca svargaphalāni bhuṅkte // MatsP_171.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:18143: cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham /
GP12mtp176pu:18144: prasādayati yaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇo 'nuprasīdati // MatsP_171.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:18145: rājā ca labhate rājyam adhanaścottamaṃ dhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:18146: kṣīṇāyurlabhate cāyuḥ putrakāmaḥ sutaṃ tathā // MatsP_171.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:18147: yajñā vedāstathā kāmās tapāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:18148: prāpnoti vividhaṃ puṇyaṃ viṣṇubhakto dhanāni ca // MatsP_171.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:18150: sarvaṃ vihāya ya imaṃ paṭhetpauṣkarakaṃ hareḥ // MatsP_171.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:18151: prādurbhāvaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha na tasya hyaśubhaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:18157: viṣṇutvaṃ śṛṇu viṣṇośca haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:18158: vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca // MatsP_172.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:18159: īśvarasya hi tasyaiṣā karmaṇāṃ gahanā gatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18162: nārāyaṇo hyanantātmā prabhavo 'vyaya eva ca // MatsP_172.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:18164: brahmā vāyuśca somaśca dharmaḥ śakro bṛhaspatiḥ // MatsP_172.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:18165: aditerapi putratvam eva yāti yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:18166: eṣa viṣṇuriti khyāta indrasyāvarajo vibhuḥ // MatsP_172.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:18174: kīrtanīyasya lokeṣu kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me // MatsP_172.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:18175: vṛte vṛtravadhe tatra vartamāne kṛte yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:18177: yatra te dānavā ghorāḥ sarve saṅgrāmadurjayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18180: trātāraṃ manasā jagmur devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // MatsP_172.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:18188: divyāni ca vimānāni prapatantyutpatanti ca // MatsP_172.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:18191: jātaṃ ca niṣprabhaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana /
GP12mtp176pu:18192: timiraughaparikṣiptā na rejuśca diśo daśa // MatsP_172.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:18198: tejasā vapuṣā caiva kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇamivācalam // MatsP_172.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:18237: dadṛśuste sthitaṃ devaṃ divye lokamaye rathe /
GP12mtp176pu:18238: te kṛtāñjalayaḥ sarve devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ // MatsP_172.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:18240: sa teṣāṃ tāṃ giraṃ śrutvā viṣṇurdaivatadaivatam // MatsP_172.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:18242: ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇur uttamaṃ vapurāsthitaḥ // MatsP_172.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:18244: śāntiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃ gaṇāḥ // MatsP_172.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:18245: jitā me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyaṃ parigṛhyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:18246: te tasya satyasaṃdhasya viṣṇorvākyena toṣitāḥ // MatsP_172.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:18248: tatastamaḥ saṃhṛtaṃ tad vineśuśca balāhakāḥ // MatsP_172.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:18249: pravavuśca śivā vātāḥ praśāntāśca diśo daśa /
GP12mtp176pu:18256: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ pākaṃ śivamāpa ca pāvakaḥ // MatsP_172.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:18263: udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakrur yuddhāya vijayāya ca // MatsP_173.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:18283: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣepaṇīyaiśca mudgaraiḥ // MatsP_173.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:18289: pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīptaśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // MatsP_173.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:18293: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau sapraroha ivācalaḥ // MatsP_173.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:18317: bāhubhiḥ parighākārais tarjayanti sma devatāḥ // MatsP_173.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:18321: cakraiśca daityapravarāś cakrur ānanditaṃ balam // MatsP_173.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:18330: surāṇāmapi sainyasya vistāraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śṛṇu // MatsP_174.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:18331: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
GP12mtp176pu:18341: yamārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavān paryeti sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:18342: havirdhāneṣu gāyanti viprā makhamukhe sthitāḥ // MatsP_174.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:18347: sa syandanavaro bhāti gupto mātalinā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:18348: kṛtsnaḥ parivṛto merur bhāskarasyeva tejasā // MatsP_174.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:18362: vimānayodhī dhanado vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ // MatsP_174.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:18364: ukṣāṇamāsthitaḥ saṃkhye sākṣādiva śivaḥ svayam // MatsP_174.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:18366: varuṇaḥ paścimaṃ pakṣam uttaraṃ naravāhanaḥ // MatsP_174.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:18368: svāsu dikṣu svarakṣanta tasya devabalasya te // MatsP_174.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:18374: cacāra madhye lokānāṃ dvādaśātmā dineśvaraḥ // MatsP_174.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:18381: jagataḥ prathamaṃ bhāgaṃ saumyaṃ satyamayaṃ ratham /
GP12mtp176pu:18383: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pañcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:18384: saptadhātugato lokāṃs trīndadhāra cacāra ca // MatsP_174.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:18389: sa vāyuḥ sarvabhūtāyur udbhūtaḥ svena tejasā /
GP12mtp176pu:18396: upatasthuḥ suragaṇāḥ prahartuṃ dānavaṃ balam // MatsP_174.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:18404: kareṇa kālīṃ vapuṣā śatrukālapradāṃ gadām // MatsP_174.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:18439: samīyuryudhyamānā vai parvatā iva parvataiḥ // MatsP_175.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:18451: viṣaṇṇavadanā devā jagmurārtiṃ parāṃ mṛdhe // MatsP_175.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:18453: bhinnoraskā ditisutair vemū raktaṃ vraṇairbahu // MatsP_175.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:18455: praviṣṭā dānavīṃ māyāṃ na śekuste viceṣṭitum // MatsP_175.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:18459: śakro daityabalaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa bahulocanaḥ // MatsP_175.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:18472: sā dadāha tataḥ sarvān māyā mayavikalpitā /
GP12mtp176pu:18478: saṃtate māyayā sainye hanyamāne ca dānavaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18481: ūrvaḥ sapūrvatejasvī sadṛśo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ // MatsP_175.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:18491: ekadehāni tiṣṭhanti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ // MatsP_175.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:18495: tvayā dharmo 'rjitastena dvitīyāṃ kuru vai tanum // MatsP_175.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:18496: sa evamukto munibhir munir marmasu tāḍitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18498: yathāyaṃ vihito dharo munīnāṃ śāśvataḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:18499: ārṣaṃ vai sevataḥ karma vanyamūlaphalāśinaḥ // MatsP_175.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:18503: asmākaṃ tu varaṃ vṛttir vanāśramanivāsinām // MatsP_175.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:18507: brahmacaryaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_175.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:18509: evamāhuḥ pare loke brahmacaryavido janāḥ // MatsP_175.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:18510: brahmacarye sthitaṃ satyaṃ brahmacarye sthitaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18511: ye sthitā brahmacarye tu brāhmaṇā divi saṃsthitāḥ // MatsP_175.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:18512: nāsti yogaṃ vinā siddhir na vā siddhiṃ vinā yaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18513: nāsti loke yaśomūlaṃ brahmacaryātparaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_175.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:18515: brahmacaryaṃ samādhatte kimataḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_175.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:18517: abrahmacarye caryā ca trayaṃ syād dambhasaṃjñakam // MatsP_175.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:18518: kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18519: nanviyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā // MatsP_175.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:18523: na dārayogo bījaṃ vā vratamuktaṃ tapasvinām // MatsP_175.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:18525: vyāhṛtaṃ sadbhiratyartham asadbhiriva me matam // MatsP_175.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:18527: dārayogaṃ vinā srakṣye putram ātmatanūruham // MatsP_175.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:18537: kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagadbhakṣye tyajasva mām // MatsP_175.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:18541: uvāca vāryatāṃ putro jagataśca dayāṃ kuru // MatsP_175.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:18543: tathyametadvacaḥ putra śṛṇu tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara // MatsP_175.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:18548: bhagavaṃstarpitaḥ putraḥ kairhavyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham // MatsP_175.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:18549: kutra cāsya nivāsaḥ syād bhojanaṃ vā kimātmakam /
GP12mtp176pu:18553: mama yonirjalaṃ vipra tasya pītavataḥ sukham // MatsP_175.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:18555: taddhavistava putrasya visṛjāmyālayaṃ ca tat // MatsP_175.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:18556: tato yugānte bhūtānām eṣa cāhaṃ ca putraka /
GP12mtp176pu:18558: eṣo 'gnir antakāle tu salilāśī mayā kṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18562: pratiyātastato brahmā ye ca sarve maharṣayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18563: aurvasyāgneḥ prabhāṃ jñātvā svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritāḥ // MatsP_175.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:18567: tapasā te muniśreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_175.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:18568: ahaṃ tu tava putrasya tava caiva mahāvrata /
GP12mtp176pu:18569: bhṛtya ityavagantavyaḥ sādhyo yadiha karmaṇā // MatsP_175.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:18574: nāsti me tapasānena bhayamadyeha suvrata // MatsP_175.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:18575: tāmeva māyāṃ gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām /
GP12mtp176pu:18578: saṃrakṣatyātmapakṣaṃ ca vipakṣaṃ ca pradhakṣyati // MatsP_175.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:18580: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtārtho dānaveśvaraḥ // MatsP_175.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:18583: tasmiṃstu vyutthite daitye nirvīryaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:18584: śāpo hyasyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭā yenaiva tejasā // MatsP_175.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:18586: dīyatāṃ me sakhā śakra toyayonirniśākaraḥ // MatsP_175.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:18594: gaccha soma sahāyatvaṃ kuru pāśadharasya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:18595: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya jayārthaṃ ca divaukasām // MatsP_176.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:18597: tvanmayaṃ sarvalokeṣu rasaṃ rasavido viduḥ // MatsP_176.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:18601: na viduḥ soma devāpi ye ca nakṣatrayonayaḥ // MatsP_176.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:18603: tamaḥ protsārya mahasā bhāsayasyakhilaṃ jagat // MatsP_176.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:18608: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kāntivapuṣāṃ tvaṃ somaḥ somapāyinām /
GP12mtp176pu:18611: śamaya tvāsurīṃ māyāṃ yayā dahyāma saṃyuge // MatsP_176.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:18620: veṣṭayanti sma tānghorān daityānmeghagaṇā iva // MatsP_176.14 //
